śrī umā maheśvarābhyām namaḥ
vande mahāgaṇapatim madanāri sūnum
vāma ūru su stha vanitā bhuja veṣṭita aṅgam
vallīśa pūrvajam abhīṣṭa dama āśritānām
vāṇīpati pramukha deva gaṇa arcita aṅghrim
tantra avatāraḥ mantrāṇām uddhāraḥ snānam arcanam
arcana aṅgam ca naivedya vidhiḥ kuṇḍasya lakṣaṇam
agni kāryam kāla vidhiḥ nimittasya parīkṣaṇam
bhū parīkṣā praveśa artha baliḥ grāma ādi lakṣaṇam
śaṅkoḥ tu sthāpanam ca eva māna upakaraṇa kramam
pada vinyāsa bhedaḥ ca sūtra marma ādi lakṣaṇam
vāstu deva baliḥ paścāt grāma ādīnām ca lakṣaṇam
daṇḍaka ādi vidhiḥ vīthi dvāra ādīnām pramāṇakam
grāma ādi devatā sthānam dvija saṃkhyā vidhānakam
vinyāsasya viśeṣaḥ ca brahma deva pada ādi ca
aṅga upajīvinām sthānam garbhanyāsasya lakṣaṇam
bālasthāna vidhānam ca grāma ādi nyāsa bhedataḥ

original: vāstuśāntiśca śālāyā vidhānaṃ ca tataḥ param || 1/7 ||
analyzed: vāstuśāntiḥ ca śālāyāḥ vidhānam ca tatas param

original: catuḥ śālā pañcaśālā hastiśālā ca mālikā |
analyzed: catur śālā pañcaśālā hasti śālā ca mālikā

ādya iṣṭakā upapīṭham ca pādānām māna lakṣaṇam
prastarasya vidhiḥ ca eva prāsādānām ca bhūṣaṇam
kaṇṭhasya śikharasya api sthūpikāyāḥ ca lakṣaṇam
nāla ādi sthāpanam paścāt eka bhūmi ādi lakṣaṇam
mūrdheṣṭakā vidhānam ca liṅga lakṣma aṅkura arpaṇam
śiva liṅga pratiṣṭhā ca pratimānām ca lakṣaṇam
śūla saṃsthāpanam paścāt devasthāpana saṃjñakam
pratimānām pratiṣṭhā ca vimāna sthāpanam param

paścima dvāra pūjā ca dakṣiṇa dvāra pūjanam
arcanam sakalānām ca mahā snapana lakṣaṇam
nitya utsava vidhiḥ paścāt mahā utsava vidhiḥ param
nīrājana kriyā pūrvā phalgunī pūjanam param
ghṛta abhiṣekam dolāyāḥ rohaṇam kṣaudra pūjanam
dīpa āvali vidhānam ca ghṛta kambala pūjanam
śivarātriḥ atho gandha pūjā damanaka arcanam
nava naivedya pūjā ca dīkṣā samaya saṃjñitā
sthālīpāka vidhiḥ svapnādhyāyaḥ nirvāṇa saṃskṛtiḥ
ācāryasya abhiṣekaḥ ca gotra pravara nirṇayaḥ
śata abhiṣekaḥ ca antyeṣṭiḥ pitṛ yajña vidhiḥ tatas
śaiva śrāddham tatas sarva prāyaścittam tatas param
adbhutānām ca śāntiḥ syāt anukarma vidhānakam

prāsāda lakṣaṇam liṅga vaśāt prāsāda lakṣaṇam
vyakta liṅga pratiṣṭhā ca sārvadeśika liṅginaḥ
aṅga liṅga pratiṣṭhā ca sa deśa sthāpanam tatas
devyāḥ vighneśvarasya api sthāpanam nṛtta mūrtinaḥ
soma āskandasya candra ardha mauleḥ tripuravairiṇaḥ  /
liṅga udbhava pratiṣṭhā ca dakṣiṇāmūrtinaḥ tathā
bhikṣāṭanasya kaṅkāla mūrteḥ pāśupatasya ca
triśūla śarabha īśāna caṇḍa īśa sthāpana ādi ca
śiva bhakta āyudhānām ca siṃhāsana vidhiḥ tathā

original: siddhāntaṃ gāruḍaṃ vāmaṃ bhūtatantraṃ ca bhairavam |
analyzed: siddhāntam gāruḍam vāmam bhūtatantram ca bhairavam
ūrdhva pūrva kubera āsya yāmya vaktrāt yathākramam
īśāna vaktrāt ūrdhva sthāt jñānam yat kāmika ādikam
daśa aṣṭādaśa bhedena śiva rudra avatārakaiḥ
ṣaṭṣaṣṭibhiḥ krameṇa eva kathitam tu śiva ājñayā
tat eva yuga bhedena sadyojāta ādi mūrtibhiḥ
prakāśitam catur bhedam mūrti saṃkhyā vaśena tu
saṃkhyayā gāruḍam tadvat pūrva vaktrāt vinirgatam
sāvitrī ādyam ca siddhi artham uktam tat avatārakaiḥ
naya sūtra ādi bhedena vāmam vāmāt vinirgatam
caturviṃśati saṃkhyākam avatīrṇam śiva ājñayā
kaula ādi viṃśat saṃkhyātam bhūtatantram tu sat yatas
dvividham tantram udbhūtam bhairavam dakṣiṇa āsyataḥ
asitāṅga ādibhiḥ bhūmau kathitam tat anekadhā
pratyekam tantra bheda uktau jāyate grantha vistaraḥ
atha siddhānta tantrāṇām avatāraḥ nigadyate
tanoti vipulān arthān tattva mantra samāśritān
trāṇam ca kurute yasmāt tantram iti abhidhīyate

yoga jam tu sudhā ākhyasya proktam tat lakṣa saṃkhyayā

vīṇāśikhā uttaram tāram santam santatiḥ eva ca
ātma yogam ca pañca ete yoga tantrasya bhedakāḥ
cintyam sudīpta saṃjñasya proktam śata sahasrakaiḥ

kāṣṭha gomaya pāṣāṇaka asthi ādi parivarjayet
sa vāsāḥ vāma hastena saṅgṛhya
śuddhām aśarkarām mṛdvīm mṛdam śauca artham āharet
vṛkṣa ambu setu valmīka grāma madhya utkara sthitām
mṛdam anya avaśiṣṭān ca śauca artham parivarjayet
prakṣālita ambu tīre tu vinyaset svatya dakṣiṇe
śaucam samācaret eka mṛdā janana śodhanam
tathā eva vāma hasta tantu saptabhiḥ guda śodhanam
daśabhiḥ vāma hastantu saptabhiḥ ca ubhayaṅkaram

original: pādau pāṇīca saṃśoddhya mṛdā caiva sakṛtsakṛt |

sa upavītaḥ samutthāya budhaḥ
gṛhe maitra pade vā api kṛtvā ca āvaśyaka kriyām
śaucam samācaret snānam mandire prāc vidhānataḥ
saṃgrāhya dantakāṣṭham tu haret danta gatam malam
vasu arka aṅgula mānan tu kāṣṭham naiṣṭhika bhoginoḥ
sārdram tvac anvitam ṛjum sama chedam ṛju udvaham
kaniṣṭhā aṅgulinā aham tu kartavyam ubhayam nṛṇām
karañjan ciribilvan ca khadiran ca arjunan tathā

analyzed: aviraktaḥ purā brāhmīm sandhyām vandeta sādhakaḥ

sthitvā vāma kare tri bhāgam udagānanaḥ

mūlena daśadhā indu stham bhāgam eva tu mantrayet  /
dikṣu astra japtam prakṣipya mūla japtam jale nyaset

athavā sva gṛhe śuddha vāriṇā śītalena vā

śivena eva ukta vat vyātvā nirdvandvaḥ mṛtam aśnute
kṛtvā evam ātma śuddhim tu sthāna śuddhim atha ācaret  /
tāla mudrā trayam kṛtvā prākāram hetinā smaret
tad bahis parighām dhyātvā kavacena eva mantrataḥ
astra jālam tu tad bāhye nyaset vighna apanuttaye
divyam dhāma vicintya atha dravya śuddhim prakalpayet
tatas saṃpūrya gandha ambu vardhanyām astra mantrataḥ
prokṣayet tena toyena śuddhi artham heti mantrataḥ
arghya pātram ca śaṅkham ca pādya ācamana pātrakam
yat anyat upayogyam tu hetinā kṣālayet tatas
hṛdayena nirīkṣya atha kavacena avakuṇṭhayet
sauvarṇam rājatam tāmram kelihāram ca śaṅkha jam
anyat vā yantrikā ādi stham pātram uktam śiva arcane
tatas saṃpūrya gandha ambu vardhanyām astra mantrataḥ
ghandha puṣpa ādikam sarvam ānītam paricārakaiḥ
puṇyāham vācayitvā atha prokṣayet dhṛdayena tu
prakṣālya pādya pātram tu gandha toyena pūrayet

original: uśīraṃ candanaṃ caiva pādye tu parikalpayet |
analyzed: uśīram candanam ca eva pādye tu parikalpayet
tadvat ācamanīya artham tat pātram parikalpayet

original: palatrayaṃ ca karpūraṃ truṭīpatraṃ ca kuṣṭhakam |

analyzed: ācamīye prayoktavyam hṛdayena tu mantrataḥ
arghya pātre nyaset paścāt aparam gandha toyakam
āpaḥ kṣīra kuśa agrāṇi taṇḍulāḥ sumanāḥ tilāḥ

original: arghyo'ṣṭāṅga iti prokto yavaiḥ siddhārthakaiḥ saha |
analyzed: arghya uṣṭāṅgaḥ iti proktaḥ yavaiḥ siddhārthakaiḥ saha
kalpayitvā viśeṣa arghyam tatra mantra gaṇān nyaset
sudhayā paramīkṛtya varmaṇā ācchādya pūjayet
tad toyaiḥ kavacena eva sa kuśam prokṣayet tathā
gandham puṣpam ca dhūpam ca dīpam arghyam nivedyakam
dadhi kṣīra ghṛta ādīn ca prokṣayet hṛdayena tu
pṛ
pūjā artham kalpitam dravyam pratyekam abhimantrayet
śrīkhaṇḍa agaru patrakaiḥ ca kusumaiḥ āmodibhiḥ saṃyutāḥ
āpaḥ majjana karmaṇe praṇihitāḥ śambhoḥ yathā lābhataḥ
prokta dravya gaṇeṣu labdham iha yat tat grāhyam āḍhya itaraiḥ
arghya ambhasaḥ jala lavam sa puṣpam hṛdayena tu
snāna kumbheṣu sarveṣu nikṣipet tat dvi śuddhaye
hṛdayena pavitraiḥ vā yat vā aṅgaiḥ tad svabhāvakaiḥ

original: gandhaṃ vastraṃ bhūṣaṇañca naivedyaṃ kusumaṃ tathā || 6/217 ||
analyzed: gandham vastram bhūṣaṇam ca naivedyam kusumam tathā
sadya vāma mahā ghora nara īśaiḥ abhimantrayet
avaśiṣṭam tu gāyatryā mantrayet dravya śuddhaye
paye dadhi ghṛta kṣaudra śarkarāḥ gandha vāri ca
pavitraiḥ hṛdaya ādyaiḥ vā snāna artham abhimantrayet  /
viśuddha mantra dravyāṇi iṣṭvā gandha ādibhiḥ kramāt
mudrayā ca amṛtīkṛtya bhāvayet amṛta ākhyayā
ātmānam arcayet dravyaiḥ evaṃbhūtaiḥ yathākramam

original: tilakaṃ candanaṃ kṛtvā puṣpaṃ śirasi vinyaset || 6/221 ||
analyzed: tilakam candanam kṛtvā puṣpam śirasi vinyaset

original: saṃgrāhya vāñchitaṃ maunaṃ tato mantrān viśodhayet |
analyzed: saṃgrāhya vāñchitam maunam tatas mantrān viśodhayet
mālā ādi aiśvarya jālāni mantrāṇām kīrtitāni vai

original: teṣāṃ prabodhinīśaktiḥ śivājñā oṃ namaḥ smṛtāḥ |
analyzed: teṣām prabodhinī śaktiḥ śiva ājñā om namaḥ smṛtāḥ
oṃkāra di namaḥ ntāḥ ca paṭhet mantrān aśeṣatas
baddha puṣpa añjaliḥ bhūtvā śiva sadbhāva bhāvitaḥ
tri mātrāt akrameṇa eva yāvat nāda antamam vrajet
mantra suddhiḥ bhavet evam śuddha tattva samāśrayāt
yojaye pañcagavyam tu tad vidhānam iha ucyate  /
maṇḍapasya śubhe bhāge kṣetre navapadīkṛte
pañcatattva kṛta nyāse pañca pātrāṇi vinyaset

original: śive sādākhyavadyāyāṃ kāle puṃsi ca deśikaḥ |
analyzed: śive sādākhya vadyāyām kāle puṃsi ca deśikaḥ
su pratiṣṭham su śāntam ca tejovat amṛta ātmakam

original: ratnodakaṃ ca saṅkalpya kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ nyaset |
analyzed: ratna udakam ca saṅkalpya kṣīram dadhi ghṛtam nyaset
gomayam ca eva go mūtram īśāna ādyaiḥ tu mantritam
eka dvi tri catur pañca vāraiḥ ṣoḍhā kuśa udakam
amṛtīkṛtya sa pūjya śivena eka tvam ādiśet
payaḥ dadhi ghṛta kṣaudra śarkarāḥ gandha vāri ca
pavitraiḥ hṛdaya ādyaiḥ vā snāna artham abhimantrayet  /

original: nitye naimittike vāpi kāmye vā kārayetprabhoḥ |
analyzed: nitye naimittike vā api kāmye vā kārayet prabhoḥ
snapanam tu yathānyāyam tat ca anekavidham bhavet
astreṇa śodhayet bhūmim vāmadevena lepayet
sūtra nyāsam aghoreṇa tāla mātra antaram yathā
tri tālam karṇikā mānam sarva sāmānyam īritam
catur dalam yadā pañca kalaśa sthāpanam diśi
vidikṣu api nava ākhyam syāt samantāt ekam āvṛtam
pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyātam tat samantāt samāvṛtam
ekonapañcāśat khyātam aṣṭottaraśatam dvijāḥ
pañcaviṃśati sakhyātān kalaśān madhyama sthitān
parihṛtya samantāt tu dvābhyām vā ekena mārgataḥ
aṣṭa dvāra samāyuktam bahis āvaraṇa dvayam
madhyame tithi saṃkhyāḥ syuḥ nava koṇe vyavasthitāḥ
madhyame tithim akhyātam madhyama tritayam tyajet
aṣṭottaraśatam hi etat sahasran ced nava adhikam
sūtra dvayam nyaset pūrva apara gam yāmya saumyakam
sārdha hasta antaram hasta māna antaram atha api vā
syāt caturdaśa saṃkhyātāḥ vṛtiḥ bāhye bhrameṇa ca
anta mārgam samābāhya vidhiḥ śāstre samīritā
madhya vyūhasya paritas catuṣkuṇḍam tu vā aṣṭakam
catvāriṃśat vyūhakasya pṛthak syāt pañcaviṃśatiḥ
aṣṭottarasahasrāt tu tyajet bāhya āvṛti guruḥ
pṛ
tatra āgneya ādi koṇa stha catur vyūham samācaret
anyat sarvam samānam syāt aṣṭa pañca śatam bhavet
aṣṭa saṃkhyā samāyukte dviśate madhyama iṣṭakam
bāhye ṣoḍaśa saṃkhyātān gṛhṇīyāt diś vidiś gatam
aṣṭa vyūham tathā tu etat ukta saṃkhyā anvitam bhavet
sthaṇḍilam puruṣeṇa syāt catur prastha mitam param
ārabhya dviguṇam ca eka vṛddhyā daśaguṇa avadhi

original: mānaṃ ca śivakumbhe syāttadardhaṃ karake matam || 6/245 ||
analyzed: mānam ca śiva kumbhe syāt tad ardham karake matam
catur tri dvi eka saṃkhyātāḥ prastha māna prapūrite
kalaśe veṣṭanam dvi tri vyoma sūtraiḥ krameṇa tu
varāla truṭi karpūra nyagrodha uśīra jātayaḥ
ebhiḥ yuktam śiva ambhaḥ syāt śiva mantra abhimantritam
tena eva pūrayet kumbham vardhanī kalaśān api
ṣaṭtriṃśat tattva paryantān kuśān tri ādīn atha nyaset  /
kūrcān aiśena mantreṇa dravya mūlena vinyaset
vastra yugmena saṃveṣṭya śiva kumbham ca vardhanīm

original: navapañcātmakaṃ ratnaṃ śive śaktau ca vinyaset |
analyzed: nava pañca ātmakam ratnam śive śaktau ca vinyaset
pādyam ācamanam ca arghyam pañcagavyam catur diśi

original: kuśodakaṃ tataḥ kṣīraṃ dadhikoṇe ghṛtaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: kuśa udakam tatas kṣīram dadhi koṇe ghṛtam bhavet
dvitīya snapanam proktam tṛtīyam ca nigadyate
madhu lājam saktu cūrṇam lāja cūrṇam haridrakā
bhūti ikṣu sāra kadalī tila sarṣapa pānasāḥ
nārikelam ca nāraṅga dvayam syāt mātuluṅgakam
pañcaviṃśati madhye tu saṃtyajet antara āvṛtam

original: evaṃ kṛte bhavedatra kalaśānāṃ tu ṣoḍaśa |
analyzed: evam kṛte bhavet atra kalaśānām tu ṣoḍaśa
catur dikṣu ca koṇeṣu pādya ādi aṣṭakam īritam
antarāle tu madhu ādi vasu saṃkhyākam īritam
prāk ukta tritayam ca etat viśeṣāt nityakarmaṇi
pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyātam api nitye praśaṃsitam
uttamottama pūjāyām aṣṭottaraśata avadhi
naimittikam tad ūrdhva stha pūrva uktam api śaṃśitam
dravyāṇi etāni sarvāṇi mūlamantreṇa vinyaset
pidhāya bījamukhyena śarāvaiḥ pallavaiḥ tu vā
da tvā hṛdayamantreṇa vastrāṇi vividhāni ca
āsanam saṃprakalpya asmin kumbhe mūrtim anusmaret
brahmabhiḥ sakalīkṛtya tad kalāḥ tatra vinyaset
nyasta vidyā tanum tad tad rūpam dhyātvā śivam nyaset

original: sthāpanādi ca pādyādi kṛtvā datvā hṛdā guruḥ || 6/260 ||
analyzed: sthāpana ādi ca pādya ādi kṛtvā da tvā hṛdā guruḥ

original: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca dīpamarghyaṃ vidhāya ca |
analyzed: gandham puṣpam ca dhūpam ca dīpam arghyam vidhāya ca
padarśya liṅga mudrām tu kavacena avakuṇṭhayet

original: iṣṭvā gaurīṃ ca vardhanyāṃ yonimudrāṃ pradarśya ca |
analyzed: iṣṭvā gaurīm ca vardhanyām yonimudrām pradarśya ca
pañca kḷptau tu brahmāṇi hitvā īśānam dvijottamāḥ
vidyeśāḥ nava kṷptau syuḥ bāhye mūrti īśvarāḥ diśi
antare vāmadeva ādyāḥ pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyake

krodha ādyāḥ vasu saṃkhyātāḥ śata rudra ādikāḥ tu vā
ekonena tu pañcāśat snapane devatāḥ mataḥ
madhye vidyeśvarāḥ pūjyāḥ śata rudrāḥ bahis matāḥ
aṣṭottaraśata ākhye ca snapane devatāḥ matāḥ

original: vidyeśā madhyame devāstvanyatra śiva eva hi ||
analyzed: vidyeśāḥ madhyame devāḥ tu anyatra śive eva hi

original: sa ca nāmnāṃ sahasraistu paṭhyate tadviśeṣataḥ ||266 ||
analyzed: sa ca nāmnām sahasraiḥ tu paṭhyate tat viśeṣataḥ

pṛ
liṅgam trividham ākhyātam vyakta avyakta ubhaya ātmakam

original: sthiraliṅgaṃ caraṃ vāpi trividhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tathā |
analyzed: sthira liṅgam caram vā api trividham maṇḍalam tathā

original: paṭaṃ vā bhitticitraṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā mantrasaṃskṛtam || 6/270 ||
analyzed: paṭam vā bhitti citram vā pīṭham vā mantra saṃskṛtam
vahni ambu guru vṛkṣa ādyam vidyāpīṭham atha api vā
viśeṣataḥ svayam siddham pāṣāṇam ratnam eva vā
anyat vā liṅga kalpa uktam saikata ādyam viśeṣataḥ
etat sarvam śiva ijyā artham yathāyogam prakalpayet
sāmānya arghyam ca saṃgrāhya dvāra agre vṛṣabham yajet
lohajam saṃyajet dvāre parivāre tu śailajam
saptavargāt caturtham tu sapta svara vibhūṣitam
bindu nāda samāyukta mādo praṇava pūrvakam
vṛṣabhāya namaḥ ca ante tasmin brahma aṅga kalpanā
dvāram astreṇa saṃprokṣya dvārapān arcayet kramāt
gaṇapam bhāratīm ūrdhve nandinam jāhnavī yutam
mahākālena yamunām savye savye samarcayet  /
vimalam ca subāhum ca talpayoḥ ca kramāt yajet
ete pūjyāḥ namaḥ ntaiḥ ca hṛdaya ādyaiḥ yathākramam
rūpa saṃsthāna bhāvaiḥ tu gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt
kāryam trividha vighnānām nyasya khaṅgam udumbare
dvāra pūjā avasāne tu snāna ante ca nivedyake
sandhyā avasāne nikṣepyam pracchanna paṭam uttamam
saṃpūjya ātmabhuvam vāstoṣpate brahmaṇe iti api
liṅga madhya gatām pūjām pūrva kāle prakalpitām

original: gāyatryā pūjayitvā tu sāmānyārghyaṃ tu dāpayet |
analyzed: gāyatryā pūjayitvā tu sāmānya arghyam tu dāpayet
uccārya pañca brahmāṇi pūjām liṅgāt visṛjya ca
hṛd mantreṇa īśa diś bhāge pīṭhikā ādau yathāvidhi
caṇḍa īśāya iti nikṣipya piṇḍikām astra yogataḥ
viśodhya dakṣa hastena śiva liṅgam tu śodhayet
astra ambunā eva saṃśodhya śiva liṅgam sa vedikam
sāmānya arghya jalaiḥ paścāt abhiṣecanam ācaret
āvāhana āsanam padmam anantam snāna karmaṇi

iti ātma sthāna dravya arṇa liṅga śuddhau kṛte sati

parikīrtitam
mahāmāyā avasānam tu divya deham vicintayet

original: yallaghu vyāpakaṃ taddhi vyāptaṃ hi tadadhiṣṭhitam || 6/290 ||
analyzed: yat laghu vyāpakam tat hi vyāptam hi tat adhiṣṭhitam
tṛṇa vat vāyunā dṛśyam dhāryate jāyate yayā
sādhāra śaktiḥ nyastavyā pūrvam kūrma śilā āsane
dugdha abdhi sadṛśa ākārā kalpitā hṛdaya arṇa gā
anantam nīla saṃkāśam aneka phaṇa maṇḍitam
hṛdaya iñjali saṃyuktam eka vaktram catur bhujam
kṣīrābdhitaḥ samutpanna saroruha sama ākṛtim
tatra ādhāre hṛdā mantrī vinyaset āsana ātmakam
tad vīrya bhūtāḥ dharma ādyāḥ catuṣkoṇa stha pādukāḥ
siṃha ākāra sita arka aṃśu pīta kṛṣṇa nibhāḥ śubhāḥ
anyonya vīkṣaṇaiḥ siṃhaiḥ anekaiḥ parivāritāḥ
adharma ajñāna avairāgya anaiśvarya ākhyāni tāni tu
pṛ
citra varṇa svarūpāṇi dikṣu gātrāṇi kalpayet
adhas chadanam ūrdhvam ca raktam śuklam vicintayet
bandha mocana hetu ādi śakti dvaya mayam dvayam
padmam aṣṭa dala upetam siddhi aṣṭaka samanvitam
śakti kesara saṃbhinnam karṇikā śakti saṃyutam

original: vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrī ca kālī caiva tataḥ param || 6/300 ||
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrī ca kālī ca eva tatas param
balapramathinī ca eva sarvabhūtadamanī api
pūrva ādi īśāna paryantam kesareṣu daleṣu ca
vāmā ādyāḥ śaktayaḥ raktāḥ śveta ābhā syāt manonmanī
maṇḍala trayam arka indu vahni ākhyam sva svarūpataḥ
dala antam kesara antam ca karṇikā antam prakalpayet
brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca maṇḍala traya devatāḥ
brahmāṇam sa catur vaktram catur bāhu vibhūṣitam
kamaṇḍalu dharam raktam daṇḍa hastam prajāpatim
akṣa mālā dharam divyam padma hastam su locanam
dhyātvā patreṣu vinyasya sarva kilviṣa nāśanam
atasī puṣpa saṃkāśam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
pīta ambara dharam divyam vanamālā vibhūṣitam
sphurat makuṭa māṇikya kiṃkiṇī jāla maṇḍitam
dhyātvā viṣṇum mahātmānam kesareṣu niveśayet
śaṅkha kunda indu dhavalam śūla hastam trilocanam
siṃha carma parīdhānam śaśāṅka kṛta śekharam
nīlakaṇṭham vṛṣa ārūḍham rudram dhyātvā viśeṣataḥ
karṇikāyām niveśya enam mahāpātaka nāśam
tatra eva ātma trayam nyasya guṇatrayam atas param
vahnitrayam ca tatra eva vinyaset pravibhāgaśaḥ
evam pṛthvī ādi tattvānām śuddhavidyā avasānakam

original: vyapti? sañcintya tanmadhye śaktiṃ bhūyo'pi vinyaset || 6/312 ||
analyzed: vyapti sañcintya tad madhye śaktim bhūyas api vinyaset
evam śakti ādi śakti antam āsanam parameṣṭhinaḥ
anantaḥ kartṛ rūpeṇa pīṭha ātmā tu atra tiṣṭhati
evam saṃkṣepataḥ viprāḥ pīṭha kḷptiḥ iha ucyate

original: dharmo jñānaṃ ca vairāgyaṃ tvaiśvaryaṃ ca catuṣṭayam || 6/314 ||
analyzed: dharmaḥ jñānam ca vairāgyam tu aiśvaryam ca catuṣṭayam
anantaḥ śaktiḥ iti evam ṣaḍ aṅgāni āsanasya tu
ṣaḍadhvam āsanam śambhoḥ pūjā syāt hṛdayena tu
athavā anya prakāreṇa kathyate pīṭha kalpanā
sarva adhva nirmitam pīṭham catur yuga mahā aṅghrikam
pañcāśat bhāva sambhinna kaṇṭakaiḥ upaśobhitam
vidyeśvara dalam śakti kesaraiḥ upaśobhitam
pīṭham evaṃvidham dhyāyet mātṛkā akṣara sambhavam
napuṃsaka akṣaraiḥ eva dharma ādīn parikalpayet
anantam sṛṣṭi pūrveṇa tad pūrveṇa mahā ambujam
karṇikā antam svara antena
oṃkāra ādyāḥ akāra antāḥ tyakta ṣaṇḍa nava svarāḥ
vāmā jyeṣṭhā ādi śaktīnām kramāt utkramataḥ nava
kesarāṇi caturviṃśatka ādi bha antargatāni ca
makāra ādi hakāra antaiḥ nava bījāni kalpayet
maṇḍala trayam atra eva pūrvak parikalpayet
mātṛkā sambhavam pīṭham evam āpādya pūjayet
maṇḍala tritaya ibhyutthām anala stambha sannibhām
pṛ
mūrtim īśvara tatva antām liṅganāhe tu vinyasem
hṛd sampuṭam ajātam vai mūrtimantram udāhṛtam
tathā eva mūle eva ayam sādākhyam mantram ucyate

anyaiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ dīpaiḥ jvālayet tu samantataḥ

original: godānaṃ tiladānaṃ ca svarṇadānaṃ tathaiva ca || 6/444 ||
analyzed: go dānam tila dānam ca svarṇa dānam tathā eva ca
gavām tṛṇa ādi dānam ca kuryāt loka upacārataḥ
prabhūtaiḥ sneha sampūrṇaiḥ jvaladbhiḥ dīpakaiḥ sthiraiḥ
kuryāt ārātrikam paścāt sat vartyā pratibodhitaiḥ
yathāṅgam tilakaiḥ vā tripuṇḍrakaiḥ
naivedyam balau abhyantare pi ca
sakṛt āvamanam da tvā kartavyam karma ca uttaram
praṇamya adhyeṣya labdha ājñaḥ bahis āvaraṇam yajet
īśānam karṇikāyām tu pūjayet kusuma ādibhiḥ

original: puruṣaṃ pūrvapatre tu aghoraṃ dakṣiṇe yajet |
analyzed: puruṣam pūrva patre tu aghoram dakṣiṇe yajet
vāmam uttara patre tu sadyam paścima patrataḥ
vinyaset pañca patrāṇi pañca vaktra yutāni ca
bāhubhiḥ daśabhiḥ ca eva śaśāṅka makuṭaiḥ saha
dhyātavyāni sva rūpāṇi vara āyudha dharāṇi ca
agni īśa rakṣaḥ vāyavya catur dikṣu gatam yajet
vṛt śiraḥ cūlikā varma netram astram yathākramam
hṛdayam candra varṇa ābham śiraḥ gorocana prabham
taṭit jvalana saṃkāśām śikhām samyak vicintayet
ādhūmram kavacam nyasyet astram kapila varṇakam
jyotī rūpa prakāśam ca netram madhya gatam smaret
pañcavaktra yutāḥ sarve daśa bāhu indu bhūṣitāḥ
nānā ābharaṇa saṃyuktāḥ nānā sraj gandha bhūṣitāḥ
dvis aṣṭa vatsara ākārāḥ surūpāḥ sthira yauvanāḥ
prasanna vadanāḥ saumyāḥ trinetrāḥ svastika āsanāḥ
mūrdha ādibhyaḥ hṛd ādibhyaḥ tu ānetavyāḥ prabhoḥ ime
īśānam netram aiśānyām athavā sādhakaḥ yajet
garbha āvaraṇam evam tu pūjayet abhitas haram
sthāne ismin athavā pūjyāḥ vāmā ādyāḥ śaktayaḥ nava
aṅka ārūḍhā prabhoḥ pūjyā ādiśaktiḥ manonmanī  /
āvāhana ādinā etāni sva mantraiḥ kramaśas urcayet
na avakuṇṭhanam eteṣām amṛtīkaraṇam vinā
saṃskāra aṣṭakam eva etat pratyekam vihitam budhaiḥ
snapanam dīpa kḷptiḥ ca na pṛthak ca aṅga bhāvataḥ
pṛ
vidyeśvarāḥ dvitīye tu ananta ādyāḥ yathākramam
ananta īśaḥ ca sūkṣmaḥ ca śiva uttama eka netrakau
eka rudraḥ trimūrtiḥ ca śrīkaṇṭhaḥ ca śikhaṇḍikaḥ
ete devāḥ catur vaktrāḥ hara vat daśa bāhavaḥ
khaṇḍa indu maulayaḥ saumyāḥ padma sthāḥ vividha āyudhāḥ
khaḍga kheṭa dhanuḥ bāṇa kamaṇḍalu akṣasūtriṇaḥ
vara abhaya kara upetāḥ śūla paṅkaja pāṇayaḥ
yugānta āditya saṃkāśāḥ saṃsṛṣṭau śiva coditāḥ  /

original: anantaḥ pūrvataḥ pūjyaḥ sūkṣmaṃ dakṣiṇato yajet |
analyzed: anantaḥ pūrvatas pūjyaḥ sūkṣmam dakṣiṇatas yajet
śivottamam tu vāruṇyām ekanetram tathā uttare
ekarudram tathā aiśānyām trimūrtim ca agni gocare

original: śrīkaṇṭhāṃ caiva nairṛtyāṃ vāyavyāṃ tu śikhaṇḍinam || 6/466 ||
analyzed: śrīkaṇṭhām ca eva nairṛtyām vāyavyām tu śikhaṇḍinam
gaṇeśvarāḥ tṛtīye tu kubeḥ āśāt itas kramāt
siṃha ārūḍhā ambikā tri akṣā pīta ābhā darpaṇa udvahā
aiśānyām saṃsthitaḥ caṇḍaḥ śuddha vaiḍūrya saprabhaḥ
vaiyāghra vasanaḥ tri akṣaḥ śūla daṇḍa kuṭhāra bhṛt
nandinam pūrva digbhāge padmarāga sama prabham
trinetram śūla hastam ca saumyam nāga upavītinam
harita ābham mahākālam śūla hastam tri locanam
nāga upavītinam raudram āgneyyām diśi pūjayet
sa laṅḍuka kuṭhāra akṣamālā hastaḥ tri locanaḥ
bisinī patra saṃkāśaḥ pūjyaḥ vai yama diś sthitaḥ
ādhāra bhūtaḥ dharma ātmā pūjyaḥ nirṛti gocaraḥ
nirmāṃsa vigrahaḥ bhṛṅgī śvetaḥ vāruṇa diś gataḥ
ṣaḍvaktraḥ bālaveṣaḥ ca dvādaśākṣaḥ tathā bhujaḥ
vara abhaya dhanuḥ bāṇa mahā paraśumān api
catur bhujaḥ dvi bāhuḥ vā bhavati eka ānanaḥ śriyai
śakti kukkuṭa hastaḥ tu vara abhaya samanvitaḥ
vāyavyām vidruma ābhāsaḥ pūjanīyaḥ phala arthibhiḥ
athavā anya prakāreṇa pūjanīyāḥ gaṇeśvarāḥ

original: devī caiva tu caṇḍeśo mahākālo vṛṣastathā || 6/478 ||
analyzed: devī ca eva tu caṇḍeśaḥ mahākālaḥ vṛṣaḥ tathā

original: nandīśaśca gaṇādhyakṣo bhṛṅgī ca skanda eva ca |
analyzed: nandīśaḥ ca gaṇādhyakṣaḥ bhṛṅgī ca skandaḥ eva ca
dhyāyet etān anudvignaḥ padmarāga sama prabhān
lokapālān caturthe tu kramaśas sva sva diś gatān
dvirada indra samārūḍham pīta varṇam tu vajriṇam
sahasrākṣam yajet indram pūrva bhāge vyavasthitam
jvālā mālā vṛtam śakti dharam agnim ajāsanam
mahiṣa stham yamam kṛṣṇam dakṣiṇe daṇḍa pāṇinam
nairṛtyām nirṛtim nīlam gadā hastam narāsanam
vāruṇe varuṇam śvetam jhaṣa stham pāśa hastakam
śabalam dhvaja hastam ca mṛga stham anilenilam
khaḍga hastam nidhāna stham kuberam pītam uttare
kapilam śūla hastam ca vṛṣa ārūḍham tri locanam
prasanna vadanam hṛṣṭam īśānam śāṅkare yajet
viṣṇum tu adhas gatam kṛṣṇam tārkṣya stham cakrapāṇinam
brahmāṇam aruṇa ābham ca haṃsa stham padma hastakam
ūrdhva gam saṃyajet prājñaḥ sva sva nāma ādika akṣaraiḥ
pañcame tu astra saṃghātam pūjanīyam yathā uditam
pūrva bhāge yajet vajram pīta varṇam ṣaṣ aśrakam

original: agnau śaktiṃ suraktābhāṃ kṛṣṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ tu dakṣiṇe |
analyzed: agnau śaktim su rakta ābhām kṛṣṇam daṇḍam tu dakṣiṇe

original: nirṛtau nīlakhaḍgaṃ tu śvetaṃ pāśaṃ tu vāruṇe || 6/488 ||
analyzed: nirṛtau nīla khaḍgam tu śvetam pāśam tu vāruṇe
pṛ
citra dhvajam tu vāyavyām hema ābhām uttare gadām
aiśānyām jvalitam śūlam cakram arka sama prabham
adhas stham saṃyajet abjam śvetam ūrdhve vicakṣaṇaḥ
pañca āvaraṇa pūjā evam samāsāt parikīrtitā
eka āvaraṇa pūjā syāt aṅgaiḥ brahmabhiḥ eva ca
athavā kevalaiḥ aṅgaiḥ kevalaiḥ brahmabhiḥ tu vā
brahma aṅgaiḥ lokapaiḥ astraiḥ bhavet āvaraṇa trayam
hetibhiḥ sahitān lokapālān abhyarcayet tu vā
atha brahma aṅga vidyā īśa mūrtyā ekādaśa rudrakān
yajet gada ādibhiḥ ca evam antar āvaraṇa kramāt
bāhya āvaraṇa pūjā ca parivāra vidhau viduḥ
evam āvaraṇam pūjya dadyāt naivedyam uttamam
pañcavaktreṣu naivedyam ūrdhva vaktre thavā punar
aṅgānām api sarveṣām pṛthak naivedyam ardhatas
caru pākaḥ prakartavyaḥ pṛthak pātreṣu saṃbhave
pūteṣu itarathā ekasmin haviṣyam mantra saṃskṛtam
bāhya āvaraṇa devānām dvāra adhyakṣa puras saram
yajanam gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ pratyekam pravidhīyate
bhūta ādibhyaḥ balim dadyāt atha mantra nivedyake
tad ante nitya homaḥ vā praviśya abhyantaram punar
tṛptau ācamanam dadyāt hasta udvartana pūrvakam
mukha vāsam ca tāmbūlam deva yogyam pradāpayet
śrīmat pañca mahā śabda darpaṇa chatra cāmaraiḥ
geya nṛtta japa stotraiḥ tadā tam abhinandayet
hṛṣṭam devyā saha āsīnam sa deśam śakti vigraham
dhyātvā tad śirasi nyasyet pavitram karma pūrakam
patanāt trāyate yasmāt tasmāt eva pavitrakam
prakṛtau paramībhāvam saṃpūrti artham anantaram
parama antikam uccārya prāsādam pūrvavat nyaset  /
prarocanam tu kartavyam mudrayā prāc upāttayā
prārthayitvā japam kuryāt akṣasūtreṇa buddhimān
akṣāṇām akṣa kalpānām saṃyamaḥ yat prasūyate
dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa phala avāpteḥ akṣasūtram tat ucyate
aṣṭottaraśatena atha tad ardhena tad ardhataḥ
japa mālā prakartavyā saṃskṛtā śarva śambaraiḥ
madhyamā anāmikā aṅguṣṭha karṣaṇāt siddhiḥ uttamā
aṅguṣṭha tarjanī yogāt madhyamā siddhiḥ iṣyate
kaniṣṭhā aṅguṣṭha saṃyogāt siddhiḥ uktā kanīyasī
mūlāt daśa aṃśaḥ brahma aṅga japaḥ kāryaḥ atra dhīmatā
na vilambitam aspaṣṭam na ca asvīkṛtam adrutam
asaṃkhyātam manaḥ bhrāntyā japam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
nitya ādi karma bheda uktam japam kṛtvā nivedayet
sādhakaḥ sādhya sidhi artham virāmāya itaraḥ janaḥ
culuka uda trayeṇa eva kuśa puṣpa ādibhiḥ saha
om guhya ati guhya goptā tvam gṛhāṇa asmad kṛtam japam
siddhiḥ bhavatu me yena tvad prasādāt tvayi sthite
yat kiñcid karma he deva sadā sukṛta duṣkṛtam
tat me śiva pada sthasya bhuṅkṣva kṣapaya śaṅkara

original: śivo dātā śivo bhoktā śivaḥ sarvamidaṃ jagat || 6/513 ||
analyzed: śivaḥ dātā śivaḥ bhoktā śivaḥ sarvam idam jagat

original: śivo yajati sarvatra yaḥśivaḥ so'hameva tu |
analyzed: śivaḥ yajati sarvatra yaḥ śivaḥ saḥ ham eva tu

original: nivedyaivaṃ svamātmānaṃ japaṃ pūjāṃ ca bhaktitaḥ || 6/514 ||
analyzed: nivedya evam svam ātmānam japam pūjām ca bhaktitaḥ
dhyāyan tiṣṭhet śivam paścāt yathāpūrvam udāhṛtam
stutvā anekavidhaiḥ stotraiḥ praṇipatya punar punar
nitya agni kāryam kurvīta nitya agneḥ homa mandire
pṛ
nitya utsavam ca kurvīta tāṇḍavam tad anantaram
tatas liṅgam samabhyarcya gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt
dadyāt parāṅmukha arghyam ca mahāmudrām pradarśayet
saṃhāra mudrayā astreṇa devān āvaraṇa sthitān
utthāpya mūrtimantreṇa yojayet mūrti saṃgatān
hṛd mantra anugatam mūlam uccārya karaṇa ujjhitam
sakala upādhi nirmuktam yathā niṣkala tām gatam
śiva tattva vibhāgena cintayet hṛd sthitena ca
nirapekṣaḥ visargaḥ yaḥ liṅge sādhāraṇaḥ mataḥ
parigṛhīta liṅge tu sa apekṣaḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ
cala liṅge api sa apekṣaḥ na apekṣaḥ sthaṇḍile sadā
sarvatra api anapekṣaḥ tu pratyaham tu vidhīyate
aiśānyām pūjayet caṇḍam gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt
tasmai samarpayet sarvam nirmālyam tat prakīrtitam
liṅga mūrdha stham iti eke piṇḍikāyām atha apare
aiśānyām pīṭhaka stham vā bāhye
naivedyam gandha puṣpa ādyam dravyam yat jāyate cirāt
yat mālyam upabhuktam tat nirmālyam abhidhīyate
rajaḥ sthaṇḍila liṅga stham śiva bhukta ujjhitam hi yat
caṇḍa bhojyam durādharṣam varjanīyam prayatnataḥ
vitāna chatra mālya ādi vastra bhūṣaṇa vāhanam
devadravyam tat ucyate
tasmāt anyat api dravyam śivāya viniveditam
deva svam caṇḍa bhojyam vā na ātma bhogāya kalpayet
vitāna dāma saṃsparśaḥ dhūpa āmodaḥ na dūṣyate  /
śivasya dīpa ja āloka prekṣā ādi racanā tathā
nirapekṣam visṛjya aiśam liṅgam saṃśodhya pūrvavat

original: praṇave yogapīṭhe tu mūrti nyasya tadātmikām |
analyzed: praṇave yogapīṭhe tu mūrti nyasya tad ātmikām
pavitraiḥ sakalīkṛtya gāyatryā paryupāsayet
alaṅkṛtya tatas śaktyā bhoga artham kusuma ādibhiḥ

original: vedikāsahitaṃ liṅgaṃ kṣamasveti ca vai vadet || 6/532 ||
analyzed: vedikā sahitam liṅgam kṣamasva iti ca vai vadet
prakṣālya ardhya ādi pātrāṇi vinyaset phalaka ādike
prāsāda garbham unmṛjya tribhiḥ gomaya golakaiḥ
caṇḍa bhojyam bahis tasmāt kṣipet ucchiṣṭa bhājane
snāna pānīya dugdha ādyaiḥ yadi siktaḥ bhavet tadā
snāyāt prakṣālayet vā atha nāmeḥ ūrdhvam adhas tathā

original: ācamya prayato bhūtvā devadevaṃ praṇamya ca || 6/535 ||
analyzed: ācamya prayataḥ bhūtvā devadevam praṇamya ca
cyutaḥ khalita śudhi artham abhyaset mantra saṃhitām
cala liṅge api ayam nyāyaḥ vihitaḥ yajña mandire
sthaṇḍile saṃharet pūjām tribhiḥ gomaya golakaiḥ
pāṇi pādau ca prakṣālya api ācamya vidhinā tatas

original: praṇamya daṇḍavadbhūmau kṣamasveti ca vai vadet |
analyzed: praṇamya daṇḍa vat bhūmau kṣamasva iti ca vai vadet
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre arcana vidhiḥ caturthaḥ paṭalaḥ
pṛ
arcana aṅga vidhim vakṣye sandhyā lakṣaṇa pūrvakam
bhāskara udayam ārabhya yāvat vai bhāskara udayaḥ
sapta ardha ghaṭikā mānaḥ yāmaḥ iyam sandhiḥ ucyate
ṣaṣṭi uccha vāsaḥ bhavet prāṇaḥ ṣaṣ prāṇaḥ ghaṭikā bhavet
ghaṭikā ṣaṣṭi ahorātram aṣṭa sandhyam tat ucyate
aṣṭa sandhyāsu yā pūjā sā bhavet uttamottamā
sapta ṣaṣ bhūta veda agni yugma indu prahareṣu ca
yāma ardha kāla saṃvṛttā pūjā navavidhā bhavet
pūjā ārambhāt tu nṛtta antam kuryāt sandhyā avasānakam
saṃdhyā atikramaṇāt doṣaḥ nyūnāyām tu na doṣa bhāj
guru upacāra pūjāyām vidhiḥ eṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
ghaṭikā ardham nivedya artham bali dānam tu tad samam
nitya agni kāryam ardham ca nitya utsave dvi nāḍikā

original: ghaṭikaikā tu nṛttārthaṃ kāla eṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ |
analyzed: ghaṭikā ekā tu nṛtta artham kālaḥ eṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
evam kāla vidhiḥ proktaḥ mahā sandhyā trayasya ca

original: laghūpacāre sandhyāyāṃ hīnaṃ cettu na dūṣakam |
analyzed: laghu upacāre sandhyāyām hīnam ced tu na dūṣakam
yathā sambhava kāle tu yathā sambhava nāḍikā
ātma artha yajanam kuryāt yathāśakti anurodhataḥ
aruṇa udaya velāyām prāk eva prahara ardhataḥ
kuryāt pañca mahā śabdam sarva prāṇi tamaḥ upaham
tad kāle pūjayet devam sarva kāma artha siddhaye
sāyaṃkāla īrcana ante syāt yajanam ca ardha yāmake
bhūribhiḥ gandha kusumaiḥ gandhaiḥ parimalaiḥ api
dhūpaiḥ āmoda bahulaiḥ naivedyaiḥ laukika ādibhiḥ
khaṭvā ārūḍhām umām devīm alaṅkṛtya viśeṣataḥ
nṛttaiḥ geyaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ deva pārśvam praveśayet
putra pautra vivṛddhi artham pūjayet śaṅkaram tatas
vauṣaṭ antaiḥ ca madhyāhne sandhi ante śivam arcayet
nṛpateḥ āyuḥ ārogya siddhaye vijayāya ca

original: evaṃ pratidinaṃ pūjā kartavyā vibhave sati |
analyzed: evam pratidinam pūjā kartavyā vibhave sati
pūjakaḥ sandhi pūrve tu kuryāt snāna ādikam vidhim
snāna ante śuddha vastra ādyaiḥ paryaṣṭi paricārakaiḥ
yajana artham tu sambhārāḥ sambhriyantām jala ādayaḥ
gaṅgā ādi sindhu sambhūtam puṣkariṇī ādi sambhavam
su svādu vāsitam puṣpaiḥ nava mṛd kumbha pūritam
śuddha vastra srutam
śrīkhaṇḍa agaru patrakaiḥ ca kusumaiḥ āmodibhiḥ saṃyutāḥ
āpaḥ majjana karmaṇi praṇihitāḥ śambhoḥ yathā lābhataḥ
prokta dravya gaṇeṣu labdham iha yat tat grāhyam āḍhya itaraiḥ
kalpayet abhiṣeka artham vāri saṃsāra vāri yat
bhāra ādi nava bhāra antam nava liṅga idhama adhame  /
eka bhāra vivṛddhyā tu nava saṃkhyayā
aṣṭa droṇaiḥ atha adbhiḥ vā dviguṇaiḥ triguṇaiḥ tu vā
svāyambhubāṇa ligna ādau prokteṣu uktam hi vāñcchitam
snāna udaka pramāṇam syāt ātma arthe hi yathā icchayā
pañcāmṛtam pañcagavyam kuśa ambu kalaśa udakam
snapana arthāya kathita pramāṇena prakalpayet
pṛ
sauvarṇa mūrṇa sūtra uttham kārpāsaḥ utha dukūlakam
deva alaṅkāra yogyena pramāṇena samanvitam
uttamam proktam madhyamam kṣaumam ucyate
kārpāsa tantu jam vastram adhamam parikīrtitam
arka hasta āyatam vā atha vistāram syāt dvi hastakam
manoramam tu su ślakṣṇam viśiṣṭam vastram ucyate
vistāra aṣṭaguṇa āyāmam sa daśam tu sa lakṣaṇam
ākhu daṣṭa agni dagdham ca keśa viddham ca varjayet
vastram evaṃvidham tat ca gṛhṇīyāt upayogi yat
kuṅkumam candanam dūrvā sidhārtha uśīrakam tathā
tilena eva samāyuktam pādyam yat vā uttamam bhavet
siddhārtha uśīrakam dūrvā yuktam madhyamam ucyate  /
uśīram candana upetam adhamam pādyam ucyate
elā lavaṅga karpūra varāla phala saṃyutam
āpaḥ ācamanīya artham uśīra maya candanaiḥ

original: palatrayaṃ ca karpūraṃ truṭī patraṃ dvijottamāḥ || 7/32 ||
analyzed: pala trayam ca karpūram truṭī patram dvijottamāḥ
ācāme tu prayoktavyam elā uśīra yutam tu vā
āpaḥ kṣīra kuśa agrāṇi yava siddhārtha taṇḍulaiḥ

abhāve vali dānam syāt dvāra adhyakṣa puras saram
tad bāhye bhūta pīṭheṣu diś vidiś sthāpiteṣu ca
rudrebhyaḥ pūrvatas dadyāt mātṛbhyaḥ dakṣiṇe tathā
gaṇebhyaḥ paścime bhāge yakṣebhyaḥ ca uttare balim
grahebhyaḥ ca tathā aiśānyām asurebhyaḥ ugni gocare
pālāśyām palabhakṣebhyaḥ nāgebhyaḥ vāyugocare
nakṣatra rāśi vargebhyaḥ tathā viśva gaṇāya ca
aiśānyām bali dānam syāt tatra eva kṣetrapāline

original: eteṣvaṣṭasu pīṭheṣu dikpālānāṃ baliṃ tu vā |
analyzed: eteṣu aṣṭasu pīṭheṣu dikpālānām balim tu vā
prathamam dvārapālānām bhūtānām syāt dvitīyakam
vṛṣa ādi bali pīṭha antam dadyāt āvaraṇa kramāt
aṣṭa dvi ṣaṭ dvis aṣṭau hi dvātriṃśat paricārakāḥ
antarhāra ādi śāla sthāḥ dadyāt teṣām pṛthak pṛthak
gaṇeśam tatra saṃpūjya sa upacāram viśeṣataḥ
sambhave sati sarveṣām upacāra arcanam bhavet
tatas pūrva sthite pīṭhe balim dadyāt viśeṣataḥ
yakṣa rākṣasa paiśāca bhūta gandharva kinnarāḥ
pitṛ dānava nāgāḥ ca brahma ādya aiśānam antakam
praṇava ādi caturthī antam sva nāma pada madhya gam
svāhā antam bali nirdeśam sarvebhyaḥ iti yojayet
bali dāna samāyuktam dadyāt bhūta balim tatas
sarva diś dvāra sampanne tri dvi eka āśā avakāśake
indra ādi īśāna paryantam balim dadyāt sva karmasu
tatas garbhagṛham gatvā dadyāt ācamanīyakam
nirmālyam tu samānīya caṇḍeśāya nivedayet
yena nirmala tām yāti nirmālyam iti kīrtyate
caṇḍasya ācamanam dadyāt nirmālyam tu visarjayet

original: agādhe'mbhasi vā'gnau vā gavāṃ vā'pi nivedayet || 8/86 ||
analyzed: agādha imbhasi vā agnau vā gavām vā api nivedayet
kāyasya mala bandha tvāt nirmālyam tu na bhojayet
agni kāryam tatas kuryāt kuṇḍa saṃskāra pūrvakam

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre naivedyavidhiḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre naivedya vidhiḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭalaḥ
pṛ
atha agni kārya siddhi artham kuḍa lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: kuṇḍaṃ vā sthaṇḍilaṃ vā'pi vahnerāyatanaṃ dvidhā || 9/1 ||
analyzed: kuṇḍam vā sthaṇḍilam vā api vahneḥ āyatanam dvidhā
sūtram pūrva aparam pūrvam nyaset diś sādhana kramāt
tena eva sādhayet sūtram dakṣiṇa uttara gam kramāt
tatas kṣetra ardha mānānām diś sūtrāt vidiśām grahaḥ

original: caturaśraṃ bhavet kuṇḍaṃ vṛttaṃ vā hastanirmitam || 9/3 ||
analyzed: catur aśram bhavet kuṇḍam vṛttam vā hasta nirmitam
nitya naimittike ca eva kāmye kalpa pracoditam
iṣṭakābhiḥ su pakvābhiḥ apakvābhiḥ asambhave
kuryāt kuṇḍam tu śāstra uktam mantra homa anurūpataḥ
mantrāṇām vāruṇānām ca kumbha ākāram vidhīyate
vāyavyānām patākā iva tu vajrakam
sapta jihvā ākṛti proktam āgneyānām guru uttamaiḥ
madhyama uttama vīryāṇām caturaśram phala pradam
trikoṇam alpa vīryāṇām strī rūpāṇām bhaga ākṛtiḥ

original: ardhacandraṃ tu raudrāṇāṃ saumyānāṃ vṛttameva hi |
analyzed: ardhacandram tu raudrāṇām saumyānām vṛttam eva hi

original: pañcakoṇaṃ tu mūrtīnāṃ kinnarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca || 9/8 ||
analyzed: pañcakoṇam tu mūrtīnām kinnarāṇām tathā eva ca
vidyā avidyeśvarāṇām tu padma ākāram iha ucyate
aindryām stambhe catuṣkoṇam agnau tāpe bhaga ākṛtiḥ
vāruṇyām śāntike vṛttam ṣaṣ aśra uccāṭana inale
udīcyām pauṣṭike padmam raudryām aṣṭa āśrama mukti dam
śata ardha śata hāme tu vistāram dviguṇam kramāt
sahasra ayuta home tu hastam hasta dvayam kramāt
bhavet lakṣa yute home catur hastam ca ṣaṭkaram
koṭi homa iṣṭa hastam syāt tasmāt ūrdhvam adhas na hi
hasta mātram bhavet kuṇḍam liṅge kanyasake nyaset
dvi aṅgula ardham tayoḥ vṛddhiḥ prānte dvi tri aṃśataḥ kramāt
pañcama aṃśam puras nyastvā koṇa veda aṃśa mānataḥ
bhramāt aśvattha patra ābham kuṇḍam āgneyam ucyate
caturaśre gṛhe tyaktvā ādi ante tad aṃśake
iṣṭa dikṣu nyaset paścāt uttare sūtra pātanam
tri bhāga vṛddhitaḥ matsyaiḥ tribhiḥ naiśācaram bhavet
kaṇṭha ardha aṣṭa aṃśa santyāgāt vṛtta kuṇḍam iha uditam
ṣaṣ bhāga vṛddhitaḥ matsyaiḥ caturbhiḥ syāt ṣaḍaśrakam
tu karṇikā syāt dvi bhāgataḥ
tad bahis tu eka bhāgena kesarāṇi prakalpayet
tṛtīye dala madhyāni turīye dala koṭayaḥ
bhramaṇāt padmakuṇḍam syāt dala agram darśayet bahis
vṛtta kuṇḍa samam ca anyat athavā anya prakārataḥ

original: vṛttakuṇḍaṃ purā kṛtvā caturdhā mekhalāṃ bhajet |
analyzed: vṛtta kuṇḍam purā kṛtvā caturdhā mekhalām bhajet

original: utsedhaṃ ca tathā kṛtvā karṇikā sārdhato bhavet || 9/21 ||
analyzed: utsedham ca tathā kṛtvā karṇikā sārdhatas bhavet
avaśiṣṭam dalam vedadalam aṣṭa dalam tu vā
kṣetra ardha daśamam bhāgam catu dikṣu tad uttare
vinyaset tad pramāṇena turya āśrama param nayet
tasya karṇa pramāṇena tad bhujān ca api lāñchayet  /
tatra aṣṭa sūtra saṃyogāt aṣṭāśram kuṇḍam ucyate
vistāra sadṛśaḥ khātaḥ mekhalā śeṣaḥ eva vā
pṛ
kaṇṭha uṅguṣṭha mitaḥ hastaḥ yava vṛddhyā dvi hastataḥ
kaṇṭha mānam idam proktam mekhalām śṛṇuta dvijāḥ
muṣṭi mātrasya kuṇḍasya mekhalā hi aṅgula dvayā
mekhalā dvitayam kāryam aṅgula ardha aṅgula kramāt
ratni mātrasya kuṇḍasya nemiḥ syāt aṅgulaiḥ tribhiḥ
anya nemi dvayam tasya tṛtīya ardha aṅgulā matā
hasta mātrasya kuṇḍasya nemiḥ syāt catur aṅgulā
kartavyā mekhalā ca anyā tri dvi aṅgula kramāt tathā
kuṇḍasya dvi karasya syāt pūrva nemiḥ ṣaṣ aṅgulā
anyā aṅgula catuṣkā syāt tṛtīyā tu aṅgulaiḥ tribhiḥ
catur hastasya kuṇḍasya nemiḥ pūrva aṅgula aṣṭakā
ṣaḍbhiḥ anya aṅgulaiḥ kāryā caturbhiḥ apara aṅgulaiḥ
kartavyā mekhalā pūrvā ṣaṣ hastasya daśa aṅgulaiḥ
aṅgulaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ ca anyā tṛtīyā ṣaḍbhiḥ aṅgulaiḥ
aṣṭa hastasya yā pūrvā mekhalā dvādaśa aṅgulā
daśa aṅgulā dvitīyā tu tṛtīyā aṣṭa aṅgulā matā

original: kuṇḍasya yādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ mekhalānāṃ tu tādṛśam |
analyzed: kuṇḍasya yādṛśam rūpam mekhalānām tu tādṛśam
athavā anya prakāreṇa mekhalā mānam ucyate
caturviṃśati bhāgam tu vibhajet kuṇḍa mānakam
tad eka bhāga mātram syāt tena dvi tri caturguṇaiḥ
vistāra utsedha mānābhyām bhavanti iha ca mekhalāḥ
ṣaṣ aṅgula viśāla uccā mekhalā ekā bhavet yadi
kuṇḍa bimba ardha mānena nābhiḥ tri aṃśena vā matā
mekhalā madhya gā yoniḥ dvi aṅgula ucchrāya saṃyutā
muṣṭi ratni eka hasteṣu yoni mānam udīritam
dvi hasta ādiṣu kuṇḍeṣu vistāre dvi aṅgula adhikā
agni aṅgula adhikā dairghyāt utsedhaḥ sva bhujāt tatas
sā yoniḥ sarva kuṇḍānām sva ardha mānena nirmitā
aśvattha patra vat vā atha gaja uṣṭha sadṛśā athavā
praṇālena samāyuktā kuṇḍa māna yutena tu
yoneḥ ārabhya nābhi antam gonandena su śobhinā
nābhiḥ syāt kuṇḍa madhye tu sva ardha mānena nirmitā
tad caturtha aṃśaka uttuṅga padma ākārā yathā bhavet
ekāśīti padā vedī maṇḍapena bahis bhavet

original: tadbāhye triṣu bhāgeṣu madhye kuṇḍāni kalpayet |
analyzed: tad bāhye triṣu bhāgeṣu madhye kuṇḍāni kalpayet
caturdhā vedikām kṛtvā vedikā kuṇḍa madhyame  /
yathā eka aṃśam bhavet kuṇḍa jālam vā parikalpayet
pradhāna vāyu soma īśa kuṇḍeṣu prāc mukhaḥ yathā
pūrvam uttara vaktram syāt śevam prāc uttarā mukham

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre kuṇḍalakṣaṇavidhiḥ saptamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre kuṇḍa lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ saptamaḥ paṭalaḥ
pṛ
atas param pravakṣyāmi vahni kārya vidhi kramam
vaidikam miśrakam śaivam agni kāryam tridhā smṛtam
kevalaiḥ vaidikaiḥ mantraiḥ vihitaḥ vaidikaḥ bhavet
mantraiḥ ca vaidikaiḥ śaivaiḥ vihitaḥ miśraḥ ucyate
kevalaiḥ śiva mantraiḥ tu vihitaḥ śaivaḥ ucyate
utpādane kramaḥ tu evam vihitaḥ śiva śāsane
tribhiḥ paridhibhiḥ ca ūrdhva samidbhyām saṃyutaḥ tu yaḥ
vaidika agniḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ miśra agniḥ tu ubhaya ātmakaḥ
catuṣparidhibhiḥ śaivaḥ śāstre smin saṃprakīrtitaḥ
praṇītā brahmakūrcena saṃyuktaḥ vaidikaḥ smṛtaḥ
tathā eva miśra vahniḥ tu śaiva agniḥ tad yutaḥ hi vā
miśra vaidikayoḥ agnyoḥ svarūpam śṛṇuta dvijāḥ
eka vigraha saṃyuktaḥ dvi vaktraḥ ca dvi nāsikaḥ
ṣaṣ akṣaḥ mekhalā yuktaḥ pāda traya samānvitaḥ
catuḥ śṛṅga samāyuktaḥ dvi śirāḥ jaṭilaḥ mataḥ
upavītī ca mauñjīvān sapta hasta samāyutaḥ
sapta jihvā samāyuktaḥ vṛṣavāhana saṃyutaḥ

original: hiraṇyā kanakā raktā kṛṣṇā jihvā ca dakṣiṇe || 10/9 ||
analyzed: hiraṇyā kanakā raktā kṛṣṇā jihvā ca dakṣiṇe  /

original: suprabhā cātiraktā ca bahurūpā ca vāmake |
analyzed: suprabhā ca atiraktā ca bahurūpā ca vāmake
evam jihvāḥ samuddiṣṭāḥ miśra agnau vaidika anale

original: hiraṇyā vāruṇī jihvā kanakā madhyame sthitā |
analyzed: hiraṇyā vāruṇī jihvā kanakā madhyame sthitā

original: raktā cottarajihvā syāt kṛṣṇā yāmyāṃ diśi sthitā || 10/11 ||
analyzed: raktā ca uttarajihvā syāt kṛṣṇā yāmyām diśi sthitā
su prabhā pūrva jihvā āsyāt atiriktā agni diś sthitā
bahu rūpa eśa jihvā syāt jihvāsthānam prakīrtitam
śaiva agniḥ kathyate viprāḥ śṛṇuta atha samāhitāḥ
daśa hastam trinetram ca sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
rakta vastra parīdhānam paṅkaja upari saṃsthitam
baddha padmāsana āsīnam daśa āyudha samanvitam
kanakā bahurūpā ca api atiraktā tatas param

original: suprabhā caiva kṛṣṇā ca raktā cānyā hiraṇmayī |
analyzed: su prabhā ca eva kṛṣṇā ca raktā ca anyā hiraṇmayī
ūrdhva vaktre sthitāḥ tisraḥ śeṣāḥ prāc āditaḥ sthitāḥ  /
śaiva agni dhyānam uddiṣṭam trividhaḥ agniḥ prakīrtitaḥ
vaidikaḥ api tridhā gārhapatyaḥ syāt dakṣiṇaḥ unalaḥ
tatas tu āhavanīyaḥ tu teṣām atra prayojanam
kārayet deśikaḥ dhīmān śaiva miśra anala udbhave
anukalpam samānīya śaivam sampādayet guruḥ
miśram vā sādhayet tatra niyamaḥ api vidhīyate
gārhapatyaḥ gṛhasthānām pitṝṇām dakṣiṇa analaḥ
daivaḥ tu āhavanīyaḥ tu ca anyeṣām api śaṃsitaḥ

original: bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaśca krameṇa parikīrtitaḥ |
analyzed: bālaḥ yuvā ca vṛddhaḥ ca krameṇa parikīrtitaḥ
pratiṣṭhā artham śiva agneḥ tu sampad artham samāharet
bāla agnim utsava artham tu yauvanam parikalpayet
nitya agnau yojayet vṛddham anyatra api ca yojayet
anukalpa śiva agneḥ tu ca utpāda artham kramaḥ mataḥ
śiva agni utpāda homaḥ tu śreṣṭhaḥ saṃparikīrtitaḥ
miśra agni utpāda homaḥ tu madhyamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
vaidike kevala agnau vā śiva mantrān na yojayet  /
pṛ
śiva agnau vaidikāḥ mantrāḥ ca anye vā saṃprakīrtitāḥ
tathā eva miśra vahniḥ tu vaidika agniḥ tu kathyate

original: brahmā viṣṇuśca lokeśā devāścānye ca ye sthitāḥ |
analyzed: brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca lokeśāḥ devāḥ ca anye ca ye sthitāḥ
vyāsaḥ bodhāyanaḥ ca āpastambaḥ ca eva āśvalāyanaḥ

original: satyāṣāḍhaśca ye cānye matto vedāstu sārthakān |
analyzed: satyāṣāḍhaḥ ca ye ca anye mattaḥ vedaḥ tu sārthakān

original: śāstrāṇyanyāni śrotāraḥ purāṇaṃ ca smṛti tathā || 10/27 ||
analyzed: śāstrāṇi anyāni śrotāraḥ purāṇam ca smṛti tathā
sūtraiḥ tu nima artham tu vyāsa saṃkṣepa kāriṇaḥ
tad matana kṛtaḥ yaḥ agniḥ vaidikaḥ paripaṭhyate
a dīkṣitāḥ ca vipra ādyāḥ vaidika agnau tu kevalam
adhikāriṇaḥ iti uktāḥ dīkṣitāḥ sarva yogyakāḥ

original: ubhayāśrayi?ṇo ye tu kṛtvādau vaidikaṃ pṛthak |
analyzed: ubhaya āśrayiṇaḥ ye tu kṛtvā ādau vaidikam pṛthak
kuṇḍa saṃskāra pūrvam tu śaiva agnim sādhayet tatas
miśra agniḥ evam uddiṣṭa ratu ubhaya āśrama yogyakaḥ
athavā vaidike home tad anantaram
śaiva ukta kuṇḍa saṃskārān kṛtvā ca agnim ca tat purā
nābhi sthegnau apānena viśrāmya udāna vṛttinā
kramāt sadya vāma aghora nareśvarān
nitya agni veśayet bhūyas śiva agnim api kuṇḍake
evam miśram tu sampādya juhuyāt sarva mantrakaiḥ
ubhayoḥ saṅkara arthakam
ādau vā kuṇḍa saṃskāram kuryāt vaidika śaivakam
vaidika agni avasāne tu śaivam sampādya vā analam
kṛtvā śiva agnim anyatra tena saṃyojanam nayet
evam antya iṣṭi karma ādau sāṅkaryam sammatam tu iha
pṛthak kāryaḥ śraddhā vitta anusārataḥ
śaiva agne saṃpravakṣyāmi kuṇḍa lakṣaṇa pūrvakam

original: tathā kuṇḍaṃ catuṣkoṇaṃ vṛttābhaṃ vātha vārijam |
analyzed: tathā kuṇḍam catuṣkoṇam vṛtta ābham vā atha vāri jam
sarva kāma pradam nitye hasta mātra vinirmitam
catur tri dvi aṅgulāḥ tisraḥ maikhalā ekā ṣaṣ aṅgulā
gaja uṣṭha sadṛśā yoniḥ madhye syāt dvādaśa aṅgulā  /
kaṇṭha uṅguṣṭha pramāṇena garbha śvabhra upari sthitaḥ
stha piḍale tad abhāve vā saṃskṛta agni niveśayet  /

original: asaṃskṛte tu vai kuṇḍe śivāgnirnaiva siddhyati |
analyzed: a saṃskṛte tu vai kuṇḍe śiva agniḥ na eva siddhi ati

original: aniṣ?panne śivāgnau tu hutaṃ bhavati niṣphalam || 10/41 ||
analyzed: aniṣpanne śiva agnau tu hutam bhavati niṣphalam
vīkṣaṇam śivamantreṇa prokṣaṇam ca astra mantrataḥ
varmaṇā abhyukṣaṇam kāryam tāḍanam ca astra mantrataḥ
ullekhana avakiraṇa pūraṇam secanam tathā
kuṭṭanam ca tatas kuryāt sammārjanam atas param
upalepaḥ kuṇḍa kḷptiḥ kuṇḍasya paridhānakam
kuṇḍa arcanam ca paridhi viṣṭara nyāsaḥ eva ca
etat sarvam tu matimān astramantreṇa kārayet

original: āsanaṃ tatra saṃkalpya devīṃ vāgīśvarīṃ nyaset |
analyzed: āsanam tatra saṃkalpya devīm vāgīśvarīm nyaset
tadvat vāgīśvaram ca api yat vā ākāśa tanum śivam
dhyātvā riraṃsu bhaisānyām saṅgamayya yathāvidhi
kalpam mantha anusampātam samidhaḥ ca etayoḥ tatas
sūryakāntāt dvija āvāsāt prasūtam athavā analam
anukalpa vidhānena mantra pūtam niyojayet
kalpa vid
tāmra pātre śarāve vā vīkṣaṇa ādyaiḥ viśodhayet
kravyāda aṃśam parityajya prokṣayet astra vāriṇā
kavacena avakuṇṭhya atha aimunāya iti vinyaset
vahnibījam ṣaḍaṅgaiḥ ca vahneḥ saṃyojanam nayet  /
mūlena vauṣaṭ antena dhenumudrā yutena ca
amṛtīkṛtya saṃpūjya kuṇḍasya eva pradakṣiṇam
pṛ
tridhā kṛtvā atha jānubhyām vinyaset avanīm gataḥ
vāgīśī garbhanāḍyām tu sva ātmanaḥ sammukham yathā
mūlamantreṇa nikṣipya sva ātmānam śiva vat smaret
toya bindum tatas da tvā chādayet tu sat indhanaiḥ
darbha kaṅkaṇam astreṇa japtam garbhasya rakṣaṇe
devī haste hṛdā badhvā garbhādhāna nimittakam
sadyojātam samāvāhya hṛdayena āhuti trayam
tilaiḥ da tvā puṃsavana nimittam vāmam arcayet
śirasā eva āhutim tadvat sīmantonnayane punar
aghoreṇa samabhyarcya śikhayā eva āhuti trayam

original: datvā darbheṇa śikhayā vaktrāṅgānāṃ ca kalpanam |
analyzed: da tvā darbheṇa śikhayā vaktra aṅgānām ca kalpanam

original: niṣkṛtiṃ ca tadā kṛtvā jātakarma tato nayet || 10/58 ||
analyzed: niṣkṛtim ca tadā kṛtvā jātakarma tatas nayet
puruṣeṇa arcanam kṛtvā kavacena āhuti trayam
tilena eva tadā kuryāt sūtakasya nivṛttaye

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre nimittaparīkṣāvidhiḥ daśamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre nimitta parīkṣā vidhiḥ daśamaḥ paṭalaḥ

original: śume nimitte labdhe ca bhūparīkṣāṃ samācaret |
analyzed: śume nimitte labdhe ca bhū parīkṣām samācaret

original: śaivaṃ brāhmaṃ tathā vāstu vaiṣṇavañcaindrameva ca || 13/1 ||
analyzed: śaivam brāhmam tathā vāstu vaiṣṇavam ca aindram eva ca
aukṣam ca bhautikam ca eva āsuram ca piśācakam
rākṣasam ca eva vāyavyam vāruṇa āgneyakau tathā
jānīyāt lakṣaṇaiḥ etaiḥ bhū guṇam deśika uttamaḥ
sthala aravinda tulasī dūrvābhiḥ vā tatā mahī
viṣṇukrāntā ākhu karṇābhyām śālmalī giriśāribā
kapota śuka haṃsaiḥ ca śaivī sā śubha dā mahī
bilvaiḥ palāśaiḥ darbhaiḥ ca kuśaiḥ ca hariṇaiḥ tathā
homa dravyaiḥ su gandhaiḥ ca bhūḥ brāhmī śubha dā matā
tindukaiḥ tintriṇībhiḥ ca karajaiḥ veṇubhiḥ tathā
kārpāsa arka japābhiḥ ca haṃsaiḥ pakṣi mṛgaiḥ tathā
niṣkaṇṭakaiḥ tathā vṛkṣaiḥ yā bhūmiḥ sahitā bhavet
vaiṣṇavī bhūḥ samākhyātā śaurya vīrya pradā nṛṇām
kadalī panasa āmraiḥ ca punnāgaiḥ vakulaiḥ tathā
pāṭalaiḥ sindhuvāraiḥ ca tathā ca āmalakaiḥ punar
indīvaraiḥ ca vaiśyaiḥ ca śūdraiḥ aindrī mahī matā
pāṭalī agaru gandha āḍhyā dhana dhānya samṛddhi dā
aṅkolaiḥ ca tathā vṛkṣaiḥ mārjālaiḥ nakulaiḥ tathā
śaśa godhā cakoraiḥ ca vṛkaiḥ aukṣamahī matā
śaurya vīrya karī sā syāt prajā sampad samṛddhi dā
nirguṇḍī mādhavī dūrvā tu aṅkolaiḥ kiṃśukaiḥ tathā
mallikā karavīraiḥ ca madhūkaiḥ bhautikī matā
anna dā puṣṭi dā nṝṇām bhasma gandha samanvitā
bhallātakaiḥ mahāvṛkṣaiḥ duṣṭa sattvaiḥ palāṇḍubhiḥ
kirātaiḥ kakubhaiḥ gṛdhraiḥ dhūrtaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitā
āsurī yuddha dā bhūmiḥ pūti gandha samanvitā
śālmalībhiḥ tathā bhūmiḥ vakulaiḥ ca vibhītakaiḥ
śleṣmātakaiḥ kharaiḥ uṣṭraiḥ sṛgālaiḥ sūkaraiḥ punar
caṇḍālaiḥ ca pulindaiḥ ca pūti gandha ūṣarā ca sā
paiśācī ca smṛtā śāstraiḥ sarva nāśa samanvitā
caṇḍāla viṣa coraiḥ ca śiraḥ roga ādibhiḥ tathā
yā vāyavyā iti sā proktā duḥkha nairdhanya dāyikā
yā pūgaiḥ āvṛtā bhūmiḥ vāruṇī sarva siddhi dā
snuhi śleṣmātaka ādyaiḥ ca saṃyuktā kṣudraśarkaraiḥ
ūṣarā toya hīnā ca āgneyī sarva nāśinī
śaive śaivī samākhyātā vaiṣṇavī viṣṇu deśake

original: brāhmī syād brahmadeśe tu śaivī viprādiyogyakā |
analyzed: brāhmī syāt brahma deśe tu śaivī vipra ādi yogyakā

original: śaivī vipraviṣiṣṭā ca brāhmī syādvaiṣṇavī ca bhūḥ || 13/21 ||
analyzed: śaivī vipraviṣiṣṭā ca brāhmī syāt vaiṣṇavī ca bhūḥ
bhūbhṛtām syāt viśām aukṣī śūdrāṇām bhautikī smṛtā

original: paiśācī tvāsurī bhūmī rākṣasī yā ca bhūrmatā || 13/22 ||
analyzed: paiśācī tu āsurī bhūmī rākṣasī yā ca bhūḥ matā

original: antyajānāmiha proktā śataśaḥ karṣitā ca yā |
analyzed: antyajānām iha proktā śataśas karṣitā ca yā

original: sā ca gobhiściraṃ bhittvā bhūrgrāhyā vatsarordhvataḥ || 13/23 ||
analyzed: sā ca gobhiḥ ciram bhittvā bhūḥ grāhyā vatsara ūrdhvatas
kṣetra sthiti vaśāt urvī kathitā tu anulominām

original: anūpā jāṅgalā ceti vāstuyogyā dvidhā dharā || 13/24 ||
analyzed: anūpā jāṅgalā ca iti vāstu yogyā dvidhā dharā
pṛ
sthiram gurutaram bhūri śarkaram kṣāra vāriṇā
yuktam alpīyasā atyantam jāṅgalam
sūkṣma vālukam ānūpam kṛṣi kṛtyuccalat jalam
jāṅgala anūpa sammiśra guṇam sādhāraṇam smṛtam
sarva sasya ucitam puṣpa phala vṛkṣa sukha udayam
sarva ṛtu sukha dam sarva hitam ānūpam iṣyate
tayoḥ samparka saṃyuktam sādhāraṇam udāhṛtam
padmakam bhadrakam dhūmram pūrṇam ca iti caturvidham
sama saṃsparśanam snigdham su gandham su svaram sthiram
prācī udīcī udakam sasyam dakṣiṇeśam puras vanam
saumyam sārataram tat tu prāc udak vīraṇa anvitam
su dravyam ramaṇīyam sat janasthānam tu bhadrakam

original: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ nīcaṃ nityaṃ ceti caturvidham |
analyzed: uttamam madhyamam nīcam nityam ca iti caturvidham
daśa daṇḍa pramāṇam tu ṣaṣ mātra avanatam tu yat

original: uttamaṃ syādvitastyā tu madhyaṃ hastena cādhamam |
analyzed: uttamam syāt vitastyā tu madhyam hastena ca adhamam
tat manda madhya tvarita jala āvaha samanvitam
hastāt adhika nimnam tu ninditam vāstu kīrtitam
caturaśram samam yat tu dvijanmanām
aṣṭa ṣaṣ caturaśram yat yuktam tu nṛpa vaiśyayoḥ
śūdrasya api yathāsaṃkhyam kalpayet deśika uttamaḥ
śreṣṭham pūrva āyatam vāstu madhyamam dakṣiṇa uttaram

original: śvetaṃ raktaṃ ca pītañca kṛṣṇaṃ viprāditaḥ kramāt || 13/37 ||
analyzed: śvetam raktam ca pītam ca kṛṣṇam vipra ādeḥ kramāt
mṛdaṅga veṇu vīṇā ādi dundubhi dhvani saṃyutam
paśu gandha samam śreṣṭham sarva bīja prarohaṇam
eka varṇam ghanam snigdham sukha saṃsparśana anvitam
kubja aṅga muktam ākāśam nīca channam param sukham
tiktam ca kaṭukam ca eva kaṣāya madhura amlakam
pradakṣiṇa udaka upetam kara mātra uccalat jalam
niṣkapālam nirupalam krimi valmīka varjitam
suṣira asthi vihīnam tu tanu vāluka saṃyutam
aṅgāra tuṣa hīnam tu vṛkṣa mūla vivarjitam
paṅka śeṣa ujjhitam śvabhra darī loṣṭa vivarjitam
sarkarā bhasma hīnam tu sabhā caitya samīpa gam
duṣṭa prāṇi samīpa stham nṛpa mandira saṃśritam
devālaya samīpa stham kaṇṭaka druma saṃyutam
caṇḍāla vāstukam ca eva karmakāra ālaya āśritam
eka dvi tri catur mārga āvṛtam avyakta mārgakam
śaṅkara ārāma saṃyuktam tasya kṣetram tu varjayet
anyat evaṃvidham vāstu sarva doṣa karam bhavet
yat karma vihitam mohāt evaṃbhūte tu vāstuni
tat mahā doṣa dam yasmāt sarvathā tat vivarjayet
hīna jāteḥ samuddiṣṭam utkṛṣṭānām vidhīyate
utkṛṣṭa uktam na hīnasya sarva deveṣu yogyakam
miśra varṇa yutam vāstu śreṣṭham tad varṇa janmanām

original: pūryamāṇe mahīṃ khātvā garte svaireva pāṃsubhiḥ |
analyzed: pūryamāṇe mahīm khātvā garte svaiḥ eva pāṃsubhiḥ
adhika nyūna tulyeṣu pāṃsuṣu etādṛśam phalam
tad pāṃsu dhāraṇe ṣaṣṭi śatam phala vivekataḥ
sa puṣpa kumbha toyena pūryamāṇā ivaṭe yadi
śastam pradakṣiṇa āvartam udakam śānta budbudam
uttāna puṣpakam śreṣṭham na tu adhomukha puṣpakam
pṛ
sarṣapāṇām tilānām vā ca uptānām aṅkurāḥ bhuvi

original: trirātreṇa prajāyante yasyāṃ sā syācchubhā mahī || 13/53 ||
analyzed: tri rātreṇa prajāyante yasyām sā syāt śubhā mahī
pūrva uttara plavā śreṣṭhā madhyamā sarvatas plavā

original: sāpi grāhyā gṛhādau tu sā colbaṇaguṇānvitā || 13/54 ||
analyzed: sā api grāhyā gṛha ādau tu sā ca ulbaṇa guṇa anvitā

original: kumārarājadhānī vā nyāyāptā sā mahī matā |
analyzed: kumāra rājadhānī vā nyāya āptā sā mahī matā
evam parīkṣya gṛhṇīyāt mahīm bahu guṇa anvitām
vetāla ādeḥ punar samyak praveśa balim āharet

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre bhūparīkṣāvidhiḥ ekādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre bhū parīkṣā vidhiḥ ekādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ

original: grāmādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ prāsādānāṃ ca sadmanām |
analyzed: grāma ādīnām ca sarveṣām prāsādānām ca sadmanām
anyeṣām api sarveṣām praveśa baliḥ ucyate
śubhe muhūrte nakṣatre rātrau doṣa vivarjite
ādi śaiva kula udbhūtaḥ pañca gocara saṃsthitaḥ
sita anulepana āḍhyaḥ ca praveśabalim ārabhet
brāhmaṇān bhojayet pūrvam puṇyāham vācayet tatas
nava bhāgām dharām kṛtvā brahma sthāna āditas kramāt
nava dikṣu balim dadyāt mantreṇa anena vāstu vid
ime bhūmau vasantaḥ utra bhūta paiśāca rākṣasāḥ
sveccham gacchantu imām bhūmim āśu gṛhṇāmi vāstune
dadhi ājya apūpa saṃyuktaiḥ annaiḥ teṣām bali kṣipet
gīta vādya ādi nirghoṣaiḥ veda ghoṣaiḥ ca ghoṣayet
ācāryam pūjayet pūrvam sarvān sampūjayet tatas

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre praveśabalividhiḥ dvādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre praveśabalividhiḥ dvādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
tatas prabhāte svīkāram kuryāt snātaḥ vibhūṣitaḥ
vasānaḥ nūtanam vastram uttarīya samanvitaḥ
sūpa lipta mahī madhye sarva dhānya upari sthitam
sarva ratna oṣadhī garbha nimnagā ambhaḥ prapūritam
sat vastra vadanam kumbham sitasūtra vibhūṣitam
sa āsanena sa dehena śivena samadhiṣṭhitam
pūjayitvā vidhānena gandha puṣpa akṣataiḥ guruḥ
pṛ
tatas kumbham samutkṣitya vipra mūrdhni adhiropayet
veda ātodya kulastrīṇām praśasta dhvanibhiḥ tathā
tatas karaka nirgacchat acchinna jala dhārayā
dhyāyan prajā hitam kṣipram pariṣiñcet pradakṣiṇam
nayet tu pūrva sīmāntam kiñcid tatra vilambya ca
tasmāt agneḥ palāśasya pavana īśānayoḥ tathā
dikṣu nītvā tatas prācīm nayet bhūmi parigrahe
ācārya ādīn atha abhyarcya kartā dadyāt ca dakṣiṇām
praveśa artham baliḥ ca eva bhū parīkṣā parigrahau
grāma aṅga bhūta deva ādau pṛthak na iṣṭaḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
tatra ādau karṣaṇam kuryāt svatantraiḥ sarvam ācaret
sarvam svatantrataḥ kuryāt śraddhā vitta anusārataḥ
tatra durgā niveśe tu viśeṣaḥ kiñcid iṣyate

original: darbhāstarāntike tasya payaḥ pītvā guruḥ svapet || 15/12 ||
analyzed: darbha āstara antike tasya payaḥ pītvā guruḥ svapet  /
asmin vāstuni vardhasva dhana dhānyena medini
uttamam vīryam āsthāya namaḥ teḥ tu śivā bhava  /
iti uktvā upoṣya śuddha aṅgaḥ śvabhram prātar parīkṣayet

original: sāvaśeṣaṃ jalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad grāhyaṃ sarvasaṃpade || 15/14 ||
analyzed: sa avaśeṣam jalam dṛṣṭvā tat grāhyam sarva saṃpade
klinne vāstu vināśāya śuṣke dhānya dhana kṣayaḥ

original: ahni vā pūraṇaṃ kṛtvā parīkṣāṃ tu samācaret || 15/15 ||
analyzed: ahni vā pūraṇam kṛtvā parīkṣām tu samācaret
gatvā śatapadam ca antar pratyāvṛtya nirīkṣayet
anyūnam ced jalam tad stham uttamā bhūḥ praśasyate
aṅgulena tu hīnam ced madhyamā iti prakīrtitā

original: tato hīnaṃ tu hīnā syādatihīnā vipatkarī || 15/17 ||
analyzed: tatas hīnam tu hīnā syāt ati hīnā vipad karī
iyam parīkṣā kartavyā praveśa artha baleḥ purā

original: sarveṣāmapi vāstūnāṃ sā tu sādharaṇī matā || 15/18 ||
analyzed: sarveṣām api vāstūnām sā tu sādharaṇī matā
evam parigraham kṛtvā tatas karṣaṇam ārabhet

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre bhūparigrahavidhiḥ trayodaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre bhū parigraha vidhiḥ trayodaśaḥ paṭalaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi grāmādīnāṃ ca karṣaṇam |
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi grāma ādīnām ca karṣaṇam
su śvetau vṛṣabhau dāntau yuvānau bala saṃyutau
a prota nāsikau sa aṇḍau śubha lakṣaṇa saṃyutau
kakudam ca tathā vāla khura śṛṅgāṇi bhūṣayet
tad ākṛti kṛtaiḥ hema bhūṣaṇaiḥ gandha puṣpakaiḥ
ukta lakṣaṇa varṇa āḍhyam gṛhītvā govṛṣa dvayam
tarpayitvā gulaiḥ kṣīraiḥ tatas karṣaṇam ārabhet
tasya upakaraṇam dravyam khādiram deva viprayoḥ  /
nṛpāṇām khādiraḥ rājataruḥ syāt vaiśya śūdrayoḥ
nimbaḥ ca vakulaḥ ca api gavākṣī kaṭphalaḥ tathā
tindukaḥ karavarṇaḥ ca sarveṣām tu mahīruhām
halaḥ ca lāṅgalaḥ muṣṭiḥ yugam asya prakīrtitaḥ
pṛ
catur vitasti dīrgham syāt halam tat mūla nāhakam
dvi vitasti ṣaṣ aṅgulyam lāṅgaleṣu prapaṭhyate
triguṇaḥ hala dairghyeṇa mūla uṣṭa aṅagula nāhakaḥ
agre tu catur aṅgulyam lāṅgaleṣu praśasyate
hala dīrghaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ tri dvi aṅgula ghana anvitaḥ
ghana dviguṇa vistārā patākā dhvaja yaṣṭi vat
catur hasta āyataḥ ca agre vitasti pariṇāhakaḥ
madhye tri sapta mātreṇa nābheḥ vṛttā nibhaḥ yugaḥ
catur vitasti dīrghaḥ syāt eka aṅgula viśālakaḥ
śamyaḥ śamyā antaraḥ samyak vitastiḥ iha kathyate

original: madhye kīlo dvimātraḥ syānmadhyavāme tu ṣaḍyavaḥ |
analyzed: madhye kīlaḥ dvi mātraḥ syāt madhya vāme tu ṣaṣ yavaḥ
śamyā antaraḥ samam śamyā ālambanam syāt yuga ādayaḥ
pāṃsu garbham ca tat talyam ayaḥ mayam iha iṣyate
hiraṇmayam pāṃsu garbham devānām pravidhīyate
rājatam dvija bhūpānām lohitam vaiśya śūdrayoḥ
yat vā hala ādikam yat tu tad ardhe vasu bhājite  /
eka bhāgam samārabhya catur bhāga avasānakam
nyūnam vā api adhikam vā api kārayet kartuḥ icchayā
rajjuḥ go carma jā vā api mauñjī tāla ja valkalāḥ
nalikera kṛtā vā api rajjuḥ sarvatra śaṃśitā
palāśa udumbara aśvattha vaṭa plakṣa udbhavāḥ tathā

original: halādayaḥ surādīnāṃ sarve sarvatra vā matāḥ || 16/17 ||
analyzed: hala ādayaḥ sura ādīnām sarve sarvatra vā matāḥ

original: evaṃ sarvaṃ ca sampādya deśikaḥ śivaviprajaḥ |
analyzed: evam sarvam ca sampādya deśikaḥ śiva vipra jaḥ
kṛta mantra tanuḥ bhūtvā
prāpta pañcāṅga bhūṣaḥ tu vṛṣabhau saṃprapūjayet
vṛṣam tryambaka mantreṇa halam ca astreṇa pūjayet

original: karṣakaṃ tu samāhūya vastraṃ datvā dvijottamaḥ |
analyzed: karṣakam tu samāhūya vastram da tvā dvijottamaḥ
ātmānam iva tam dhyātvā preṣayet kṛṣi karmaṇi
svayam ca ādau tu saṃpṛśya karṣayet deśika uttamaḥ
dvātriṃśat vāram iti uktam deva agraja mahībhṛtām

original: daśapañcādhikaṃ khyātaṃ vaiśye śūdre tu saptakam |
analyzed: daśa pañca adhikam khyātam vaiśye śūdre tu saptakam
sarveṣām sapta vāram vā pañca vāram atha api vā
prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ vā api kṛṣi karma samārabhet
evam kṛṣṭvā samīkṛtya saṣ mātra āvartitam kramāt
tila sarṣapa mudgān ca māṣa vrīhim anukramāt
payasā kṣālayitvā tu vapet netram anusmaran
ācārya dakṣiṇām dadyāt kāñcanam pañca niṣkakam
sarva upakaraṇa upetam dadyāt tasmai ca go vṛsau
vṛṣau pṛṣṭha avanītau ca tayoḥ ca eva atidhāvanam
śayanam duṣkṛtam ca anyat prajānām sarva doṣa dam
hala ādi bhaṅge tadvat syāt rajju chede tathā eva hi
prāyaścittam tadā kuryāt śānti homam śiva dvijaḥ
tathā atra karṣakasya api patane ca evam eva hi

original: tatrasthānāṃ ca sasyānāṃ vardhitānāṃ ca karṣaṇāt || 16/28 ||
analyzed: tatrasthānām ca sasyānām vardhitānām ca karṣaṇāt
bhakṣaṇam go kulaiḥ dhīmān kārayet deśika uttamaḥ

original: trirātraṃ pañcarātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ tu vāsayet || 16/29 ||
analyzed: tri rātram pañca rātram vā sapta rātram tu vāsayet
gavām sa vṛṣa vatsānām purīṣa prasrava ukṣaṇaiḥ
khura saṃghaṭṭana āghrāṇa paribhramaṇa goṣpadaiḥ
romantha udgāra pātaiḥ ca phenaiḥ vatsa ānana cyutaiḥ
pavitrīkṛta bhū madhye grāma ādyam parigṛhyatām

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre bhūkarṣaṇavidhiḥ caturdaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre bhūkarṣaṇavidhiḥ caturdaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
pṛ
devānām brāhmaṇa ādīnām varṇānām anulominām
gṛha grāma ādi kartaṇām śiva dīkṣā anvita ātmanām
a dīkṣitānām anyeṣām śiva bhakti anvita ātmanām
śaṅkusaṃsthāpanam vakṣye grāma ādīnām śubha āvaham
brahmasthānasya nairṛtyām śaṅku sthānam prakalpayet
anyatra sthāpitaḥ śaṅkuḥ grāma ādyam nāśayiṣyati

original: vāyurnāgastathā mukhyo bhallāṭaḥ soma eva ca |
analyzed: vāyuḥ nāgaḥ tathā mukhyaḥ bhallāṭaḥ somaḥ eva ca
gajaḥ ca api aditiḥ ca eva ditiḥ ca eva tathā uttare
bāhyadevāḥ ime proktāḥ tu antar āvaraṇe punar
aryamā ca vivasvān ca mitraḥ ca pṛthivīdharaḥ

original: caturdikṣu gatā devā īśānādau ca koṇake |
analyzed: catur dikṣu gatāḥ devāḥ īśāna ādau ca koṇake
āpaḥ ca eva āpavatsaḥ ca savitā api sāvitrakaḥ
indraḥ ca indrajayaḥ ca eva rudraḥ rudrajayaḥ tathā

original: madhye brahmā sthitaḥ prokto maṇḍūke cāpi tatpare || 19/58 ||
analyzed: madhye brahmā sthitaḥ proktaḥ maṇḍūke ca api tad pare

original: carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāparākṣasī |
analyzed: carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāpa rākṣasī
īśāna ādiṣu koṇeṣu śūla sthāḥ pada varjitāḥ
skandoḥ yamā ca jambhaḥ ca pilipiñchaḥ dvijottamāḥ
pūrva āditaḥ samārabhya catur dikṣu vyavasthitāḥ
grāma agrahāra veśma ādi yogyam paramaśāyikam
āsanam karṇa sūtrābhyām yuktam tu parikalpayet
tad mukha stha aṣṭa bhāginaḥ

original: ādityaśca yamaścaiva karuṇaḥ soma eva ca || 19/62 ||
analyzed: ādityaḥ ca yamaḥ ca eva karuṇaḥ somaḥ eva ca
dvipadāḥ cāpa vatsa ādyāḥ dvipadāḥ eva kīrtitāḥ
kṣetram śata padam durga pura aṭṭālaka bhūmiṣu
nagarī kheṭaka grāma veśma ādiṣu ca kathyate
sthānīyam karṇa sūtrābhyām yuktam tu parikalpayet

original: madhye bahyā padānāṃ tu bhajate pañcaviṃśatim |
analyzed: madhye bahyā padānām tu bhajate pañcaviṃśatim
koṇa īśa ādi pade brahmā tu īśa agni pitṛ vāyavaḥ
anye tu eka pade jñeyāḥ parjanya ādyāḥ yathākramāt
catvāraḥ tu aryama ādyāḥ tu pūrva ādi daśa bhāginaḥ
āpavatsa ādayaḥ koṇeṣu aṣṭau dvipada bhāginaḥ
yathāsthānāḥ carakya ādyāḥ ca aṣṭau bāhye prakīrtitāḥ
grāma ādi yogyam vijñeyam sthānīya ākhyam idam padam
deśīya ākhyam padam karṇa sūtrābhyām parikalpayet
ṣaṭtriṃśat bhāga bhuj brahmā mukha sthāḥ dvādaśa aṃśinaḥ

original: ādityaśca yamaścaiva varuṇaḥ soma eva ca || 19/69 ||
analyzed: ādityaḥ ca yamaḥ ca eva varuṇaḥ somaḥ eva ca
dvipadāḥ bāhya vithi sthāḥ carakya ādyāḥ tu pūrvavat
deśīya ākhya padam ca edam agrahāra ādi pūjitam
caṇḍitam tu ubhaya ākhyam tu karṇa sūtra dvaya anvitam
padāni ekonapañcāśat madhye brahyā adhitiṣṭhati
bahirāvaṇe prācyām āditya ādyāḥ tri bhāginaḥ
koṇa sthāḥ tripadāḥ jñeyāḥ īśa agni pitṛ vāyavaḥ
catvāraḥ tu aryama ādyāḥ tu caturdaśa pade sthitāḥ
pūrvavat cāpa vat sa ādyāḥ bāhya sthāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
agrahāra ādi yogyam tat padam tu ubhaya caṇḍitam

original: prāk ca pañcadaśodak ca sūtrāṇi parikalpayet || 19/74 ||
analyzed: prāk ca pañcadaśa udak ca sūtrāṇi parikalpayet
agrahāra ādi yogyam syāt bhadrāsanam idam padam
padmagarbham idam ca anyat karṇa sūtra dvaya anvitam
ekāśīti padam madhye bhuṅkte lokapitāmahaḥ
āditya ādyāḥ tri bhāgāḥ syuḥ koṇa īśāḥ pañcanāyakāḥ
aṣṭādaśa aṃśa bhāga sthāḥ ca aryama ādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
śeṣam pūrvavat uddiṣṭam agrahāra ādi pūjitam
prāñci saptadaśa udañci sūtrāṇi parikalpayet
karṇasūtra dvaya upetam padabhuktim ca pūrvavat
agrahāra ādi yogyam syāt tri yutam parikīrtitam
vṛtta bhoga padam ca anyat karṇa sūtra dvaya anvitam
ekaviṃśat śata padam brahmā bhuṅkte tu madhyame
pṛ
indra ādi lokapālāḥ ca tu aṣṭau pañca pada īśvarāḥ
dvāviṃśat bhoginaḥ devāḥ mukha sthāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
āpa vatsa ādayaḥ uṣṭau hi dvipadāḥ tu prakīrtitāḥ
vṛtta ābhogam idam proktam grāma ādau saṃprayojayet
ekonaviṃśati prāñci tāvanti syuḥ udañci api
karṇa aṣṭakam idam vidyāt agrahāra ādi pūjitam
gaṇita ākhya padam karṇa sūtrābhyām saṃyutam bhavet
ekonasaptati padam tad madhye brāhmakam bhavet
ṣaṭtriṃśati pade devāḥ mukha sthāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
tri padāḥ lokapālāḥ syuḥ antara sthāḥ dvi bhāginaḥ  /
āpavatsa ādayaḥ ca aṣṭau pārśvadevāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
proktam gaṇita pādam tu grāma ādau parikalpayet
tatas sūrya viśālam syāt pūrvavat parikalpayet
su saṃhita padam karṇa sūtra yuktam prakalpayet
madhye padāni dhātuḥ ca dviśatam pañcaviṃśati
aryama ādi catuṣkasya triṃśat triṃśat padāni ca
īśa ādi koṇa saṃsthānām caturṇām pada pañcakam
āditya ādi caturṇām tu tripadam parikīrtitam

original: dve dve pade ca pratyekaṃ parjanyādau prakalpayet |
analyzed: dve dve pade ca pratyekam parjanya ādau prakalpayet
pūrvavat cāpa vatsa ādeḥ aṣṭakasya dvayam dvayam
carakya ādi aṣṭakam tadvat bāhye tu parikīrtitam
etat susaṃhitam nāma padam grāma ādi pūjitam
padam supratikānta ākhyam karṇa sūtra dvaya anvitam
pūrva uktena prakāreṇa padam grāma ādi pūjitam
viśālam karṇa saṃyuktam paṇḍita īśaiḥ prakalpyatām

original: dviśataṃ ca navāśīti madhye brahmapadāni ca || 19/93 ||
analyzed: dviśatam ca nava aśīti madhye brahma padāni ca
aryama ādi catuṣkasya catustriṃśat pṛthak pṛthak
pañcāśat lokapālāḥ syuḥ anyat sarvam samānakam  /
viśāla ākhyam idam proktam agrahāra ādi pūjitam
vipra garbham yathāpūrvam agrahāra ādi pūjitam
viśveśa ākhyam padam karṇa yuktam tu parikalpayet
tri śatam ca ekaṣaṣṭin ca madhye brahma padāni ca
aryama ādyāḥ yathāpūrvam bāhye devāḥ tri bhāginaḥ
agrahāra ādi yogyam syāt viśveśa ākhyam idam padam
bhogam vipula pūrvam yat agrahāra ādi pūjitam
padam ca karṇa sūtra dvaya anvitam
catvāriṃśat tathā ekam ca padāni atra catuḥ śatam
brahmā bhuṅkteḥ yama ādyāḥ tu pūrvavat parikalpayet
koṇa sthāḥ pañca bhāgāḥ syuḥ anye tri pada bhāginaḥ
idam vipratikānta ākhyam agrahāra ādi pūjitam
viśāla akṣam karṇa yuktam pūrvavat parikalpayet
triṃśat prāñci tathā udañci sūtrāṇi parikalpayet

original: madhye pañcaśataṃ brahmā bhuṅkte nava ca viṃśatim |
analyzed: madhye pañcaśatam brahmā bhuṅkte nava ca viṃśatim
caturṇām aryama ādīnām ṣaṭcatvāriṃśat aṃśakam
pañcāśat lokapālāḥ syuḥ parjanya ādyāḥ tri bhāginaḥ
vipra bhuktiḥ iti jñeyam padam grāma ādi yogyakam
viśvasāram yathāpūrvam etat grāma ādi pūjitam
padam īśvara kāntam tu karṇa sūtra dvaya anvitam
brahmaṇaḥ ṣaṭśatam madhye pañcaviṃśati saṃyutam
aryama ādi catuṣkasya pañcāśat prativeditam
aṣṭānām lokapālānām trayaḥ bhāgāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
parjanya ādeḥ tu catvāraḥ bhāgāḥ pratyekam īritāḥ
etat īśvarakānta ākhyam agrahāra ādi pūjitam
indrakāntam yathāpūrvam agrahāra ādi pūjitam
evam ūrdhvam ca vijñeyam yāvat syāt tu parārdhakam
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padam daivam mānuṣam pārameśvaram
pṛ
parameśa padam yojyam caturṇām api varṇinām
traivarṇikānām vā kuryāt agrahāra ādi vāstuṣu
catuṣpaṣṭi padam vipra bhūpayoḥ ca viśeṣataḥ
viś śūdrayoḥ tathā ekonapañcāśat padam īritam

original: sarvaṃ sarvatra ceṣṭaṃ vā śāstre'smin saṃprakīrtitam |
analyzed: sarvam sarvatra ca iṣṭam vā śāstre ismin saṃprakīrtitam
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi ekāśīti ākhyam āsanam ca tridhā matam
sakala ādiṣu sarveṣu padeṣu eva pada trayam
vāstukarmaṇi śastam syāt grāma ādau ca gṛha ādiṣu
athavā anya prakāreṇa sakala ādi vidhīyate
karṇa sūtra vihīnam vā madhye karṇa dvaya anvitam
athavā aneka karṇa stha sūtraiḥ anvitam eva vā

original: padaṃ sarvaṃ vidheyaṃ syādevaṃ buddhyā prakalpayet || 19/114 ||
analyzed: padam sarvam vidheyam syāt evam buddhyā prakalpayet
atha vṛtta padanyāsam pravakṣyāmi yathāvidhi
cakra vat pañca sūtrāṇi sa antarāṇi samāni ca
dvātriṃśat ca caturviṃśat dvis aṣṭa aṣṭa eka bhāginaḥ
ekāśīti padam hi etat jñeyam viṣama saṃsthitiḥ
aṣṭāviṃśat tathā viṃśat dvādaśa aṣṭa ardha bhāgataḥ
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padam ca etat catur vṛtte
kumbhakasya tu vinyāsam sammiśram ubhayoḥ nyaset
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padam vāstu vāstukam
grāma ādi ca upavāstu syāt vāstavyam syāt gṛha ādikam
strī puṃsoḥ iva saṃyogaḥ tathā yojyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
jayante meṣa saṃsthānam aryamṇi vṛṣabha sthitiḥ
bhṛśa aṃśe mithunam vidyāt kulīraḥ vitathe bhavet

original: vyañjake kesarī bhṛṅge kanyā sugrīvake tulā |
analyzed: vyañjake kesarī bhṛṅge kanyā sugrīvake tulā

original: mitre tu vṛścikaḥ śeṣe dhanurmukhye jhaṣasthitiḥ || 19/121 ||
analyzed: mitre tu vṛścikaḥ śeṣe dhanuḥ mukhye jhaṣa sthitiḥ
pṛthivīdharake kumbhaḥ tu aditau mīnaḥ ucyate
carācara ubhayāḥ jñeyāḥ tat tat eva aṃśake nyaset
aśvinī ādīni sarvāṇi nakṣatrāṇi yathākramam
pradakṣiṇa gatāni eva meṣa ādiṣu vibhāgataḥ
āditye sūryavāraḥ syāt agnau aṅgārakaḥ mataḥ
yame tu guruvāraḥ syāt nairṛtau budhavārakam  /
varuṇe tu bhavet śukraḥ vāyavye ca arka jaḥ tathā
some tu somavāraḥ syāt īśāne rāhu saṃsthitiḥ
madhye ketuḥ bhavet vāstu śāstre smin kāmika āhvaye
tad vaśāt vihitam sarvam sarva siddhi phala pradam

original: strīliṅgaṃ viṣamaṃ jñeyaṃ samaṃ pulliṅgakaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: strī liṅgam viṣamam jñeyam samam pulliṅgakam bhavet

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre padavinyāsavidhiḥ saptadaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre pada vinyāsa vidhiḥ saptadaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
pṛ
atas param pravakṣyāmi sūtra nirmāṇakam dvijāḥ
prathamam brahmaṇaḥ sthānāt prāc sūtram sa balim nyaset
dvitīyam syāt udak sūtram tasmin api balim kṣipet
caturaśra āyata aśra stha paryantam syāt tṛtīyakam
karṇasūtram caturtham syāt pañcamam ca ardhapañcakam
ṣaṣṭham syāt tad anantaryam saptamam madhya karṇikam
aṣṭamam ca ardha karṇam syāt navamam karṇikā antaram
evam anyat tu vijñeyam yāvat dvātriṃśakam padam
paryanta sūtram ādyam syāt tatas vinyāsa sūtrakam
pramāṇasūtram anyat syāt evam sūtra dvayam bhavet
yat upānah ādi mānam tat kūṭa koṣṭha avasānakam
paryanta sūtra mānam tat sūtram prāmāṇikam param
sūtram deva pada ucitam
tat hi vinyāsa sūtram syāt jñātavyā sūtra kalpanā
atha kṣetram tu vibhajet ṣaṣṭi uttara śata trayam
teṣu eka bhāgam sūtrasya mānam tat prāṇaḥ ucyate  /
sūtrāṇi prāñci kāryāṇi anukāryāṇi udañci hi
prāṇa vāyu pramāṇena śāstre smin kīrtitāni hi
tāni pum strī svarūpāṇi kīrtitāni krameṇa tu
prāṇa vāyu pramāṇena dviguṇāḥ ca anuvaṃśakāḥ
vāstu madhye mahā vaṃśa pārśva gāḥ tu prakīrtitāḥ
triguṇaḥ ca mahā vaṃśaḥ vāstu madhye prakīrtitaḥ
prāṇe triguṇakāḥ ca anu sirāḥ karṇa gatāḥ matāḥ
mahāsirāḥ ca tatrasthāḥ madhye karṇa gatāḥ matāḥ  /
prāṇa vāyu pramāṇena triguṇāḥ tāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
mahāsirāḥ ca anusirāḥ saṃjñeyāḥ tu napuṃsakāḥ
vāstu madhye tu ketuḥ syāt mahāmarma tat ucyate
mahāsirā mahā marma paryante sandhiḥ iṣyate  /
vaṃśa sūtra sirā saṅgāt śūlam iti abhidhīyate
mahāśūlam catuṣprāṇam triguṇam ca anuśūlakam

original: śuddhaṃ padaṃ tu marma syāllāṅgalaṃ koṇasaṃgatam |
analyzed: śuddham padam tu marma syāt lāṅgalam koṇa saṃgatam

original: catuṣkaṃ tu catuḥ sūtraiḥ ṣaṭkaṃ ṣaṭsūtrayogataḥ || 20/16 ||
analyzed: catuṣkam tu catuḥ sūtraiḥ ṣaṭkam ṣaṣ sūtra yogataḥ
aṣṭakam ca aṣṭa sūtrāṇām yogena parikīrtitam
padasya ca aṣṭama aṃśena marma mānam prakīrtitam
tri hasta nirmite kṣetre yava mānam tu sūtrakam
anyeṣām roma mātreṇa pratihastam prabandhayet

original: hṛdaye vaṃśake śūle sūtrasandhau ca marmake || 20/19 ||
analyzed: hṛdaye vaṃśake śūle sūtra sandhau ca marmake  /
sirāyām aṣṭake ṣaṭke catuṣke lāṅgale pi ca
devālaya ādikam na uktam kṛtam ced kula nāśanam
eṣām svarūpaka aṣṭa aṃśam nava aṃśam parihṛtya ca
bhitti stambha gṛha ādīni kārayet deśika uttamaḥ
gṛha pīḍā na kartavyā pada sūtreṇa dhīmatā
yat aṅgam vā astu martyasya bādhyate sarva karmaṇi
tad aṅge tu tadīyasya bādhāḥ pariharet tatas

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre sūtranirmāṇavidhiḥ aṣṭādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre sūtra nirmāṇa vidhiḥ aṣṭādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
pṛ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa vāstudeva bali kriyām
rātrau kuryāt balim vidvān ahni grāma ādi vāstuṣu
rātrau vā atha divā ava atha gṛha devālaya ādiṣu
su snātaḥ nava vastraḥ tu sa uṣṇīṣaḥ sa uttarīyakaḥ
tādṛśena ca tad kartrā yuktaḥ karma idam ācaret  /
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu puṇyāham vācayet tatas

original: taddeśe maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā gomayena ca buddhimān || 21/ 4 ||
analyzed: tad deśe maṇḍalam kṛtvā gomayena ca buddhimān

original: tatra kūrcaṃ vinikṣipya sambuddhyantaṃ svanāma ca |
analyzed: tatra kūrcam vinikṣipya sambuddhi antam sva nāma ca
uktvā tvā āvāhayāmi iti ca āvāhya arcanam ācaret
caturthī antam sva nāma uktvā namaskāra anta saṃyutam

original: pādyādinikhilān datvā svasvoktaṃ tu baliṃ kṣipet || 21/6 ||
analyzed: pādya ādi nikhilān da tvā sva sva uktam tu balim kṣipet
brahmāṇam pūjayet pūrvam sa ghṛtam pāyasam kṣipet
phalāni aryamaṇe dadyāt tila māṣa udanam tathā
dadyāt vivasvate ipūpam dadhi mitrāya dāpayet
pṛthvīdharāya sat gandhān dāpayet su samāhitaḥ
navanītam atho dadyāt parjanyāya viśeṣataḥ

original: jayantāya ghṛtaṃ dadyāt mahendraḥ kuṣṭhabhāg bhavet || 21/9 ||
analyzed: jayantāya ghṛtam dadyāt mahendraḥ kuṣṭha bhāj bhavet  /
madhuparkam tathā dadyāt ādityāya viśeṣataḥ
satyakāya badaryāḥ tu phalam madhu samanvitam
dāpayet antarikṣāya tapanam dugdha sarppiṣā
agnaye dugdha saṃyuktam odanam śiva saṃyutam
pūpṇe ca vitathe dadyāt pakva annam su samāhitaḥ
gṛha kṣatāya śimba annam dadyāt madhu sanvitam
yamāya pāyasam dadyāt gandharve gandham ucyate  /
sāmudram bhṛṅgarājāya mastyam mastyodanam mṛge
dadyāt nirṛtaye tailam piṇyāka annam ca buddhimān

original: dauvārike dadhi proktaṃ sugrīve tu yavānnakam |
analyzed: dauvārike dadhi proktam sugrīve tu yava annakam
piṣṭāni puṣpadantāya puṣpāṇi sa jalāni ca
jaleśvarāya dātavyam pāyasam ghṛta miśritam
vārāham tu balau māṃsam asurāya pradāpayet  /
dadyāt samāhitaḥ samyak śeṣāya tila taṇḍulau

original: rogāya śuṣkamastyān vai dhvajaṃ pītaṃ ca vāyave || 21/17 ||
analyzed: rogāya śuṣka mastyān vai dhvajam pītam ca vāyave
nāgāya madhu mukhyāya lājān samyak pradāpayet
bhallāṭāya gula annam vai samyak dadyāt bali pradaḥ
somāya pāyasam dhūpam dīpam dadyāt viśeṣataḥ
gajāya śarkarā apūpam adityai modakam viduḥ  /
titaye tu balim dadyāt bāhyadeva bali krame
pāyasam ghṛta sammiśram īśānāya nivedayet
dadyāt savitre lājān tu savitre gandha vāri vai
indrāya māṣam annam vai mudga annam ca indra sūnave  /
rudrāya māṃsam annam syāt phenam rudrātmajāya vai

original: āpāya mastyaṃ māsaṃ ca cāpavatsāya dāpayet || 21/22 ||
analyzed: āpāya mastyam māsam ca cāpa vatsāya dāpayet  /

original: ghṛtaṃ māṃsaṃ carakyai ca śūlasthāyai śivāśritāḥ |
analyzed: ghṛtam māṃsam carakyai ca śūla sthāyai śiva āśritāḥ
bidārikāyai dātavyam lavaṇam dhīmatā bhṛśam
tila piṇḍam atho dadyāt pūtanāyai viśeṣataḥ
kulmāṣam pāpa rākṣasyai māṃsa annam syāt graheṣu ca

nava daṇḍam vyapohya eva kuryāt dhāma mahā antaram
tri yuga indriya ṣaṣ hastaiḥ sapta hastena vā gṛham
yat vā kara dvayena eva mūlasthānam prakalpayet
bālasthānam atha ardhena garbhagehāt tathā bhavet
mūla bhāga viśālena bhittiḥ dvi triguṇā matā

original: śeṣaṃ tu garbhagehasya maṇḍapaṃ vā sabhākṛti |
analyzed: śeṣam tu garbha gehasya maṇḍapam vā sabhā kṛti

original: tasya garbhagṛhārdhaṃ tu hīnamadhyārdhakaṃ tu yat || 34/7 ||
analyzed: tasya garbhagṛha ardham tu hīna madhya ardhakam tu yat

citra ahi śirasā upetam sūtra hīnam tu kārayet
nava aṅgulam samārabhya dvi dvi aṅgula vivardhanāt

tat liṅgam tri catur bhāga mānena tu niveśayet
mūla udaya samam śreṣṭham madhya hīnam adhas ntaram
vasudhā bhājite tatra nava liṅga ucchrayāḥ matāḥ
sapta aṅgulam samārabhya dvi dvi aṅgula vivardhanāt
taruṇa pratimānām tu navadhā mānam īritam
sakale sakalam kuryāt niṣkale ca eva niṣkalam
mūla bimba ardha mānam tu śreṣṭham veda aṃśa mānataḥ  /

vidhīyate
kṣīravṛkṣaiḥ palāśaiḥ vā vaṭa udumbara pippalaiḥ

original: tatsamaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tripādaṃ vāgramaṇḍapam || 34/20 ||
analyzed: tad samam vā tad ardham vā tri pādam vā agramaṇḍapam

liṅganāham tu vistāram pīṭham vā ardha unnatiḥ matā

ratna nyāsaḥ na kartavyaḥ pāda śaila ādikam na hi

pṛ
darbha mālā samāyuktam vitāna ādyaiḥ samanvitam
madhya aṃśe vedikām kuryāt tad caturtha aṃśaka unnatam
vasu aṅgulam tu vistāram utsedhaḥ catur aṅgulaḥ
tasyāḥ ca paritas ca aṣṭa dikṣu kuṇḍāni kalpayet
diśāsu caturaśrāṇi koṇeṣu abjāni kalpayet
īśāna śakrayoḥ madhye pradhānam vṛtta kuṇḍakam

original: athavā pañcakuṇ.ḍāni caikaṃ vā pūrvataḥ sthitam |
analyzed: athavā pañca kuṇḍāni ca ekam vā pūrvatas sthitam
maṇḍapasya uttare pārśve snāna śvabhram prakalpayet
paścāt śilpinam udvāsya puṇyāham vācayet tatas
jala madhye prapām kuryāt sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutām
prakṣālya pañcagavyena liṅgam ca astreṇa deśikaḥ
śuddha toyena gandha ādyaiḥ saṃsnāpya ca hṛdā arcayet  /
vastra yugmena saṃveṣṭya lamba kūrca samanvitam
jale tu śāyayet liṅgam sadyena eva kuśa upari
tri rātram dvi eka rātram vā veda yāma avasānakam
prabhūta pañcagavyena snapanam vā samācaret
paritas kalaśān aṣṭau lokapāla adhidaivatān
sa vastrān sa hiraṇyān ca sa sūtrān sa apidhānakān
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra maṇḍape samalaṅkṛte
vāstu homam tatas kuryāt prāsāde maṇḍape api vā
paryagnikaraṇam kṛtvā vāstu homa stha vahninā
jalāt ānīya liṅgam tu snāna śvabhra upari nyaset
vastram visṛjya liṅge tu pūrvavat śuddhim ācaret
kautukam bandhayet dhīmān hṛdayena tu mantrataḥ
vastreṇa veṣṭayet liṅgam vāmadevena deśikaḥ
śālibhiḥ vedikā madhye aṣṭa droṇa ardha nirmitaiḥ
taṇḍulaiḥ ca tilaiḥ darbhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ca su paristaret
śayanam kalpayet madhye carmaja ādyaiḥ anukramāt
sarva ātodya samāyuktam stotra maṅgala vācakaiḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyuktaḥ tu ādiśaivaḥ sa śiṣyakaḥ
divya gandha anulipta aṅgaḥ puṣpa mālā vibhūṣitaḥ
śukla vastraḥ ca sa uṣṇīṣaḥ śukla vastra uttarīyakaḥ
īdṛśaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktaḥ tu ācāryaḥ ca uttarānanaḥ
vedi ūrdhve śāyayet liṅgam prāc śiraskam adhomukham
abhyarcya hṛdayena eva gandha ādyaiḥ upacārakaiḥ
droṇa ambu pūritam sūtra veṣṭitam kūrca saṃyutam
pañcaratna samāyuktam sa apidhānam sa vastrakam

original: śivakumbhaṃ nyasettasya mūrdhni deśe tu varmaṇā |
analyzed: śiva kumbham nyaset tasya mūrdhni deśe tu varmaṇā
vardhanīm vāmatas sthāpya sūtraka ādibhiḥ anvitām
śiva mantram nyaset dhyātvā devadevam sadāśivam
aṣṭatriṃśat kalā upetam pūjayet mūlamantrataḥ
pūjayet tu sva mantreṇa vardhanīm tu manonmanīm
mukulīm padma mudrām ca liṅga mudrām pradarśayet
abhitas tu ghaṭān aṣṭau drauṇa ardha udaka pūritān
sūtra ādibhiḥ samopetān hema ṭaṅka samāyutān
indra ādiṣu krameṇa eva sthāpayet deśika uttamaḥ
ananta ādi śikhaṇḍi antān sva sva mantraiḥ ghaṭeṣu ca
vinyasya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ naivedya antam hṛdā arcayet
parivāra ghaṭān aṣṭau ca upavedi upari nyaset
ṛk ādi adhyayanam kuryuḥ saṃskṛtāḥ veda vittamāḥ
ekaḥ vā sarva vedān ca paṭhet sva sva diśi sthitaḥ
tad abhāve tu ajāta ādyāḥ japtavyāḥ mūrtipaiḥ saha
sadyojātaḥ tu ṛgvedaḥ vāmadevaḥ yajuḥ smṛtaḥ
aghoraḥ sāmavedaḥ tu atharvaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
aṣṭottarasahasram vā tad ardham vā tad ardhakam
pṛ
aṣṭottaraśatam vā api japet vaidika siddhaye
mūrti dhārā ādi alābhe tu deśikaḥ sarvam ācaret
agnyādhāna ādikam sarvam agni kārya uktam ācaret
khādira aśvattha bilvāḥ ca udumbara vaṭau tathā
madhūka arka palāśāḥ ca samidhaḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
palāśaḥ tu pradhānam ca sarveṣām idhmam ucyate
samidh ājya anna lājaiḥ ca tilaiḥ homam samācaret

original: sahasraṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tu vā || 34/58 ||
analyzed: sahasram vā tad ardham vā śatam aṣṭa uttaram tu vā
pūrṇāhutim tatas kuryāt vauṣaṭ antena mūlataḥ
śivāt daśa aṃśataḥ nyeṣām dikṣu brahmāṇi kalpayet  /
vidikṣu hṛdaya ādīni mūla ardham samam eva vā
pūrṇāhutim tatas kuryāt vauṣaṭ antena mūlataḥ
ātma tattva ādikān nyasya mūrtim mūrti īśvarān api

analyzed: athavā pañca niṣkam vā dviguṇā madhyamā bhavet

analyzed: dviguṇā madhyame kalpe triguṇā ca uttame bhavet

muhūrte samanuprāpte gurave san nivedayet

pṛ
nayana unmīlanam gavya abhiṣekam śayanam tathā
kumbha saṃsthāpanam pūjā homam ca sthāpana ādikam
dhyāna mātram ca nitya arcā nirmalaiḥ kusuma ādibhiḥ
tad tad deva pratiṣṭhā ukta mārgeṇa eva samācaret
etat sāmānyam uddiṣṭam viśeṣaḥ kiñcid asti hi
dvitīye sthāpana arhaḥ tu pūrva rātrau muni īśvarāḥ
mūla geha agrake tatra pūrvavat sthaṇḍila upari
kumbham tu sthāpya pūrva ukta vidhinā deśika adhipaḥ
mūla liṅgam tu saṃpūjya gandha ādyaiḥ haviṣā saha
praṇamya devadeveśam kartā karma vicakṣaṇaḥ
eka vatsaram ārabhya yāvat syāt dvādaśa abdakam

analyzed: grāma ādīnām tu vinyāsaḥ niveśa ādyam ca kathyate
