analyzed: athavā kevalām devīm deveśam ca atha maṇḍapam
deva aṅga bhūtakūṭa ādau veśayet pūrva mārgataḥ
rājānam mālikā ādau tu pradhāna mahiṣī yutam
pradhāna mantri saṃyuktam amātya ādibhiḥ āvṛtam
aṅkura arpaṇa pūrvam vā rahitam vā niveśayet
gṛha maṇḍapa kūṭa ādau śālāsu ca mahānase
brāhmaṇa ādi catur varṇān mārgeṇa anena veśayet
iti kāmikākhye mahātantre grāmagṛha vinyāsa vidhiḥ trayastriṃśattamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
pṛ
vāstuśānti vidhim vakṣye grāma ādīnām śubha āvaham
vāstu upaśamanam nāma sarva doṣa vināśanam

original: jīrṇoddhāre navīkāre chede bhede tathaiva ca |
analyzed: jīrṇa uddhāre navīkāre chede bhede tathā eva ca
vāyu agni jala saṃbādhe nṛpa cora ādi bādhake  /
dakṣiṇa apara vṛddhau ca prāc udak chedane ipi ca
nyūna atireke mānasya dvāra nirgama bhedane  /
prākāra parigha abhede devatā ālaya kalpane
yajamāna antare ca eva hīna lakṣaṇa vāstuke  /

original: tyakte śūnye tathā naṣṭe prātilomye tathaiva ca |
analyzed: tyakte śūnye tathā naṣṭe prātilomye tathā eva ca
ābhicāra kṛte doṣe vyādhi mārī bhaye pi ca
utpāte durnimitte ca sarva doṣa apanuttaye
vāstu upaśamanam kuryāt sadyas eva vicakṣaṇaḥ
vakra rathyā anvite vā api vinyāsa ādya vivarjite
anyeṣu aśubha yukteṣu gṛha devālayeṣu ca
mahā adbhute ca saṃprāpte trividhe ca uttama ādike
prāyaścittam viśeṣeṇa vakṣyamāṇam idam nayet  /
tatas guruḥ kṛta snānaḥ śiva vipraḥ prasanna dhīḥ
ahatābhyām su vāsobhyām saṃyuktaḥ sa uttarīyakaḥ
vāstu aṅga devatāḥ sarvāḥ tad tad śāstra ukta mārgataḥ
pūjayitvā vidhānena devān anyāt tathā eva ca
vāstu madhye prapām kuryāt ca anyasmin vā manorame
darbha mālā ādibhiḥ yuktām sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutām
vāruṇyam indrakāṣṭhāyām dakṣiṇe ca uttare api vā
tad madhye daṇḍa mātreṇa vedīm pañca aṅgula ucchritām
tasyām piṣṭa akta sūtreṇa padāni parikalpayet
catur nava vikārān ca pañcaviṃśat padam tu vā
ṣaṭtriṃśat aṃśakaiḥ ca api catvāriṃśat nava adhikam
aṣṭa aṣṭaka padam vā api sūtra varga padam tu vā
eteṣu anyatamam yogyam vinyaset vāstu vittamaḥ
śālibhiḥ sthaṇḍilam kṛtvā taṇḍulaiḥ tila miśrakaiḥ
lāja darbha samāyuktam puṣpaiḥ ca eva samanvitam

original: caruṃ ca tatra saṃsthāpya ghṛtenaivābhidhārya ca || 36/16 ||
analyzed: carum ca tatra saṃsthāpya ghṛtena eva abhidhārya ca
saṃprokṣya hṛdayena eva vastreṇa ācchādya sat kuśaiḥ

original: vedyāstu paścime deśe kuṇḍaṃ kṛtvā trimekhalam || 36/17 ||
analyzed: vedyāḥ tu paścime deśe kuṇḍam kṛtvā tri mekhalam
caturaśram hasta mānam nava aṅgula samucchrayam
tatra vahnim samādhāya vahni kārya ukta mārgataḥ
samidh ājya havirbhiḥ ca yava kṛṣṇatilaiḥ api
madhu ājya kṣīra saṃyukta dūrvayā homam ācaret
pañca brahma śiva aṅgaiḥ ca vidyā aṅgaiḥ śiva pūrvakaiḥ

original: aghoreṇa śataṃ vārdhaṃ dravyaiḥ pūrvaistu pañcabhiḥ || 36/20 ||
analyzed: aghoreṇa śatam vā ardham dravyaiḥ pūrvaiḥ tu pañcabhiḥ
aṣṭottaraśatam dūrvā homaḥ mṛtyu jitaḥ bhavet
pūrṇāhutim tatas hutvā vāstu devān samarcayet  /
padeṣu kūrcam nikṣipya kuryāt āvāhana ādikam

original: brahmāṇaṃ prathamaṃ ceṣṭvā tataḥ sarvāṃśca pūjayet || 36/22 ||
analyzed: brahmāṇam prathamam ca iṣṭvā tatas sarvān ca pūjayet
dvādaśa abda su saṃpūrṇām vipra jāti samudbhavām
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpūrṇām nānā ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
śukla ambara dharām kanyām śukla puṣpaiḥ alaṅkṛtām
śukla vastra uttarīyām tām saṃpūjya anna ādibhiḥ sukham
tasyāḥ ca da tvā tāmbūlam bali dravya samanvitam
dadyāt tasyāḥ ca haste tu bali pātram guruḥ tadā
nava vastra dharaḥ śaiva vipraḥ dadyāt balim pure
pṛ
madhu ājya dadhi saṃyuktam śuddham annam tu vā dadet
sarva dravya samāyuktam athavā enam samācaret
rātrau grāma balim dadyāt prāsāda ādau yatheṣṭataḥ

original: catuṣkuṇḍe tu vā vāstudevānāṃ tarpaṇaṃ bhavet || 36/28 ||
analyzed: catuṣkuṇḍe tu vā vāstu devānām tarpaṇam bhavet
dakṣiṇām dāpayet paścāt ācārya ādiṣu anukramāt
adhamā pañca niṣkam syāt dviguṇā madhyamā bhavet  /

original: triguṇā cottamā proktā deśikasya tu dakṣiṇā |
analyzed: triguṇā ca uttamā proktā deśikasya tu dakṣiṇā
agrahāra ādike devāgāre rājñām dvijanmanām
vaiśyānām śūdra jātīnām āvāse maṇḍapa ādiṣu
caṇḍāla ādi uṣite ca eva tad janma maraṇe api ca
dūṣiteṣu asura ādyaiḥ ca vidhim enam samācaret

original: kūpe vā puṣkariṇyādau jalaṃ sarvaṃ bahiḥ kṣipet || 36/32 ||
analyzed: kūpe vā puṣkariṇī ādau jalam sarvam bahis kṣipet  /
sahasra kumbha toyam vā śata kumbha udakam tu vā

original: pañcagavyaṃ tu nikṣipya śāntihomaṃ tu kārayet || 36/33 ||
analyzed: pañcagavyam tu nikṣipya śānti homam tu kārayet  /

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre vāstuśāntividhiḥ catustriṃśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre vāstuśāntividhiḥ catustriṃśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
śālā lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi śālānām lakṣaṇam param
devānām brāhmaṇānām ca kṣatriyāṇām viśeṣataḥ
vaiśyānām śūdra jātīnām vāsa yogyāḥ tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ
eka dvi tri catuḥ saptadaśa śālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
tad ūrdhvam tri tri vṛddhyā tu yāvat iṣṭam pragṛhyatām

original: tā eva mālikāḥ proktā mālāvatkriyate yataḥ || 37/3 ||
analyzed: tāḥ eva mālikāḥ proktāḥ mālā vat kriyate yatas
mānam tāvat dvidhā khyātam hasta bhakti vaśena tu
sārdha hastam samārabhya tri tri aṅgula vivardhanāt
aṣṭottaraśatam yāvat hastānām vistaraḥ mataḥ
vistārāt ardha hastam syāt triguṇa antam samāyatiḥ
evam hasta pramāṇam syāt bhaktimān avaśāt tatas
eka hastam samārabhya tri tri aṅgula vivardhanāt
nava hasta anta vistārāḥ bhaktayaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
vistārāt dvi aṅgula ardhā syāt dviguṇa antā samāyatiḥ
eka bhakti viśālāt tu ca ardha bhakti vivardhanāt
triguṇa anta pramāṇena vistārāt āyatiḥ matā

original: vistāre cāyate caiva vinyastā bhaktayaśca tāḥ || 37/8 ||
analyzed: vistāre ca āyate ca eva vinyastāḥ bhaktayaḥ ca tāḥ
pramāṇena samastāḥ ced viṣamāḥ vā yatheṣṭataḥ

original: vistāre cāyate caiva yugmā ojāśca bhaktayaḥ || 37/9 ||
analyzed: vistāre ca āyate ca eva yugmāḥ ojāḥ ca bhaktayaḥ
bhakti abhyantara mānam vā bhakti bāhyam atha api vā
bhakti madhya pramāṇam vā tad stha pādāt tathā api vā
caturaśram tu devānām dvijānām api sattamāḥ
kṣatriyāṇām tathā proktam anyayoḥ āyata aśrakam
hīna uktam śreṣṭha jātīnām hitam na uktam viparyayāt
vistāra samaḥ utsedhaḥ sa pādaḥ vā atha sārdhakaḥ  /
pāda ūna dviguṇaḥ vā api dviguṇaḥ vā āyatiḥ samā
pāda āyāmaiḥ tu vā kuryāt vakṣyamāṇaiḥ yathākramam
āya ādi saṃpad artham tu vistāre ca āyatau tathā
utsedhe ca eva hastānām samyak sampūrṇa tām nayet
vistārāt kevalam vā athavā āyāmāt unnate tathā
vistāra āyāma saṃsargāt āyādyam parigṛhyatām
aṣṭa tri tri aṣṭabhiḥ hatvā aṣṭam anu arka bhaiḥ bhajet

original: āyo vyayaśca yoniśca nakṣatraṃ śeṣato bhavet || 37/16 ||
analyzed: āyaḥ vyayaḥ ca yoniḥ ca nakṣatram śeṣatas bhavet
pṛ
triṃśat āpnotu paryantam tithiḥ vāram tu saptabhiḥ
athavā anya prakāreṇa cāyādyam parigṛhyatām
dairghyam dairghyasya vistāram nāhakam
aṣṭa nanda agni vasubhiḥ gaṇayet nanda nandanāḥ
arka diś vasu bhaiḥ sapta navabhiḥ ca kramāt bhajet
āya ādyam pūrvavat proktam āya ādhikyam śubha pradam
yajamānasya janma ṛkṣeṇa anukūlam yathā bhavet

original: tathā parīkṣya kartavyaṃ nāmanakṣatrakaṃ tu vā || 37/20 ||
analyzed: tathā parīkṣya kartavyam nāma nakṣatrakam tu vā
parīkṣya bahudhā kuryāt ubhayam vā parīkṣayet
sarva ānukūlyam sarvatra vā astu yasmāt na labhyate
tasmāt guṇa dhikam grāhyam alpa doṣam yathā bhavet

original: adhiṣṭhānaṃ ca pādaṃ ca prastaraṃ kaṇṭha eva ca || 37/22 ||
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam ca pādam ca prastaram kaṇṭhe eva ca
śikharam sthūpikā ca eva śālā aṅgam iti kathyate
yajamānasya jānu antam nābhi antam hṛdaya avadhi

original: galāvadhi śiro'ntaṃ ca pādārdhaṃ vā tribhāgikam |
analyzed: gala avadhi śiraḥ ntam ca pāda ardham vā tri bhāgikam
tri ādi ṣoḍaśa bhāgānām adhikam vā ukta mānataḥ  /
adhiṣṭhānasya mānam syāt tat pādasya atha kathyate
sārdha hastam samārabhya tri tri aṅgula vivardhanāt
nava hasta pramāṇa antāḥ stambha utsedhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
aṅgula trayam ārabhya ca ardha aṅgula vivardhanāt
triṃśat mātra avasānāḥ tu vistārāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
catur aṃśam samārabhya ṣoḍaśa aṃśam yathāvidhi
bhāgān kṛtvā eka bhāgena nyūnam syāt agra vistaraḥ
evam ūrdhva ūrdhva pādānām tāra āyāmau prakalpayet
prastaram pāda dairghyasya ca ardha mānena kārayet
tad mānam navadhā kṛtvā ca eka ādya ācatur aṃśakaiḥ
nyūnam vā api adhikam vā api prastaram kārayet budhaḥ
prastara ukta pramāṇam tu sarvam kaṇṭhe vidhīyate
pāda uktam sarva mānam tu śikhare pi vidhīyate
dhruvā vidhāna rītyā vā śikharam parikalpayet
kaṇṭha uktam sarva mānam tu sthūpī utsedhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
pāda viṣkambha mānena dviguṇa ādi nava antakam
bhitti viṣkambhaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ dvi aṅgulena athavā nayet
aṣṭa aṅgulam samārabhya dvi dvi aṅgula vivardhanāt
tri hasta antam tu vistāraḥ bhittīnām parikīrtitaḥ
mūlabhitteḥ idam mānam ūrdhve pāda ardha hīnakam

original: anyonyamadhikā vāpi nyūnā vā bhittayaḥ samāḥ |
analyzed: anyonyam adhikāḥ vā api nyūnāḥ vā bhittayaḥ samāḥ
śālā ekā daṇḍa khaṇḍa ābhā dvi śālā tad dvayena tu
tad trayeṇa tri śālā syāt catuḥ śālā catuṣṭayī
saptabhiḥ sapta śālā syāt evam anyāḥ tu kīrtitāḥ
vistāre ca eka bhakti ādi pañcāśat bhaktika avadhi
āyāme api tathā vṛddhyā śata antam parikalpayet

original: āsāmagre tvalindāḥ syuḥ pradhāne vā viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: āsām agre tu alindāḥ syuḥ pradhāne vā viśeṣataḥ
eka dvi tri catuṣpañca ṣaṣ sapta alinda saṃyutāḥ
pṛṣṭhe pārśve tathā eva syuḥ iṣṭa deśe thavā punar
pṛthu dvāram ca dvārān ca evam eva prakalpayet
madhye tu prāṅkaṇam kāryam viśālena eka paṅktikam
ardha paṅkti vivṛddhyā tu triṃśat paṅki antam iṣyate  /
āyāme ca eka paṅkti ādi triguṇa antam viśāla tā

original: evaṃ brahmāṅkaṇaṃ kāryaṃ jalapātayutaṃ na vā || 37/41 ||
analyzed: evam brahma aṅkaṇam kāryam jalapāta yutam na vā
miśram vā api prakartavyam bhramaṇa srava vāri yuj
bāhya vāri yutam vā api vivaram vā prakalpayet
eka paṅkti viśāla ādi pāda pāda vivṛddhitaḥ
pañca bhāga avasāna antam śālā vistāraḥ iṣyate  /
pṛthu dvāra viśālam tu ca evam eva prakalpayet
alindaḥ pṛthu dvāreṇa samaḥ vā ca ardha mānataḥ
pṛ
dvāra mānam tathā evam syāt daṇḍikā dvāram ardhataḥ
dakṣiṇe netra bhittau vā garbhādhānam prakīrtitam
athavā brahmabhittau vā garbhādhānam vidhīyate
ka bhitteḥ dakṣiṇe bhāge svāmi āvāsaḥ praśasyate
uttare tat gṛhiṇyāḥ gṛham bhavet
kuryāt viśiṣyate
nava bhāge gṛhe tatra dakṣiṇe pañca bhāgakam  /

original: vāmabhāge trayaṃ tyaktvā madhye dvāraṃ vidhīyate |
analyzed: vāma bhāge trayam tyaktvā madhye dvāram vidhīyate
alinde dvāram evam syāt anyatra api evam eva tu
kampa dvāram tu vā kuryāt madhya pārśva dvayoḥ tathā
bhitti vyāsa irka bhāgam tu bāhye bāhya śara aṃśakam
yogasya madhyamaḥ pāda madhyamaḥ ca vidhīyate

original: bhittimadhyaṃ tayormadhyaṃ pādamadhyaṃ tu vā samam || 37/51 ||
analyzed: bhitti madhyam tayoḥ madhyam pāda madhyam tu vā samam

original: koṇaṃ ca madhyamaṃ sthānaṃ tyaktvā vārivaho bhavet |
analyzed: koṇam ca madhyamam sthānam tyaktvā vāri vahaḥ bhavet
koṇāt tṛtīya bhāge tu jala nirgamaḥ iṣyate  /
gṛhakṣate mahendre ca puṣpadante vidhīyate

original: bhallāṭe caiva madhye ca dvāramāsu vidhīyate || 37/53 ||
analyzed: bhallāṭe ca eva madhye ca dvāram āsu vidhīyate
hasta stambha tulā ādīni narāṇām yugma saṃkhyayā

original: devānāmubhayaṃ grāhyaṃ madhyadvāraṃ tu vai tale || 37/54 ||
analyzed: devānām ubhayam grāhyam madhya dvāram tu vai tale
anna āgāra ādi madhyam tu vāstu madhyāt pradakṣiṇe
ādityāt nanda pāda ante pañca aṅgula gati kramāt
vāstu madhyāt udak pūrvam dakṣiṇa aparatas kramāt
ekaika aṃśa gatāḥ tatra stambha sthāpana karmaṇi
gṛha aṅghri madhyayoḥ madhyam bhitti madhyam iti smṛtam
evam caturgṛham proktam śālāyām kalpayet nava
etat sarvam tu śālānām sāmānyam iti kīrtyate
taitilānām dvijātīnām pāṣaṇḍa āśramiṇām api
hasti aśva ratha yodhānām yāga homa ādi karmasu
devānām bhūpatīnām ca nṛtta gīta ādi karmasu
ekaśālā praśastā syāt strīṇām raṅga upajīvinām
lāṅgalam gaṇikā ādīnām śūrpam ugra upajīvinām
śālā virahita sthāne kuḍye dvāram prayojayet
ūrdhva bhūmim samārabhya racanā kathyate idhunā
pradhānaśālā yatra eva raṅga sthānam vidhīyate
svāmi āvāsasya vinyāsam maṇḍapa ākāra saṃyutam
cūlī harmya yutam ca ūrdhve ca agra dvāra samanvitam
vāstu dvāra yutam ca eva ka bhitteḥ ca viśeṣataḥ
sarvatas kuṇḍa saṃyuktam gṛha dvāra sanvitam
raṅga bhitti samāyuktam dhāma sopāna saṃyutam
sa ūrdhva vāstavya saṃyuktam cūlī harmya yutam tu vā
agra karma samāyuktam karṇakūṭa dvaya anvitam
karṇa kūṭa vihīnam vā ca anyat sarvam tu vāstuṣu

original: madhyamaṃ cāṅkaṇasthānaṃ maṇḍapena yutaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: madhyamam ca aṅkaṇa sthānam maṇḍapena yutam tu vā
sabhākāra yutam vā api kevalam vā jala sthalam
ūrdhvabhūmiḥ iti khyātā sā anyathā ca nigadyate
pradhāna maṇḍapa āgāram cūlī harmya vivarjitam
svāmi vāsam vidhāya evam raṅgam kuryāt tu tad samam
lūpa āroha kriyā yuktam anyat pūrva ukta vartmanā
athavā sarva śālāyām lūpa ārohaṇam eva vā
ūrdhvabhūmiḥ iti khyātā dvitīyām śṛṇuta dvijāḥ
catuḥ śālā pradeśe tu tad adhas bhūmiḥ ucyate
sā bhūmiḥ maṇḍapa āgāra cūlī harmya vibhūṣitā
tad adhastāt samantāt tu pṛthu dvāra yutā tathā
bhāga dvayena tasya eva vinyāsaḥ paripaṭhyate
pṛ
catuṣkoṇe catuṣkūṭam tad vistāreṇa nirmitam
catur bhāga dvi bhāgena pṛṣṭha āvāsa sabhām nayet
agra kūṭa dvayoḥ madhye śālāḥ pṛṣṭha sabhāḥ yathā
pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ ca eva catur bhāga anta vistaram
pañjara dvitayam kāryam karṇakūṭa sama udayam
tayoḥ ūrdhvam ca paryāptiḥ ūrdhvatas dvi tala antikā
pṛṣṭhāvāsa sabhā tadvat anyat sarvam adhas sthale  /
avasāna samāyuktam tri talam ca etat īritam
alindasya samantāt tu bhāgena ekena vārakam
pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ ca eva ca agra śālā anusārataḥ
tathā pradhāna śālāyāḥ tu anusāreṇa pārśvayoḥ
alindasya anusāreṇa pūrva bhāge viśeṣataḥ
bhāga dvaya viniṣkrāmaḥ bhāga dvaya viśālataḥ
sa dvāra netraśālānām ṣaṭkam ca alindataḥ bahis
catuḥ śālā avasāna antām ūrdhva adhas parikalpayet
tad adhas bhū praveśe tu tad dvārasya avasānakam

original: ṣaṇṇāṃ vai netraśālānāṃ antarāle ca vāssthalam || 37/81 ||
analyzed: ṣaṇṇām vai netraśālānām antarāle ca
catur bhāga āyatam bhāga dvaya vistāra saṃyutam

original: dakṣiṇe cottare caiva pūrve caiva viśeṣataḥ || 37/82 ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇe ca uttare ca eva pūrve ca eva viśeṣataḥ
agra koṇe dvayoḥ ca eva pañca sthāne prakalpayet
athavā nairṛte vāyau deva bhāga samanvitam
vāḥsthalam vā vidhātavyam ūrdhvatas ṣaṣ tala upari
tad adhas bhū dvayam yat tu rajju sūtra kapota yuj  /
etat sapta talam proktam rājñām āvāsa yogyakam
tad adhastāt samantāt tu bhāgena ekena vārakam
etat daśa talam proktam rajju sūtram adhas talam
tad adhastāt talam ca ekādaśa dvādaśa bhūmikam  /
evam eva prakāreṇa kuryāt āṣoḍaśakṣmakam
ādyam tu sarvatobhadram dvitīyam vardhamānakam
tṛtīyam svastikam proktam nandyāvartam caturthakam
carukam pañcamam vidyāt śālānām apidhānakam
sarvatobhadram aṣṭa āsyam veda āsyam vardhamānakam

original: dakṣiṇe cottare caiva ṣaṇṇetraṃ svastikaṃ matam || 37/89 ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇe ca uttare ca eva ṣaṇṇetram svastikam matam
pārśvayoḥ puratas ca eva catur netra samāyutam

original: nandyāvartaṃ smṛtaṃ pūrve dakṣiṇe paścime tathā || 37/90 ||
analyzed: nandyāvartam smṛtam pūrve dakṣiṇe paścime tathā
uttare saumya śālā ādi śālānām āsyam īrtitam
niṣpaṭam carukam vidyāt sarvatra eva viśeṣataḥ
ādyam catuṣṭayam yat tu sarveṣām api śaṃsitam
viśeṣāt bhūbhṛtām śastam carukam devayogyakam
dvijānām vihitam ca eva pāṣaṇḍa āśramiṇām api
śālābhāge tu alinde vā pṛthuvāra aṃśake api

original: etāsāṃ mālikānāṃ tu kuryādagre tu maṇḍapam || 37/94 ||
analyzed: etāsām mālikānām tu kuryāt agre tu maṇḍapam
eka bhāgam samārabhya vāsa vyāsa sama avadhi
āyāmaḥ tu aṃśa vṛddhyā tu vistāraḥ vāsataḥ samaḥ
ekaika bhakti hānyā tu tri bhaktay antaḥ tu vistaraḥ
eka dvi tri tala upetam catur pañca talam tu vā
maṇḍapam tu vidhātavyam śālānām agra deśake
evaṃbhūtasya vāsasya samantāt maṇḍapam nayet
eka bhāgam samārabhya pāda bhāga vivṛddhitaḥ
pañca bhāga avasāna antam kuryāt āvṛta maṇḍapam
hasta mānena vā kuryāt tri hastāt ardha vṛddhitaḥ
pañcadaśa kara antam tu kuryāt āvṛta maṇḍapam

original: maṇḍapena vinā vāpi tena mānena pīṭhikā |
analyzed: maṇḍapena vinā vā api tena mānena pīṭhikā

original: vibhadrā vā sabhadrā vā kartavyā mālikā budhaiḥ || 37/100 ||
analyzed: vibhadrā vā sabhadrā vā kartavyā mālikā budhaiḥ
pṛ
śālānām tu catur dikṣu ca eka bhāga āditaḥ kramāt
pāda bhāga vivṛddhyā tu ca aṣṭa bhāga avasānakam
vinirgamasya tad vṛddhyā tasya vistaraḥ
dviguṇa antaḥ vidheyaḥ syāt evam syāt madhya vāraṇam

original: madhyavāraṇayuktaṃ vā tadvihīnaṃ tu vā dvijāḥ |
analyzed: madhya vāraṇa yuktam vā tad vihīnam tu vā dvijāḥ
evaṃbhūtasya vāsasya samantāt syāt khalūrikā
vāsa vyāsam catur bhāgam kṛtvā ca eka ādi bhāgataḥ
vṛdhyām vāsasya bāhye tu ṣoḍaśa avadhi bhāgakān
vyapohya paritas kuryāt prathama āvaraṇa āditas
khalūrikāḥ tu ca eka ādi sapta bhāga avasānakāḥ

original: mukhe ca pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe bhaktayaḥ syuryatheṣṭataḥ |
analyzed: mukhe ca pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe bhaktayaḥ syuḥ yatheṣṭataḥ
ojaḥ yugma pramāṇena nyūnā vā api adhikā tu vā

original: sabhadrā vā vibhadrā vā khalūrī syādyatheṣṭataḥ |
analyzed: sabhadrā vā vibhadrā vā khalūrī syāt yatheṣṭataḥ

original: etāsāmantarālaṃ tu samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ tu vā || 37/107 ||
analyzed: etāsām antarālam tu samam vā viṣamam tu vā

antarāle bahis vā api adhikam nyūnam eva vā
eka pārśva idhikam vā api pṛṣṭhe vā api adhikam yathā
vā api pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhatas tathā
śālāyām ukta mānena bhaktiḥ hastam vaśena vā

original: tatsarvamatra saṃgrāhyaṃ śālāmātraṃ tu vā bhavet || 37/110 ||
analyzed: tat sarvam atra saṃgrāhyam śālā mātram tu vā bhavet
ekabhakti ādi bhakti ardha vṛddhyā diś bhaktika antikam
khalūrikā vidhau proktam sālam tatra ubhayatra tu
khalūrikā viśālān tu tri catur pañca bhāgakān

original: ṣaṭsaptabhāgaṃ vā kṛtvā bahirekaṃ vyapohya ca || 37/112 ||
analyzed: ṣaṣ sapta bhāgam vā kṛtvā bahis ekam vyapohya ca

original: antare śeṣabhāgāṃstu hitvā madhye tu sālakam |
analyzed: antare śeṣa bhāgān tu hitvā madhye tu sālakam
eka aneka tala upeta mūla āyāmena bhūmikām
sabhākāra śiraḥ yuktām śālākārām atha api vā
athavā maṇṭapa ūrdhve tu cūlī harmya vibhūṣitām
tala adhiṣṭhāna pādebhyaḥ kiñcid ūna pramāṇakām
tad vardhita upapīṭhām vā tad vardhita masūrakām
pāda āyāma sama uttuṅga masūraka yutām tu vā
mūla dhāma tala uttuṅga adhi sṭhāna tala saṃyutām
tad vihīna talām vā api sama sthala yutām tu vā
etām khalūrikām kuryāt prāsāda ādiṣu buddhimān
devānām manujānām ca viśeṣāt rāja dhāmani

original: puṣpadante ca bhallāṭe mahendre ca gṛhakṣate || 37/118 ||
analyzed: puṣpadante ca bhallāṭe mahendre ca gṛhakṣate  /
dvāram upadvāram tu vā nayet

original: garbhāgārayutaṃ vāpi madhye bhaktiyutaṃ tu vā || 37/120 ||
analyzed: garbhāgāra yutam vā api madhye bhakti yutam tu vā
catur aṃśa ādi bhānu anta bhāgān kṛtvā eka bhāgakam  /
hitvā mūla tala ādyam tu kuryāt śeṣeṇa buddhimān
adhiṣṭhāna ādi ṣaṣ vargam tad mānam upapīṭhake

original: dvārotsedhāya dātavyaṃ samaṃ vāpyadhikaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: dvāra utsedhāya dātavyam samam vā api adhikam tu vā

mūla dhāma talāt kiñcid ūnam vā api samācaret
sāla gopurayoḥ tuṅgaḥ tu adhikaḥ ca api mūlataḥ
gopurasya api alaṅkāram śālā alaṅkāra vat nayet
sabhākāra śiraḥ yuktam śālākāra śiraḥ kriyam
maṇḍapa ākāra saṃyuktam cūlī harmya vibhūṣitam
agratas ulindaka upetam aṭṭālam sālaka antare
gopurasya tu vistāra tri bhāgāt eka bhāgikam
catur bhāga eka bhāgaḥ tu pañca bhāga eka bhāgikaḥ
nirgamaḥ gopurāṇām tu prākārāt bāhyatas bhavet
gopuram ca khalūrī ca mūlavāstu nirīkṣitam
pṛ
antare rāja devīnām gṛhāṇi antarmukhāni ca
pradhāna mahiṣī geham vāma bhāge samācaret
anyāsām api tat bāhye gṛhasya āvṛtya kārayet
anyeṣām api tad bāhye kartuḥ icchā vaśena tu
prāc aṅkaṇam pradhānam syāt prāc avāc aṅkaṇe jvaraḥ
dakṣiṇe jaya dam rājñām nairṛte ripu vardhanam
pratīcyām putra mitra ṛddhiḥ paścimottarataḥ mṛtiḥ
udīcyām kośa vṛddhiḥ syāt īśāne maraṇam dhruvam
samantāt parighām kuryāt rājadhāmni idam īritam
devānām anya jātīnām api yogyam sanātanam
ārambha kāle tu eteṣām pṛthak pṛthak iha ucyate
kumbha sthe makara stha ṛke pūrva geham atha ārabhet
meṣa sthe vṛṣa ge dākṣyam āpyam siṃha kulīrake
tulāyām vṛścike saumyam na iṣṭam anyat catuṣṭayam  /
bhāskarasya diśi veśma na iṣṭan ca antarmukham sadā

analyzed: bādhitam ca nadī srotasā ca śoka apaham bhavet

analyzed: gṛhe na vardhanīyāḥ syuḥ grāma ādau śubha dāḥ matāḥ

analyzed: koṇaśālām tu kṛtvā tu vasan āśu vinaśyati

analyzed: yāmya agram kṣatriyāṇām tu paścima agram viśām bhavet
śūdrāṇām uttarasyām syāt eṣa vaṃśa agrakaḥ vidhiḥ

śūdrāṇām anya jātīnām ayugma stambhaḥ iṣyate

analyzed: rājādanam ca nimbaḥ ca silindhraḥ piśitam tu vā

pṛ
gṛha madhyama bhittiḥ ca pada madhya vivarjitā
tām āśritya tu kulyā ābham dvāra dvayam iha iṣyate  /
sarvathā bhinna śālāsu sandhi karma na kārayet

adhiṣṭhānam ca yāmi ādi caturgṛha vidhau bhavet
dvārasya antaḥ tu nimnaḥ ced vṛddhiḥ veśma adhipasya tu
unnatiḥ ca bahis jñeyā dvārasya ripu vardhanī
bhallāṭe dvāram iṣṭam syāt brāhmaṇānām viśeṣataḥ
māhendram bhūbhujām vidyāt vaṇijām api rākṣasam
puṣpadanta pada dvāram śūdrāṇām eva bhāṣitam
tad digīśān samāśritya dvāram vidhivat ācaret
madhya sūtrasya vāme vā dvāram vidhivat ācaret

original: jayante tu mahendre ca rākṣase vitathe bhṛśe |
analyzed: jayante tu mahā indre ca rākṣase vitathe bhṛśe

ukṣe dvāram na kartavyam bhavet

vistāra samaḥ utsedhaḥ sa aṅghriḥ sa ardhaḥ tri pāda yuj

śānti daḥ puṣṭi daḥ paścāt jaya daḥ dhana daḥ bhavet  /

original: hīnaṃ jātiriti proktā nikṛṣṭaṃ chanda ucyate |

atra api utsedha dīrghe ca pūrvavat parikalpayet
samam tu catur aśram tu daiva mānuṣam īritam
pāṣaṇḍa deva vipra ādi yāga yogyam iti smṛtam
daṇḍakam maulikam svastibhadram ca eva caturmukham
deva ādīnām tu sāmānyam caturvidham udāhṛtam

original: tadeva purato bhadraṃ caturdvyaṃśe tu sammatam || 38/36 ||

etat svastikam iti uktam caturmukham atha ucyate

karkarī vaṃśa śālā agre catur netra samanvitam
adhiṣṭhāna ādi vārga āḍhyam prāsāda vat alaṅkṛtam
nāsikā toraṇa ādi aṅgaiḥ yuktam vātāyana ādibhiḥ

iti kāmika ākhye mahā tantre eka śālā viśeṣa lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
dvi tri śālā lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ
dvi śāle catur aśre tu daśa bhāga vibhājite
bahirbhāgena vāraḥ syāt dvi aṃśa śālā viśālataḥ
prāc mukhe vāram eka aṃśam maṇḍapaḥ nava bhāga bhāj
tat āvṛtya eka kālindam śeṣam ca kramaṇam bhavet
mukhya geham bahirdvāram lāṅgala ābham yathā tathā
catur mukha samāyuktam dvi śālam iha kīrtitam
paura maṇḍala hīnam vā maṇḍapena vinā api vā
alindena anvitam vā api dvi śālam parikalpayet
tat eva pañca bhāga antam eka śālāmukha āyatam
dvāram pūrvavat uddiṣṭam sarva alaṅkāra śobhitam
maṇḍapāt bāhyatas lindam sa āyatam pravidhīyate
netra traya samāyuktam svastikam tu abhidhīyate
tat eva dvi mukha upetam daṇḍavaktram iti smṛtam
sa avakāśa antara upetam maṇḍapena vinā api vā
alindena anvitam vā api dvi śālam parikalpayet
sa vāram vā vivāram vā eka aneka tala anvitam

original: dvibhāge tvekabhāgaṃ vā tribhāge tu dvayaṃ tu vā |

catuḥ śālā ādi śālānām alaṅkāraḥ ūthaḥ ucyate
aṣṭa ādi dvādaśāntam tu nīce tu parikalpayet
daśa arkam anubhāgān tu nikṛṣṭe saṃprakalpayet
āditya manvoḥ eka aṃśam bhāgam madhye tu kalpayet  /
caturdaśa dvis aṣṭa aṣṭādaśa aṃśāḥ śreṣṭha vartmani
bīja bhāgaḥ samākhyātaḥ jātiḥ dvi aṃśa adhikā yatas
catur aṃśa adhikāḥ ca atra prakalpyam syāt rasa adhikam
aṣṭa aṃśa adhikam ābhāsam sarvatobhadra saṃjñake
bījam tu caturaśram syāt jātyā dvandva ādi vṛddhitaḥ
bīja jāti ādi saṃbhūtā saṃkhyā ṣaṣṭiḥ iti smṛtā
nikṛṣṭe sarvatobhadre dvi bhāgam madhyama aṅkaṇam
samantāt mārgaḥ eka aṃśaḥ dvi bhāgaḥ geha vistaraḥ
aṣṭa netra samāyuktam catur diś bhadra saṃyutam
bhadra madhye sabhāsyam syāt catuṣkam karṇakūṭakam
madhyame vāra saṃyuktam kūṭe śaṅkham yuga anvitam
pūrvasmin aparasmin vā svāmi āvāsaḥ praśasyate
sarvatas kuḍya saṃyuktam kuḍya ābha dvāra saṃyutam
bahis jālaka kuḍya āḍhyam antaram lūta pādakam
pakṣaśālā aṃśake dvāram pūrvasmin vā praśaṃsyate
sama stambham sama dvāram sama vaṃśam tu kārayet
karkarī vaṃśa jāla agram kūṭa hīnam tu vā nayet

ubhayam viparītam vā harmyam syāt madhya maṇḍapam

deva dvija narendrāṇām etat bhavanam īritam
yathā iṣṭa diśi vāraḥ syāt yathā iṣṭa diśi bhadrakam
vāramārgam alindam ca svāmi vāñchā vaśāt nayet
vikalpam iti nirdiṣṭam ābhāsam sarva yogataḥ
muṇḍa prāsāda saṃjñam tu harmya prāsāda saṃjñikam
ābhāsam sarvatobhadram deva dvija mahībhṛtām
nīcam tu sarvatobhadram caturvidham udāhṛtam
madhyamam sarvatobhadram catur aṃśa aṅkaṇa anvitam
eka aṃśa āvṛta mārgaḥ syāt śālā aṃśaḥ dviguṇaḥ bhavet
bahis tu alindam eka aṃśam prāgvat eva prakalpayet
sarvatobhadra jātiḥ syāt tad eva aṃśena bāhyake
vāra yuktam dvi bhāgena pṛthuvāra yutam tu vā
prāgvat bhadra samopetam deva dvija mahībhṛtām
dvi bhāgam aṅkaṇam ca antar vāra hīnam tu vā nayet

original: tadaṃśato bahirdvāraṃ mahāvāraṃ tu vā nayet |
analyzed: tad aṃśataḥ bahirdvāram mahāvāram tu vā nayet
ṣoḍaśa aṃśa viśālam tu vikalpam iti nirdiśet
tatra aṅkaṇam ṣaṣ aṃśaḥ syāt paritas mārgaḥ ekatas
dvi aṃśaḥ śālā vibhāgaḥ syāt antarvāram tu ca ekatas
bhāga ekena bahis vāram prāgvat śeṣam prakalpayet
vikalpam iti nidirṣṭam ābhāsam tatra miśritam
muṇḍa prāsāda harmya aṅgam mālikā ābhāsam iṣyate
utkṛṣṭam sarvatobhadram catur aṃśa aṅkaṇa anvitam
bhāgena paritas mārgaḥ ca antarvāram atha ekatas
śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgaḥ syāt bāhyālindam atha ekatas
nāsikā jāla saṃyuktam toraṇa ādyaiḥ tu saṃyutam

analyzed: antar vāram parityajya bāhye vā tatra kalpayet  /

eṣa jāti kramaḥ proktaḥ rājñām āvāsa yogyakaḥ

jāti chanda vikalpānām miśrama ābhāsa nāma bhāj
harmya aṅgam mālikā aṅgam ca muṇḍaprāsāda saṃjñikam
etat ābhāsam ākhyātam rājñām āvāsa yogyakam
svāmi pañcāṅga vinyāsam anuktam ca atra pūrvavat
utkṛṣṭam sarvatobhadram caturvidham udāhṛtam
evam vikāra bhedam tu sarvatobhadram iṣyate
iti kāmika ākhye mahā tantre catuḥ śālā sarvatobhadra lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ
aṣṭatriṃśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ

śālā tu vardhamāna ākhyā ṣaṣ aṣṭa daśa bhāgikā
nikṛṣṭa bhāginī ca aṣṭadaśa dvādaśa bhāgikā  /
daśa dvādaśa manvaṃśā madhyamā parikīrtitā
dvi ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa bhāge tu śreṣṭhā tu parikīrtitā
mūlam evam samākhyātam jātiḥ dvi aṃśa adhikā tathā
chanda ādayaḥ tathā dvi aṃśa vardhita āyāma saṃyutāḥ
nīca ādayaḥ trayaḥ api atra nava bheda samanvitāḥ
jāti ādi ābhāsa kāntā yā uktā mūla samanvitā
saṃkhyayā pañcacatvāriṃśat anta avadhi bhava ādibhiḥ
utkṛṣṭā ca atra yā jātiḥ vikalpa ādi anta dīrghikā
dvādaśa atra militvā tu saptapañcāśat īritā
nikṛṣṭe vardhamāne tu dvi bhāgam madhyama aṅkaṇam
śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgena madhyabhāgaḥ hi alinda bhāj
madhya bhitti samāśliṣṭa kulyā ābha dvāra saṃyutam
apare dīrghaśālā syāt dvi netrā tuṅga saṃyutā
alpa nimnā bhavet prācī śālā dīrghā dvi netrakā

original: pakṣage dve tu śāle tu vaṃśanimne dvivaktrake |
analyzed: pakṣa ge dve tu śāle tu vaṃśa nimne dvi vaktrake
bāhye bhitti samāyuktam antar pādaiḥ samanvitam
sarvatas kuḍya saṃyuktam madhya geham vidhīyate
dvi bhāga kṛta niṣkrāntam catur diś madhya vāraṇam
karṇe dvi aṃśa viśālam tu sopānam vaṃśa saṅgame
mukhya gehasya mūle tu snāna geham dvi bhāgataḥ
tasya apare tu saṃśliṣṭam pracchannam maitra gehakam

original: vāstūnāṃ tu caturmadhye catuḥ sūtraṃ prayojayet || 41/12 ||
analyzed: vāstūnām tu catuḥ madhye catuḥ sūtram prayojayet

prāsāda vat alaṅkuryāt vibhadram vā sa bhadrakam
nikṛṣṭam vardhamānam syāt rājñām āvāsa yogyakam
tat eva paritas ṛṃśena dvāram tu parikalpayet
yathā iṣṭa diśi bhadrāṅgam yathā iṣṭa diśi vāsakam
yathā iṣṭa dvāra saṃyuktam chandam iti abhidhīyate
tat eva pṛthu vāram tu daṇḍikā vāra saṃyutam

original: sabhadraṃ vā vibhadraṃ vā vikalpamiti kīrtitam |
analyzed: sa bhadram vā vibhadram vā vikalpam iti kīrtitam
jāti ādi traya saṃyuktam ābhāsam iti kīrtitam
nīca māna aṃśake dvi aṃśe na aṅkaṇam parikalpayet
aṃśena paritolindam śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ

original: ucchritaṃ mukhyagehaṃ syācchālāḥ śeṣāḥ samā matāḥ |
analyzed: ucchritam mukhya geham syāt śālāḥ śeṣāḥ samāḥ matāḥ
prāk ukta vat alaṅkuryāt nīce jātiḥ prakīrtitā
tat eva paritas lindam eka aṃśena prakalpayet
chanda nāmnā samuddiṣṭam viśvam anyat purā ukta vat
tat eva paritas ṛṃśena vāram vā pṛthuvārakam
uttuṅgam svāmi vāsa aṅgam itara dvivṛta aṅghrikam
vikalpam iti nirdiṣṭam ābhāsam tatra miśritam
madhyamam vardhamānam tu bhāgam dvi madhyama aṅkaṇam

eka aṃśa āvṛta vāram syāt aṣṭa netra samanvitam

catuḥ ṣaṣ aṃśa dīrgham tu madhye śālā catuṣṭayam

vikalpam pṛthuvāreṇa bāhyavāreṇa saṃyutam

daṇḍikā vāra saṃyuktam ābhāsam sarva miśritam
uttama vyāsa bhāge tu dvi bhāgam madhyama aṅkaṇam

śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgena paritas lindavārake  /

jātyākhyam vardhamānam syāt vipra bhūmīndra yogyakam

viśiṣṭam vardhamāna ākhyam sa alaṅkāram atha ucyate
vistāre ṣoḍaśa aṃśāḥ syuḥ āyāme dvādaśa aṃśakāḥ
brahmāṅkaṇam dvi bhāgam syāt āyāme catur aṃśakam
śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgena mukhya geham alinda bhāj
bhāga dvayena tad bāhye alindam parikalpayet
tad bahis vāram ekāśam pṛthu vāram dvi bhāgataḥ
vihāya pṛṣṭha deśe tu racanā miśra deśake  /
tṛtīye vāḥsthalam pañca pradeśe tu prakalpayet
madhya sūtra anusāreṇa pūrvasmin pārśvayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: tritale vāḥ sthalaṃ cāntarnetraśālā catuḥ sthale || 41/37 ||

alindasya catuṣkoṇe karṇakūṭa catuṣṭayam
kuryāt pañca tala prānte tad madhye pūrva bhāgataḥ
catur bhāga sama āyāma dvi bhāga vistṛta anvitā
alinda pārśvayoḥ karṇakūṭānām madhya deśataḥ
pañjara dvitayam kuryāt kūṭa dvaya sama udayam
pārśvam vār sthala saṃyuktam vāra yukta dvi bhāgikam
karṇakūṭa dvayoḥ madhye para veda dvi bhāgataḥ
pṛṣṭhavāra sabhām kuryāt ṣaṣ tale tu dvijottamāḥ
pārśvayoḥ netrakūṭe dve mukhāyāmaḥ tu ṣaṣ tale

pṛ
samantāt madhyame ca eva śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ

original: aṅkaṇaṃ dvitayaṃ kāryaṃ pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ padaiḥ || 45/13 ||
analyzed: aṅkaṇam dvitayam kāryam pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ padaiḥ
ṣaṇṇetram aṣṭa netram vā daśa āsyam vā atha kalpayet
sapta śālam idam proktam aṣṭa śālam atha ucyate  /

original: vistāre rudrabhāgāḥ syurāyāme ca tathaiva ca |
analyzed: vistāre rudra bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyāme ca tathā eva ca
samantāt eka bhāgena catuḥ śālām prakalpayet
eka bhāga aṅkaṇam kuryāt madhye śālā catuṣṭayam
aṣṭa netra yutam vā api ṣoḍaśa āsya yutam tu vā
viśiṣṭa prastara ardha aṃśām aṣṭa śālām prakalpayet
devānām bhūsurāṇām syāt aṣṭa śālā dvijottamāḥ
vistāre rudra bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyāme syuḥ trayodaśa
samantāt eka bhāgena catuḥ śālām prakalpayet
madhyame pañca śālāḥ syuḥ eka bhāga vinirmitāḥ
aṅkaṇānām catuṣkam tu madhya bhāga dvayena tu
eka bhāga kṛtam śeṣam dvi aṅkaṇam parikalpayet
bhavanti vipule saptadaśa dairghya dvaya adhikam
eka bhāga mitāḥ dikṣu catuḥ śālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: śālānāṃ pañcakaṃ madhye catuḥ śālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 45/21 ||
analyzed: śālānām pañcakam madhye catuḥ śālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
bhāga dvayam idam tāsām ṣaḍaṅgaṇam udāhṛtam
ekonaviṃśat aṃśāḥ syuḥ vistāre dairghyake punar
ekaviṃśati bhāgāḥ syuḥ dvi bhāgena samantataḥ
madhyame pañca śālāḥ syuḥ bhāga dvaya vinirmitāḥ

original: ekabhāgena madhye tu aṅkaṇānāṃ tu ṣaṭkakam |
analyzed: eka bhāgena madhye tu aṅkaṇānām tu ṣaṭkakam
nava śālam idam proktam daśa śālam iha ucyate
pañca ādi nava bhāga antam vistāra īśam prakalpayet
āyāme dviguṇam kuryāt athavā āyāmaḥ ucyate  /
aṣṭa diś bhāgam anvaṃśam vikāra aṃśāḥ krameṇa tu
athavā āyāma kṷptiḥ tu pañca ādīnām krameṇa tu
āditya manvoḥ eka aṃśāt aṣṭādaśa aṃśāḥ ca viṃśatiḥ

original: yathāyukti gṛhāṇāṃ ca aṅkaṇaṃ tatra kalpayet || 45/27 ||
analyzed: yathāyukti gṛhāṇām ca aṅkaṇam tatra kalpayet  /
daśa śālam idam proktam sarveṣām api yogyakam
vihāra śālā kartavyā ca ekaśālā viśālakā
ekaviṃśat guṇānām tu śālā vyāsena vardhayet
dviguṇa ādi āya saṃyuktam mānam viṃśati saṃkhyakam
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi saṃyuktam puratas bhadra saṃyutam

original: purataḥ pṛṣṭhato vāpi vārālindayutaṃ na vā || 45/30 ||
analyzed: puratas pṛṣṭhatas vā api vāra alinda yutam na vā
netra dvaya samāyuktam agra nāsā vibhūṣitam
eka dvi tri tala upetam kūṭa koṣṭha yutam na vā
vihāra śālā ca eva uktam sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
bauddha arhata ādi pāṣaṇḍa yogyam etat udīritam
sakala kṣitipa indrāṇām ekādaśa talam matam
nava bhūmiḥ dvijānām syāt nṛpāṇām sapta bhūḥ matā
ṣaṣ talam maṇḍalīkasya pañcakam yuvarājake
vaiśyānām ca catur bhūmiḥ yodha senā īśayoḥ api
ekasmāt ātri tala antam tu śūdrāṇām pravidhīyate
sāmanta pramukhānām tu pañca bhūmīḥ vidhīyate
yugmam vā ayugma saṃkhyam vā sarva bhūmi indra mandiram

original: rājñāṃ strīṇāṃ ca devīnāṃ yugmaṃ vāyugmasaṃkhyakam || 45/36 ||
analyzed: rājñām strīṇām ca devīnām yugmam vā ayugma saṃkhyakam
sa daṇḍikam lupa āroham dvi netram prastara anvitam
mṛṇmayam tu tṛṇa ācchādyam eka dvi tri tala anvitam
praśastam sarva jātiṣu
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre pañcaśālā ādi vidhiḥ tricatvāriṃśattamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
pṛ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa hastiśālā vidhi kramam

original: trikaraṃ tu samārabhya karārdhena tu vardhayet || 46/1 ||
analyzed: tri karam tu samārabhya kara ardhena tu vardhayet  /
yāvat pañca karam bhitti mānam pañcavidham bhavet
hastiśālā vidheyā tu bhitti mānena dhīmatā

original: vistāre bhaktayaḥ ṣaṭ ca āyāme nava bhaktayaḥ |
analyzed: vistāre bhaktayaḥ ṣaṭ ca āyāme nava bhaktayaḥ
catur bhakti viśālā vā sapta bhittyā atha api vā
tri pañca bhittayaḥ vā asyuḥ vistāre ca āyatau api

original: mukhaśālaikabhittiḥ syāt sārdhā vā dviguṇāpi vā || 46/4 ||
analyzed: mukha śālā eka bhittiḥ syāt sārdhā vā dviguṇā api vā
vistāre cāyate vā api nirgama āgama yogyakāḥ
dakṣiṇe śayana sthānam ca iṣṭa bhaktyā vidhīyate
rājādanaḥ madhūkaḥ ca kadaraḥ khadiraḥ punar

original: tintriṇī cārjunaḥ proktāḥ stabakaḥ pihitaḥ śamī || 46/6 ||
analyzed: tintriṇī ca arjunaḥ proktāḥ stabakaḥ pihitaḥ śamī
kṣīriṇī padmaka ādyāḥ te śālā stambhāḥ gajasya ca
nava aṣṭa sapta hasta uccāḥ kāka mānam vihāya ca
vistāre syāt ṣaṣ aṅgulyam eka aṅgula vivardhanāt
dvādaśa aṅgula mānam tad avagāhaḥ yathā valam
śālā stambhāḥ ime proktāḥ viṭapa aṅga śikhā anvitāḥ
ālānasya viśālaḥ syāt dvādaśa aṅgula mānataḥ  /
eka aṅgula vivṛddhyā tu pañcaviṃśa aṅgula antakam
chatra ābha agram su vistāram aṣṭa aṃśam pīna saṃyutam

original: pañcadhā tu kṛte śālāvyāse pṛṣṭe tribhāgikam |
analyzed: pañcadhā tu kṛte śālāvyāse pṛṣṭe tri bhāgikam

original: nītvāreḥ ṣoḍaśāṃśaṃ tu vāme'ṣṭāṃśaṃ vyapohya tu || 46/11 ||
analyzed: nītvā areḥ ṣoḍaśa aṃśam tu vāma iṣṭa aṃśam vyapohya tu
sthāpayet kūṭam ālānam pūrva ukta ucca samanvitam
anuvātāḥ samantāt syuḥ tatra bhittim prakalpayet
tad ardham pāda hīnam vā aṣṭa aṃśa ūnam atha api vā
tad ūrdhve chādanam kuryāt kūṭa ādyaiḥ tu samantataḥ
gostanam syāt vitastyā tu bahis ānana saṃyutam
phalakā prastaram kāryam dṛḍha dārubhiḥ eva tu
śilābhiḥ ca iṣṭakābhiḥ ca prastaram na eva yojayet
mūtra dvāra samopetam sthūla dvāram prakalpayet
gaja rāśim samārabhya ca aṣṭamam dvādaśam tathā
parihṛtya vidheyā syāt gajaśālā vicakṣaṇaiḥ
evam tu gaja śālā syāt aśva śālā vidhīyate
nagare rāja veśma ādau kuryāt devālaya ādiṣu
aśvānām api pūrva ukta bhaktyā śālām prakalpayet
dvi hastam tu samārabhya vistareṇa api vardhayet
nava hasta pramāṇa antam bhitti mānam atha api vā
etat vistāram ākhyātam tu āyāmaḥ tu adhunā ucyate
pāda adhikam atha adhyardham pāda ūna dviguṇam tu vā
dviguṇam vā atha vistārāt āyāmam parikalpyate

original: ekabhittyā dvibhittyā vā tribhittyā vātha vājinaḥ |
analyzed: eka bhittyā dvi bhittyā vā tri bhittyā vā atha vājinaḥ
sthānam prakalpayet śreṇyāḥ pṛthu vā kartṛ vāñchayā
samantāt kuḍya yuktam vā yathā iṣṭa diśi vāraṇam
atra anuktam tu sāmānya śālā māna uktam ācaret
pañca aṅgulam sām ārabhya vṛddhyā ca eka aṃṅgulena tu
dvādaśa aṅgula paryantam stambha mānam iha uditam
ājānu dvaya vistīrṇam phalakā prastara anvitam
mūtra dvāra samāyuktam sāradāru mayam dṛḍham
sāra dāru mayam kīlam dvi sapta aṅgula dairghyakam
vistāram tri aṅgulam proktam sūcikā agra samanvitam
paścāt vandhe grabandhe ca yojayet dṛḍha ghāta vat
aṣṭamam dvādaśam rāśim parihṛtya anukūlataḥ
pṛ
aśvānām adhipasya api sthānam samyak samācaret
uṣṭra ādīnām anena eva pramāṇena samācaret
aśva śālā samākhyātā go śālā pravidhīyate
aśvaśālā ukta bhaktyā tu go śālām parikalpayet

original: ekaśālā dviśālā vā triśālā vātha kalpayet |
analyzed: eka śālāḥ dvi śālāḥ vā tri śālāḥ vā atha kalpayet

original: catuḥ śālāsamā vāpi āyāmena yutāpi vā || 46/29 ||
analyzed: catuḥ śālā samā vā api āyāmena yutā api vā
brahma aṅkaṇam vṛṣa upetam viyuktam vā prakalpayet
go rāśeḥ avirodhena sthānam tāsām prakalpayet
gavām rakṣā prakartavyā dhānyena tṛṇa rāśibhiḥ
palālaiḥ odana ādyaiḥ ca nirmālyaiḥ vā api poṣayet
nirmālya bhakṣaṇam tāsām na doṣāya prakalpitam
āya ādi sampad saṃyuktam gaja ādi sthānam īritam
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre hastiśālā ādi vidhiḥ catuścatvāriṃśattamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa mālikā lakṣaṇam dvijāḥ
caturdhā mālikā śālā sabhā muṇḍa ja saudha je   /
śālāyām api śālāṅgā niṣkrānta ānana śobhitā

original: sā śālā mālikā jñeyā śāstre'smin kāmikāhvaye || 47/2 ||
analyzed: sā śālā mālikā jñeyā śāstre smin kāmika āhvaye
sabhā vat vihitā bāhye prāsāda vat alaṅkṛtā

original: ūhapratyūhasaṃyuktā yā sabhā sā ca mālikā || 47/3 ||
analyzed: ūha pratyūha saṃyuktā yā sabhā sā ca mālikā
yathā iṣṭa diśi saṃyuktā bhogabhūmi samanvitā
maṇḍapasya ukta vistāra āyāma tuṅga vibhūṣiṇī
sarvatra muṇḍa ākāra tvāt kathitā muṇḍamālikā
pratyekam trividham proktam sañcitam ca api asañcitam
upasañcitam iti evam nāgaram drāmiḍam tathā

original: vesaraṃ ca tathā jāticchando vaikalpameva ca |
analyzed: vesaram ca tathā jāticchandaḥ vaikalpam eva ca

original: śuddhaṃ miśraṃ ca saṅkīrṇaṃ bījamūlaṃ tathāṅkuram || 47/7 ||
analyzed: śuddham miśram ca saṅkīrṇam bīja mūlam tathā aṅkuram
alinda sahitam vā api ṣaḍvarga sahitam ca yat
arpitam saṃcitam proktam puṃliṅgam tat dhanīkṛtam
devānām asurāṇām ca siddha vidyādhareṣu api
rakṣaḥ gandharva yakṣāṇām praśastānām ca janminām
sarvatra bhogabhūmi aṅgam alinda pariśobhitam
sarva varga samāyuktam manaḥ prīti samanvitam
caturṇām anulomānām yogyam strī liṅgam iṣyate
pañcavarga yutam miśram arpita anarpita aṅgakam
pāṣaṇḍānām idam śastam napuṃsaka samanvitam
sva vistāra vāśa ācchanna hasta pūrṇa āyata anvitam
yugma ayugma vibhāgena nāgaram syāt samīkṛtam
antara prastara upetam ūha pratyūha saṃyutam
nīvra sandhāra saṃstambha vrātaiḥ paridṛḍhaiḥ śubhaiḥ
drāmiḍam vakṣyate thā atas tathā vistāra dairghyakam
rakta channa pratikṣepāt yugma ayugma viśeṣataḥ
hitvā tatra samībhūtam bhadra alaṅkāra saṃyutam
aneka vāra saṃyuktam ṣaḍvargam drāmiḍam smṛtam
labdha vyāsa āyatam yat tu na atiriktam na hīnakam
bahuvarga yutam vā api daṇḍika vāra śobhitam
sva kṣetra upeta madhya aṅghri yuktam tat vesaram matam
yatīnām gaṇikānām ca jīvinām krūra karmaṇām
pṛ
praśastam vesaram teṣām anyeṣām itare śubhe
ṣaḍvargaka samāyuktam jātiḥ yeṣām hi anarpitam
karṇe śālā sabhā madhye chandam syāt chandam eva tat
tyakta madhya aṃśake koṣṭhe yasya syāt tat vikalpakam
drumeṇa iṣṭakayā vā api dṛṣad ādyaiḥ atha api vā
etena sahitam geham śuddham iti abhidhīyate
dravya dvaya yutam miśram saṅkīrṇam bahubhiḥ yutam
devānām eva saṃkīrṇam anyeṣām anyat iṣyate
vistāre catur aṃśam syāt āyāme tu ṣaṣ aṃśakāḥ
paritas vāram eka aṃśam śālā vyāsaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
āyāmam caturaśram syāt śālānām ca viśeṣataḥ
madhyāgāra viniṣkrānta nirgamena samanvitā
nirgamaḥ tu dvi bhāgena vistāraḥ dvi aṃśa mānataḥ
koṣṭha ānana samāyuktam tad agre maṇḍapam nayet

original: vistāre nirgame caiva vibhāgo maṇḍapasya tu || 47/26 ||
analyzed: vistāre nirgame ca eva vibhāgaḥ maṇḍapasya tu
bahis vāra samāyuktam vyāsaḥ pārśva dvayoḥ api
pṛṣṭhe ca maṇḍapasya api pārśvayoḥ agra deśake  /
eka bhāgam viniṣkrāntam dvi aṃśa vistāra saṃyutam
saṃśliṣṭa vāra saṃyuktam ṣaṭsu ca ardha sabhā mukham
śālā śikhara saṃyuktam nāmnā sindhukam iṣyate
etat eva sabhākāra śikharam mantra pūrvakam
saṃtyakta śikhara grīva cūlī harmya samāyutam
saṃpūrṇam iti vikhyātam anyat sarvam tu pūrvavat
mukhavat pṛṣṭha śobhā āḍhyam sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
meru kūṭam idam nāmnā ca anyat pūrva ukta vat bhavet
etat eva sabhākāra śikharam kṣemam ucyate
kṣemam eva ca pūrva uktam pūrva bhadra vihīnakam
agra bhakti samāyuktam śālā pṛṣṭhe ca pārśvayoḥ
bhadra pārśva dvayoḥ agre ṣaṭ bhāgān parivarjayet
tatra eva śālā pṛṣṭhe ca netrayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
śālā ānanam prakartavyam eka dvi aṃśa vinirmitam
tat tat agre prakartavyam vāre bhadrasya paścime
dvi bhāgam caturaśrasya bhadrasya eva ca pārśvayoḥ
agre ca vār sthalam kuryāt dvi tri aṃśa āyāma vistaram
pārśvayoḥ sthala pūrve ca dvāra maṇḍapa pārśvayoḥ
karṇakūṭa dvayam kuryāt catur bhāga vinirmitam
agre ca pārśvayoḥ ca eva kuryāt eka aṃśa vārakam
catur madhye catuṣkoṇe sabhākāram prakalpayet
śivam etat samākhyātam anyat sarvam tu pūrvavat
etat eva ca karṇe tu karkarīkṛta kūṭakam

original: madhye śālā sudṛṣṭākhyā anyatsarvaṃ tu pūrvavat |
analyzed: madhye śālā sudṛṣṭa ākhyā anyat sarvam tu pūrvavat
etat eva sabhākāra śikharam harmyam iṣyate  /
ante tu prastara upetam etat saumyam tu kathyate
sarvam aṅgam sabhā ākāram karṇa kūṭa vivarjitam
sabhā vyāvṛta vārāṅgam viśālam iti kathyate

original: viśāle ṣaṭ tu bhāgaṃ syādāyāme daśabhāgakam || 47/42 ||
analyzed: viśāle ṣaṣ tu bhāgam syāt āyāme daśa bhāgakam
ṣaṣ dvi aṃśa āyāma vistārā madhyaśālā vidhīyate
tad bahis vāram eka aṃśam tad bāhye tu vṛṣasthalam
tad bahis ca catur dikṣu dvi aṃśa aṃśam vāra niṣkramaḥ
catasraḥ tu sabhāḥ kāryāḥ koṇa kūṭa catuṣṭayam
lāṅgala ākāra saṃyuktam vārsthalasya bahis gatam
netrayoḥ ubhayoḥ ca eva vārsthala aṃśe sabhe mate  /
dvi aṃśam vāsa samāyuktam vārasya eva bahis sthitaḥ
catuḥ ṣaṣ aṃśa vistāra dairghya bhadram mukhe mukhe
pṛ
tad madhye catur aṃśena sabhām kuryāt samantataḥ
vārsthalam ca eka bhāgena pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
catuṣkoṇe catuṣkūṭam eka bhāga vinirgamam
śālā madhye ca kartavyā dvi bhāgena eka bhāgataḥ  /
antare vārsthalam kuryāt vijayam nāmataḥ bhavet

original: etadeva ca pṛṣṭhe tu bhadrayuktaṃ bhavedyadi || 47/49 ||
analyzed: etat eva ca pṛṣṭhe tu bhadra yuktam bhavet yadi
sarva kalyāṇam iti uktam anyat sarvam tu pūrvavat
pūrva uktam eva vijayam bhadrayoḥ agra pṛṣṭhayoḥ
parityakta sabhā ākāram maṇṭapa ākāra saṃyutam
sabhākāra śiraḥ yuktam pradhānāgāram īritam
bhadra nāmnā samākhyātam anyat pūrva ukta vat bhavet
etat eva mukham bhadram sabhākāra śiraḥ yutam
etat raṅgamukham proktam anyat sarvam tu pūrvavat
pūrva uktam eva vijayam bhadrayoḥ agrakūṭayoḥ

original: etadeva tu śālā syānmadhye bhadraṃ bhavedyadi |
analyzed: etat eva tu śālā syāt madhye bhadram bhavet yadi
nāmnā ca alpam iti proktam anyat pūrva ukta vat nayet
āyāme daśa bhāgāḥ syuḥ vistāre rasa bhāgakāḥ

original: vāsomadhye tu ṣaḍdvyaṃśe vāraṃ bāhye tu kārayet || 47/55 ||
analyzed: vāsaḥ madhye tu ṣaṣ dvi aṃśe vāram bāhye tu kārayet  /
tad bāhye vārsthalam ca eka bhāgena eva prakalpayet
vārsthale tu catuṣkarṇe kūṭam ekena kārayet  /
tatra eva madhya bhāge tu ca eka dvi aṃśena maṇḍapam
vāsa ādi aṃśa viniṣkrānta śālā mukha samanvitam
harmya sthalasya bāhye tu dvi aṃśa eka aṃśa sabhā mukham
pṛṣṭhe tu tadvat iṣṭam syāt nāmnā idam koṇa saṃjñakam
etat eva sabhākāra śiraḥ nā aham iti smṛtam
agratas pṛṣṭhatas śālā mukha āgatam iti smṛtam
netrayoḥ pṛṣṭhaka āsyam ced geyam nāmnā samīritam

original: śālāmukhaṃ tu karṇe syātsāraṃ nāmnā prakīrtitam || 47/60 ||
analyzed: śālāmukham tu karṇe syāt sāram nāmnā prakīrtitam
tad agre ca eva pṛṣṭhe ca dvi catur bhāga saṃyutam
pārāvṛtasya śālā āsyam puṣkaram tu iti kathyate

original: ubhayaṃ ca daśāsyaṃ ceddbhutaṃ ceti kīrtitam |
analyzed: ubhayam ca daśa āsyam ced adbhutam ca iti kīrtitam
madhye śālā ānana upetam bāhu koṣṭha ānana anvitam
anyatra saṃjñayā ca etat saṅkīrṇam paripaṭhyate

original: bhadradvyaṃ ca saṃtyaktaṃ śikharaṃ maṇṭapaṃ tu cet || 47/63 ||
analyzed: bhadra dvyam ca saṃtyaktam śikharam maṇṭapam tu ced
nāmnā puṣkaram iti uktam anyat pūrva ukta vartmanā
etat eva ca sarvatra sa bhāgam daṇḍam ucyate
iti kāmika ākhye mahā tantre mālikā lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ
pañcacatvāriṃśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
pṛ
mālikām lāṅgala ākhyām tu pravakṣyāmi viśeṣataḥ
vistāra iṣṭa aṃśakam kuryāt āyāme dvādaśa aṃśakaḥ
paritas vāram eka aṃśam śālā vyāsaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
śeṣam harmya sthalam kuryāt madhye vāraṇa saṃyutam
catur dvi aṃśena vistāra yuktam etat iha uditam
karṇe syāt lāṅgala ākāra kūṭa nirgama saṃyutam
netra dvaya samāyuktam gomecam iti kathyate
tat eva veda netram ced viśvam iti abhidhīyate
harmya dvayasya madhye tu karṇakūṭa dvaya anvitam
ādeyam iti vikhyātam lāṅgalam trividham bhavet
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre lāṅgalamālikāvidhiḥ ṣaṭcatvāriṃśattamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa mālikā maulika āhvayam
vistāre daśa bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyāme dvādaśa aṃśakam  /
samantāt dvāram eka aṃśam śālā vyāsaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
veda netra samāyuktam anyat syāt salila sthalam
karṇakūṭa dvi bhāgena maṇṭapam madhyamam bhavet

original: kūṭaṃ ca maṇṭapaṃ caiva niṣkrameṇa samanvitam || 49/3 ||
analyzed: kūṭam ca maṇṭapam ca eva niṣkrameṇa samanvitam
yugmanābham iti proktam madhya maṇṭapa madhyame
catur aśra samāyuktam dhanam iti abhidhīyate
tat eva kūṭakam ced tu sukham iti abhidhīyate
bahis śālā ānana upetam yadi syāt raudram ucyate  /
ṣaḍbhiḥ netraiḥ samāyuktam ṣaṇṇetram iti kathyate

original: evaṃ pañcavidhaṃ proktaṃ triśālāmaulikaṃ tu tat || 49/6 ||
analyzed: evam pañcavidham proktam triśālāmaulikam tu tat
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre maulikā mālikā vidhiḥ saptacatvāriṃśattamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
pṛ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa mālikām padmaka āhvayam
aṣṭa aṃśa vyāsa saṃyuktam daśa aṃśa āyāma saṃyutam
samantāt paritas ṛṃśena vāram tu parikalpayet
antar śālā dvi bhāgena madhya aṅkaṇa samanvitā
dvi bhāga vistṛtam veda bhāga āyāma samanvitam
śālākāram sabhākāram maṇṭapam vā aṅkaṇam bhavet  /
eka bhāga viniṣkrāmam bhāga dvaya viśālataḥ
pāśvayoḥ bhadra saṃyuktam aṅkaṇasya ukta rūpavat
mukhya vāra samāśliṣṭam kuryāt caṅkramaṇa trayam
netrāṇi ca ardha kūṭāni karṇa āśliṣṭāni ca aṣṭa ca
śālā ābha śikharam mukhya dhāma kuryāt tat uddhṛtam
maṇṭapāgrajaśālā syāt pakṣaśālā tu vārsthale  /
bāhye vāre catuṣkoṇe sabhā syāt dvayaṃśa nirgamā

original: madhye śālā sabhā vā syānmadhye vāraṇamiṣyate || 50/7 ||
analyzed: madhye śālā sabhā vā syāt madhye vāraṇam iṣyate
kūṭaśālā antare kuryāt hasti pṛṣṭha ābha nāsikām
śālā agra pṛṣṭha pārśveṣu dvi bhāgena eka bhāgataḥ
śālāḥ syuḥ vā sabhāḥ vā syuḥ antara antara deśake
hāra aṅka alaṃkṛtam kuryāt śrīvardhanam idam matam
etat saubhadram iti uktam tyakta mastakam eva ca

original: śikharaṃ tu sabhākāraṃ mukhe śālāsyameva ca || 50/10 ||
analyzed: śikharam tu sabhākāram mukhe śālā āsyam eva ca
pūrva uktam anyat sarvam syāt śrībhadram nāmataḥ bhavet
vistāre daśa bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyāme dvādaśa aṃśakāḥ
brahmāṅkaṇam dvi bhāgam syāt vistāre dviguṇa āyatam
antarvāram bahirvāram śālāyāḥ tu eka bhāgataḥ
śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgena pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
catasraḥ ūrdhva sabhāyāḥ tāḥ sakta āvāra viśeṣataḥ
pūrve ca paścime bhāge dvi aṃśa aṃśa vyāsa nirgame

original: śālāsye vā sabhāsye vā bhadre vārāntare sthire || 50/14 ||
analyzed: śālā āsye vā sabhā āsye vā bhadre vāra antare sthire  /
pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ dvi aṃśa vyāse veda aṃśa dairghyake
madhyam vāraṇake kalpyam sa vāre vāsa bāhyatas
mukhaśālā viśālā syāt mukhavāsāt tu maṇṭapaḥ
śeṣam harmya sthalam kāryam aṅkaṇam tu viśeṣataḥ
bhadrasundaram etat syāt kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ
etat eva sabhākāram śiraḥ ced mukhya vāsakam
merukāntam iti proktam sarva alaṅkāra śobhitam
vistāre dvādaśa aṃśaḥ syāt āyāme nava bhāgakam  /
aṅkaṇam bāhyatas vāram eka śālāt vibhāgataḥ
aṅkaṇam maṇṭapam mukhyavāram tat tat bhavet iha

original: agraśālā ca tadvatsyāccheṣaṃ sarvaṃ tu vārsthalam || 50/20 ||
analyzed: agra śālā ca tadvat syāt śeṣam sarvam tu vārsthalam
sva āyāma ardha pramāṇena ca uddhṛtam mukhya vāsakam
hāra aṅga śobhitam tat ca maṇṭapam pravidhīyate
vāsa bāhya iṃśataḥ vāram tatra aṣṭau syuḥ sabhā mukhe
karkarī bandha yuktāḥ tu vāsāśliṣṭāḥ tu ime matāḥ
pradhāne ca agra śālāyām antar pārśva dvayoḥ api
bahu śālā anusāreṇa sabhā śālā ānane mate  /
tad bāhye ca āvṛtam vāram eka bhāgena kalpayet
tad bāhye ca catur dikṣu pañca bhāga vinirgamāt
tatra eva ca catur dikṣu vedabhāga viśālataḥ
bhāga dvaya vidiś mārgam madhya vāraṇam iṣyate
tad pārśvayoḥ dvayoḥ ca eva antarālāḥ dvi aṃśa vistarāḥ
pṛ
eka bhāga viniṣkrāntāḥ ca aṣṭau syuḥ te sabhā mukhāḥ
catur aṃśāya yukte ca eka antarāla samanvite

original: dve śāle ca prakartavye dakṣiṇe cottare'pi ca || 50/28 ||
analyzed: dve śāle ca prakartavye dakṣiṇe ca uttare api ca
tad pārśvayoḥ ca vipulāḥ tathā
viparīta āyasa saṃyuktāḥ ca eka bhāga antarālakāḥ
śālāḥ catasraḥ kartavyāḥ pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
puratas pṛṣṭhatas vā api madhya vāraṇa pūrvakam
catur aṃśena kūṭam syāt eka bhāga antarālakam
athavā catur aṃśena śālā pūrvavat īritā
tad pārśvayoḥ dvayoḥ ca eva karṇakūṭa dvayam bhavet
bhāga dvaya antarālam tu dakṣiṇa uttara kūṭayoḥ
kūṭa ardha sabhayoḥ evam paścime pi evam eva tu
anyat sarvam samāna uktam nāmnā ca etat sumaṅgalam
pañca ṣaṣ sapta bhauma antam bhūpālānām prakīrtitam
tat eva ca aṅkaṇam mukhyam vāsaśālā ākhyam īritam
karṇakūṭa dvayam ca agra śālā aṃśe veda bhāgataḥ
ahanyam etat uddiṣṭam anyat sarvam tu pūrvavat
sabhā agram aṅkaṇam mukhya āgāram ced kānti vardhanam
vistāra āyāma tā ūrka aṃśam manu aṃśena samāyutam
aṅkaṇam syāt catur bhāgam vistāre ca
śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgena sarvatra parikīrtitaḥ
mukhya dhāmnaḥ samantāt tu vāram eka aṃśataḥ bhavet
mukhya dhāmnaḥ mukhe pṛṣṭhe śālā syāt nāsikā dvayam  /
śālā ākhya mukhya dhāma syāt kabhittyā ca samanvitam
agra śālā aṃśake koṇe kūṭe dvi aṃśena nirmite
śeṣam harmya sthalam ca antar śiṣṭam kuḍya samanvitam
bahis āvṛta vāram syāt patākā kuḍya saṃyutam
bahirvāre dvi bhāga eka bhāga vistāra nirgame
śālā sabhā mukhe pūrve pūrva kārya agra śālake  /
tad bahis kārayet varṣasthalam bhāga dvayena tu
khaṇḍa harmya samāyuktam samantāt parikalpayet
sva vyāsa ardham tad ardham vā karṇakūṭasya nirgamaḥ
śālāyām aviśālena pañca bhāga viniṣkramāt
bāhye tu khaṇḍa harmyam syāt caturbhadram prayojayet
dakṣiṇe ca uttare vā api bhadrayoḥ ca dvayoḥ api
khaṇḍa harmyasya pārśve tu vārsthalam ca eka bhāgataḥ
tad agre maṇṭape madhye veda bhāgena nirmitam
tad karṇayoḥ dvayoḥ ca eva karṇakūṭa dvayam bhavet
pārśvayoḥ maṇṭapam veda bhāgena eva tu vārsthalam  /
pārśvayoḥ dvi eka bhāgena tadvat eva ca vārsthalam
tad pārśvayoḥ dvayoḥ veda dvi aṃśena eva tu nirmite

original: pratilomāyate śāle kārye madhye tu vārsthalam |
analyzed: pratilomāyate śāle kārye madhye tu vārsthalam
ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ vāre kāryā ca ardha sabhā mukhā
bhāga dvaya viśālāḥ tu ca eka bhāga vinirgamāḥ
pṛṣṭhatas puratas bhadra dvaye tu evam samācaret  /
khaṇḍa harmyasya bāhye tu vārsthale ca eka bhāgataḥ
tad agre maṇṭapam veda bhāgena eva tu nirmitam
tad karṇa kūṭayoḥ ca eva karṇa kūṭa dvayam bhavet
pārśvayoḥ maṇṭapasya eva veda bhāgena vārsthalam  /
tad agre vārsthalam ca eka bhāgena eva tu nirmitam
tad agre vāram eka aṃśam kuḍyam ca api prayojayet  /
tad agre dvi aṃśa vistārāt ca eka bhāga viniṣkramāt
mukhaśālā prakartavyā viśeṣeṇa vimāna vat
pūrva paścima bhadram tu sa vāram vā akṣi pakṣma vat
etat tat vardhamānam syāt bhūpālānām praśaṃsitam
pṛ
tat eva ca śiraḥ hīnam śuka pañjara saṃyutam
manoramyam iti khyātam dvijātīnām praśaṃsitam
tat eva mukhya dhāma evam sabhā śikhara saṃyutam

original: aṅkaṇaṃ tu sabhāraṃ syāt śrīkaraṃ caitadīritam || 50/56 ||
analyzed: aṅkaṇam tu sa bhāram syāt śrīkaram ca etat īritam
vistāre dvādaśa aṃśāḥ syuḥ āyāme manu bhāgataḥ
aṅkaṇam veda bhāgam syāt śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
mukhāgāra igra śālāyām syāt caṅkramaṇam ekatas

original: aṅkaṇaṃ tu sabhāraṃ syānmukhyāgāraṃ tu koṣṭhakam || 50/58 ||
analyzed: aṅkaṇam tu sabhāram syāt mukhyāgāram tu koṣṭhakam
tat saṃśliṣṭa dvi bhāga eka bhāga vistāra nirgamam
śālā vaktra samāyuktam tat bhadram ca krama ujjhitam
tasya paścima bhāge tu tadvat eva vidhīyatām
vārsthale bāhuśāle dve mukhya āgārasya pārśvayoḥ
maṇṭapa dvitayam kuryāt vāsakam vā api maṇṭapam
paritas vāram eka aṃśam sa bhāram syāt jala sthalam
pārśvayoḥ mukhaśālāyāḥ kuryāt ardha sabhā mukhe
pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ ca eva śāle kārye vicakṣaṇaiḥ
karṇakūṭa catuṣkam tu tatra koṇeṣu kārayet
sa dvāram syāt catur dikṣu vibhāgena tu nirmitam
catur bhāga samāyāmam sa vāram mukha pārśvake
śālā catuṣṭayam kuryāt uttare kūṭa koṣṭhayoḥ
nīḍa aṣṭakam prakartavyam diśāmukham idam matam
etat eva śiraḥ hīnam mukhāgāram sa bhārakam
aṅkaṇam maṇṭapākāram nāmnā vipulam ucyate
mukhya āgāram sabhākāram śālā syāt ca aṅkaṇa kriyā
maṇṭapam ca agra śālā stha dvayam hitvā tu kūṭakam
dvayam tatra sūryakāntam idam matam
vistāre daśa bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyāme dvādaśa aṃśakam  /
dvi aṃśena āyata dīrghe tu vibhāgaḥ vistaraḥ punar
aṅkaṇasya puras pṛṣṭhavāram eka aṃśataḥ bhavet  /
śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgena sarvatra parikīrtitaḥ
bahis varṣa sthalam ca eka bhāgam bhāgena vārakam
vyāsa āyāma viśālena tad ardhena ca nirgamam
bahis varṣa sthalāt bhadra dvayam bhadra anvitam bhavet
pratilomāyate śāle dvi catur vyāsa dairghyake
tayoḥ madhya inulomena śālā yāmam iha iṣyate
bhavet
eka bhāga antarālena sarvāḥ śālāḥ niveśitāḥ
pūrvasmin pṛṣṭha deśe tu vibhāgena eva nirgamam
madhye vārāṇam iṣṭam syāt ucchritam svāmi vāsakam  /
agrahāram tu tadvat syāt tad saṃśliṣṭe tu bāhuke
jālakaiḥ toraṇaiḥ ca eva nāsikā ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
śrī kāntam etat ākhyātam yogyam aiśvarya bhoginām
tat eva mukhya āgārasya śikharam tu sabhā kṛti
vāraṇaiḥ ca āvṛtam brahma aṅkaṇa sthānam sabhā kṛti
pūrva śālā agra mūla stham karṇakūṭa dvayam bhavet
śeṣam tu vārsthala upetam rudrakāntam idam matam

original: mukhyāgāraṃ tu goṣṭhābhaṃ koṣṭhāgraṃ tvaṅkaṇaṃ bhavet || 50/78 ||
analyzed: mukhyāgāram tu goṣṭha ābham koṣṭha agram tu aṅkaṇam bhavet
agra śālā aṅgake pārśve kartavye koṣṭhaka ānane
tatra eva pūrva bhāge tu koṣṭhakasya dvi bhāgataḥ
vistārāt nirgamāt eka bhāgam ṣaṇmukham īritam
ṣaṇṇetram syāt iti brahmāṅkaṇam koṣṭha ānane pi ca
saṃtyakta śikharam sarva maṇṭapa ākāram iṣyate
jayantam nāmataḥ proktam sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
vistāre manu bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyame ṣoḍaśa aṃśakāḥ
aṅkaṇam tu catur bhāgam śālā dvi aṃśena bāhyatas
pṛ
tad bahis vāram eka aṃśam khaṇḍa harmyam tu bāhyatas
catuṣkūṭam catuṣkoṇe catur nāsi samanvitam
tayoḥ madhye catur dvi aṃśe catuḥ śālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
karkarī śikhara upetāḥ agra vāra anvitāḥ nava
hāra bandham yathāsthānam kāmāṅkaṇam udīritam
etat eva aṅkaṇam bhāga trayeṇa āyāma saṃyutam
tena vāram prakartavyam mukhya āgārasya ca agratas
uttuṅga śikhara grīvam mukhya āgāram prakīrtitam
śālāsyam aṅkaṇam ca syāt karkarīkṛta vaktrakam
śeṣam tu vārsthalam kuryāt vārabandha anta maulikam
bhadreṇa bhadra saṃyuktam sukha dam svastikam matam
vistāre ca āyate ca eva pūrvavat bhāga saṃyutam
dvi catur bhāga saṃyuktam aṅkaṇam tasya bāhyatas
vāram ekena kartavyam śālāvyāsaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
bahis vāram alindam ca khaṇḍa harmyam ca bhāgaśas
śālā bhāge catuṣkoṇe catuṣkūṭam tu kārayet
caturṇām api madhye tu kuryāt śālā catuṣṭayam
aṅkaṇam maṇṭapa ākāram śālā tuṅga adhika unnatam
antar vinyāsa vat khaṇḍa harmyam tu parikalpayet
śālā madhya ānana upetam catur dikṣu prakalpayet
antare pañjarān kuryāt khaṇḍa harmye viśeṣataḥ
guhye guhye kriyā upetam viśva bhadram bhavet idam
dvi catur bhāga vistāra dairghyam aṅkaṇam iṣyate
aṅkaṇa āvṛta vāram tu nandicchandam pradakṣiṇam
nandyāvarta ānana upetam kuryāt śālā catuṣṭayam
sama vaṃśam yathākāryam khaṇḍa harmye tu koṇake
eka aṅga nirgata chandam chanda ākāra ānana anvitam
śālā catuṣṭayam kuryāt śālā vyāsa ardha nirgamam
dviguṇa āyāma saṃyuktam madhyavāraṇam iṣyate
prāsāda vat alaṃkuryāt nandyāvartam dvijottamāḥ
śālā catuṣṭayam kuryāt sabhākāra śiraḥ yathā
aṅkaṇam maṇṭapam kuryāt ucchritam tatam īritam
saumukhyam idam ākhyātam sarveṣām tu sukha āvaham
sarvam tu maṇṭapa ākāram śālānām parikīrtitam
śuka pañjara saṃyuktam bāhye vāra ādi pūrvavat
rucakam ca idam ākhyātam anyat sarvam tu pūrvavat
vistāra āyāma mānena samam syāt vāram aṅkaṇam
śālāvyāsaḥ api tadvat syāt vāra ādi tritayam tatas
maṇṭapam tu catur dikṣu koṇe veda sabhā anvitam
śeṣam tu vārsthalam kuryāt supratiṣṭhitam īritam

original: mukhyāgāraṃ tu śālāsyamaṅkaṇaṃ ca yathā bhavet |
analyzed: mukhya āgāram tu śālā āsyam aṅkaṇam ca yathā bhavet
anyat varṣasthalam sarvam nāmataḥ jayamaṅgalam

original: aṅkaṇaṃ tu sabhākāraṃ mukhyāgāraṃ tu harmyavat |
analyzed: aṅkaṇam tu sabhākāram mukhya āgāram tu harmya vat
kūṭa ākāram catur dikṣu maṇṭapam parikalpayet
anyat sarvam tu pūrva uktam etat adbhutam iṣyate
vistāre ṣoḍaśa aṃśāḥ syuḥ āyāma ṣṭādaśa aṃśakāḥ
madhyame dvi catur bhāgaiḥ aṅkaṇam parikalpayet
tad bāhye dvāram eka aṃśam śālā vyāsaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
samantāt vāram eka aṃśam bāhye vāram tathā eva ca
alindam ca eka bhāgena khaṇḍa harmyam tu ca ekatas
mukhya śālā agra śāle ca netra hīne prakalpayet
bāhuśālā dvayam kāryam tat saṃśliṣṭam tathā bhavet
mukhya āgāra apara sthāne sthāne mūle tu varcasā
madhya vāram ca bhadraiḥ ca khaṇḍa harmyaiḥ ca maṇḍitam
pṛ
karṇa dvi aṃśena sopānam agra śālā aṃśake nayet
agre śālā samāyuktam tri śiraḥ maṇṭapam tu vā
vāsa sthānam ca bhogam ca svāmi vāñcchā vaśāt nayet
etat padmakam iti uktam anyat sarvam tu pūrvavat

ṣaṣ bhūta veda vahni aṃśaiḥ śreṣṭhe pṛṣṭhe tayoḥ yutiḥ
sva bhāgāt sūtra vistāraḥ pakṣasūtram purā ukta vat
ṣoḍaśa aṃśe śivāyāme sūtrāyāmaḥ daśa aṃśakaḥ

original: caturbhāgaṃ tadūrdhve'tha pṛṣṭhe dvyaṃśaṃ vihāya ca || 51/122 ||
analyzed: catur bhāgam pṛṣṭhe dvi aṃśam vihāya ca
mukula ākāram ārabhya saṃyutaḥ pārśva sūtrayoḥ
athavā atha traya aṃśam tu tyaktvā ūrdhve rudra bhāgataḥ
nāla āyāmaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ śeṣam pūrvavat eva hi
evam drāmiḍa liṅgasya brahmasūtram prakalpitam
nāla āyāmaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ tu aṣṭa bhāgāt prabhṛti adhas
bhūta veda guṇa aṃśeṣu saṅgamaḥ pakṣa sūtrayoḥ
dvaḥdaśa aṃśa arcanā bhāge ṣoḍaśa dvi aṃśam ūrdhvatas
nāla āyāmaḥ nava aṃśaḥ syāt saṅgamaḥ pūrvavat bhavet
vyāse dvis asṭa bhāge tu bhāgaḥ syāt sūtra vistaraḥ
tad ardham pakṣasūtram syāt antaram śeṣa pūrvavat
evam vesara liṅgasya brahmasūtram udāhṛtam
sārvadeśika liṅge tu vibhāgaḥ ūyam na kīrtitaḥ

original: tathā pīṭhe tu pīṭhasya nāgarādyaṃ vidhīyate || 51/129 ||
analyzed: tathā pīṭhe tu pīṭhasya nāgara ādyam vidhīyate
abhadram drāmiḍe pīṭham bhadram bhadropabhadrakam
nāgare vesare yogyam kāliṅge api varāṭake  /
sāmānyam pīṭham uddiṣṭam pratimā api adhunā ucyate

original: garbhe dhiṣṇye masūre ca dvāre stambhe ca mastake || 51/131 ||
analyzed: garbhe dhiṣṇye masūre ca dvāre stambhe ca mastake  /
sthūpikā ucce daśa aṃśa ucce sapta aṃśā pratimā varā

nakṣatra saṃkhyā tuṅgāni pratimāyām bhavanti hi
nāgare tri tri saṃkhyāni drāmiḍe nava saṃkhyayā
vesarāṇi tathā anyāni śreṣṭha madhya adhama kramāt

original: sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ caiva tāmasaṃ ca kramāttridhā || 51/134 ||
analyzed: sāttvikam rājasam ca eva tāmasam ca kramāt tridhā
sāttvikam sthānake yogyam rājasam nṛtta rūpake
tāmasam ca anya rūpe tu yojanīyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
sārvadeśika liṅge tu vidhānam na iṣyate budhaiḥ
dhāmavāstu amarāṇām tu nāgara ādyam param matam

original: grāme vā nagare vāpi pattane rājadhānike |
analyzed: grāme vā nagare vā api pattane rājadhānike
bahis vā aṣṭāsu kāṣṭhāsu kuḍya antar vā bahiṣkṛtam
eteṣām antarāle vā prāsādam kartum ārabhet
uttare nāgaram kuryāt vāyau vaiśāna deśake

original: dakṣiṇe drāmiḍaṃ kuryādvahnau vā nairṛte'pi vā || 51/139 ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇe drāmiḍam kuryāt vahnau vā vā
pūrvasmin paścime vā api vesaram harmyam ācaret
soma pārśva dvaye tadvat yama pārśve yama ukti vat
indrasya pārśvayoḥ tadvat vāruṇa ubhayaḥ tathā
dhāmāni etāni sarvāṇi drāmiḍāni bhavanti hi
sārvadeśika harmyam ced sarvatra api samācaret
eteṣām iṣṭa kāma ādyām iṣṭa deśe samācaret
brāhme ced agni koṇa stha koṣṭhaḥ syāt vāpaṇasya ca
nairṛte api eka deśa stham sabhāyāḥ vā avirodhataḥ
dhāmāni etāni kāryāṇi vaṃśa sūtra avirodhataḥ
pārvatībhavanam śarva ukta vat nayet
valabhi ākāraka upetam drāmiḍa ākāram eva vā

original: vighneśvarasya madhye vā pūrvokte vā yathā śive || 51/145 ||
analyzed: vighneśvarasya madhye vā pūrva ukte vā yathā śive
hasti pṛṣṭha śiraḥ kāryam sādhāraṇa śiraḥ tu vā
kāryam yathā śarvasya sammatam
pūrva ukta deśe kartavyam nāgaram viṣṇu mandiram
madhyame ca catur dikṣu brahmaṇaḥ
vesaram dhāma kartavyam catur bhadra samanvitam
vāruṇyām vā atha yāmyā agni madhye vā grāma madhyame
śrī dhāma vaiṣṇavam kuryāt yāmye nairṛta madhyame
grāma ādi madhyameni atra yathā vā brahma mandiram
tathāvidhe vā sūryasya śiva vat matam
aṣṭa dikṣu iṣṭa deśeṣu kṣetra īśe drāmiḍam tatas
pārvatī bhavanam yadvat pūrva ukta sthānakam dvijāḥ
yathā vācaḥ tu indra pāvaka madhyame  /
pūrva ukta deśe vā kāryam vahnau soma īśa madhyame
śāstuḥ dhāma vidhātavyam yathā vighneśa mandiram
somasya soma digbhāge nairṛte vā atha tad gṛham
nāgaram soma vāyavye vāstu vaiśravaṇam gṛham
somamandira vat kāryam vahnau someśa madhyame
kāma dhāma yathā viṣṇoḥ athavā anyatra deśataḥ
an uktānām ca sarveṣām devānām yoṣitām api
prāc uktānām ca devānām devīnām sārvadeśikam
athavā kārayet dhāma tad tad vāhana saṃyutam
sārvadeśika saṃjñasya prāsādasya ca lakṣaṇam
liṅgasya lakṣaṇam viprāḥ tadvat pīṭhasya lakṣaṇam
lakṣaṇam brahmaśailasya tadvat bera ādi lakṣaṇam
tat tat adhyāya saṃsiddham saṃgrāhyam deśika uttamaiḥ
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre nāgara ādi vibheda vidhiḥ navacatvāriṃśattamaḥ
paṭaḥ
pṛ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa bhūmi lamba vidhi kramam
catur aṃśa ādi saṃsthānam bhūmilambam iti smṛtam
athavā kṣaya vṛddhiḥ vā hastānām parikīrtitam
hastānām saptatiḥ tāre śatam tuṅge prakīrtitam
ekonam vā prakartavyam talam dvādaśa saṃjñikam
triṣaṣṭi vistṛtam tatra navati unnatam īritam
ekādaśa talam saptapañcāśat vistṛtam bhavet
catur hastam aśīti uccam daśa bhaumam dvijottamāḥ

original: ekayuktaṃ tu pañcāśatkaraṃ tāre tu tuṅgake |
analyzed: eka yuktam tu pañcāśat karam tāre tu tuṅgake
pañca saptati saṃkhyātam navabhaumam prakīrtitam
pañca hasta samāyuktam catvāriṃśat kara anvitam
ṣaṣṭi unnata samāyuktam aṣṭa bhaumam prakīrtitam
navatriṃśat kara upetam saptapañcāśat unnatam
etat sapta iti proktam ekaviṃśati saṃyutam
triṃśat hasta samutsedham catur talam udāhṛtam
tithi hasta viśālam yat ekaviṃśati tuṅgakam  /
eka tri talam ākhyātam śāstre smin kāmika āhvaye
saptati antam dvis aṣṭa ādi vistāre vā prakalpyatām
etat uttama mānam syāt jāti ākhyasya dvijottamāḥ
vistāre ca api ca utsedhe dvi tri hasta kṣayeṇa tu
madhyamam ca adhamam jñeyam saptaviṃśati bhedakam
mahaḥ tri talasya iṣṭa tri bhedaḥ na eva vidyate
aṣṭāviṃśati hastam tu jātya ākhyam iha kīrtitam
eka ādi ekādaśa antānām hastānām antara kṣayāt  /
dvi ādi dvādaśa sīmnām tu ṣaṇṇām api antara kṣayāt
saptaviṃśati māne tu ṣaṭtriśat saṃkhyakam matam
chandam vikalpam ābhāsam ekaike tu dvi saṃkhyakam
nava ādi rudra bhāga anta dhāmnām uktam pramāṇataḥ
yat tu ṣoḍaśa bhūmi antam vimānam mānavam dvijāḥ
etat antara mānam syāt kṣudra mānam atha ucyate
tri catur hastam ārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
eka bhūmi pramāṇam tu caturvidham udāhṛtam
pañca ṣaṣ hastam ārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
dvi tale tu catur mānam rudra bhānu kara antakam
sapta aṣṭa hastam ārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
tri tale tu catur mānam manu viśvakara antakam
pakṣa ṣoḍaśa hasta antam catuṣpañca talam bhavet
eka hastam dvi hastam vā kṣudram ekatalam matam
yugma ayugma karam mānam pāda ardha kara saṃyutam
vyomahastam samārabhya vyomahasta vivardhanāt
vimānam yojitavyam syāt sarveṣām api śaṃsitam
āyāme dviguṇa antam syāt vedāntāḥ maṇṭape matāḥ
tathā bhaktyā vidheyāḥ syuḥ āyāme dvijasattamāḥ
deva bhū sura bhūmi indra viś śūdrāṇām samānakam
vistāre sapta ṣaṣ pañca catur tri aṃśa idhikam tribhiḥ
śāntikam puṣṭi jaya dam adbhutam sārvakāmikam

original: utsedhe dviguṇo vyāsaḥ pādādhikyaṃ ca sammatam || 52/24 ||
analyzed: utsedhe dviguṇaḥ vyāsaḥ pāda ādhikyam ca sammatam
vistāra dviguṇāt aṣṭa aṃśa adhikam vā adhiyojayet
kṣudrāṇām evam uddiṣṭam kaniṣṭhānām atha ucyate

original: saptāṃśe tu kṛte vyāse saptāṃśaṃ vā ṣaḍaṃśakam |
analyzed: sapta aṃśe tu kṛte vyāse sapta aṃśam vā ṣaṣ aṃśakam
vistārāt adhikaḥ tuṅgaḥ madhya mānam atha ucyate
pṛ
vistāram pūrvavat kṛtvā catur pañca adhikam tu yat
madhya mānam idam proktam uttamānām traya aṃśakam
pūrvam uddeśa mānam syāt etat nirdeśa mānakam
eka dvi tri karaiḥ yuktam māna hīnam tu vā adhikam
utsedham kalpayet dhīmān sarveṣām api sadmanām
devānām sārvabhaumānām ā dvādaśatalam viduḥ
rakṣaḥ gandharva yakṣāṇām ekādaśa talam matam

original: dvijānāṃ navabhaumaṃ syāddaśabhaumaṃ tu dhāma vā || 52/30 ||
analyzed: dvijānām navabhaumam syāt daśabhaumam tu dhāma vā
yuvarājasya rājñān ca ca pañcamasya eva pañca bhūḥ
nanda ādi ekādaśa talam ṣaṇṇām vai cakravartinām
tribhaumam ca caturbhaumam vaiśyānām śūdra janmanām

original: rājñāṃ pañcatalaṃ vāpi mataṃ paṭṭabhṛtāṃ tu tat || 52/32 ||
analyzed: rājñām pañca talam vā api matam paṭṭabhṛtām tu tat
sapta hasta samutsedhāt ūrdhvam saptati vistarāt
na iṣyate adhika mānam tu sarvathā tat vicakṣaṇaiḥ
śivasya ṣoḍaśa kṣmā ādi sarva bhūmiḥ vidhīyate
prāsāda vaśatas liṅgam liṅgāt prāsādaḥ eva vā
parīkṣya matimān kuryāt yathāśāstram tat ucyate
svāyaṃbhuvam bāṇaliṅgam daivikam ca ārṣakam tu iti
gāṇavam mānuṣam liṅgam ṣaṣ prakāram prakīrtitam
svena eva udbhūta liṅgam tu svāyambhuvam udāhṛtam
śivena saṃskṛtam yat tu bāṇaliṅgam iti smṛtam
devaiḥ saṃsthāpitam daivam ārṣam ṛṣi hitam smṛtam
gaṇaiḥ saṃsthāpitam liṅgam gāṇavam tat udāhṛtam
mānuṣam manujaiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ śiṣṭam ṣaṣṭham iha uditam
mānuṣe liṅga mānam tu prāsāda vaśataḥ bhavet
anyeṣām ca eva sarveṣām liṅgāt prasādaḥ iṣyate
prāsāda garbha mānena liṅgam jyeṣṭha ādi bhedataḥ
mukhyatas siddhaye proktam mukti artham anuṣaṅgataḥ
hasta ādi liṅga mānāni yāni tāni vimuktaye
muktaye ca anuṣaṅgeṇa bhavanti vidhi yogataḥ
svāyaṃbhuva ādi liṅgānām dṛśya bhāgāt adhastanam
darśayet yadi mohena sarva doṣa karam nṛṇām
na āhata arau tathā sthūla deśe saṃgṛhya kalpayet
māna veliṅga mānam tu śiraḥ mānam vinodayam
svāyaṃbhuva ādi liṅgānām śirasā saha mānakam
kalpayet arcanā bhāgam tena pīṭham prakalpayet
tathā pañcaguṇaḥ vā api pīṭha vistaraḥ iṣyate  /
eteṣām api sarveṣām karṇa mānena vā bhavet
kṛtvā aṣṭadhā vā navakam eka dvi aṃśa traya aṃśakam

original: caturaṃśaṃ tu vā hīnamadhikaṃ vā prakalpayet |
analyzed: catur aṃśam tu vā hīnam adhikam vā prakalpayet
pīṭha dviguṇa mānaḥ vā triguṇaḥ vā caturguṇaḥ  /
pañca ṣaḍguṇataḥ vā api garbha gehasya vistaraḥ

ardhaḥ vā sadṛśaḥ pīṭhāt dviguṇaḥ triguṇaḥ api vā
eteṣām karṇa mānaḥ vā bhitti viṣkambhaḥ iṣyate  /
anena eva prakāreṇa sandhāne pi prakalpyatām
pīṭha vyāsena harmya stha nālī geham ayugmakam
yadi tad bāhya bhāgam ca yugmam eva samācaret
yugmam ced yugma bhāgam syāt sammiśram na eva kārayet
yatra liṅgena yat mānam yugmam vā ayugmahastakam

original: yadi tatra karacchedo hīno vāpyadhiko bhavet || 52/52 ||
analyzed: yadi tatra kara chedaḥ hīnaḥ vā api adhikaḥ bhavet
māna saṃpūrṇakam kuryāt tatra doṣaḥ na vidyate
aṅgulaiḥ garbha māne tu vibhakte liṅga dairghyake  /

original: liṅgaṃ cedaṅgulaṃ chinnaṃ tatra sampūrṇatāṃ nayet |
analyzed: liṅgam ced aṅgulam chinnam tatra sampūrṇa tām nayet
āya ādi sampad artham ca eka dvi tribhiḥ aṅgulaiḥ
pṛ
kṣīṇam vā api adhikam vā api kartavyam sampad icchatā

original: triḥ saptabhāgatāre tu bhāgaṃ kṛtvā ṣaḍaṃśakam || 52/55 ||
analyzed: tris sapta bhāga tāre tu bhāgam kṛtvā ṣaṣ aṃśakam
liṅga madhyāt tad eka aṃśam dakṣiṇena vyapohati
prāsāda madhyam iṣṭam syāt paścime api tathā eva ca

eteṣām api sarveṣām āyā ādi vidhiḥ ucyate
vistāram dviguṇam kṛtvā vasubhiḥ bhājite sati

original: śiṣṭaṃ yoniriha proktā tadabhāve tu śodhakaḥ |
analyzed: śiṣṭam yoniḥ iha proktā tad abhāve tu śodhakaḥ
udaye vasubhiḥ saptaviṃśadbhiḥ bham iha uditam  /
paridhau nanda guṇite saptamūḥ dvāram ucyate

udayam vasubhiḥ bhaktvā sūryaiḥ āyaḥ tu śeṣatas
punar api udayam nanda vasubhiḥ vyayaḥ ucyate
pūrva uktena prakāreṇa api anena vidhinā api vā
parikṣyāya ādi ṣaṭkam tu prāsādam parikalpayet

original: pādādikaṃ tu yacchiṣṭaṃ tatsarvaṃ sakalaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: pāda ādikam tu yat śiṣṭam tat sarvam sakalam bhavet

original: pūrvavadguṇitaṃ kṛtvā bhāgaṃ tāraṃ ca tatsamam || 52/63 ||
analyzed: pūrvavat guṇitam kṛtvā bhāgam tāram ca tad samam

athavā anya prakāreṇa āya ādi vidhiḥ ucyate
nāgaiḥ sūtra agni randhraiḥ hata dina daśa vasu abdhi śiṣṭam tu tat syā
dāyonau yoni vāram vasu hatam uḍubhiḥ bhakta śiṣṭam tu ṛkṣam

original: hatvā bhaktvātha sūtrairbhuvanamatha phalaṃ śiṣṭamaṃśaṃ vasughnaṃ
analyzed: hatvā bhaktvā atha sūtraiḥ bhuvanam atha phalam śiṣṭam aṃśam vasu ghnam

athavā anya prakāreṇa cāya ādin parikalpayet
āyam anyatara yoni ṛkṣakam vāram aṃśaka guṇa kṣaya kramāt  /

original: idaṃ liṅge ca sakale dvāre stambhādike matam || 52/67 ||
analyzed: idam liṅge ca sakale dvāre stambha ādike matam
idam māyā ādikam ca ardha maṇṭape śiṣṭa maṇṭape
parivāra ālaye prakalpayet
evam parīkṣya bahudhā prāsādam parikalpayet
tri aśā eka aṃśaḥ bhavet garbhaḥ pañca aṃśāt tri aṃśam eva vā
sapta aṃśe catur aṃśaḥ vā nava aṃśe pañca bhāgataḥ
rudrabhāge ṣaṣ aṃśaḥ syāt viśvāṃśe sapta bhāgakaḥ   /
tithi aṃśe vasubhiḥ saptadaśa aṃśe tu nava aṃśakaḥ
vistāra ardha pramāṇam tu garbha vistāraḥ iṣyate
eka dvi tri talānām syāt garbhagehe pramāṇakam

śālāvyāsaḥ mataḥ dvi triguṇa āyāma samanvitaḥ
pañjaraḥ ca ardha bhāgaḥ vā tri pādaḥ vā atha bhāgikaḥ
alinda andhārikā andhāra hārāḥ bhāgena kalpitāḥ
bhāga ardha dvi tri bhāgam vā pañcatriṃśam atha api vā
alindam kalpayet śeṣam gṛha vinyāsake matam
mahatām ca vimānānām racanā atra vidhīyate
nava bhāga tri bhāgaḥ vā vyāsa nālī gṛha anvitaḥ
bahis āndhārika āndhāra hāra bhāgena vistṛtāḥ
hāra pramāṇam bāhye tu racanā artham prakalpayet
bhitti anta stham pramāṇam syāt bhitti bāhye tu abāhyataḥ
racanā kṣetra mānam tu hitvā mānam prakalpayet
evam antastha vinyāsaḥ bāhya vinyāsaḥ ucyate
saptaviṃśati bhāge tu prāsādasya tu vistare
ekaika bhāga veśāt tu kūṭa śādikam nayet
ādau bhāga dvayena atha kūṭam ekena vā bhavet
talam ekam bhavet grāsam khaṇḍa harmyam tri bhūmike
pṛ
athavā anya prakāreṇa ca antar vinyāsaḥ ucyate
saptaviṃśati bhāge tu prāsādasya ayaḥ ucyate
tri bhāgena bhavet garbham samantāt bhittiḥ iṣyate
pañca alindam sa ṣaṣ kuḍyam bahis āndhārikā vṛtam
tri nava aṃśam idam jāti vimānam dvādaśa kṣmakam
etat maṇi maye liṅge bāṇa ādau vā prakalpayet
daśa ādi pañca hasta ṛddhyā yadā prāsādaḥ iṣyate
pañcāśat kara paryantam nava liṅgeṣu anukramāt
tad āyāma āya vistāre hasta rāśau kara āhate
liṅga vat pīṭham anyena sa ekena trayam antaram
dvi adhikena bahis bhittiḥ śeṣam prāgvat prakīrtitam
liṅge śilāsu ca krodhe bhitti pañca aṃśa varjitāḥ
