padmam aṃśam bhavet kampam aṃśena parikīrtitam
aṃśena antaritam dvābhyām pratiraṃśena vājanam
dvābhyām janma aṃśataḥ padmam kampam ekena kīrtitam
jagatī pañca bhāgena veda aṃśaiḥ kumudam bhavet
eka aṃśam padmam ekena padmam kaṇṭhaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
kampam aṃśena bhāgena padmam dvābhyām kapotakam
ekena kampam aṃśena tri aśam dvābhyām pratiḥ bhavet
aṃśena vājanam tuṅge kṛte ṣaḍviṃśaka aṃśake
tri aṃśam pratiḥ ca kampam ca tyaktvā anyaiḥ anyat iṣyate  /
ekena janma bhāgābhyām padmam aṃśena kampakam
jagatī catur aṃśena kampam padmam dvi bhāgakam
kampam aṃśena bhāgena padmam vṛttam tribhiḥ bhavet
eka aṃśam padmam āliṅgam aṃśam antaritam tathā
dvābhyām pratis ca bhāgena vājanam pañcaviṃśa ike
yavam ekam samārabhya ca ekaika yava vardhanāt
pañca mātrā antakam vṛddhim ādhikyam vā prakalpayet
masūrakam adhiṣṭhānam vastu ādhāram dharā talam
talam kṛṭṭimam ādi aṅgam paryāya vacanāni hi

original: jagatyā niṣkramo yāvat tāvadeva ca kairave || 54/81 ||
analyzed: jagatyāḥ niṣkramaḥ yāvat tāvat eva ca kairave

original: ambujānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sve sva yo niṣkramo mataḥ |
analyzed: ambujānām ca sarveṣām sve sva yaḥ niṣkramaḥ mataḥ
vetrāṇām api sarveṣām catur bhāga eka nirgamaḥ
sva samaḥ vā tri bhāgaḥ vā mahā vājana nirgamaḥ
evam nivṛttam evam syāt śobhā bala vaśena vā
praveśa nirgamau kāryau sarva aṅgānām masūrake
praticchandaḥ na sarvatra eva vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: dvārārthaṃ yaḥ paricchedaḥ sampaddvāraṃ ca netyalaṃ |
analyzed: dvāra artham yaḥ paricchedaḥ sampad dvāram ca nā iti alam
svāyambhuva ādi liṅgeṣu praticchandaḥ na doṣa kṛt
pāda bandham adhiṣṭhānam chedanīyam yathocitam
janma ādi pañcavargeṣu tad tad aṃśa ivasānake
paṭṭikā aṅge tu adhiṣṭhānaiḥ anyasmin evam ūhyatām
tad adhisṭhāna mānam ca śrūyatām muni puṅgavāḥ
devānām syāt catur hastam dvijānām tad samaḥ bhavet
nṛpāṇām tri karam sārdham dvi hastam yauvarājakam
dvi hastam vaṇijām eka hastam śūdrasya kīrtitam
etat jāti vaśāt bhūmi vaśāt atra eva kathyate
daṇḍāt ṣaṣ mātra hatyāt tu dvādaśa ādyāt tri bhūmikāt
tri talasya uttamasya iṣṭam pādena ūnam dvi hastakam
mahattarāṇām kṣudrāṇām mānam eva atra ca ānayet
masūraka unnatam pañca hastaiḥ dvātriṃśat aṅgulam
triṃśat aṅgula mūlam vā dvi dvi aṅgula vivardhanāt
aṣṭatriṃśa aṅgulam ca ante trayodaśa viśālataḥ
ṣaṣ ādīnām tu pañcānām ekatriṃśa aṅgula āditaḥ
navatriṃśa aṅgulam tat syāt caturdaśa karasya tu
tri catur hastayoḥ dhāmnoḥ tad nītyā eva viniścayaḥ
ārta utsedha aṃśa mānam vā adhiṣṭhānasya vidhīyate
pṛ
tad tad pāda udaya ardhena ṣaṣ aṣṭa aṃśa ūna mānataḥ
adhiṣṭhāna uchrayaḥ vā syāt pāda tuṅga ūnam eva vā
tri bhāgāt ravi bhāga antam tyaktvā adhiṣṭhāna tuṅgakam
bhāgena vā prakartavyam aṅgulaiḥ vā yavaiḥ tu vā
nyūnam vā api adhikam vā api kārayet kartuḥ icchayā
adhiṣṭhāna ādi ṣaḍvarge pi evam eva samācaret
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre upapīṭha adhiṣṭhāna vidhiḥ
dvipañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi pāda mānam vicakṣaṇāḥ
pādaḥ ca dvividhaḥ homa stambhaḥ syāt pratipādakaḥ
adhiṣṭhāna upagūḍhaḥ tu nirghāta stambhaḥ iṣyate
prati stambha vṛteḥ ūrdhve ca uttara anta samāyatiḥ
prati stambha udayaḥ mataḥ

original: ayaṃ dvādaśabhūmeḥ syāttalaṃ prati talaṃ prati || 55/3 ||
analyzed: ayam dvādaśa bhūmeḥ syāt talam prati talam prati
vitastyāḥ kṣapayet eka bhūmau tri karaḥ iṣyate
anena eva kramāt neyam ṣoḍaśa kṣmā antam eva hi
dbi antarāṇām ca ṣaṣ veda aṅgulena kṣayaḥ iṣyate

original: jātītarāṇāṃ kṣapaṇaṃ dvābhyāṃ vā tryaṅgulena vā || 55/5 ||
analyzed: jātītarāṇām kṣapaṇam dvābhyām vā tri aṅgulena vā
ravi bhaumasya visṛtiḥ aṣṭāviṃśati mātrakam
dvi aṅgulena kṣayaḥ bhūmau bhūmau eva ṣaṣ aṅgulā  /
eka bhū stambha vistāraḥ tala upari tale matam

original: dvyantarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ dvābhyāṃ vā tribhiraṅgulaiḥ || 55/7 ||
analyzed: dvi antarāṇām ca sarveṣām dvābhyām vā tribhiḥ aṅgulaiḥ
ūna ādhikye prakartavye tathā anyeṣām prakalpayet
ārta adhiṣṭhāna tuṅgena dviguṇaḥ pāda tuṅgakaḥ
athavā ārta aṃśa mānena stambha dairghyam prakalpyatām
ārta utsedha aṃśa mānam tu ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa nava aṃśakam
hīnam vā api adhikam vā api stambha utsedham prakalpayet
athavā stambha tuṅge tu vasunanda daśa aṃśake  /
vistāraḥ tu eka bhāgaḥ syāt sarveṣām dāru pādake

original: tadvyāsārdhaṃ ca pādena tridvyaṃśaṃ vā prakalpayet || 55/11 ||
analyzed: tad vyāsa ardham ca pādena tri dvi aṃśam vā prakalpayet
bhitti stambha viśālam yat tena dvi triguṇam matam
śilā stambha viśālam syāt yathā iṣṭam vā prakalpayet
ṣaṣ aṃśam tu samārabhya dvādaśa aṃśa sama avadhi
bhāgam kṛtvā eka bhāgena vā ūrdhva ūrdhvam stambha tuṅga tā

original: mūlādagraṃ yathā proktaṃ kuḍyaṃ cāpi tathā matam |
analyzed: mūlāt agram yathā proktam kuḍyam ca api tathā matam
dvi tri veda catur daṇḍaḥ kuḍya vistāraḥ iṣyate  /
pañca ṣaṣ guṇitaḥ vā api stambha alaṅkāraḥ iṣyate

original: ucyate caturaśraṃ ca vṛttaṃ vā tatprakīrtitam || 55/15 ||
analyzed: ucyate caturaśram ca vṛttam vā tat prakīrtitam
sarvam tat caturaśram tu kumbha maṇḍī samanvitam
brahmakāntam vijānīyāt vyāsa triguṇa mānataḥ
madhya iṣṭāśram potikā antam madhya aṣṭāśram prakalpayet
sarvatra aṣṭa asra saṃyuktam kumbha maṇḍī ādi saṃyutam
viṣṇukrāntam svayam nāmnā kaumāram syāt ṣaḍaśrakam
bhānukāntam tad agram syāt kalāśram candrakāntakam
mūle karṇa pramāṇena caturaśraḥ tad ūrdhvataḥ
pūrva ukta ākṛti saṃyuktāḥ nanu kīrtitāḥ
sarvatra vṛtta saṃyuktam īśa kāntam iti smṛtam
sama tri bhāga mānena catur aṣṭa aśra vṛttakam
pṛ
kumbha maṇḍi ādi sahitaḥ rudrakāntaḥ tu kīrtitaḥ
śukla bheda samāyuktaḥ īśa kāntaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
piṇḍa pādaḥ iti proktaḥ mūle vipula mānataḥ
caturaśraḥ tad ūrdhve tu ṣoḍaśa asra ādi saṃyutaḥ
syāt mūla caturaśra ūsau stambha vyāsaḥ dvayena ca

original: vistṛtaṃ tu tadūrdhvoccaṃ mūle padmāsanaṃ bhavet || 55/23 ||
analyzed: vistṛtam tu tad ūrdhva uccam mūle padmāsanam bhavet
yathā iṣṭa ākṛti śeṣam tu mūlapadmāsanam bhavet
dvi tri daṇḍa viśāla uccaḥ lūkhalaḥ yadi mūlataḥ
tad ūrdhva iṣṭa aśra saṃyuktaḥ syāt ulūkhala pādapaḥ
udayam tu catur bhāgaḥ siṃha vyāla ibha bhūtakaiḥ
nara nārī yutaḥ mūle yathā iṣṭa ākāra saṃyutaḥ
upariṣṭāt ca tad nāmnā pādāḥ ca bahavaḥ matāḥ
stambha ardha niṣkramaḥ kuḍyāt aṣṭāśrāṇām vidhīyate

original: tribhāgaikaṃ ca vṛttānāṃ vedāśrāṇāṃ tu pādataḥ || 55/27 ||
analyzed: tri bhāga ekam ca vṛttānām vedāśrāṇām tu pādataḥ

original: kumbhaścaturvidhaḥ proktaḥ sapādaḥ sārdha eva ca |
analyzed: kumbhaḥ caturvidhaḥ proktaḥ sa pādaḥ sa ardhaḥ eva ca
pāda ūna dviguṇaḥ ca eva dviguṇaḥ tu unnati kramāt

original: bhānukānta iti proktaḥ taducce tu navāṃśake || 55/29 ||
analyzed: bhānukāntaḥ iti proktaḥ tad ucce tu nava aṃśake  /

original: aṃśena dṛk caturbhāgaḥ kalaśaḥ kaṇṭha ekataḥ |
analyzed: aṃśena dṛś catur bhāgaḥ kalaśaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ ekatas
āsyam aṃśam atha aṃśena padmam ardhena vṛttakam
ardhena hīnakau kāryau stambha dviguṇa mānataḥ
kumbha vistāraḥ uddiṣṭaḥ ca adhyardham ca asya mīrtitam
mūla pāda viśālam tu hīnakau pāda vistarau
dṛś kaṇṭhau ca vidhātavyau pāda vistāra mānataḥ
tad vistāra samāyuktam tatas dbiguṇa mūlataḥ
kiñcid agram vihīnam syāt kamalam tad adhas bhavet
aṣṭa aṃśa adhika pad vyāsam ardha pādena tuṅgakam
mūlasthānam adhas tat syāt daṇḍa mānam atha ucyate  /
triguṇa ardha yutā sā ca caturaśrā samāyatā
maṇḍitā pañcadhā kṛtvā sa ardhena phalaka āsanam
tad samam vetram iti uktam maṇḍī śeṣeṇa kalpyatām
daṇḍa ākrāraḥ tu vetra antam pāda ākāra samaḥ bhavet
pālikā ābhā ca padma agrā tathā nāga tala ākṛtiḥ

original: tridhā maṇḍī samākhyāta pādordhve potikā bhavet || 55/37 ||
analyzed: tridhā maṇḍī samākhyāta pāda ūrdhve potikā bhavet
nāgavṛttā patracitrā samudrormiḥ iti tridhā
stambha triguṇa mānā sā daṇḍa udaya samāyutā
chāyā kṣepaṇa saṃyuktā nāga vṛttā iti kīrtitā
catur daṇḍa samāyāmā tri pāda udaya saṃyutā
chāyā kṣepaṇa patraiḥ ca yuktā patra vicitritā
pañca daṇḍa samāyāmā daṇḍa māna sama udayā
catur bhāga eka mānena yuktāḥ yugmaiḥ taraṅgakaiḥ
yathā iṣṭaiḥ pārśvayoḥ ca eva samudrormiḥ iti smṛtā

original: potikānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ vistāraḥ pādataḥ samaḥ |
analyzed: potikānām ca sarvāsām vistāraḥ pādataḥ samaḥ
tad uccaḥ tri tri bhāgena tasyāḥ tu agre tu paṭṭikā
tad ardha ardhena kartavyam tad adhas kṣepaṇam dvijāḥ
chāyā āyāmam tad ucca ardham tri dvi aṃśam vā atha kalpayet
sva vyāsa ardham tri bhāgam vā tu agramaṇḍanam iṣyate
sa nālikam sama talam siṃha vyāla ādi maṇḍitam
muṣṭi bandha upari kṣiptam vyāla ādyaiḥ bhūṣitam tu vā
pūrva aśra caturaśrāṇām nāga vṛttā prakīrtitā
sarveṣu ca atihāreṣu patracitrā prakīrtitā
samudrormiḥ tathā anyeṣām pādānām phalakā matā
vistāre tri catur bhāge ca eka aṃśena śikhā bhavet
hasta ādi pañca hasta antam ṣaṣ ṣaṣ aṅgula vardhanāt  /
stambha antaram prayoktavyam ojam vā yugmam eva vā
samāḥ stambha antarāḥ sarve prāsāde sārvadeśike
pṛ
viṣama stambha bhāgam tu vāstu ca āśu vinaśyati

original: sāyaṃ cāpi ca tatsarvaṃ tatprakāreṇa kārayet || 55/49 ||
analyzed: sāyam ca api ca tat sarvam tad prakāreṇa kārayet
śilā mayāḥ tu devānām anyeṣām nā eva kīrtitāḥ
iṣṭakābhiḥ drumaiḥ sarve stambhāḥ kāryāḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
yugma ayugmāḥ tu devānām ayugmāḥ tu nṛṇām matāḥ
anta stambhāḥ bahi stambhāḥ ṛju stambhāḥ samāḥ matāḥ
adhiṣṭhānam ca pādam ca bhittiḥ uttara saṃjñakam
tulā jayantī ca ākhyātā chāyā ākhyam iti kīrtitam
ebhyaḥ viśiṣṭam yat vastu tanukāyam iti smṛtam

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre pādamānavidhiḥ tripañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre pāda māna vidhiḥ tripañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
prastara vidhi paṭalaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa prastarasya vidhi kramam
uttaram vājanam ca eva muṣṭi bandham mṛṇālikam
daṇḍikā valaya kṣudra gopana ācchādanāni ca
āliṅga antaritā ca eva pratyaṅgam vājanam kramāt
trayaṃśa eka aṃśa aṃśa pañca eka dvi tri bhāga eka bhāgakaiḥ
tri bhāgena eka bhāgena upari upari yojayet
etāni prastara aṅgāni trividham ca uttaram bhavet
khaṇḍa uttaram patra bandham rūpa uttaram iha dvijāḥ
pāda vistāra vistāram sama udaya samanvitam
khaṇḍa uttaram iti jñeyam pādena utsedha saṃyutam
pāda vistāra saṃmuktam patrabandham iti smṛtam
ardha uccam pāda vistāram rūpa uttaram iha uditam
tri pādam vā tri tri bhāga ūnam ardham vā karṇa nirgamam
svastikam ca ardha mānam ca nandyāvarta sama ākṛti
sarvatobhadra vṛttam vā pratyuttara niveśanam
prāk ukta utsedha saṃyuktam tat pādāt atha vistaram
chandaḥ pāda agra saṃyuktam athavā parikalpayet
tad ucca tri catur bhāga nirgama udgama saṃyutam
vājanam caturaśram vā padma aśram ca uttara upari
āyatam tri catur pañca daṇḍaiḥ ardham tri pādikam
vistāram tad sama utsedham potikā alaṅkṛti kriyām
sa nālīka vidhīkam syāt mṛṇālikam atha upari
tulā valīkayoḥ madhye kṣoṇī vājanam eva vā
stambha vyāsī tri pāda uccā tu ardha pāda ūna vistarā
mahā bhāra tulā kāryā valīkā ūrdhve viśeṣataḥ
tulā vistāra tāra uccā jayantī syāt tulā upari
ardha daṇḍa ghana upetam adhyardha uccam sama udaram
sthāna mārgam jayantyam ūrdhve pārśva gam tu uttaram bhavet  /
vājanāḥ ca tulā dvāra anugāḥ sarvatra kīrtitāḥ
prastaraḥ pāda viṣkambhaḥ tri daṇḍam ca ardha daṇḍakam
tulā valīkayoḥ madhye dvi daṇḍam athavā punar
eka daṇḍa antaram vā api jayantī uttaram eva ca
pādāt pāda vivṛddhyā tu tridaṇḍa antam prakalpayet
tathā eva ca anumārgāṇām antaram pravidhīyate
anumārga yutam vā api rahitam vā api kārayet
pṛ
yathābalam yathāśobham ācchādyam tat upari atha
dārubhiḥ vā iṣṭakābhiḥ vā yathābala ghana anvitam
haṃsa bhūta baliḥ vā atha nidrā vā daṇḍa mānataḥ
tri pāda udaya yuktā vā vidheyā vājana upari
bahis kapotakaraṇam vājana upari kalpayet
adhyardha dvi tri daṇḍaḥ vā nirgamaḥ ca udgamaḥ bhavet
ardhatri pāda daṇḍam vā kapota ālambanam bhavet
uttara upari saṃsthāpya vājanasya tad ūrdhvakam
potikā anta avalambam vā tulā antaritam antaram
daṇḍa ardhāt pāda vṛddhyā tu tri daṇḍa antam tat ucyate  /
tad ardha ardha tri bhāga ekam sopāna ghanam iṣyate
pāda aṣṭa aṃśa ṣaṣ aṃśa eka phalakaiḥ chādayet pari
kampāḥ tad upari kṣepyāḥ yathā iṣṭa ākṛti vistaraiḥ
chādayet loha loṣṭaiḥ vā mṛd loṣṭaiḥ vā dvijottamāḥ
sopāna nirgama ādyena daṇḍikā nirgamaḥ bhavet

original: daṇḍikā pādatārārdhaṃ tadardhaṃ hi ghanaṃ bhavet || 56/26 ||
analyzed: daṇḍikā pāda tārā ardham tad ardham hi ghanam bhavet  /
daṇḍikā vipula upetam tad ardham ca gala anvitam
sa nālīkam tu maṇḍī aṅgam daṇḍa niṣkrama saṃyutam
muṣṭi bandham pṛthak kuryāt vājana upari buddhimān
tulā ācchedena vā kuryāt stambha agra vipula anvitam
tad ardham niṣkrama upetam sva agra paṭṭikayā anvitam
kāya pādam nayet dhīmān daṇḍikā vājana antare
kāya pāda antaram chādyam phalakaiḥ sāra dāru jaiḥ
daṇḍikā muṣṭibandha antar sama ādi āya samanvitam
daṇḍa tri pāda visṛtam tad ardha ardha ghana anvitam
ūrdhva adhastāt śira upetam nānā kampa samāyutam
maṇḍanam tu antare kāryam daṇḍikā muṣṭibandhayoḥ
muṣṭibandha sama ākāram caturaśra sama ākṛti
yathā iṣṭa vipula uttuṅgam tuṅga ardha sama veśanam
daṇḍikā ūrdhve tu valayam gopanam syāt tad ūrdhvatas
hitvā avaśiṣṭa mānam tu gopanam ca arpayet budhaḥ
vasantakam vālindam vā vidheyam vā ajana upari
tri pāda uccam tad ūrdhve syāt kapota uccam tu pūrvavat
evam syāt dṛḍha kalpam tu śilayā iṣṭakayā drumaiḥ

original: yathā prayogasthairyaṃ tu tathā yojyaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ |
analyzed: yathā prayoga sthairyam tu tathā yojyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
kapota ucca tri bhāgam vā pādam vā kṣudranidrakam
kapota nāsikā kṣudra nīvra ūrdhve sthita karṇikā
sa pāda daṇḍā vā adhyardha dvi daṇḍā vistṛta anvitā
siṃhaśrotra śikhā liṅga paṭṭikā antasya paṭṭikā
vidheyā svastika ākṛtyā nāsikā ūrdhvena nāsikā
kukṣika ādi śikhā mānam yathāśobhanam eva vā
prativājanakasya ūrdhve na iṣyate nāsikā ucchrayaḥ
pāda pāda ghana upetam pādāt pāda vinirgamaḥ
āliṅgam syāt tad ūrdhva stham tad ūrdhva antaritam matam
pāda ardha vipulam tu ardha nivṛtyā aśra agra paṭṭikā
pāde pāda antare tu antar praviṣṭam pāda bāhyakam
pāda ākāram tri pāda ardha sadṛśa udaya saṃyutā
pratim niveśayet tasya tri tri bhāga eka bhāgataḥ
pādena vājanam kuryāt tad anantaram ucyate  /
tat ced nimna unnatam sarvam devānām kula nāśanam
vikāraḥ syāt tu devānām dvijānām bhūbhṛtām api
anyayoḥ ca ardha candra ābhā pratiḥ kāryā dvijottamāḥ

original: daṇḍaṃ sapādaṃ sārdhaṃ vā pratinirgamanaṃ nayet || 56/46 ||
analyzed: daṇḍam sa pādam sa ardham vā pratinirgamanam nayet  /
pṛ
eka dvi tri catur mātraiḥ yavaiḥ vā parikalpayet
hīna ādhikyam tu ca aṅgānām prastarasya dvijottamāḥ
pāda aṅgānām tathā kuryāt gala aṅge ca masūrake

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre prastaravidhiḥ catuḥpañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre prastara vidhiḥ catuḥpañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
prāsāda bhūṣaṇam vakṣye śrūyatām dvijasattamāḥ

original: syāt pādaprastara grītvāvarge mūle tu vedikā || 57/1 ||
analyzed: syāt mūle tu vedikā
adhyardha ādyam tri daṇḍena bhitti mātra visāriṇī
ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa daśa utsedhā tad samam dīrghikā bhavet
pratyuccā dviguṇa utsedhā vedikā prastara uttare
grīvā utsedha tri bhāgāt ca grīvā adhastāt sthirā bhavet
pañca sapta aṃśake dvi tri bhāga uccam vā agra bandhanam
śeṣa ūdha stambha khaṇḍaḥ syāt bhittiḥ pāda viśāla bhāj
tad pādaḥ pāda nirveśaḥ ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa aṃśaḥ eva vā
caturdhā bandhanam kṛtvā kampam ekena kārayet  /

original: tadūrdhve tu dvibhāgena nidrā tvekena vājanam |
analyzed: tad ūrdhve tu dvi bhāgena nidrā tu ekena vā ajanam

original: pādaṃ vā pañcabhāge tu tridvyaṃśaṃ vājanaṃ bhavet || 57/6 ||
analyzed: pādam vā pañca bhāge tu tri dvi aṃśam vājanam bhavet  /
kampam ardhena nidrā syāt adhyardhena ardhataḥ kajam
ardhena kampam aṃśena vājanam parikalpayet
dvāviṃśati aṃśake tuṅge karṇaḥ dvādaśa bhāgikaḥ
netra aṃśena tathā nidrā kapotam catur aṃśakam
tad ūrdhve vājanam ca ekam tadvat karṇaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
nidrā kāryā tad ūrdhva sthā paṭṭa ṣaṭka samanvitā
dvāviṃśati aṃśake tuṅge karṇaḥ dvādaśabhiḥ bhavet
vājanam ca eka bhāgena nidrā ekā vājanam tribhiḥ
padma kampa gala abjāni tadvat karṇaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
ṣoḍaśa aṃśe tad utsedhe nava aṃśam galam iṣyate  /
vājanam ca eka bhāgena tathā nidrā tri bhāgataḥ
paṭṭapadmam atha eka aṃśam padmam ekena kīrtitam
vedikā jālāka artham tu na evam chedyāt dvijottamāḥ
dvāra artham devaveśma artham chedanīyam yathocitam
vedikā niyamaḥ dhāmni na iṣyate sārvadeśike

original: evaṃ vediḥ samākhyātā dvāraṃ tu śrūyatāṃ dvijāḥ || 57/14 ||
analyzed: evam vediḥ samākhyātā dvāram tu śrūyatām dvijāḥ
stambha deśe nava aṣṭa aṃśe sapta aṃśe tu aika bhāga bhāj
dvāra tuṅgam tad ardham syāt vistāraḥ deva sadmani
nālī geham tri bhāga ekam ardham vā nava pañca bhāj
pañcatriṃśat bhavet tuṅgam idam vaiśeṣikam bhavet
vistāraḥ prāgvat uddiṣṭaḥ tu athavā tat prakīrtyate
tri vitasti viśālam syāt dairdhyam sapta vitastikam
vistāra āyāmataḥ tasmāt ṣaṣ dvādaśa kara agrakaiḥ
vṛddhyā tri pañca māna ādi ṣaṣ vitasti antakāni hi
pṛ
pañcaviṃśati mānāni dvāra tārā udayāni hi
tad ādyam śayanīyasya gṛhasya dvādaśa eva hi
samāvṛta khalūrīṇām tāni eva uktāni paṇḍitāḥ
nagara grāma durgāṇām śeṣāṇi uktāni veśmanām
vistāraḥ dviguṇa utsedhaḥ ṣaṣ mātram adhikam bhavet
nava mātrā adhikam vā api sarveṣām samudīritam
sa ṣaṣ mātram dvi tālam ca sa tri mātram dvi tālakam

original: dvitālaṃ kṣudramānaṃ tu sārdhatālaṃ tu yojayet || 57/22 ||
analyzed: dvi tālam kṣudra mānam tu sārdha tālam tu yojayet

original: nyūnaṃ tu śubhadaṃ vāraṃ viprādīnāṃ gṛhaṃ matam || 57/23 ||
analyzed: nyūnam tu śubha dam vāram vipra ādīnām gṛham matam
stambha āyāma iṣṭa bhāge tu ṣaṣ ardham dvāra dairghyakam
tad ardhe nava bhāge tu sārdha aṣṭa aṃśāt samunnatiḥ
tri vyāsa dviguṇa uttuṅgam na iṣṭam dvāram nṛṇām gṛhe
pāda uttuṅga vaśāt bhūmau bhūmau evam vidhīyatām
ukta utsedha tri pañca ekam aṅgulena adhikam tu vā
vipule api tathā evam syāt ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa aṃśakaiḥ tu vā
dvārasya ubhaya pārśve tu maṇḍita sthambha yugmakam

original: bhūṣaṇaṃ tu bahiḥ kāryaṃ sarveṣāmapi sadmanām || 57/27 ||
analyzed: bhūṣaṇam tu bahis kāryam sarveṣām api sadmanām
mānam labdha udayam yat syāt bhaktvā mātraiḥ viśeṣataḥ
parihṛtya aṅguli chedam āyādyam parikalpayet
aṣṭa nanda agnibhiḥ ca eva vasu nanda catuṣṭayaiḥ

original: hṛtamāyaṃ vyayaṃ caiva yo vistārastu vārakaḥ |
analyzed: hṛta māyam vyayam ca eva yaḥ vistāraḥ tu vārakaḥ
aṃśakāḥ ca avaśiṣṭāḥ tu kalpanīyāḥ tu deśikaiḥ
vāstunaḥ pārśvayoḥ madhye stambham samyak nidhāpayet
ka bhitti visṛta artham tu tyaktvā tad pārśvayoḥ dvayoḥ
mukhya dvāram tu tad vāme kampa dvāram tad anyake

original: kampadvāraṃ ca madhye tu yogārthaṃ bahulānvitam || 57/32 ||
analyzed: kampa dvāram ca madhye tu yoga artham bahula anvitam
kampam samā antaram kuryāt yathāśobham atha api vā
mūlavāstu tripārśveṣu kampa dvāram yathocitam
kampa dvāram samuddiśya bhitti antar stambha saṃyutam
na tyajet yadi tad svāmī maraṇāya bhaviṣyati
sa pāda pāda vistāraḥ sa ardhaḥ vā yoga vistaraḥ
stambha vyāsa samaḥ vā api tad ardham bahulam matam  /
tri pādam vā uttara adhastāt pratīkam tat sva vājanam

original: dvārodayāya śeṣaṃ tu tridhā vā pañcadhā kṛte || 57/36 ||
analyzed: dvāra udayāya śeṣam tu tridhā vā pañcadhā kṛte
eka aṃśam vā dvi aṃśakam syāt adhas bhūṣaṇam ūrdhvatas
śeṣeṇa bhūṣaṇam kuryāt śuddha dvāram tu madhyamam
aṣṭamaṅgalakasya ūrdhve latā ādyāḥ paritas matāḥ
tri catur pañca ṣaṣ bhāga bhāgena stambha vaipule

original: kavāṭabahulaṃ proktaṃ daṇḍārdhaṃ vā ghanaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: kavāṭa bahulam proktam daṇḍa ardham vā ghanam bhavet
ayugma phalakā grāhyā madhya sandhi vivarjitā

original: talpasya bhūṣaṇordhve vā bāhye vā parikīrtitā |
analyzed: talpasya bhūṣaṇa ūrdhve vā bāhye vā parikīrtitā
madhyam tyaktvā prayoktavyā yathā bala samanvitā
asya talpa ghanasya ardha ghana dviguṇa vistarā
daṇḍāḥ tri paṃca sapta eva nava ekādaśa saṃkhyayā
aśva skandha khura ābhāḥ vā aśvattha patra samāḥ api

original: yugme mahati talpe ca dakṣiṇasthe kavāṭake || 57/42 ||
analyzed: yugme mahati talpe ca dakṣiṇa sthe kavāṭake  /
vistāre tu āyatau ca eva tri aṃśa pañca aṃśake kṛte
upariṣṭāt traya aṃśam tu tyaktvā adhas oṃśam dvi pārśvayoḥ
teṣām madhye tu yat dvāram maṇidvāram iha ucyate
yathābalam yathāśobham ayaḥpaṭṭaiḥ dṛḍhīkṛte
śrī mukhyaiḥ vāma daṇḍaiḥ ca kṣepaṇaiḥ sandhi patrakaiḥ
ardhacandraiḥ tathā śṛṅgaiḥ puṣpaiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ api
yoga sama bandha kīlaiḥ ca daivata ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
ūrdhva adhas śikhara āśliṣṭa mūlabandha agra bandhanam
pṛ
gulphe lalāṭa sandhau ca paṭṭaiḥ hema ādi nirmitaiḥ
badhnīyāt sarva deśe vā yathāśobham yathābalam
talpati ivra ghanā tasya tadvat dviguṇa vistarā
praveśa dakṣiṇe talpe vidhātavyā manoharā

original: argalaṃ dakṣiṇe bhāge vāmabhāge tu talpakam || 57/49 ||
analyzed: argalam dakṣiṇe bhāge vāma bhāge tu talpakam

original: kavāṭaṃ tvekavṛkṣotthaṃ bhedo bāhyaṃ tu bāhyakam |
analyzed: kavāṭam tu eka vṛkṣa uttham bhedaḥ bāhyam tu bāhyakam

original: antaraṃ ca vinirdiṣṭaṃ jñātvā karma samācaret || 57/50 ||
analyzed: antaram ca vinirdiṣṭam jñātvā karma samācaret
deva dvija narendrāṇām kavāṭa yugalam matam
anyayoḥ ekam uddiṣṭam mahā dvāre catur yugam
aneka śṛṅkhalā upetam bahu kuṇḍala bhūṣitam
kavāṭa yugmam kartavyam kokila argala saṃyutam
prastare bhittike vā api praviṣṭaḥ nirgataḥ athavā
tathā kavāṭaḥ vā kāryaḥ yantraiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ api

original: kūjat kavāṭo neṣṭavyo viśiṣṭo'pi tathā bhavet |
analyzed: kūjat kavāṭaḥ neṣṭavyaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ api tathā bhavet
dvāreṇa siddham dvāram tu rathyā rūpāt iva uditam
liṅgam prāsāda siddham ced na iṣṭam dvāram śiva dvijāḥ
bhittim kṛtvā tu paṃcāśat antar triṃśat bahis dvayam
sapta aṃśaiḥ vā catur tri aṃśaiḥ nītvā antar yogaḥ ucyate
athavā yoga vistāraḥ tu aṅgulaiḥ tribhiḥ eva vā
aṅgula aṅguli vṛddhayā tu dvātriṃśat karaja antaram
bahulam prāgvat uddiṣṭam pādam vā tat udīritam
pañca ādi ekādaśa antam tu dvāra tuṅgam vidhāya ca
eka aṃśa hīnam tad mānam dvāram śuddham iha uditam
tatra dvi adhikam grāhyam tat mānam devatā ucitam

original: evaṃ dvāraṃ samākhyātaṃ toraṇaṃ śrūyatāṃ dvijāḥ || 57/59 ||
analyzed: evam dvāram samākhyātam toraṇam śrūyatām dvijāḥ
tri daṇḍaḥ vā catur pañca daṇḍaḥ toraṇa vistaraḥ
tad pādaḥ pāda pāda ūna dvi aṃśaḥ tri aṃśaḥ athavā mataḥ
pāda ardha vistaraḥ vā api toraṇa stambha vistaraḥ
tri bhāgaḥ maulika utsedhaḥ vīrakāṇḍāt upari adhas

original: uttaraṃ ca tridaṇḍaṃ syāttadardhaṃ vājanaṃ bhavet || 57/62 ||
analyzed: uttaram ca tri daṇḍam syāt tad ardham vājanam bhavet

original: uttareṇa samānaṃ tu paṭṭikā tviha kathyate |
analyzed: uttareṇa samānam tu paṭṭikā tu iha kathyate
tad ardham vājanam ca ūrdhve tat sarvam syāt sanātanam
toraṇam trividham patra toraṇa makara anvitam
citra toraṇam iti eṣām maṇḍanam ca adhunā ucyate
bāla candra nibhaiḥ patraiḥ citritam patra toraṇam
dvayoḥ makarayoḥ vaktraiḥ saktam madhyama pūritam
nānāvidha latā yuktam etat makara toraṇam
tat eva pārśvayoḥ madhyam pūritam ca dvayoḥ api
nakra tuṇḍa pragrahaiḥ ca tayoḥ āsya vinirgataiḥ
vidyādharaiḥ ca bhūtaiḥ ca siṃha ibha vyāla haṃsakaiḥ
vāle sraj daṇḍakaiḥ anyaiḥ maṇibandhaiḥ vicitrakam
citra toraṇam etat syāt devānām bhūbhṛtām varam
guhāsu pratimā ādyāḥ syuḥ pādāḥ sarva aṅga śobhitāḥ
caturaśra aṣṭa vṛtta ābhāḥ kumbha maṇḍī ādi saṃyutāḥ
potikā sahitāḥ vā syuḥ viyuktāḥ vā prakīrtitāḥ
utsandhyāt avalambam tu kuryāt makara pṛṣṭhakam
eka daṇḍam samārabhya sārdha daṇḍa vivardhanāt
catu daṇḍa anta mānam tu guhā āveśanam iṣyate
guhāsu devatāḥ sthāpyāḥ prāsādasya samantataḥ
dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇāmūrti liṅga uttham tasya paścime
brahmāṇam uttare deśe sthāpayet deśika uttamaḥ
ardha maṇḍapa dakṣa aṃśe vighneśam nṛtta rūpiṇam
durgān ca uttara bhāge syāt rudram vā sārvadeśike

original: nānākārayutaṃ vāpi sarvatraikaṃ tu vā nyaset || 57/74 ||
analyzed: nānā ākāra yutam vā api sarvatra ekam tu vā nyaset
pṛ
pratimā lakṣaṇa uktena mārgeṇa eva samācaret

analyzed: tale tale tu devān ca gale ca api evam ācaret

analyzed: indram vāhana yuktam vā rudra rūpam tu vā nyaset

devatā vā atha saṃsthāpyā kalpite bāhyabhittike

analyzed: dakṣiṇe nandi saṃjñam tu mahākālam tu vāmatas

original: vyatyāso vā tayoḥ pūrvadvāre vā paścimānane |
analyzed: vyatyāsaḥ vā tayoḥ pūrva dvāre vā paścima ānane

analyzed: dakṣiṇa ānana yukte ca uttara āsye eva m iva vā
catur dvāra samopete dvārapān aṣṭa vinyaset

original: yasyāṃ diśi bhaveddvāraṃ tāṃ prācīṃ parikalpayet || 57/81 ||
analyzed: yasyām diśi bhavet dvāram tām prācīm parikalpayet
athavā udaya deśam tu raveḥ prācīm prakalpayet

original: aiśānyāṃ vā praṇālaṃ syātpūrvasyāṃ vā prakīrtitam |
analyzed: aiśānyām vā praṇālam syāt pūrvasyām vā prakīrtitam
evam praṇālam ākhyātam padma madhye viśeṣataḥ
gale vā dvāra deśe vā dvāra toraṇam iṣyate
dvāra tulyaḥ natiḥ tri āsa antaraḥ stambha dvayoḥ api
uttara uttara yukta aṣṭa maṅgalaiḥ tu nava kramāt
phalakam pañcavaktram tu tad ūrdhve śūla saṃyutam
citraketu patākā śrī bherī kumbhāḥ ca dīpikā
nandyāvartam ca devānām sarveṣām aṣṭamaṅgalam

original: bherī vṛṣo gajaścaiva cāmarau kesarī jhaṣaḥ |
analyzed: bherī vṛṣaḥ gajaḥ ca eva cāmarau kesarī jhaṣaḥ
patākā ca pradīpaḥ ca devānām aṣṭamaṅgalam
darpaṇam pūrṇa kumbham ca vṛṣabhaḥ yugma cāmaram
śrīvatsam svastikam śaṅkham dīpaḥ ca eva aṣṭamaṅgalam
patākāḥ svastikāḥ śaṅkhāḥ pūrṇa kumbham sa padmakam
chatra lakṣmī pradīpāḥ ca dvijānām aṣṭamaṅgalam

original: patākā pūrṇakumbhaṃ ca śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ ca śryaṅkuśau |
analyzed: patākā pūrṇa kumbham ca śaṅkham cakram ca śrī aṅkuśau

original: padmākhyatoraṇaṃ śūdre sarvaṃ sarvatra vā matam |
analyzed: padma ākhya toraṇam śūdre sarvam sarvatra vā matam

original: jālakaṃ phālakaṃ śailamaiṣṭyaṃ kuḍyaṃ ca iṣyate || 57/94 ||
analyzed: jālakam phālakam śailam aiṣṭyam kuḍyam ca iṣyate
jālakaiḥ bahubhiḥ yuktam jālakam kuḍyam iṣyate

ūrdhva adhas padma kampaiḥ ca bhitti bandhanam eva vā

original: niṣpādaṃ vā sapādaṃ vā kuḍyaṃ śailamathaiṣṭakam || 57/97 ||
analyzed: niṣpādam vā sa pādam vā kuḍyam śailam atha aiṣṭakam
athavā mṛṇmayam vā api kuḍyam iṣṭam dvijottamāḥ
kuḍye stambha latā kāryā vastu ādhārasya ca upari
vedikā ūrdhva adhare kūṭa koṣṭha ādīnām tridhā smṛtā
citra kumbha latā pūrvā stambha kumbha latā parā
kumbhakumbhalatā ca anyā tāsām lakṣaṇam ucyate
kumbha kumbha latā mūle daṇḍa dviguṇa vistaraḥ

original: sapādā vātha sārdhā vā pādonadviguṇā tu vā |
analyzed: sa pādā vā atha sa ardhā vā pāda ūna dviguṇā tu vā
pāda ūna triguṇā vā api tad ardhena ucchrayaḥ bhavet
nandyāvarta avalambaḥ syāt kumbhataḥ pāda nirgatiḥ
pṛ
āsya bhāga tri bhāga ekā tadā syāt patra nirgatiḥ
padma ādīnām ca mānam śobhā bala anugam
stambha ardham kalaśāt bātī latā vartanam iṣyate
yathā śobhā antara vyāsā muktā śaṅkha antare sthitā
stambhaśālā viśālā syāt stambhavistāraḥ eva ca
tasyāḥ tu alaṅkṛtiḥ prāpta vallī maṇḍana maṇḍitam
kuḍyāt vinirgatā rūpa padma mālā agra bhāginī
eṣām niṣkrānti veśī tu yathāśobham samācaret
agra patra avadheḥ madhye muktibandham sa nālakam
pāda pāda viniṣkrānta padma paṭṭa vicitritam
madhye dvi pārśvayoḥ grātī tad samāsya udaya avadhi
muṣṭi bandha upari kṣiptam vyāla antam kalaśa avadhi
vyāla mṛd paṭṭikā pādā pāda uccā patra citritā
padma hṛd padma saṃyuktam tad ūrdhve nara bandhanam
tat sarvam phalaka utsandhi paryantam paripaṭhyate
vīrakāṇḍa avadhi kṣeṇī tad ūrdhve nakra paṭṭikā
lasat makara kāṇḍaḥ syāt nirgacchat vyāla paṭṭikā
ūrdhve makaratuṇḍasya pūritam maulibandha vat
tasya avataṃsaka ūrdhvam tu vājanāya samullikhet
ghmāta śaṅkham tu bhūtam vā kārayet uttarāt adhas
yathā a śobhana sarva aṅgā gatā kumbha latā īdṛśī
citra kumbha latā evam syāt stambha kumbha latā anyathā
stambha dviguṇa vistāram stambha ūrdhve padma viṣṭaram
paṭṭikā padma dhṛk veṣa padma upari paṭṭikā
tri pañca sapta śākhābhiḥ yukta ārya amburuha āsanā
ūrdhva stha pūrṇa kumbha aṅkā kumbha kumbhalatā matā
atha padmāsana ūrdhva stha stambha kṣepaṇa paṭṭikā
khaḍga ādi phalaka anta aṅgā tad ūrdhve pūrṇa kumbha vat
kumbhasya tiryak patrā ca patra alaṅkāra saṃyutā
stambha kumbha latā edṛś syāt anyat api evam ūhyatām
evam kumbhalatā proktā vṛttasphaṭikam ucyate
ṣaṣ aṣṭa daśabhiḥ bhānu manu vaikāra mātrakaiḥ
vyāsa tārā ardha niṣkrāntā dvi tri aṃśam vā dvi bhāgikam
vṛtta ākāram samam cetu toraṇa aṅghri vat āyatam
sa kandharam tad ūrdhve tu śukanāsyā vibhūṣitam
vṛtta sphaṭika matra uktam dyu stha sadma vibhūṣitam
tri bhāgaiḥ śikharam ca eka bhāgaḥ sthūpī udayaḥ bhavet
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍānām pramāṇam iha kīrtitam
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṅgam māna sūtrāt bahis nayet
antar pramāṇasūtrāt tu veśanam sarva doṣa dam

original: caturaṃśraṃ tu vasvaśraṃ ṣoḍaśāśraṃ tu vartulam || 57/124 ||
analyzed: catur aṃśram tu vasu aśram ṣoḍaśa aśram tu vartulam
mastaka sthūpikā upetam karṇakūṭam idam matam
madhye nāsā samāyuktam ardha koṭī samanvitam
mukha paṭṭikayā upetam śakti dvaya samanvitam
aneka sthūpikā upetam koṣṭhakam madhyaśas bhavet
haṃsa tuṇḍa nibham pṛṣṭhe śālā ākāram mukhe mukhe
pañjaram vihitam kūṭa koṣṭhayoḥ antaram dvijāḥ
pārśva vaktram tat eva iṣṭam hastituṇḍam sa maṇḍalam
eṣa jāti kramaḥ proktaḥ karṇa koṣṭha samanvitam
madhye kūṭam tayoḥ madhye kṣudra koṣṭha ādi śobhitam

original: chandametatsamuddiṣṭaṃ kūṭaṃ vā koṣṭhakaṃ tu vā || 57/129 ||
analyzed: chandam etat samuddiṣṭam kūṭam vā koṣṭhakam tu vā
antara prastara upetam nimnam vā unnatam eva vā
vikalpam iti nirdiṣṭam ābhāsam tad vimiśritam
pṛ
jāti ādi bhaidakaiḥ yuktam vimānam sampadām padam
viparīte vināśāya bhavet eva viniścayaḥ
nāsikā tu aṣṭadhā jñeyā tasya ādau siṃha saṃjñakam
sārdha pañjaram anyat syāt tṛtīyam pañjaram matam
niryūha pañjaram paścāt pañcamam lamba nāsikam
siṃhaśrotram tu ṣaṣṭham syāt khaṇḍaniryūhakam tatas
jhaṣa pañjaram anyat syāt tāsām lakṣaṇam ucyate
śliṣṭa prāsāda nīvra aṅga vipulam sama nirgamam
ṣaḍvarga sahitam śakti dhvaja yuṅmukha paṭṭikam
vedikā jālaka stambha rājitam siṃhapañjaram
tri daṇḍa ādi catur daṇḍa paryantam vipula anvitam
yathārha āyāma saṃyuktam sūci pāda dvayam dvijāḥ
sarveṣām pañjarāṇām tu madhyame saṃprayojayet
dhāmni prāsādam āśliṣṭam sa tīvram ca ardha nirgatam
adhiṣṭhāna ādi pañca āga śakti dhvaja samanvitam
mukha paṭṭikayā upetam vedikā jālaka anvitam
karṇa pāda yutam sārdha pañjaram tu vidhīyate
prāgvat vipula saṃyuktam pāda nirgamana anvitam
tri bhāga nirgatam vā api vṛtta sphaṭika sannibham
pañjaram syāt idam śeṣam prāgvat atra samīritam
sva anurūpa śikhāsu agram śliṣṭa nīvra aṅga karṇakam
kapota ādi aṅga saṃyuktam etat niryūha pañjaram
saṃśliṣṭa nīvra karṇa aṅghri kṛta nāga talam śiraḥ
niryūha rahitam yuktam sarva aṅgam lamba nāsikam
tat eva siṃha śretra ābha śikham yadvat anīvrakam
saṃśritam karṇa pādena siṃhaśrotram tat ucyate
vistāre pañcama aṃśe tu dvi aṃśa nirgamana anvitam
nīvra adhastāt kapota ādi aitśaiḥ maṇḍita rūpakam

original: nāmnā tu khaṇḍaniryūhaṃ jñātvā samyak prayojayet |
analyzed: nāmnā tu khaṇḍaniryūham jñātvā samyak prayojayet
daṇḍa daṇḍa anta niṣkrānta nīvra adhastāt upari adhas
aṅgaiḥ yukta kapota ādyaiḥ kandharam toraṇa anvitam
jhaṣapañjaram etat syāt aṣṭamam nāmataḥ dvijāḥ
adhiṣṭhāna antara antastha tuṅge pañca vibhāgake
sa aṅghri dvi aṃśena pādaḥ syāt ardhena prastara udayaḥ  /
tad samam galam iti uktam madhye koṭiḥ tu śeṣatas
ūrdhve tu bhāgam āropya śiraḥ tena samācaret
stambha adhastāt adhiṣṭhānam kuryāt stambha ardha mānataḥ
tad aṣṭa aṃśa adhikam vā atha śeṣam syāt upapīṭhakam  /
sarveṣām pañjarāṇām tu mānam evam udāhṛtam
pādukā uttarayoḥ madhye nava aṃśena upapīṭhakam
masūrakam dvi bhāgam syāt dviguṇam stambha dairdhyakam
sārdha aṃśam prastara utsedham madhya aṃśam vedikā udayam
uttara ādi kapota antam nāla udayam iti īritam
pañjara ākṛti saṃyuktam kapotāt tu vinirgatam
yathāśobham yathāyukti tathā śakti dhvaja anvitam
kapota pañjaram hi etat prāsāde sārvadeśike
madhye dvi tri catur bhitti vistāram sama nirgamam
śālākāram sabhākāram prasāda śikhara āvṛti
mahā vāra āvṛtam vā api hāra stha śikhara kriyam
brahmadvāram iti proktam vimānānām sanātanam
eka bhitti viśālena toraṇam syāt tu bhārakāḥ
sa patākāḥ bahis grāhyāḥ tad vistāra lupa anvitāḥ
garbha dvi tri kara vyāsā śuka nāsā mukhe mukhe

original: na kartavyā vimāneṣu nāsikordhve na nāsikā |
analyzed: na kartavyā vimāneṣu nāsikā ūrdhve na nāsikā
pṛ
go mūtram gaṇikā patra nandyāvartam ca saptadhā
ṛju kampa yutam yat tu ṛjujālakam ucyate
karṇa gatyā yadā śrotram gavākṣam iti kīrtitam
tat eva catur aśra uttham kuñjarākṣam iti smṛtam
vidiś vaktra gatā dṛṣṭiḥ gomūtram iti kīrtitam
mūlam api agra gulika mṛdu bhitti antara arcitam
nānā chidra samāyuktam gaṇikā jālakam bhavet
patraiḥ randhram patra jālakam iṣyate
pañca sūtra gatam randhram prādakṣiṇya krameṇa tu
nandyāvartam iti proktam vedi ardhve jālakam nayet
svāyaṃbhuva ādi liṅge tu yathākāmam prayojayet
tyaktvā bhityā aṅghri madhyam tu sapta daṇḍa anta vistṛtam
eka daṇḍam samārabhya vyāsa dviguṇa saṃyutam
ardha pādena kampa uccam aṣṭa aṃśa adhikam eva vā
tyaktvā madhya aṅghri randhram tu yugma ayugma aṅghri kampa yuj
bhitti madhyāt bahis tasyāḥ stambha yoga kavāṭa yuj  /
kavāṭa yugalam vā ekam ghaṭana uddhāṭana kṣamam
pāda varge bhavet grīvā varge vātāyana sthitiḥ
tale tale tu sopānam āroha artham prakalpayet
mūlam trividham uddiṣṭam caturam vṛttam āyatam
caturvidham prakartavyam tri khaṇḍam śaṅkha maṇḍalam
vallī maṇḍalam iti ūrdhve go mūtreṇa samanvitam
sa tri khaṇḍam tri khaṇḍam syāt dvi khaṇḍam ca ardha mūlakam
mūlāt agra agram ākṣīṇam śaṃkhasopānam iṣyate  /
syāt vallīmaṇḍalam vṛkṣārohi vallī sama kriyam
aśva pādasya vistāram dviguṇam ca caturguṇam
tasmāt aṅgula vṛddhyā tu dvātriṃśati samā avadhi
śayita phalaka vyāsa ṣaṣ aṅgulam udāhṛtam
dviguṇam tu samārabhya ca ekaika aṅgula vardhanāt

original: dairghyaṃ tithiguṇāntaṃ syādyathākāmaṃ tu vā bhavet || 57/173 ||
analyzed: dairghyam tithi guṇa antam syāt yathākāmam tu vā bhavet
śayita vyāsa pāda ardham tri pāda sadṛśa udayaiḥ
hasti sopānakam lāja sopānam vṛddhi saṃjñakam
sama khaṇḍam samam proktam khaṇḍaśas syāt samāgamaḥ
hasta vyāsam tu daṇḍa ādi tridaṇḍa antam prayojayet
tad pādam tat ghanam proktam yathābalam atha api vā
ayugmam eva sopānam prādakṣiṇya kramāt nayet  /
sopānam pārśvayoḥ agre tad mūlasya prayojayet
tad mūlam syāt adhiṣṭhānam pāda prastara varga yuj
aśva pāda upari sthitvā rohaṇam dakṣiṇa aṅghriṇā
īdṛś lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam sopānam sampadām padam

original: uttare vātha pūrve vā praṇālaṃ kalpayedbudhaḥ |
analyzed: uttare vā atha pūrve vā praṇālam kalpayet budhaḥ
janma ādi pañcavarge tu bāhye nālam prayojayet

original: paṭṭikāntatale nālamatha chidraṃ tu vā bhavet |
analyzed: paṭṭikā anta tale nālam atha chidram tu vā bhavet
pañca aṅgulam samārabhya ca ekaika aṅgula vardhanāt
ṣaṭtriṃśat aṅgula antam tu nāla āyāmam prakalpayet
aṅgula trayam ārabhya ca ardha aṅgula vivardhanāt
caturviṃśati mātra antam nālāt nālam prakalpayet

original: samaṃ tripādamadhyaṃ vā ghanacchidraṃ tu madhyame || 57/182 ||
analyzed: samam tri pāda madhyam vā ghana chidram tu madhyame

original: dvitribhāge tu bhāgaṃ vā vedabhūtāṃśake dvayam |
analyzed: dvi tri bhāge tu bhāgam vā veda bhūta aṃśake dvayam
ṣaṣ sapta aṃśa trayam vā atha veda aṃśam vā prakalpayet  /
gāmbhīryam api tadvat syāt agram kiñcid natam bhavet
mūlāt pañca tri bhāgam vā dvi bhāgam vā prakalpayet
athavā bandha bhāge tu bhāgena agram prakalpayet
patitam siṃha vaktra ādyaiḥ kevalam vā prakalpayet
bhāga uccam dvi tri bhāga ucca bhāgam sarva aṅga saṃyutam
potikā rahitam vīra kāṇḍa upari samanvitam
pṛ
uttaram vājanam sa abja kṣepaṇam nimna vājanam
tad ūrdhve jhaṣa kāṇḍam syāt nānā citra vicitritam
toraṇa ākṛti saṃyuktam mṛṇāla anvita kandharam
sarva alaṅkāra saṃyuktam stambhatoraṇam īritam
pāda antare vā pāde vā karṇa prāsāda madhyame
śālā madhya antarāle tu kuryāt sarveṣu dhāmasu
mūla pāda ucca mānam tu kṛtvā aṣṭa aṃśam yathākramam
adhiṣṭhāna ādi ṣaḍvarga sahitam mūla dhāma vat
kuryāt kṣudra vimānam tu stambhānām antarālake

original: sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ miśraṃ yadyadrūpaṃ śivasya tu || 57/191 ||
analyzed: sakalam niṣkalam miśram yat yat rūpam śivasya tu
anyeṣām devatā ādīnām rūpam ārṣa anurūpakam
mad bhaktānām sva rūpam yat mānuṣam vā gaja ādikam
pipīlikā avasāna antāḥ tathā teṣām tu vā bhavet

original: sarvaṃ dhāmani kartavyaṃ dhāmnaḥ ṣaḍvargameva vā || 57/193 ||
analyzed: sarvam dhāmani kartavyam dhāmnaḥ ṣaḍvargam eva vā

original: yānaṃ vā śayanaṃ vāpi gopurākṛtimeva vā |
analyzed: yānam vā śayanam vā api gopura ākṛtim eva vā
pīṭha ākṛtim vā meru ādi parvata ākṛtim eva vā
nandi ādi ākṛti vā dhāmni vidheyam ca iṣṭa deśake
maṇḍape gopure vapre parivāra ālaya ādiṣu
evam evam vidheyam syāt tathā bhuvi viśiṣyate
pañjara ādiṣu paryāya vacanam tu iha kathyate
pramāṇa bhavanam karṇa prāsādasya aṣṭakam tathā
sabhā iti kūṭa nāma syāt chāyā valabhiḥ eva ca

original: brahmadvāraṃ tato madhye maṇḍapaṃ koṣṭhake matam |
analyzed: brahmadvāram tatas madhye maṇḍapam koṣṭhake matam
ṛjuvaktram dvijāvāsam krīḍam syāt siṃhavaktrakam
pañjarasya abhidhānam syāt hastipṛṣṭham atha ucyate
gajapṛṣṭham ca tat tuṇḍam gajavaktram gaja aparam
hastipṛṣṭha abhidhānam syāt dvāri kuḍyam ca kuṭṭimam
bhitteḥ ākhyeyam ākhyātam gṛhapiṇḍiḥ atha ucyate
madhye vāsā āvṛtam vāsā piṇḍirandhārikā iti ca
saṃjñā evam gṛhapiṇḍeḥ syāt andhāram gṛhamādyakam
parimaṇḍana sālinda avalindasya abhidhānakam
masūrakam adhiṣṭhānam vastu ādhāram dharā talam
talam kuṭṭimam ādi aṅgam adhiṣṭhānasya kīrtitam

original: sthāṇuḥ sthūṇaśca pādaśca jaṅghā ca caraṇāṅghrikam || 57/203 ||
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ sthūṇaḥ ca pādaḥ ca jaṅghā ca caraṇa aṅghrikam
stambhaḥ tu talipam kampaḥ pādānām abhidhānakam

original: prastaraṃ caiva gopānaṃ kapotaṃ mañcameva ca || 57/204 ||
analyzed: prastaram ca eva gopānam kapotam mañcam eva ca
nīvram iti evam ākhyātam prastarasya dvijottamāḥ

original: kandharaṃ galasaṃjñaṃ ca kaṇṭhaṃ grīvā śirodharam || 57/205 ||
analyzed: kandharam gala saṃjñam ca kaṇṭham grīvā śirodharam
evam kaṇṭhasya nāma syāt śikharam punar ucyate

original: śikharaṃ śiramūrdhā ca śikhā mauliśca mastakam || 57/206 ||
analyzed: śikharam śira mūrdhā ca śikhā mauliḥ ca mastakam
śīrṣam kam iti vijñeyam śirovargasya paṇḍitāḥ

original: sthūpikā ca ghaṭaḥ kīlo culukaḥ sthūpirityapi || 57/207 ||
analyzed: sthūpikā ca ghaṭaḥ kīlaḥ culukaḥ sthūpiḥ iti api

original: śikhā sthūpiriti khyātā cūlikā ca dvijottamāḥ |
analyzed: śikhā sthūpiḥ iti khyātā cūlikā ca dvijottamāḥ

original: vimānaṃ bhavanaṃ harmyaṃ saudhaṃ dhāma niketanam || 57/208 ||
analyzed: vimānam bhavanam harmyam saudham dhāma niketanam
prāsādam sadanam sadma geham āvasakam gṛham
ālayam nilayam vāsaḥ pyā āspadam vāstu vāstukam
kṣetram āyatanam veśma mandiram dhiṣṇyakam padam
layam kṣayam agāram ca tathā upavasitam punar
sthānam iti evam uktāni paryāya vacanāni hi
dhāmnaḥ samyak samākhyātāḥ evam anyat samūhyatām
iti kāmika ākhye mahā tantre prāsāda bhūṣaṇa vidhiḥ
pañcapañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
pṛ
kaṇṭhasya lakṣaṇam vakṣye samāsāt śṛṇuta dvijāḥ
tad mūle vedikā kāryā kaṇṭha utsedhāt tri bhāgataḥ
garbhabhitti tri bhāga ekam aṅghreḥ vedi aṅghri veśanam
catuṣpañca ṣaṣ aṃśe tu samāveśa adhivedikā
grivā veśaḥ tatas tāvat sapta aṣṭa aṃśe tathā eva ca

original: samaṃ vādhyardhakaṃ vāpi dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ tu vā || 58/3 ||
analyzed: samam vā adhyardhakam vā api dviguṇam triguṇam tu vā
vedikā utsedha mānena grīvā uccam parikalpayet
uttaram vājanam ca eva muṣṭi bandham mṛṇālikam
daṇḍikā valayam ca eva galabhūṣaṇam iṣyate

original: daṇḍikāntaṃ galaṃ proktaṃ tadūrdhve śikharaṃ bhavet || 58/5 ||
analyzed: daṇḍikā antam galam proktam tad ūrdhve śikharam bhavet
prastara ūrdhve vṛṣam sthāpyam śiva dhāmni viśeṣataḥ
ūrdhvena sthāpitāḥ te ca dhāmnā udhastāt samantataḥ
antar maṇḍala deśe tu sthāpanīyāḥ sa pīṭhikāḥ
anyeṣām api devānām dhāmni tad vāhanān nyaset

original: devīnāṃ ca tathā proktaṃ galadevāṃstu vinyaset |
analyzed: devīnām ca tathā proktam galadevān tu vinyaset
eka pāda yutam brahma viṣṇu saṃyuktam eva vā
īdṛś rapa samāyuktam maheśam vā api vinyaset
pūrva ukta vidhinā vā api nayet

original: grivāyāṃ tu caturdikṣu nāsi pādāṃśca vinyaset |
analyzed: tu catur dikṣu nāsi pādān ca vinyaset
tatra eva kārayet vṛttam sphuṭitam ca samantataḥ

original: evaṃ kaṇṭhaḥ samākhyātaḥ tadūrdhve śikharaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: evam kaṇṭhaḥ samākhyātaḥ tad ūrdhve śikharam bhavet
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre kaṇṭha lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ ṣaṭpañcāśattamaḥ
paṭalaḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa śikharasya tu lakṣaṇam |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa śikharasya tu lakṣaṇam
śikhara utsedha māna aṃśa bhāga māna vaśena vā

original: daṇḍikāvadhi tāreṇa pañcāṃśaṃ dvyaṃśakaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: daṇḍika avadhi tāreṇa pañca aṃśam dvi aṃśakam tu vā
sapta nanda śiva aṃśeṣu trayodaśa tithau tathā
saptadaśa aṃśake bandha veda pañca ṣaṣ aṃśakam
sapta aṣṭa aṃśam tu tāra ardham iti aṣṭau śikhara udayāḥ

original: pāñcālaṃ cāpi vaidehaṃ māgadhaṃ cāpi kauravam |
analyzed: pāñcālam ca api vaideham māgadham ca api kauravam

original: kosalaṃ śaurasenaṃ ca gāndhāraṃ patrikaṃ tathā || 59/4 ||
analyzed: kosalam śaurasenam ca gāndhāram patrikam tathā
yathākrameṇa nāmāni jñātavyāni vicakṣaṇaiḥ
jaghanāt ūrdhvam eva ete bhāgāḥ sarve samīritāḥ
sarve tu taitilānām syuḥ ardha adhastāt tu mānataḥ
ekādaśāt saptadaśa bhāgāt eka aṃśa vardhanāt  /
avantikā prabhṛti ūrdhvam ardha āviṣṭa lupa udayaḥ
vyāmiśraḥ ca kaliṅgaḥ ca tathā kauśikam eva ca

original: varāṭaṃ drāmiḍaṃ caiva barvaraṃ kollakaṃ punaḥ |
analyzed: varāṭam drāmiḍam ca eva barvaram kollakam punar
tathā śauṇḍikam iti evam vyāmiśra ādi lupa udayaḥ

original: caturaśraṃ ca vṛttaṃ ca ṣaḍaśrāṣṭāśrameva ca || 59/9 ||
analyzed: caturaśram ca vṛttam ca ṣaṣ aśra aṣṭa āśram eva ca

pṛ
aṣṭa ādi aṣṭa aṣṭa dhārāṇi harmya ādīnām śirāṃsi ca
ṣaṣ ādya aṣaṣṭi karṇa antāḥ sammatam śikhara ākṛteḥ
pañca ādi ekādaśa antāḥ ca catur ādyāḥ daśa antakāḥ

pūrva ukta dvi antara uccam tu vyāmiśram nāma puṣkaram
ūrdhva sthāni api adha sthāni puṣkarāṇi ardha mānataḥ
ardham ārabhya saṃvardhya paścāt ucca ardha bhāji hi
ārohaṇī avarohāṇi guhyam etat udāhṛtam
nayet
daṇḍika uttara bāhulyam sūtra veda āsanāni adhas
āsane catur aṃśa ādi nyaset vindu daśā antakān
koṣṇīṣa sandheḥ tad bindu sīmanta uccam samāharet
mūlāt āsanam nyaset
tāni eva daṇḍikā ādīnām paryantāni bhavanti hi
koṣṇīṣa saṅgāt paryanta bindu antam tat lupāyanam
tad tad paryanta vistāram sa sūtram vinyaset punar
vinyaset āsane vā api tat mānam syāt lupa avadhi
etat madhya lupā sīmnā vardhate varṇa saṃkhyayā
evam āvartya tat paścāt ārohe vā avaruhya ca
tad tad koṣṭeṣu saṃjātam tad tad malla yutam bhavet

original: samadhyaṃ vā vimadhyaṃ vā lupānyāso dvidhā mataḥ || 59/21 ||
analyzed: samadhyam vā vimadhyam vā lupānyāsaḥ dvidhā mataḥ
madhyam ca madhyakarṇam ca vyākarṇam anukoṭikam
kotiḥ iti evam ucyeta pañca varṇa lupāḥ kramāt
tad tad sūtrāt adhas pṛṣṭhavaṃśa nidrāṇi sūtrayet
śayita sthiti sūtra antam kīlam tad kūṭa mūrdhani
nidhāya ardhendu vat sarvāḥ cūlikāḥ vilikhet samāḥ
lupa avilupa madhya antargatā sā cūlikā ākṛtiḥ
evam syāt ṛju kāyam tu ca anyat api evam ūhyatām
bālakūṭasya vistāra sthiti sūtra stana antaraḥ

original: lupātārastu daṇḍo vā sapādaḥ sārdha eva vā |
analyzed: lupā tāraḥ tu daṇḍaḥ vā sa pādaḥ sa ardhaḥ eva vā
yathā abhimata mānaḥ vā vistarāt bahulāt api
vistāraḥ tri catur pañca bhāga eka aṃśam tu tad ghanam
jānu vyāsaḥ tu uttara ardha cūlikā vā ardhaḥ eva vā
daṇḍikā vipulam tāvat tri pāda ardham tu tat ghanam
valayam jānu nīvram ca daṇḍikā vipula ardhataḥ
malla madhyāt atha ālīna tāla mānam ca yat ghanam
paryantāt jānukāntam ca cūlikā bhāgaḥ eva vā
śayanāt tāvat eva syāt nīvra ālambana sūtrakam

original: kuṭhārikā lalāṭaṃ ca jaghanaṃ caiva sammatam || 59/30 ||
analyzed: kuṭhārikā lalāṭam ca jaghanam ca eva sammatam
pāda viṣkambha kaṇṭhe vā viṣkambha dviguṇe tathā
kūṭa vyāsaḥ lupā madhyam dvi karṇaḥ dviguṇaḥ yathā
tad ardham nālikā ālambam ūrdhve malla agra saṅgatiḥ

original: chidraṃ tannīvramātraṃ vā mallānāṃ tu praveśanam || 59/32 ||
analyzed: chidram tat nīvra mātram vā mallānām tu praveśanam

original: lupā vā sughanaṃ vāpi valayo vaṃśavistaraḥ |
analyzed: lupāḥ vā su ghanam vā api valayaḥ vaṃśa vistaraḥ
tad ardha veśanāt nīvram valayasya vidhīyate
lupa ūrdhve ca phala nyāse pāda bandha sama ardhataḥ

original: ālipya ca dhanurvaṃśaṃ nikṣipya ca tadūrdhvataḥ || 59/35 ||
analyzed: ālipya ca dhanuḥ vaṃśam nikṣipya ca tad ūrdhvatas
chādayet loha loṣṭaiḥ ca bandhayet aṣṭa bandhanaiḥ
lupā madhyāt atha chidram valayasya vidhīyate  /
kriyāyāḥ pañca rekhāḥ tu kalpyāḥ ṣoḍaśa saṃkhyayā
kukṣi vyāsa aṣṭa bhāga ekam māna mātram iti smṛtam
tena mātreṇa sapta ardhāni ardha bhāga vivardhanāt
ā pañcadaśa saṃkhyātāḥ parilekhyāḥ tu ṣoḍaśa
pṛ
lupa anta ūrdhva anta bindu ādim atho vinyasya tadvidham
tad bandu ādi vilekhya atha rūpa lekhā vicakṣaṇaiḥ
prāsādānām imāḥ proktāḥ gṛha ādīnām tu ṣoḍaśa
lupa āgamāt yat dviguṇam yat mānam tena buddhimān
ka uṣṇīṣa āsana sīmābhyām adhas śapharam ālikhet
tasmāt upari mallasya lekhayet tat vicakṣaṇaḥ
malla āyatāt ardha bhāge tri pañcāśīkṛte kramāt
tad tad aṃśa avasānam tu tad tad madhye samālikhet
sarvāsām parilekhānām kramaḥ ayam parikīrtitaḥ
pāñcāla ādi lupānām tu pratyekam procyate dvijāḥ
ṛju kāya yutāḥ malla ādyāḥ rekhā āsanaka agrayoḥ

original: madhye kṛtā kriyārekhā parilekhā tu sā smṛtā || 59/44 ||
analyzed: madhye kṛtā kriyā rekhā parilekhā tu sā smṛtā
lupā ghana pramāṇena ghaṭikām caturaśrikām
vitasti āyāminīm ṛjvīm kṛta madhyama sūtrakām
cūlikā antar varṇa lupā tiryak sūtrasya madhyamām
vinyasya ghaṭikām paścāt chinnām śayana sūtra vat

original: prativarṇe tu ghaṭikāṃ tadvarṇe tāṃ nidhāpayet |
analyzed: prativarṇe tu ghaṭikām tad varṇe tām nidhāpayet
kṣipta sūtrasya śeṣa aṃśa chinne varṇa lupa udare  /
likhet
udara āyāma madhye tu likhite karakam bhavet  /
ghaṭikā lalāṭa madhya stham karakam ca samam yathā
tathā nidhāna ghaṭikām lupodara vaśāyatām
tad lalāṭa ākṛtiḥ chedyā valaya ādyāḥ lupa udayāḥ

original: iṣṭapārśve kṣipecchāyāṃ chidre ca valasya tu || 59/50 ||
analyzed: iṣṭa pārśve kṣipet chāyām chidre ca valasya tu
tad tad ghaṭikayā tad tad madhya saṃhita madhyayā

original: tallalāṭagatacchāyā tāsāṃ tāsāṃ tu vā bhavet || 59/51 ||
analyzed: tad lalāṭa gata chāyā tāsām tāsām tu vā bhavet
daṇḍikā valaya chidra stana jānu uttara ādiṣu
ghaṭikā madhyamāyām achidrāṇi valasya tu
śiraḥ madhya ṛdha madhye ca nyaset muṇḍam tulā upari
suvarṇāḥ madhya bandhāḥ ca kharjūra dala sannibhāḥ
sa vala ṛkṣā vidhātavyā lupā śikharaka antare
śikhara ucca catuṣpañca bhāgaḥ syāt padma tuṅgakam
vedī vistāra tulyam syāt śisvarasya tu nīvrakam
śikharasya tri bhāge tu nāsikā vistaraḥ bhavet
sama tri pādaḥ hi ardhaḥ vā mahā nāsī vinirgamaḥ
tadvat sa tri catur bhāga hīnam skandha aṅga tuṅgakam
śakti dhvajaḥ tad ardhaḥ vā tri pādaḥ vā atha tuṅgakam
sārdha daṇḍaḥ dvi daṇḍaḥ vā kṣudra nāsā viśāla tā

original: vistāre mukhapaṭyaśca daṇḍo vādhyardha eva vā |
analyzed: vistāre mukha paṭyaḥ ca daṇḍaḥ vā adhyardhaḥ eva vā

original: sapādo vā tripādo vā tadghanaṃ syādyatheṣṭataḥ || 59/58 ||
analyzed: sa pādaḥ vā tri pādaḥ vā tat ghanam syāt yatheṣṭataḥ
śakti dhvajasya mūle tu vipulam daṇḍa mānataḥ
mukha paṭa yukta mānaḥ vā tāvat tad kandhara ādayaḥ  /
grīvā antara agra patram tu stambha vyāsa ardha mānakam

original: tridaṇḍaṃ vā prakartavyaṃ galastvardhena vā bhavet |
analyzed: tri daṇḍam vā prakartavyam galaḥ tu ardhena vā bhavet
tāvat śakti dhvaja antam syāt sa patram vā sa śūlakam
netra saṃśliṣṭa mallam tu cūlikā stana maṇḍitam
śayita sthiti paṭṭābhyām aṅgula ādyaiḥ vibhūṣitam

analyzed: yatra yatra vicitram tu prāsāde parikalpayet
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre śikharalakṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma

pṛ
sthūpikā lakṣaṇam vakṣye prāsāda ādeḥ sanātanam
padma uccam vā ardha bhāgaḥ vā tad ūrdhve sthūpikāyati

original: alpīyasī śirordhā vā bhāgoccaṃ vā tribhāgike |
analyzed: alpīyasī śirordhā vā bhāga uccam vā tri bhāgike
loha jam dāru jam vā api sthūpikākīlam iṣyate
ūrdhva bhūmeḥ tu pāda uccam vistāram pādataḥ samam
agram aṅgula vistāram ānupūrvāt kṛśam nayet  /
caturaśram samam kuryāt tri bhāga ekam adhas tatas
vṛttam ūrdhvam adhas kuryāt śikhi pādān nyaset adhas
vistāram triguṇa āyāmam vyāsa uccam pādataḥ samam
āyāmam tu yathāśobham tathā kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
athavā tat śikhāyām adviguṇam kīla dairghyakam
stambha vyāsa ardha vistāram tri catur bhāgaḥ eva vā
agram ardha aṅgulam vyāso śikhi pādam yathāsukham
śikhara ākṛti vat kīlam liṅga chandam atha api vā
dvāviṃśati aṃśake dairghye padmam sārdha aṃśam īritam
sapta aṃśa vistaraḥ tasyāḥ tad ūrdhve ca tu vājanam
vistāram dvi tri bhāgena vetram ardha uccam īritam
tri bhāgaḥ vistaram ca ūrdhve vājanam ca ūrdhvam ucyate
tri bhāgam vistaram ca ūrdhve padmam aṃśa vinirmitam
vistāraḥ nava bhāgaḥ syāt ūrdhve padmam atha aṃśataḥ
pañca aṃśaḥ vistaraḥ tasya vetram ardha vinirmitam
tri bhāgaḥ vistaraḥ tasya karṇaḥ tu aṃśa vinirmitaḥ
vistāreṇa dvi bhāgaḥ syāt ūrdhvam vājanam ardhataḥ
vistāreṇa tri bhāgaḥ syāt vetram aṃśa vinirmitam
vistāram syāt kampakarṇam tu kampakam
pūrvavat padmam ardham syāt vistāram pañca bhāgikam
vājanam ca eka bhāgena ṣaṣ aṃśaḥ vistaraḥ bhavet
ūrdhva padmam adhas yadvat tad ūrdhve vetram aṃśataḥ
vistāraḥ syāt tri bhāgena tad ūrdhve padma kuḍmalam
veda aṃśe tri aṃśa vistāraḥ mūlataḥ parikalpayet
caturaśra dvis aṣṭāśram sa ādhāram vartulam tu vā
athavā anya prakāreṇa sthūpikā bhūṣaṇam nayet
padma kumbham ca pūrva ukta mānena eva samācaret
veda aṃśaiḥ karṇam iti uktaḥ tad ūrdhvam pūrvavat nayet
dvāviṃśati aṃśakāḥ tatra pūrvavat parikalpitam
īdṛś lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam vimānam sampadām padam
viparīte vipatyai syāt kartuḥ kārayituḥ tathā
eva amadau tu śāstra artham ālocya ālekhya buddhimān
sthāpite samyak uddiśya sāmānyam tena kārayet
prārambha kāle sañcitya sarva vastu samācaret
kṛtasya viparīta tvam anarthāya bhavet iha
pramāṇa sahitam ca evam athavā anādikam tu vā
ukta sthāne vidhātavyam sa pramāṇam yathā bhavet
kāmika ādi āgama uktena pramāṇena samācaret
tatra anya ekena kartavyam na uktam ced anya śāstrataḥ
siddhānte na uditam ced tu gāruḍa ādyam pragṛhyatām
tatra api na uditam ced tu vāstuśāstram samāśrayet
vaktra aikyam uttamam proktam tantra aikyam madhyamam bhavet
adhamam srotasām aikyam srotaḥ miśram tu nīcakam
tad abhāvāt nikṛṣṭam syāt evam budhvā samācaret
kāmika ākhyam śiva jñānam sarva sāmānyam īritam
mukhya tvāt sarva śāstrebhyaḥ sarvatra parikīrtitam
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre sthūpikālakṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma
aṣṭapañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
nāla ādi sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ
pṛ
sthāpanam nāla yoga aṅghreḥ sravat ūrdhva upalasya ca
sthūpikā sthāpanam ca eva vakṣye tat śṛṇuta dvijāḥ
ayane ca uttare vā api dakṣiṇe prāpta deśake
avilambena kartavyam su muhūrte śubhe dine
prāsādasya agratas kuryāt uttare veśa deśake
maṇṭapam nava hasta ādi pañca hasta antam eva ca
madhyame vedikām kuryāt nava bhāga eka bhāgataḥ
kuṇḍāni paritas kuryāt bhūta veda eka saṃkhyayā
vṛtta ābham caturaśram vā sarva kuṇḍam samācaret
maṅgala aṅkura kāryam tu pūrvam eva samācaret
athavā tad vihīnam tu sthāpanam ca etat ācaret
maṇḍapam samalaṃkṛtya puṇyāham vācayet tatas
astra ambunā athavā prokṣya nāla ādyam sthāpayet atas
pañcamṛd pañcagavyaiḥ ca śuṃddha udaka samanvitam
ālipya candana ādyaiḥ tu puṣpa mālābhiḥ āvṛtam
kṛta kautuka bandhaḥ tu vañjaiḥ āveṣṭya deśikaḥ

original: sthaṇḍilaṃ vedikordhve vā bhūtale vā samācaret |
analyzed: sthaṇḍilam vedikā ūrdhve vā bhū tale vā samācaret

vastraiḥ darbhaiḥ samāchādya hṛdayena tu mantratas

sthāpayet paritas kumbhān aṣṭau vastra ādi saṃyutān
sa sūtra nuda sampūrṇān indra ādi adhipa saṃyutān
gandha ādyaiḥ arcanām kuryāt hṛdayena vivakṣaṇaḥ
mūrdheṣṭakā pratiṣṭā ced ākāram pūrva śailake

original: sthāpayitvā tadūrdhve tu sthūpikīlaṃ tu vinyaset || 61/21 ||
analyzed: sthāpayitvā tad ūrdhve tu sthūpi kīlam tu vinyaset

vistāra ardham tu tat sarvam nālīgṛham iti smṛtam

analyzed: tāre sapta tri bhāge tu sauṣṭhikam vistaram smṛtam
