tri bhāgaḥ prastaraḥ pañca bhāgaḥ syāt ūrdhva bhāgataḥ
dvi bhāgaḥ prastaraḥ karṇaḥ tri bhāgaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
sārdha vedaiḥ śira sthūpiḥ adhyardhena vinirmitaḥ
catur asram adhiṣṭhānam tadvat kandhara mastakam
catur kūṭa samāyuktam catur koṣṭha samanvitam
kṣudranīḍam upari aṣṭau nāmnā etat svastikam bhavet
tat eva sauṣṭhikam nimnam unnatam koṣṭhakam yadi
antara prastara upetam etat vipula sundaram
aṃśam aṃśa trayam sa tri pāda aṃśam sa aṅghri bhāgikam
bhāga traya vitasti aṃghri prastaram grīva mastakam
pṛ
pāda udaye daśa aṃśe tu dvi tala ādi vimānake
antara prastara upetam kūṭaśālā antam īritam
tat eva koṣṭhakam nimnam unnatam sauṣṭhikam yadi
antara prastara upetam etat kailāsam ucyate
tat eva vartulam vedi kandharam śikharam ghaṭam
vasu kūṭam catuḥ śālā upetam pañjara bhūṣitam
koṣṭhakam nirgamam madhye dvi tri daṇḍena sauṣṭhikam
sama grīva śiraḥ yuktam kūṭa koṣṭhaka saṃyutam
nānā adhiṣṭhāna saṃyuktam nāmnā etat parvataḥ bhavet
tat eva śikharam dikṣu ca ardha koṣṭhaka saṃyutam
caturaśra śiraḥ yuktam catuṣkūṭa samanvitam
nānā adhiṣṭhāna saṃyuktam nāmnā etat svastikam bhavet
tat eva sauṣṭhikam koṣṭham antara prastara anvitam
hāra pañjara saṃyuktam nāmnā kalyāṇam iṣyate
tat eva śikharam ca ardha koṣṭhakam rahitam yadi
caturṇā asi samāyuktam etat pāñcālam iṣyate  /
tat eva aṣṭa aśrakam vedi kandharam śikharam ghaṭam
śikhara aṣṭa mahā nāsi yuktam syāt viṣṇukāntakam
tat eva kūṭaśālānām antara prastaram vinā
tad catur bhāga mānena ca āyatam caturaśrakam

original: āyataṃ ca tathā vedikandharaṃ śikharaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: āyatam ca tathā vedi kandharam śikharam bhavet
sthūpi traya samāyuktam tad nāmnā etat su maṅgalam
tat eva āyata vṛttam ced vedikā kandharam śiraḥ
sarva avayava saṃyuktam etat gāndhāram iṣyate  /
tārāt ardha adhika āyāma saṃyuktam caturaśrakam
dvi aśra vṛtta śiraḥ yuktam netraśālā mukha anvitam
hastipṛṣṭham idam dvi aśram vṛttam vā api masūrakam
catur aśram adhiṣṭhānam vṛttam syāt garbhagehakam
sarva alaṅkāra saṃyuktam nāmnā etat syāt manoharam
tat eva janma ādya ākumbhāt vṛttam ced tu bahis bahis
śeṣam pūrvavat uddiṣṭam proktam īśvaraka antakam
dvi bhūmiḥ evam ākhyātā tri bhūmiḥ adhunā ucyate
prāsādasya tu vistāre sapta aṣṭa aṃśaiḥ vibhājite
bhāgena kūṭa vistāram koṣṭhāt dvi triguṇa āyatam
ūrdhva kṣma tāre ṣaṣ bhāge bhāgaḥ kūṭasya vistaraḥ
koṣṭhakam dviguṇa āyāmam hāram bhāgena kalpayet
ūrdhva bhūmeḥ dvi bhāgena madhyabhadram vidhīyate
daṇḍaḥ sārdha dvi daṇḍaḥ vā harmya nirgamaḥ iṣyate
vimāna uccam tu vibhajet caturviśati saṃkhyayā
dharā talam dvi bhāgena caturbhiḥ pādaḥ īritaḥ
dvi bhāgaḥ prastaraḥ pādaḥ sa tri pāda guṇa aṃśakaiḥ
prastaraḥ sārdha bhāgaḥ syāt bhāgaḥ sārdha tri bhāgakaḥ
sa pāda bhāgaḥ mañcaḥ syāt sārdhakam kaṇṭham īritam  /
śikharam sārdha bandham syāt ekena sthūpikā bhavet

original: kūṭaṃ koṣṭhaṃ ca nīḍaṃ ca vasusaṃkhyāsamīritam || 62/41 ||
analyzed: kūṭam koṣṭham ca nīḍam ca vasu saṃkhyā samīritam
janma ādi sthūpikā antam tu vedāśrakam iti smṛtam

original: dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca cakranīḍāstu ṣoḍaśa || 62/42 ||
analyzed: dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca cakranīḍāḥ tu ṣoḍaśa
yathāśobham tathā nāsyaḥ sarvatra parikīrtitāḥ
śikhare tu mahān āsyaḥ catasraḥ parikīrtitāḥ
koṣṭhakam ca unnatam kūṭam nimnam antara pañcakam
vimāna ākṛtikam nāmnā sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
catur bhāga adhika āyāmam vistāram parikalpayet
vistāre vasu bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyāme dvādaśa aṃśakam  /
tad vistāra ūrdhva mānena vartulam vartanīyakam
masūrakāt śiraḥ ntam tu dvi aṃśa vṛttam tu kārayet
pṛ
athavā śikharam khaṇḍam dvi aśra vṛttam nayet dvijāḥ
tad adhas caturaśram syāt mūlataḥ dvi aśra vṛttake
agrāt pārśva dvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe kuryāt vṛtta dvaya aṃśakam
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍānām vistāraḥ bhāgaḥ iṣyate
koṣṭhakam dviguṇa āyāmam hārāḥ bhāgena kīrtitāḥ
śikhare tu mahān āsyaḥ catasraḥ parikīrtitāḥ
koṣṭhataḥ ca unnatam kūṭam nimnam antara mañcakam
svastikam tat tribhaumam syāt śiva prīti karam bhavet
tāre sapta nava aṃśe tu bhāgaḥ sauṣṭhika vistaraḥ
śālā āyāmaḥ tathā dvi aṃśaḥ hāram bhāgena kalpayet  /
aṣṭa kūṭam tu tat koṣṭham dvādaśā eva vidhīyate
aṣṭa nīḍāni nāḍyaḥ syuḥ nīḍam śobhā vaśena tu
aṣṭa aśra mastakam vedi kandharam ca aṣṭa nāsikam
vimala ākṛtikam nāmnā sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
catur bhāga adhika āyāmam vistārāt parikalpayet
vistāre vasu bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyāme dvādaśa aṃśakaḥ  /
tad vistāra ardha mānena vartulam vartanīyakam

original: masūrakācchiro'ntaṃ tu dvyaśraṃ vṛttaṃ tu kārayet || 62/55 ||
analyzed: masūrakāt śiraḥ ntam tu dvi aśram vṛttam tu kārayet
athavā śikharam kaṇṭham dvi aśra vṛttam nayet dvijāḥ
tad adhas caturaśram syāt mūlataḥ dvi aśra vṛttake
agrāt pārśva dvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe kuryāt arka dvaya aṃśakam
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍa aṃśa vistāraḥ bhāgaḥ iṣyate  /
koṣṭhakam dviguṇa āyāmam hāram bhāgena kīrtitam
ṣaṭ bhāgāḥ syuḥ tad ūrdhve tu pṛṣṭhatas tasya pārśvayoḥ
kṛtvā arka dviguṇa aṃśam tu kūṭa koṣṭha ādi pūrvavat
ūrdhvabhaumam catur bhāgam yathā yukti vaśāt nayet
mastake puratas netram śālā vaktra samanvitam
garbha kūṭa upasaṃyuktam kṣudra nāsī vibhūṣitam

original: kūṭakoṣṭhayutaṃ vātha tadvihīnaṃ tu vā nayet |
analyzed: kūṭa koṣṭha yutam vā atha tad vihīnam tu vā nayet
śikhare dabhra nāsyaḥ syuḥ tisraḥ pāda samanvitāḥ

original: aṣṭakūṭaṃ tu tatkoṣṭhaṃ nīḍaṃ dvādaśa eva hi |
analyzed: aṣṭa kūṭam tu tat koṣṭham nīḍam dvādaśa eva hi
harāyām kṣudranīḍam syāt arka dviguṇa saṃkhyayā
eka ādi ravi bhūmi antam vartanā yuktam eva vā
hasti pṛṣṭham idam nāmnā sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
vistārāḥ tu aṣṭa bhāgāḥ syuḥ āyāmaḥ daśa bhāgikaḥ

original: kūṭaṃ koṣṭhaṃ ca nīḍaṃ ca bhāgena parikalpayet |
analyzed: kūṭam koṣṭham ca nīḍam ca bhāgena parikalpayet
hāra bhāgam tu bhāgena ṣaṣ aṃśam ca ūrdhva bhūmike
tad ūrdhve tu caturbhāgaḥ āyāma uṣṭa aṃśaḥ ādhikaḥ
sa āyatam dvi aśra vṛttam syāt vedikā gala mastakam
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṅgam pūrvavat parikalpayet
etat hasti ādikam saudham gajapṛṣṭham purātanam
navadhā bhājite tāre garbha geham tri bhāgataḥ
bhāgataḥ gṛhapiṇḍī syāt kandharam vā aṃśataḥ bhavet  /
aṃśena āndhārikā jñeyā sauṣṭhikam ca aṃśataḥ bhavet
tri bhāgaḥ koṣṭhaka āyāmaḥ sārdhatas nīḍa vistaraḥ
ṣaṣ aṃśa aṃśam kūṭam tad dviguṇa āyatam
koṣṭha bhāga gataḥ hāraḥ pañjaraiḥ añjitaḥ bhavet
ūrdhva bhūmau tri bhāgena madhye daṇḍena nirgataḥ
ādau talam catur karṇe kūṭam veda āśra mastake

original: aṣṭāśra ūrdhvabhūmau tu sauṣṭhikānāṃ tu mastakam || 62/71 ||
analyzed: aṣṭāśri ūrdhva bhūmau tu sauṣṭhikānām tu mastakam
catur aśram adhiṣṭhānam vasu aśra gala mastakam

original: aṣṭakūṭaṃ tathā koṣṭhaṃ nīḍakaṃ ca tathā bhavet || 62/72 ||
analyzed: aṣṭa kūṭam tathā koṣṭham nīḍakam ca tathā bhavet
kṣudranīḍam tathā api aṣṭau ca aṣṭau syuḥ gala nāsikāḥ
bhadrakoṣṭham idam nāmnā sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
tat eva vartulam karṇakūṭam ūrdhva ūrdhva bhūmike
mastakam tasya vṛttam syāt caturṇā asi samanvitam
pṛ
vṛttakūṭam idam nāmnā sarva avayava saṃyutam
tat eva aṣṭa aṃśa dairghyeṇa sa āyatam caturaśrakam
karṇa kūṭam ca sa āyatam vṛtta mastakam
koṣṭha bhadra vihīnam vā śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
sthūpi traya samāyuktam nāmnā etat syāt sumaṅgalam
pañcādaśa karam vyāsam daśa bhāgena yojayem  /
garbhageham catur bhāgam gāndhārī aṃśena kīrtitā
alīndram aṃśam aṃśena khaṇḍa harmyam bahiṣkramāt
kuryāt kūṭa koṣṭhaka pañjarān
bhāgena koṣṭhaka āyāmam dviguṇam sammatam budhāḥ
ūrdhva bhūmau rasa aṃśe tu bhāgaḥ sauṣṭhika vistaraḥ
koṣṭhakam dviguṇa āyāmam hāram bhāgena yojayet  /

original: tadūrdhve ca caturbhāge bhāgo madhyena nirgamaḥ |
analyzed: tad ūrdhve ca catur bhāge bhāgaḥ madhyena nirgamaḥ
daṇḍena adhyardha daṇḍena dvi daṇḍena athavā bhavet
catur aśram adhiṣṭhānam tadvat kandhara mastakam

original: vasukūṭaṃ tathā nīḍaṃ koṣṭhakaṃ ca tathaiva hi || 62/82 ||
analyzed: vasukūṭam tathā nīḍam koṣṭhakam ca tathā eva hi
ūrdhva iṣṭau lamba nīḍāḥ syuḥ jala sthala samanvitam
nāsikā ādi aṅga saṃyuktam sarva avayava saṃyutam
unnatau kūṭa koṣṭhau ced antara prastara anvitau

original: evaṃ gāndhāramatroktaṃ aṣṭāśraṃ vā galaṃ śiraḥ || 62/84 ||
analyzed: evam gāndhāram atra uktam aṣṭāśram vā galam śiraḥ
tat eva vartulam vedi kandharam śikharam yadi
śeṣam pūrvavat uddiṣṭam nāmnā śrī bhogam iṣyate
vṛttam vṛtta āyatam dvi aśram vṛttam aṣṭa ṣaṣ aśrakam
vṛttam vṛtta āyatam dvi aśram vṛttam aṣṭa ṣaṣ aśrakam
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍaiḥ ca maṇḍitam harmya khaṇḍake
ṛju bhāga viśālāt tu dvi aśra vṛttā itha vartule
bhāgaḥ kaścid bhavet nyūnaḥ bhāgaḥ sarva samaḥ tu vā
aṣṭa aṃśena daśa aṃśena ca ūrdhva aṃśasya udaya aṃśakān
yathāśobham bala vyāptiḥ tathā yuñjīta buddhimān
vakṣyetha munayaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ caturbhauma niketanam
tri catuṣpañca hasta ādiḥ dvi dvi aṅgula vivardhanāt
ekaviṃśati hasta antaḥ vyāsatuṅgaḥ tu pūrvavat
trayodaśa kara vyāsam aṣṭadhā vibhajet tatas
eka aṃśaḥ kūṭa vistāraḥ śālā āyāmaḥ dvi bhāgataḥ
bhāgaḥ pañjara vistāraḥ bhavet ūrdhvam atha uṣṭadhā
prāgvat eva sabhā śālā pañjarāṇām tu kalpanam
ūrdhve ṣaṣ aṃśa bhāgena kūṭa vistāraḥ īritaḥ
dvi bhāgaḥ koṣṭhaka āyāmaḥ nīḍam bhāga ūrdhvam iṣyate  /
ūrdhve guṇa aṃśa bhāgena bhadraḥ daṇḍena madhyame
uccam yat vibhajet dhāmnaḥ navatriṃśati saṃkhyayā
sārdham dvi aṃśam adhiṣṭhānam pañca aṃśaḥ pāda dairghyataḥ
tasya ardha prastara utsedhaḥ sa tri pāda yuga aṃśakaiḥ

original: jaṅghā ca dviguṇaṃ cordhve dvyaṃśena prastarodayaḥ || 62/96 ||
analyzed: jaṅghā ca dviguṇam ca ūrdhve dvi aṃśena prastara udayaḥ
bhāga adhika catur bhāgaḥ upariṣṭāt sva tuṅga tā
syāt sa tri pāda bhāgena prastaraḥ vedikā aṃśataḥ
gala uccam aśvinī bhāgam sārdha vedaiḥ śiraḥ bhavet
śeṣa bhāgaiḥ śikhā mānam harmya antam caturaśrakam
ravi saṃkhyā bhavet sauṣṭhika uṣṭham tadvat sa pañjaram
śikhare veda nāsāḥ syuḥ alpa nāsyaḥ tathā eva ca
sarva alaṅkāra saṃyuktam etat dharmyam su bhadrakam
tat eva kūṭa koṣṭha ādi madhye madhye dvijottamāḥ
mastakam maṇḍala ābham syāt vṛtta ābham syāt tathā śiraḥ
vistāra ardha pramāṇena garbha geha samanvitam
śeṣam dvi aṃśa āvṛtā piṇḍī tadvat andhāra hārakau
nānā masūraka ādi aṅgam nāmnā idam śrīviśālakam
pṛ
pañcādaśa kara vyāse navadhā bhājite sati
garbhageham tribhiḥ bhāgaiḥ gṛha piṇḍaḥ tad aṃśataḥ
alindam paritas ṛṃśena khaṇḍa harmyam atha aṃśataḥ
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍānām bhāgena ekena vistaraḥ
vistāra triguṇa āyāmaḥ sva vyāsa sama nirgamaḥ
śālā madhye mahā nāsī bhāga madhya vinirgamaḥ
bhadra koṣṭhaka nīḍānām antara ardhena bhārakam
tad ūrdhve vasu bhāge tu bhāgam aṭṭasya vistaram
koṣṭhakasya tu vistāraḥ tathā eva parikīrtitaḥ
āyāmaḥ tu dvi bhāgena tad madhye nīḍam aṃśataḥ
tad ūrdhve rasa bhāge tu kūṭam aṃśena koṣṭhakam
vistāra dviguṇa āyāmaḥ tad madhya īrdhena pañjaram
ūrdhva bhūmiḥ catur bhāgaḥ madhye daṇḍena nirgataḥ
aṣṭāśram karṇakūṭam syāt koṣṭhakam karkarīkṛtam
mahā śikharam aṣṭa āśrama ṣṭanāsyāḥ vibhūṣitam
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍānām saṃkhyā pūrvavat īritā
asya api utsedha bhāgam tu pūrvavat parikalpayet
bhadrakoṣṭham idam nāmnā vedabhaumam divaukasām
saptādaśa kara vyāsam daśa bhāgaiḥ vibhājayet
nālibhedam catur bhāgam bhāgena andhārikām nayet  /
paritolindram aṃśena paritas khaṇḍa harmyakam
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍam ca bhāgena parikalpayet
śālā āyāmaḥ dvi bhāgaḥ syāt hāraḥ śeṣeṇa kīrtitā
jalam vihāya ca ūrdhve ca vasu bhāgaiḥ vibhājite

original: bhāgena sauṣṭhi bhāgābhyāṃ śālā bhāgena pañjaram |
analyzed: bhāgena sauṣṭhi bhāgābhyām śālā bhāgena pañjaram
tad ūrdhve rasa bhāge tu bhāgaḥ sauṣṭhika vistaraḥ
dviguṇaḥ koṣṭhaka āyāmaḥ hārāyām kṣudra pañjaram

original: tadūrdhvaṃ tu tribhāge tu madhyāddaṇḍena nirgamaḥ || 62/116 ||
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam tu tri bhāge tu madhyāt daṇḍena nirgamaḥ
catur aśram adhiṣṭhānam aṣṭa aśram mastakam galam
ravi koṣṭham tathā śālā pañjarāṇām atha aṣṭakam
lamba pañjaram aṣṭau hi kṣudranīḍam dvis aṣṭakam
gala nāsā aṣṭa saṃyuktam koṣṭhakam kiñcid unnatam
nānā masūraka stambha vedi jāla ādi maṇḍitam
sa upapīṭham adhiṣṭhānam kevalam vā masūrakam
svastika ākāra saṃyuktam nāsikābhiḥ ca saṃyutam
pūrvavat tuṅga bhāgam syāt etat nāmnā jalāvaham
nava paṅkti kara vyāse daśa bhāga vibhājite
garbhavāsaḥ catur bhāgaḥ bhāgena gṛha piṇḍikā
kandharam paritas ṛṃśena paritas khaṇḍa harmyakam
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍānām vistāraḥ bhāgaḥ eva hi
dvi aṃśena koṣṭhaka āyāmaḥ hārāḥ bhāgena sammatam
kūṭa koṣṭham ca nīḍam ca avāntara prastara anvitam
jala sthalam vihāya ūrdhve ca aṣṭa aṃśam sauṣṭhikam bhavet
tathā dviguṇa śālā syāt tayoḥ madhye tu pañjaram
tad ūrdhve rasa bhāge tu kūṃṭa koṣṭha ādi pūrvavat

original: vijayasya tathā proktaṃ śeṣamūrdhve tu yojayet || 62/125 ||
analyzed: vijayasya tathā proktam śeṣam ūrdhve tu yojayet  /
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṅgam pūrvavat saṃkhyayā viduḥ
mahānīḍam dvis aṣṭa syuḥ nāmnā etat bhadrakūṭakam
tat eva anyat alaṅkāram koṣṭha madhye tu bhadrakam
prati grīva śiraḥ yuktam etat nāmnā manoharam
tat eva anyat alaṅkāram vedāśram kandharam śiraḥ
nāmnā avantikam iti uktam śambhoḥ mandiram uttamam
tri sapta hasta vistāre daśa bhāga vibhājite
veda aṃśaḥ garbha geham syāt aṃśena gṛha piṇḍikā
andhāra aṃśena bhāgena maṅgala aṅgam prakalpayet
kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍam ca pūrvavat parikalpayet
pṛ
maṇḍitam vedikā śāla toraṇa pramukhaiḥ api
jala sthalam vihāya ūrdhve vasu bhāgaiḥ vibhājite
śālā sauṣṭhika nīḍa ādyam pūrvavat parikalpayet
ūrdhva bhūmiḥ ṣaṣ aṃśā syāt bhāgaḥ sauṣṭhika vistaraḥ
śālā āyāmaḥ dvi bhāgena nīḍa tāra ūrdhva bhāgataḥ
ūrdhva bhūmi dvi bhāgena madhyabhadraḥ vidhīyate  /
daṇḍena nirgamaḥ tasya sārdha daṇḍa dvayena tu
grīvā nāḍī viśālā syāt vṛtta vedi samanvitam
vṛtta ābha śikhara grīva mahānāsī catuṣṭayam
alpa aṣṭa nālikā upetam asya mūla tale dvijāḥ
samam ca uttuṅga śikharam kūṭa koṣṭhaka nīḍakam
uttaṅga śālā dvi talam mūle tu adhika kūṭakam
caturaśra aṣṭa vṛtta ābhāḥ karṇakūṭāḥ tu mūlataḥ
nānā masūraka stambha vedikā jāla toraṇam
nānā sukha āvaham proktam devānām āspadam matam
pañcabhaumam aham vakṣye śrūyatām muni puṅgavāḥ
tuṅge ṣaṣṭha aṣṭa bhāge tu sa tri bhāgam dvi bhāgikaḥ
masūraka uccam ākhyātam pādaḥ sa ardha śaraiḥ bhavet  /
sārdha dvi bhāgaiḥ bimbaḥ syāt sa aṅghri bhūtaiḥ ca pādakaḥ
bhāga dvayena sa ardhena prastaraḥ parikīrtitaḥ
pañca bhāgena pādaḥ syāt mañcasya aṅghriḥ dvi pāda bhāj
dvi bhāgaḥ prastaraḥ bhavet
sa ardha vedaiḥ punar pādaḥ sa tri pāda aṃśakena ca
prastara udayaḥ iṣṭaḥ syāt vitardiḥ ca eka bhāgataḥ

original: dvibhāgaḥ kandharaḥ proktaḥ sāṅghrivedaiḥ śiro bhavet |
analyzed: dvi bhāgaḥ kandharaḥ proktaḥ sa aṅghri vedaiḥ śiraḥ bhavet
vibhāgaḥ kumbhaḥ iti uktaḥ bhāgāḥ ca evam prakīrtitāḥ
ṣaṣ tala ādyam kramāt vakṣye pañca bhūmi aṃśakaiḥ saha
pañcabhaumasya dhāmnaḥ syāt mūladhāmā ūrdhvatas kramāt
prastaraḥ tat adhiṣṭhānam mānena eva prakīrtitam
rasa bhāgena pādaḥ syāt adhiṣṭhāna tri bhāgataḥ
ṣaḍbhaumam evam ākhyātam prāyas vistāra bhāga yuj
tad adhas sārdha sapta aṃśaiḥ sa pādaguṇa bhāgakaiḥ
stambham masūrakam kuryāt tāre rudra arka bhājite
sapta bhaumam idam khyātam vimānam sārvadeśikam
tad adhas munimiḥ sārdham guṇa aṃśaiḥ pāda kuṭṭimau
dharmarudra arka bhāgaiḥ tu trayodaśa vibhāgakaiḥ
aṣṭa bhaumam idam proktam evam prājñaiḥ muni īśvarāḥ
tad adhas sārdha sapta aṃśaiḥ sa tri bhāga agni bhāgike
stambham ca kuryāt tāra iṃśāḥ prāk udīritāḥ
evam nava talam proktam daśabhaumam iha ucyate
tad adhas aṣṭa yuga aṃśaiḥ tu

original: tāre pūrvoktabhāgāḥ syurmanubhāgaṃ tu vā matam |
analyzed: tāre pūrva ukta bhāgāḥ syuḥ manu bhāgam tu vā matam
tad adhas sārdha vasu aṃśaiḥ sa pāda yuga bhāgike  /
pādam masūrakam kuryāt bhāgān aṣṭādaśa antakān
pūrva uktam kalpayet evam ekādaśa talam matam
tad adhas gṛha nanda aṃśaiḥ pāda aṃśa talakam bhavet
tāre ṣoḍaśa bhāga ādi yāvat arka dvaya aṃśakam  /
saṅkalpya tatra kūṭa ādīn yojayet deśika uttamaḥ
dvi tri vedeṣu ṣaṣ bhāgaiḥ prāc ukta aṃśaiḥ tu vā gṛham
gṛha piṇḍī alindra tārān ca garbha bhāgāt bahis nayet
prāsādasya tu vistāram kṛtvā ṣoḍaśa bhāgikam
veda bhāgaiḥ gṛham proktam piṇḍī bhāgena nirmitam
pañca alindram ca ṣaṣ kuḍyam pratyekam ca ardha bhāgataḥ
athavā āyāma vistāre caturviṃśati bhājite
garbha gehaḥ dvi bhāgena gṛha piṇḍaḥ tu bhāgataḥ
pṛ
pañcālindram tathā kuḍyam yojayet bhāgataḥ bahis
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṅgam pūrvavat parikalpayet
prāsādasya tu vistāram kṛtvā tri nava bhāgikam
pañcabhiḥ garbha geham syāt śeṣam pūrvavat īritam
anyeṣu api ca bhāgeṣu prakalpayet
evam dvādaśa bhaumam syāt tat ūrdhvam adhunā ucyate  /
pūrva mānāt adhiṣṭhāne pāda mānam atha ardhakam
stambha māne tu yuktyā eva yojayet adhikam guruḥ
ā ṣoḍaśa talam samyak ārabhya dvādaśa kṣmakam
aṃśāt viṃśati bhāga ādīn ekatriṃśa aṃśaka avadhi
kalpayet yajamāna icchā vaśena eva viśeṣataḥ
bhāga ardhena athavā alindam śeṣam kuḍyeṣu yojayet  /
yugma ayugma karaiḥ vā atha kārayet evam eva tu

original: yugmāṃśe tu vibhāge vā kūṭavyāsā dvirāyatā || 62/165 ||
analyzed: yugma aṃśe tu vibhāge vā kūṭa vyāsā dvis āyatā
śālā tu catur aṃśaiḥ vā yugma ayugma aṃśakaiḥ tathā
talam ekam bhavet grāsam khaṇḍa harmyam catur tale
dvi catur pañca ṣaṣ sapta bhūmau grāsam bhavet dvijāḥ
tri talam ca aṣṭa bhaume tu nava paṅkti tale tathā
catuṣpañca tala vyāsaḥ rudra āditya tale bhavet
ṣaṣ talam vasu bhaume ca caturdaśa tale tathā
sapta bhaumam samākhyātam ṣoḍaśa aṣṭa eka bhūmikam
mūlataḥ kūṭa koṣṭha ādi kartum samyak mahī tale

original: tale gṛhe tu kūṭādīn yathāyuktyā prayojayet |
analyzed: tale gṛhe tu kūṭa ādīn yathā yuktyā prayojayet
kūṭa śālā ādibhiḥ bhedaiḥ pūrvam ākhyā yathā uditā
dhāma sthaiḥ bhedakaiḥ yuktā vyākhyā pūrvavat īritā
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre ekabhūmyādilakṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma ṣaṣṭiḥ
paṭalaḥ
vimānānām atho vakṣye ūrdhva aśma sthāpanam param
yat dravyeṇa avasānam syāt tat mayā ca iṣṭakā matā
ādya iṣṭakā ukta mānāḥ syuḥ aṣṭa aṃśa ūnāḥ tu vā matāḥ
sthāpanam vakṣyamāṇena mārgeṇa eva samācaret  /
aṅkura arpaṇa kāryam tu prāk eva vidhinā caret
maṇḍapasya vimānasya saumyāyām pūrvatas diśi
pañca eka kuṇḍa yuktaḥ vā tad saṃkhya sthaṇḍila anvitaḥ
madhyame vedikā yuktaḥ darbha mālā ādi śobhitaḥ
paścāt śilpinam udvāsya gomayena upalepayet

original: bhojanaṃ bhūsurāṇāṃ ca puṇyāhaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ tathā || 63/5 ||
analyzed: bhojanam bhūsurāṇām ca puṇyāham prokṣaṇam tathā
vāstu homam purā kṛtvā sthaṇḍilam kārayet tatas
aṣṭa droṇaiḥ tad ardhaiḥ vā śālibhiḥ ca tad ardhakaiḥ
taṇḍulaiḥ ca tilaiḥ lājaiḥ darbhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ hṛdā guruḥ
śayyām ca kalpayitvā atha pañca mṛd pañcagavyakaiḥ
prakṣālya ca iṣṭakām sthūpim yajet gandha ādibhiḥ hṛdā
svara ādyam veda varṇam tu pūrva ādi kramaśas likhet
pṛ
iṣṭakāsu hṛdā mantrī śvetacandana carcitaiḥ

original: śayyāyāṃ sthāpayitvā tu tadvāme sthūpikāṃ nyaset || 63/9 ||
analyzed: śayyāyām sthāpayitvā tu tad vāme sthūpikām nyaset
kautukam bandhayitvā tu vastreṇa āchādya deśikaḥ
paritoṣṭau ghaṭān nyastvā lokeśa āśāsu tān hṛdā
saṃpūjya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ mūrtti mūrti adhipān nyaset

original: nandāṃ bhadrāṃ jayāṃ riktāṃ pūrṇāṃ caiveṣṭakāsu ca || 63/11 ||
analyzed: nandām bhadrām jayām riktām pūrṇām ca eva iṣṭakāsu ca
nyaset sthūpyām sa deśam ca homa karma samācaret
kṛtvā kuṇḍa ādi saṃskāram agni kārya ukta mārgataḥ
samidh ājya anna lājaiḥ ca tila ādyaiḥ ca kramāt hunet
palāśa udumbara aśvattha vaṭāḥ pūrva ādi dikṣu ca

original: pradhāne'pi palāśaḥ syātsa ca sarvatra vā mataḥ |
analyzed: pradhāne pi palāśaḥ syāt sa ca sarvatra vā mataḥ
śiva brahma aṅga mantraiḥ ca śata saṃkhyām tu homayet  /
prabhāte tu guruḥ snātaḥ kṛta mantra ādi vigrahaḥ

original: iṣṭveṣṭakābhiḥ sthūpiṃ ca kumbhānkuṇḍaṃ ca pālakān || 63/15 ||
analyzed: iṣṭvā iṣṭakābhiḥ sthūpim ca kumbhān kuṇḍam ca pālakān

original: kṛtvā ca niṣkṛtiṃ pūrṇāṃ pūjāṃ santuṣṭamānasaḥ |
analyzed: kṛtvā ca niṣkṛtim pūrṇām pūjām santuṣṭa mānasaḥ
pañca niṣka ādi samprāpta dakṣiṇaiḥ mūrtiṃdhārakaiḥ
daivajña ādyaiḥ tribhiḥ sārdham śilpinā ca guru uttamaḥ
gṛhītvā ca iṣṭakām sthūpim kṛta dhāma pradakṣiṇaḥ
āruhya śikharam mūrdhni vinyaset iṣṭakāḥ kramāt
ādya iṣṭakā ukta rītyā eva madhye ratna ādi vinyaset
tad ūrdhve sthāpayet sthūpim mūlamantreṇa deśikaḥ
tad mūlam kumbha toyaiḥ ca prokṣayet sva sva mantrataḥ
sthūpikā aṃśam vihāya adhas bandhayet iṣṭakā ādibhiḥ

original: evaṃ yaḥ kārayenmartyaḥ sa puṇyāṃ gatimāpnuyāt || 63/20 ||
analyzed: evam yaḥ kārayet martyaḥ sa puṇyām gatim āpnuyāt
iti kāmika ākhye mahā tantre mūrdheṣṭakāsthāpanavidhiḥ nāma
ekaṣaṣṭitamaḥ paṭalaḥ
liṅgasya lakṣaṇam vakṣye śrūyatām dvijasattamāḥ

original: dvividhaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ liṅgaṃ pakvaṃ cāpakvameva ca |
analyzed: dvividham mṛṇmayam liṅgam pakvam ca apakvam eva ca
ābhicārāya pakvam tu dvi hastāt upari sthitam
śveta ādyām mṛdam ādāya payaḥ taila ādibhiḥ vṛtām
yava godhūma cūrṇam tu payaḥ vṛkṣa tvacā anvitam
picchilena su gandhena cūrṇena āloḍya sat mṛdam
śrīveṣṭakam sarjarasam tathā guggulu śarkarā
pañca niryāsa saṃyuktām atha loka prasiddhitaḥ

original: eteṣāṃ saṃkhyayā tulyāṃ mṛdaṃ gṛhṇīta deśikaḥ || 64/5 ||
analyzed: eteṣām saṃkhyayā tulyām mṛdam gṛhṇīta deśikaḥ
girau giri samīpe vā vaneṣu upavaneṣu ca
nadī tīre drume śaile liṅga artham dravyam āharet

original: yāḥ suvarṇā ghanāḥ snigdhā nimagnā nagasandhiṣu |
analyzed: yāḥ suvarṇāḥ ghanāḥ snigdhāḥ nimagnāḥ naga sandhiṣu
sarit salila nirdhūta pavitra antar jala uṣitāḥ
vṛkṣa chāyā upagūḍhāḥ ca tīrtha āśrama samāśrayāḥ
āyāma vyāsa nāha āḍhyāḥ raktāḥ pītāḥ sita asitāḥ

original: manoramāḥ śilā grāhyā yauvanāḥ śreyase matāḥ |
analyzed: manoramāḥ śilāḥ grāhyāḥ yauvanāḥ śreyase matāḥ
vāta ātapa anala ālīḍhāḥ mṛdu īkṣāra udaka āśritāḥ
karma antara gṛhītāḥ yāḥ atyanta upahatāḥ ca yāḥ
antya jānīta sevyāḥ yāḥ nadī śaila taṭe sthitāḥ
pṛ
rūkṣāḥ vṛddha ati bālāḥ ca varjanīyāḥ śilāḥ drumāḥ
khādiraḥ candanaḥ sālaḥ madhūkaḥ sarala usanaḥ
bilvaḥ kadambaḥ khadiraḥ devadāruḥ ca śiṃśupā
panasa arjunau aśokaḥ ca kṣīriṇaḥ raktacandanaḥ
snigdha varṇāḥ mahā kāyāḥ śubha dāḥ śubha deśa jāḥ
dravya saṃgrahaṇam kuryāt vakṣyamāṇam viśeṣataḥ

original: tacchailaṃ navahastāntaṃ pārthivaṃ ca tathā matam |
analyzed: tat śailam nava hasta antam pārthivam ca tathā matam
tri aṃśena dāru jam loham asya ardhena uttamam matam
ṣaṣ ṣaṣ aṅgula hāni antam madhyamam mānam ucyate
tad alābhe tu tad madhye tu ekaika aṅgula hānitaḥ  /
mānam śatam ca navati hasta yukta pramāṇataḥ
dhāmagarbha pramāṇena adhamam liṅgam ucyate

original: garbhārdhaṃ madhyamaṃ jñeyaṃ pañcatryaṃśaṃ paraṃ bhavet |
analyzed: garbha ardham madhyamam jñeyam pañca tri aṃśam param bhavet
madhyama iṣṭa vibhāgena nava liṅga udayāni ca
jyeṣṭhe jyeṣṭhāt samārabhya pāda hrāsāt dvijottamāḥ
mānāni ca trayastriṃśat liṅgānām kīrtitāni tu
athavā anya prakāreṇa garbha mānam vidhīyate
adhamam garbha pādam syāt tri pādam jyeṣṭa mānakam
pūrvavat madhyamam kṛtvā trayastriṃśat pramāṇakam
āya ādi śuddhi siddhi artham bhajet māna aṅgulena tu
bhāgam vā vibhajet teṣām śadhi artham tat iha ucyate
ṣoḍaśa aṃśam samārabhya caturviṃśati saṃyutam
śata aṃśam vibhajet tatra ca eka aṃśam yojayet guruḥ
āya ādi śubha saṃyuktam saḍaṃśam vā purā mayā
bhūmilambe samādiṣṭam na uktam vistara bhīruṇā
sa tri bhāgaiḥ tris aṃśaiḥ tu sureḍyā an āḍhyake dvijāḥ
āḍhyam sarva samam liṅgam viśiṣṭam parikīrtitam
teṣām tad madhyama iṣṭa aṃśe pratyekam navadhā bhajet
liṅga āyāme dina aṃśe tu sapta aṣṭa nava bhāgataḥ  /
brahma viṣṇu īśa bhāgānām utsedhāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
sarveṣām api sāmānyam liṅgam etat udāhṛtam
varṇānām brāhmaṇa ādīnām krameṇa parikalpayet
vardhamāna śiva ādhikye sarva jāti arhake mate
liṅga āyāmam tridhā kṛtvā brahma aṃśaḥ tu eka bhāgataḥ  /
viṣṇu aṃśaḥ tadvat evam syāt rudra aṃśaḥ bhāgaḥ eva vā
eka aṃśa sadṛśaḥ tāraḥ sama khaṇḍaḥ yaḥ īrtitaḥ
catuṣpañca ṣaṣ aṃśam tu pañca ṣaṣ sapta bhāgikam
ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa aṃśakam sapta bhāga aṣṭa nava bhāgikam
vardhamānam idam proktam vipra ādīnām anukramāt
sapta sapta aṣṭa bhāgam tu pañca pañca ṣaṣ aṃśakam
veda veda śara aṃśam tu guṇa anala yuga aṃśakam
evam śiva adhikam proktam dvijātīnām anukramāt
kṛtvā nava aṃśam liṅga uccam bandha bandha guṇa aṃśakam
ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭaka nāham tu vṛtta iṣṭa āśre yuga āśrake
trairāśikam idam śāstre svastikam tu adhunā ucyate
navadhā liṅga mānena dvi aṃśam madhye guṇa aṃśakam
vṛtte yuga aṃśakam dairghyam śūdre pi etat ca śasyate
trairāśikam tu sarveṣām sarva kāma pradam matam
āḍhyānāḍhyasureḍyam ca dhārāliṅgam sahasrakam
sarveṣām brāhmaṇa ādīnām api sāmānyam īritam
eka ādi dhārayā vṛddham śata dhārā avasānakam
dhārāliṅgam praśastam syāt sahasram adhunā ucyate
sama khaṇḍe śiva āyāme rudra bhāga vinirmite
eka adhikam navati aṃśe viṣama aṃśa niveśitam
pṛ
sa eka sāhasra liṅgānām nava bhāga uccam eva vā
mukha liṅgam atho vakṣye bhukti mukti phala pradam
catur mukham tat tri mukham eka vaktra yutam bhavet
yā ucca tārā dvi bhaktā sā guṇa tyāgāt adhas śiraḥ
lalāṭam nāsikāḥ cibuka uṣṭham ca vartayet
grīvā bhuja upaniṣkrāntiḥ idānīm procyate budhāḥ
liṅga āyāme vikāra aṃśe liṅga viṣkambhataḥ bahis
catur dikṣu caturvaktra nirgamāya prakalpayet
śeṣam liṅga ākṛtiḥ kāryā viṣṇu bhāga anusārataḥ
jānau praviṣṭā grīvā syāt catur aṅgula mānataḥ  /
tadvat dīrgha samāyuktam śeṣam yat pratimokta vat
nandamātrā ādikam bhaktvā ṣaṣ tālam tu caturvidham
nirgama artham catur dikṣu veṣṭanam parikalpayet
pādona sapta mātram tu vistāreṇa prakalpayet
tri mukham vā tad ucca aṃśam ṛtu vat bhājayet samam
bhāga ardhena bhuja skandhau ṣaṣ aṅgula viniḥsṛtau
tri bhāgena bhavet grīvā makuṭam syāt dvi bhāgataḥ
caturdhā vibhajet śeṣam bhāga mātra pramāṇataḥ
śiraḥ lalāṭa nāsāḥ ca vaktram cibuka saṃyutam
viṣṇu aṃśa tāra sadṛśam makuṭam ca vivartayet
nirgama aṃśāḥ mukhānām syuḥ pratyekam vasu mātrakaiḥ
eka vaktre traya ucca aṃśe sārdha ūna mukha dairghyakam
makuṭam ca eka bhāgam syāt avaśiṣṭe dvidhā kṛte
grīvā skandhau kramaṇā eva vardhayet deśika uttamaḥ
mukhasya nirgamam kuryāt nava mātra pramāṇataḥ
aṣṭa adhika śate liṅga dairghye dairghya aṃśaḥ iṣyate  /
śiraḥ vartanam eteṣām vakṣye tat bahudhā matam
puṇḍarīka viśāla ākhyam śrīvatsam śatru mardanam
bhavanti puṇḍarīka ādi bhedāḥ bhinna phala āptaye
śriyam
prāpnoti sarvān śrīvatsāt vijayam śatru mardanāt
prajā vṛddhi karam yasmāt prajā lābhaḥ prajāpatiḥ
tri bhāga vardhanāt ardhacandram candra samaḥ yatas
prāptam āyuḥ param prāpta lokam saubhāgyam uttamam
ṣaṣ bhāga vardhanāt bhūti nimittam trapuṣa ākṛtiḥ

original: sādhyāḥ siddhāśca maruto yasmādbhūtiṃ parāṃ gatāḥ || 64/57 ||
analyzed: sādhyāḥ siddhāḥ ca marutaḥ yasmāt bhūtim parām gatāḥ
athavā anya prakāreṇa śirovartanam ucyate
aṣṭadhā vibhajet tāram adhyardhena vivartanāt
chatraśīrṣam iti proktam trapuṣā ābham nigadyate
ṣaṣ aṃśaiḥ trapuṣam vā syāt sārdha dvi aṃśena vartanam
candra khaṇḍa nibham proktam vistārāt tri aṃśa vartitam
budbuda ābham śiraḥ sārdha tri aṃśena aṣṭa vibhājite
etāni sarva liṅgānām sanātana śirāṃsi hi
āya ādi śubha saṃyuktam liṅgam sarva artha sādhakam
aśubhe tu aśubham vidyāt tad artham upari nyaset
eka hasta iṅgulam syāt ca dvi tri haste tri mātrakam
catuṣpañca kare pañca ṣaṣ saptasu ca saptakam
śirovartana bhāge tu caturthe vā ṣaṣ aṃśake  /
ekam dvayam trayam dadyāt brahma bhāgāt krameṇa tu
śirovartana bhāgasya tri aṃśam pūjā aṃśaka upari
ṣaḍbhāge tu tad ucchraye
eka aṃśam yojayet hi imān liṅge dvi aṃśam tu madhyame
pṛ
tri bhāgam uttame liṅge yojayet vā dvijottamāḥ
kevalam vā śiraḥ mānam adhiropya vivartayet  /
śirasā miśritam bhāgam pārśvayoḥ avalambya ca
vṛtta dvayam tu tad mānāt ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ nayet  /
ūrdhva deśe śiraḥ madhye tṛtīyam maṇḍalam nyaset
maṇḍalaiḥ ca tribhiḥ matsya dvayam atra upajāyate
tat matsya ānana puccha stha sūtrayoḥ yatra saṅgatiḥ
tatra sthitvā tribhiḥ vā asya vartanīyam śiraḥ śubham
jāti liṅga vibhedena śiraḥ ca dvividham matam
chatra ākāram tu viprāṇām kukkuṭa aṇḍa nibham nṛpe
vaiśyānām ardhacandra ābham śūdrāṇām trapuṣam bhavet
aparam candram api anya liṅga bhedena kathyate
caturvidham syāt chatra ābham tatra ādye sama liṅgake
śaiva ādhikye tṛtīyam syāt caturtham vardhamānake
anyonya saṅkaraḥ tu eṣām aśubhāya prakalpitaḥ
svāyaṃbhuva ādi liṅgānām lakṣaṇam na iṣyate dvijāḥ

original: kintu teṣāṃ vibhāgaṃ tu prasiddhoktyā samācaret || 64/75 ||
analyzed: kintu teṣām vibhāgam tu prasiddha uktyā samācaret
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam liṅgam sarva artha sādhakam
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre liṅgalakṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi aṅkura arpaṇa lakṣaṇam
sarva maṅgala kārya ādau kartavyam maṅgala aṅkuram
uttamaḥ madhyamaḥ nīcaḥ trividhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: navāhe vātha saptāhe pañcāhe tridine'pi vā || 65/2 ||
analyzed: nava ahe vā atha sapta ahe pañca ahe tri dine api vā
sadyas uṅkura arpaṇam vā api śivam saṃpūjya ca ārabhet
sāya ādi dinam ārabhya devānām aṅkura arpaṇam
tad dine tu manuṣyāṇām devānām api saṃmatam
bījānām adhipaḥ tasmāt rātrau tu nirvapet
divākāle na kartavyam kṛtam ced kartṛ nāśanam
sadanasya agra ge deśe vāme vā api agra dakṣiṇe  /
tri hastam tu samārabhya kuryāt rudra kara antakam
maṇḍapam tatra kartavyam pūrva saṅkalpita ithavā
aiśe vā yāga śālāyām kuryāt tīrtha aṅkura arpaṇam
vitāna dhvaja saṃyukta dvāra toraṇa saṃyute
darbha mālā samāyukte muktā dāma samanvite
puṇyāha prokṣaṇam kuryāt athavā astreṇa śodhayet  /
śarāvaḥ pālikāḥ ca eva ghaṭikāḥ ca tridhā smṛtāḥ

original: sarāvāḥ kṛtaṃ yadutkṛṣṭaṃ vargābhyāṃ madhyamaṃ bhavet || 65/9 ||
analyzed: sarāvāḥ kṛtam yat utkṛṣṭam vargābhyām madhyamam bhavet  /
kaniṣṭhikam ca ekavargaiḥ teṣām lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmraṃ nirmitaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ smṛtam || 65/10 ||
analyzed: sauvarṇam rājatam tāmram nirmitam mṛṇmayam smṛtam
pālikā ānana vistāraḥ manu aṅgulam udāhṛtam
ekaika aṅgula hīnam syāt madhyame
vistāre samam utsedhaḥ pāda tāraḥ tad ardhataḥ
vistāre kauśika aṃśena paritas śeṣaḥ ucyate  /
pṛ
vistārasya tri bhāga eka vartitam bilam ucyate
vistāra yuga bhāga ekaḥ daṇḍa vistāraḥ iṣyate  /
ghaṭikā kalaśa ākārā daṇḍa pādau tu pūrvavat
pālikā ardha pramāṇena tri pādaḥ vā śarāvakam
yathā sambhava mānam vā pālikā ādi prakīrtitam

original: bhinnaṃ kṛṣṇañca suṣiraṃ durgandhaṃ ca purāṇakam |
analyzed: bhinnam kṛṣṇam ca suṣiram durgandham ca purāṇakam
chinna liṅga ādi saṃyuktam varjayet aṅkura arpaṇe
śarāvam brahma daivatyam pālikā viṣṇu devatā
ghaṭikā aiśāna saṃyuktā teṣu tān arcayet guruḥ
pṛthak ṣoḍaśa saṃkhyātam uttamam parikīrtitam
madhyamam manu saṃkhyātam daśataḥ kanyasam bhavet  /
uttama kramam evam syāt aṣṭa ṣaṣ veda saṃkhyayā
madhyama kramam uddiṣṭam tri dvi ekaiḥ kanyasam bhavet
sarveṣām sthāpanam vakṣye śrūyatām dvijasattamāḥ
gomaya ālepanam kṛtvā piṣṭa cūrṇaiḥ vicitrayet
pañcagavyena saṃprokṣya sūtra pātam atha ācaret
sūtra vyāptiḥ daśa prācyām daśa udīcyām tathā eva ca

original: nava madhye ca saṃgṛhya paritaḥ ṣoḍaśaṃ tyajet |
analyzed: nava madhye ca saṃgṛhya paritas ṣoḍaśam tyajet
catur dikṣu ca catvāri dvārāṇi dvi padāni ca
koṇe dvādaśa saṃkhyāni teṣu syuḥ pālikā ādayaḥ
madhye nava pade padmam pālikām koṇa deśake
ghaṭikāḥ dvāra vāme syuḥ śarāvāḥ dvāra dakṣiṇe
evam dvāreṣu ca anyeṣu kalpayet deśika uttamaḥ
prāc sūtram vasu saṃkhyātam udak sūtram tathā eva ca
madhye vyoma padam hitvā paritoṣṭa padam tyajet  /
madhyame soma kumbhaḥ syāt pūrva paṅkti dvaye punar
pālikāḥ manu saṃkhyātāḥ paścime ghaṭikāḥ matāḥ
tad antarāla ṣaṭke ca dakṣedakṣe śarāvakāḥ

original: kumbhapārśve dvayaṃ proktaṃ pūrvasmin paścime dvijāḥ || 65/27 ||
analyzed: kumbha pārśve dvayam proktam pūrvasmin paścime dvijāḥ
śreṣṭha madhyamam evam syāt uttama adhamam ucyate
prāc sūtram muni saṃkhyātam udak sūtram tathā eva ca

original: madhye vedapadaṃ muktvā tatra kumbhaṃ niveśayet |
analyzed: madhye veda padam muktvā tatra kumbham niveśayet
īśāna koṇāt ārabhya pālikāḥ bāhya paṅktike  /
rākṣasyām diśi koṇa antam śarāvāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: antardiśāsu dvau dvau vā vāyāvīśe parā matāḥ || 65/30 ||
analyzed: antar diśāsu dvau dvau vā vāyau īśe parāḥ matāḥ
utkṛṣṭa kanyasam proktam madhyama uttamam ucyate
pañca pañca padam kṛtvā madhyame sthāpayet ghaṭam
catur dikṣu ca koṇeṣu sthāpayet pālikāḥ bahis
kumbha bāhye ca ghaṭikāḥ sva antara iṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
śarāvam sthāpayet bāhye pālikānām atha antare
madhyame jyeṣṭham ākhyātam madhya madhyam atha ucyate
ṣoḍhā prāc agra sūtrāṇi tathā eva uttara gāni ca

original: madhye navapadaṃ kṛtvā īśānaṃ nairṛtaṃ vinā || 65/34 ||
analyzed: madhye nava padam kṛtvā īśānam nairṛtam vinā
pālikāḥ pañca pūrva sthāḥ paścima sthāḥ śarāvakāḥ
dakṣiṇe tritaye vāme ghaṭikāḥ ṣaṣ vyavasthitāḥ
antar īśāna deśe tu pālikā ekā vyavasthitā
tathā eva nairṛte deśe śarāvaḥ su vyavasthitaḥ
ṣoḍaśa aṃśam tatas kṛtvā madhye vedaiḥ vyavasthitāḥ
pālikā ghaṭikā ca eva śarāvaḥ ca yathākramāt
īśāna koṇāt ārabhya vahni antāḥ samudīritāḥ
anena eva krameṇa eva vahnyāt viṣu ca vinyaset
kṛtvā nava padam madhye soma kumbhaḥ vyavasthitaḥ
pūrvavat pālikā ādyam tu śarvam ārabhya vinyaset
avaśiṣṭam bahis some kanyasādyam prakīrtitam
prāgvat nava padam kṛtvā dvāre pūrvatra paścime
pṛ
īśāna koṇāt ārabhya pālikā ādyam tu vinyaset
etat kanyasa madhyam syāt tatas kanyasakanyasam
kṛtvā nava padam ca api tyajet koṇa catuṣṭayam
madhye kumbham ca pūrva ādi pālikā ādīn ca vinyaset
evam nyāsa kramam proktam tad kriyā kathyate idhunā
sthaṇḍilam kārayet vidvān aṣṭa droṇena śālikā
tad ardham madhyamam proktam tad ardham adhamam bhavet
śiva kumbha ukta vat kumbhe prastham vā pratipālikam
tad madhye vilikhet padmam sa aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam
tad ardham taṇḍula upetam tila lāja samanvitam
darbhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paristīrya tad madhye sthāpayet ghaṭam
droṇena ardhena vā pūrṇam kumbha saṃkhyā samanvitam
sa sūtram sa pidhānam ca sa kūrcam vāri saṃyutam
sauvarṇam candra bimbam syāt sat vastra vadana anvitam
tad madhye vinyaset indum tad mantreṇa śiva dvijāḥ
pāyasam dāpayet vidvān tāmbūlam dāpayet tatas
īśānena tu mantreṇa pālikā ādīni vinyaset

original: darbhaiḥ kuśaiḥ palāśairvā niśchidraṃ suṣiraṃ nayet || 65/49 ||
analyzed: darbhaiḥ kuśaiḥ palāśaiḥ vā niśchidram suṣiram nayet  /
śuddha deśa uttha mṛdbhiḥ tu pālikā ādīni pūrayet
dravyāṇi vāpayet paścāt payasā bhāvitāni vai
tila sarṣapa mudgān ca māṣa śimba āḍhakāni ca

original: mudgamāṣakulutthaṃ ca tilaṃ ca sarṣapaṃ tathā |
analyzed: mudga māṣa kulattham ca tilam ca sarṣapam tathā

original: evaṃ tu madhyamaṃ proktaṃ kanyasaṃ tilasarṣapam || 65/52 ||
analyzed: evam tu madhyamam proktam kanyasam tila sarṣapam
adhamam tu evam ākhyātam athavā anyam iha ucyate
tila sarṣapa mudgān ca māṣa śimba kulatthakān
śāli priyaṃgu apāmārga yava śyāmam iha ucyate
athavā anya prakāreṇa dravya lakṣaṇam ucyate
tila sarṣapa mudgān ca tatas māṣa kulatthakam
niṣpāva śāli apāmārga śimbā vrīhi āḍhakāḥ smṛtāḥ
śyāma godhūma sasya indravaiṇavāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
payasā bhāvitāni atra nirvapet hṛdayena tu
aṅkurāḥ vardhanīyāḥ syuḥ yathā śobhā āvahāḥ dvijāḥ
vāpayet bījamukhyena prāc mukhaḥ vā api udak mukhaḥ
tad kumbha stha jalena eva pālikā ādīni vinyaset
kumbha ambhaḥ śoṣaṇāt pūrvam gandha toyena pūrayet
nityam saṃpūjya haviṣā dāpayet tad dina antakam
nirdiṣṭa divase prāpte somam udvāsayet sudhīḥ
nirvāpa ante pidhāya eva smṛtyā guptam nidhāpayet
aṅkurāḥ tu sitāḥ śastāḥ komalāḥ ūrdhva gāminaḥ

original: kṛṣṇaṃ ca dhūmravarṇaṃ ca piṅgalaṃ śyāmalaṃ tathā |
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca dhūmra varṇam ca piṅgalam śyāmalam tathā
tiryaggatam ca kubjam ca varjayet śuddha karmaṇi
śānti homam tatas kuryāt tad nivṛti artham eva ca
tīrtha aṅkurasya kartavyam grāma ādīnām pradakṣiṇam
gṛhīta mṛd sama upetam pālikā ādi samanvitam
triśūlena samopetam kundālyā ca samanvitam
caṇḍeśvara samopetam sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
anyeṣām api sarveṣām varjayet vā pradakṣiṇam
mṛd saṃgraha ādau kuryāt vā na kuryāt bhramaṇa kriyām

original: nadītīre taṭāke vā vane puṣpavane'pi vā || 65/65 ||
analyzed: nadī tīre taṭāke vā vane puṣpa vane api vā
dīrdhikā setubandha ādau vidhinā mṛdam āharet
prokṣayet bhū talam samyak śivatoyena buddhimān
āvāhayet tatas bhūmim gandha ādyaiḥ arcayet hṛdā
paritas lokapān iṣṭavā śastra mantreṇa pūjayet  /
śastreṇa nikhanet bhūmim tris khātvā ca uttarā mukhaḥ
mṛdam saṃgṛhya vāmena pūrayet sthalikā antaram
pṛ
gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya parivāra janaiḥ tu vā
vāhayitvā mṛdam paścāt prāsāda ādyam praveśayet  /
pālikā ādyaiḥ tribhiḥ śreṣṭham dvābhyām madhyamam ucyate
adhamam ca ekavargeṇa kartavyā ca aṅkura kriyā
ukta alābhe tad āsanne kāle sadyas uṅkura arpaṇam
prasūnam nālikerasya dūrvā puṣpa akṣata anvitam
prakṣipet pālikā madhye bīja mantram anusmaran
ghaṭikāsu śarāveṣu triṣu vā ca aṅkura arpaṇam
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre aṅkurārpaṇavidhiḥ nāma triṣaṣṭitamaḥ
paṭalaḥ

original: athedānīṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ tu liṅgasya śṛṇuta dvijāḥ |
analyzed: atha idānīm pratiṣṭhām tu liṅgasya śṛṇuta dvijāḥ
pūrva ukta vidhinā kālam kalpayet sthāpana ādike
yama āśleṣa agni śūrpāṇi śraviṣṭhām ca eva vāruṇam
jyeṣṭhām ca trīṇi pūrvāṇi varjayet sthāpana ādike
caturthī ca aṣṭamī bhūta pañcadaśī aśubhā matā
na iṣṭau kuja śanī jñeyau śubha yuktau śubha pradau
rāśayaḥ cara varjyāḥ syuḥ śeṣam pūrvavat īritam
aṅkura arpaṇa kāryam tu prāk eva vidhinā caret
harmya ādau maṇṭapam kuryāt yāga artham vā agra pārśvayoḥ
uttare ca eva hasta ādi trayasya aṣṭa aṅga dikkaraiḥ  /
yava vṛddhyā tat anyeṣām tasmāt arka āditaḥ api vā
tri bhāgena tathā eva syāt uttare snāna maṇḍapam
vedikā sama mānam vā snāna yogyam yathā bhavet
tathā mekhalayā yuktam śvabhra yuj śobhitam bhavet
aṣṭa aṅgula ucchritā vedī madhya bhāge catuṣkarā
hasta ādike hasta vṛddhyā tat anyeṣām prakalpayet
hasta dvaya viśālā vā vedikā hasta nirmitā

original: vedimānena kūṭaṃ syātprapā vā tasya bāhyataḥ || 66/9 ||
analyzed: vedi mānena kūṭam syāt prapā vā tasya bāhyatas
athavā sarva deśe tu prapā syāt ati vistarā

original: sarvato vātha kūṭaṃ syādalpe śobhābalaṃ yathā || 66/10 ||
analyzed: sarvatas vā atha kūṭam syāt alpe śobhā balam yathā
yogyā hasta mitā vedī liṅge syāt kanyasa traye
dvādaśa stambha saṃyuktā syāt liṅge madhyama traye
gātraiḥ viṃśatibhiḥ yuktā vedī syāt uttama traye
tad tad bhakti pramāṇena bāhya paṅktīḥ prakalpayet

original: evaṃ paṅktiyutā cādye tataḥ kuṇḍāṣṭakaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: evam paṅkti yutā ca ādye tatas kuṇḍa aṣṭakam bhavet
dvi bhaktiḥ madhyame jñeyā caturviṃśati kuṇḍake
tri bhakti saṃyutā api aṣṭacatvāriṃśat ca kuṇḍakam
jyeṣṭha liṅga trayam vā syāt dvātriṃśat kuṇḍa saṃyutam
bhramanti bāhyatas kuryāt yathā śobhā aṃśa mānataḥ
prādhānikam tad anyat syāt cakre ca anantare matam  /
sarvatra nava kuṇḍam vā liṅge kanyasa kanyase
pañca kuṇḍam atha ekam vā cala liṅge api kathyate
vedi bhāga śaśāṅka ardha tri aśra vṛttāni pañcasu
ṣaṣ aśra aṣṭa abja koṇāni dikṣu anyāsu niveśayet

original: vṛttaṃ pradhānamevaṃ syāccaturaśraṃ tu vā bhavet |
analyzed: vṛttam pradhānam evam syāt caturaśram tu vā bhavet
antar āvaraṇe tu evam bāhye tu caturaśrakam
pṛ
vṛttam vā api prakartavyam sarvatra ekam atha api vā
prāk ukta vidhinā sarvam atra anuktam samācaret
catur dvāra samāyuktaḥ catur toraṇa bhūṣitaḥ
nava dhvaja samāyuktaḥ darbha mālā ādi bhūṣitaḥ

original: ayaṃ tu maṇṭapo liṅge pratimāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ || 66/21 ||
analyzed: ayam tu maṇṭapaḥ liṅge pratimāyām viśeṣataḥ
sarva karmasu śastam syāt utsava ādau viśeṣataḥ
asya prāc ukta deśe tu lakṣaṇa uddhāra maṇṭapam
kṛtvā tatra nayet lakṣma bhavet
śilā vāluka toya ādyaiḥ dharṣayet liṅga piṇḍike
tathā ca ākāra śuddhim ca kuryāt liṅgasya deśikaḥ
mṛdbhiḥ kaṣāya vargeṇa go mūtreṇa udakaiḥ tathā
gomayena tatas umbhobhiḥ gandhavadbhiḥ su pāvanaiḥ
praṇavena astramantreṇa huṃ phaṭ praṇati yoginā
tatas sāmānya mantreṇa pūjayet sthāṇunā api vā
liṅga piṇḍim samāveṣṭya kuśa vastra sraj ādibhiḥ
maṇṭape sthaṇḍilam kuryāt aṣṭa droṇena śālinā
tila taṇḍula lājaiḥ ca darbhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paristaret  /
sthaṇḍile śāyayet liṅgam sa pīṭham pūrva mastakam
rakta vastreṇa saṃchādya yajet gandha ādibhiḥ hṛdā
bhajet
eka aṃśa sūtra vistāraḥ tathā gambhīraḥ iṣyate
tad ardhena adhamaḥ jñeyaḥ tad tāra iṣṭa aṃśake kṛte
navadhā sūtra vistāraḥ sarva liṅgeṣu kīrtitaḥ

original: kuḍkumāktena sūtreṇa navadhā ca vibhajya ca |
analyzed: kuḍkuma aktena sūtreṇa navadhā ca vibhajya ca
ṣaḍbhiḥ tu tu adhobhāge yathā bhavet
mukha nāsā lalāṭānām bhedaḥ grīvā ūrdhvataḥ bhavet
tatra na iṣṭaḥ tu yaḥ tasmāt adhas lakṣma vilakṣayet
liṅga āyāme dina aṃśe tu lakṣma vistṛtiḥ aṃśataḥ
pṛthvī nimnā ca tad rekhā vistṛteḥ navama aṃśataḥ
lakṣmasūtra ardha mānam tu pakṣasūtra avatāraṇam
tad khāta sama vaipulyam kartavyam śobhanam yathā
pakṣa kṣetre vasu chinne ṣaṣ bhāga parivartanāt
nava bhāgāt munīnām hi da tvā bhāga dvayam tu adhas
bhāga dvayena sārdhena vahni bhakteḥ vivardhanam
vikāra bhakta idhastāt vā tyaktvā bhāga dvayam tathā
navabhiḥ bhānubhiḥ bhakte pakṣam vā agni krameṇa vā
athavā anyat lakṣma tasyām nava bhāga kṛtam samam

original: bhāgaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ guṇīkṛtya bhāgatyāge tridhā tvayam |
analyzed: bhāgam ṣaṣṭham guṇīkṛtya bhāga tyāge tridhā tu ayam
yava ardhakam dvi bhāge tu vartayet lakṣma śobhanam
karṇakūṭāt adhas ca ekām brahmarekhām nayet kramāt
yāvat tu vaiṣṇavaḥ bhāgaḥ sūtra mūle gajākṣake
adhas dvitīya bhāgaḥ vā yava ardha ākāra lakṣaṇam
pakṣa sūtra vinirmuktam ubhayam tu iha kīrtitam
rekhā trayam tu kartavyam sarvāsām anukūtalaḥ
ṣoḍaśa aṃśe catur bhāgam tyaktvā ūrdhve dvādaśa aṃśakam
sa padma kuḍmalam nālam adhobhāga dvayam vinā

original: rudrāṃśoccaṃ tridhā kṛtvā cordhvabhāgaṃ tyajet kramāt || 66/42 ||
pakṣāṃśaṃ daśadhā kṛtvā vyomāṃśaṃ mukulaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: bhavet

original: vistāraḥ tatsamo jñeyo nālaṃ tu vasubhāgikam || 66/43 ||
analyzed: vistāraḥ tad samaḥ jñeyaḥ nālam tu vasu bhāgikam
mukulāt tu samārabhya pakṣa rekhe vivartayet

original: maṇirekhe tu vijñeye tayoḥpṛṣṭhe tu saṅgatiḥ || 66/44 ||
analyzed: maṇi rekhe tu vijñeye tayoḥ pṛṣṭhe tu saṅgatiḥ
rudra aṃśe rudra bhāge tu guṇa aṃśam upari nyaset
ekena mukulī nālam sapta aṃśam iti kīrtitam

original: rudrāṃśaṃ navadhā kṛtvā cordhve bhāgatrayaṃ tyajet |

analyzed: mukulam ca eka bhāgena nālam pañca aṃśataḥ bhavet
pṛ
ṣoḍaśa aṃśe punar tasmin tyajet ūrdhvam catuṣṭayam
mukulam ca eka bhāgena daśa aṃśam nālam iṣyate  /
dvādaśa aṃśe tu pūjā aṃśam tyaktvā ūrdhva īśa dvayam tatas
eka aṃśam mukulam jñeyam vasu aṃśam nālam iṣyate
nāla āyāmam adhas tiryak kṛtvā mukula mūlataḥ
pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ sūtram yathā ṛju bhavet dvijāḥ
adhas ca ūrdhva dvayoḥ pārśve caturaśra dvayam tathā

original: niṣpādya bahirūrdhvasthaṃ koṇe hastaṃ vidhāya ca || 66/50 ||
analyzed: niṣpādya bahis ūrdhva stham koṇe hastam vidhāya ca
padma kuḍmalam ārabhya nāla antam bhrāmayet bahis
nāla āyāmam tu navadhā kṛtvā ca ekaika vardhanam
tasmāt nava pramāṇena navadhā vardhanam bhavet
nāla antara iṣṭadhā bhakte bhāga ardhāt ardha vardhitam  /
catur mānam bhavet lakṣma pakṣasūtra antare dvijāḥ
pakṣasūtram ca kartavyam sūtram mukula mūlataḥ

original: kuḍmalaṃ vā gajākṣaṃ vā liṅgāgraṃ padmasannibham |
analyzed: kuḍmalam vā gaja akṣam vā liṅga agram padma sannibham
kadalī mukula ākāram śūla agra aśvattha patrakam
lokapāla āyudha astra agram śiva astra agram tu vā bhavet
sārvadeśika liṅgasya lakṣma ittham kīrtitam dvijāḥ

original: naitadratnamaye liṅge na lohe'pi ca lohitam |
analyzed: na etat ratna maye liṅge na ca lohitam
na bāṇa liṅge lauhe vā nadī prasravaṇa udbhave  /
su ākāra lakṣma atīteṣu tejaḥ ratneṣu bhāsvaram

original: ratnaje lohaje lakṣma vidheyaṃ vā na vā bhavet || 66/57 ||
analyzed: ratna je loha je lakṣma vidheyam vā na vā bhavet  /
evam lakṣma likhet vidvān guruḥ hema śalākayā
akṣi loha samopetam astra mantram anusmaram

original: śilpaśāstrāntarābhyāṃ tu tābhyāṃ vā lakṣma vā likhet || 66/59 ||
analyzed: śilpa śāstra antarābhyām tu tābhyām vā lakṣma vā likhet
tat tasmāt eva śāstreṇa samam eva vivartayet
rekhā hīna adhikā hanyāt yajamānam sa śilpinam
rājānam rāṣṭra sahitam samam tasmāt vivartayet
ācāryaḥ mantra yogyaḥ tu sthapatiḥ karma kārayet
śilpinam tu visṛjya atha nayet tat sthaṇḍila antaram
tāmrake kāṃsya pātre vā madhu ājyābhyām samanvite
saha imam sparśayet vidvān netramantram anusmaran

original: dhānyarāśiṃ tato gāṃ ca savatsāṃ brahmaṇāṃstathā || 66/63 ||
analyzed: dhānya rāśim tatas gām ca sa vatsām brahmaṇān tathā
kanyāḥ dāna krameṇa eva brahmabhiḥ darśayet guruḥ
pracchanna paṭam ānīya sthāne sthāne nayet śivam
dāru pīṭhe kuśa ūrdhve vā pūrvavat sthāpanam bhavet

original: tasyottare bhavānyāstu sthāpanaṃ tatra vā punaḥ || 66/65 ||
analyzed: tasya uttare bhavānyāḥ tu sthāpanam tatra vā punar
saṃpūjya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛsya viśeṣataḥ
devam devīm samāropya ratha ādau apramādataḥ
nānāvidhaiḥ alaṅkāraiḥ nayet vāstu pradakṣiṇam
prāsādam vā mahābhāgāḥ viśeṣaḥ kaścid ucyate

original: arvāk saptadinālliṅge piṇḍikāṃ ca vidhāya ca |
analyzed: arvāk sapta dināt liṅge piṇḍikām ca vidhāya ca
pratiṣṭhā divasāt liṅgam sandhāpya ca śilā anvitam

original: pīṭhaṃ saṃyojya kṛtvāṣṭabandhaṃ sarvāṃ kriyāṃ tataḥ |
analyzed: pīṭham saṃyojya kṛtvā aṣṭa bandham sarvām kriyām tatas
kuryāt snapanam ādaḥ tu sahasra ādiṣu sambhavaiḥ
saṃpūjya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ kṛtvā grāma pradakṣiṇam
jala adhivāsana artham tu snāpayet pañcagavyataḥ

original: parīkṣya liṅgaṃ pīṭhaṃ ca vastrādyaiḥ pūjayettataḥ |
analyzed: parīkṣya liṅgam pīṭham ca vastra ādyaiḥ pūjayet tatas

original: kautukaṃ bandhayitvā tu liṅgapīṭhe krameṇa tu || 66/71 ||
analyzed: kautukam bandhayitvā tu liṅga pīṭhe krameṇa tu
lamba kūrca samāyuktam vastraiḥ ācchādya sarvatas

original: sthaṇḍilaṃ maṇḍale kṛtvā śayanaṃ tatra kalpayet || 66/72 ||
analyzed: sthaṇḍilam maṇḍale kṛtvā śayanam tatra kalpayet  /
tad madhye vinyaset kumbham śiva ākhyam vardhanī yutam
anyat sarvam samānam syāt garbha agre sthaṇḍilam matam
atas prasaṅgam utsṛjya prakṛtam vacmi sāmpratam
jale dhi vāsayet devam dvi tri rātram sa pīṭhakam
pṛ
eka rātram divārātram yāma mātram atha api vā
nābhi mātra udake kṛtvā prapā maṇḍapa maṇḍitām
jala tīre vidhāya evam sthaṇḍila dvitayam kramāt

original: bhadrapīṭhe samāropya devaṃ devīṃ krameṇa tu || 66/76 ||
analyzed: bhadrapīṭhe samāropya devam devīm krameṇa tu
āchādya nava vastreṇa lamba kūrca samanvitam
abhitoṣṭa ghaṭān nyastvā śambhoḥ devyāḥ samāhitaḥ
pradhāna kūrca vastra āḍhyān hema yuktān sa lokapān
jala madhye nyaset paścāt devam devīm ghaṭān ca tān
śāyayet phalaka ādau tu prāk śiraḥ kā ūrdhva vaktrakam
visṛjya śilpinam paścāt prokṣite yāgamaṇṭape
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu gomayena upalepayet
puṇyāham vācayitvā tu vāstu homam samācaret
paṇṭapa alaṃkṛtim kuryāt prāc ukta vidhinā saha
kṛta snānaḥ śiva ācāryaḥ śuddha vastra uttarīyakaḥ
sa uṣṇīṣaḥ dhṛta pañcāṅga bhūṣaṇaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
mūrtipāḥ bhūṣitāḥ tadvat kintu uṣṇīṣa vivarjitāḥ
saṃprāpya yāga sthānam tu sāmānya arghya karaḥ guruḥ
dvārāṇi abhyarcya pūrva ādi dvārapāla yutāni ca
pūrve nandi mahākālau yāmye bhṛṅgi vināyakau
vāruṇe vṛṣabha skandau devī caṇḍau tu sāumyake  /
bhadraḥ vijaya saṃjñaḥ tu vijṛmbhaḥ lohitaḥ kramāt
toraṇe pūrvam ārabhya dvāre śānti ādikāḥ kalāḥ
abhyarcya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ sadya dvāreṇa saṃviśet
viśuddha kāyaḥ mantra ātmā kṛta antar yajanaḥ guruḥ
kṛta arghya dravya saṃśuddhi karma hasta ātma pūjanaḥ
kṛta pañcāṅga bhūṣaḥ tu vāstu pūjā samanvitaḥ
śiva kumbha astra yajanaḥ lokapāla arcana anvitaḥ
sva ājñāpana samāyuktaḥ kumbha astra bhramaṇa anvitaḥ
kṛta kumbha astra saṃpūjaḥ tad adhyeṣaṇa saṃyutaḥ
kuṇḍa saṃskāra saṃyuktaḥ śiva agni janana anvitaḥ
jala adhivāsana sthānāt ānīya parameśvaram
maṇṭape snapana ākhye tu prāgvat snapanam ārabhet
mṛdbhiḥ kaṣāya vargeṇa pañcagavya phala udakaiḥ
poṣpa udaiḥ patra toyaiḥ ca gandha udaiḥ dhātu toyakaiḥ
pañcāmṛtaiḥ kuśa udaiḥ vā snāpayet vṛṣabhadhvajam
evam eva bhavānyāḥ ca kuryāt snapanam uttamam
ācchādya vastra yugmena gandha ādyaiḥ arcayet kramāt

original: kṛtvā kautukasūtraṃ tu śambhordevyāḥ krameṇa tu |
analyzed: kṛtvā kautukasūtram tu śambhoḥ devyāḥ krameṇa tu
śayyām ca kalpayet vidvān śāli taṇḍulaka ādibhiḥ
aṣṭa droṇaiḥ sa śālībhiḥ tad ardhaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ api
tilaiḥ tad ardhaiḥ lājaiḥ ca darbhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paristaret

original: carmajaṃ romajaṃ tūrdhvaṃ muṇḍajaṃ cāṇḍajaṃ tathā |
analyzed: carma jam roma jam tu ūrdhvam muṇḍa jam ca aṇḍa jam tathā
kārpāsa jam krameṇa eva kalpayet upadhānakam
alābhe pañca vastraiḥ tu miśraiḥ śayyām prakalpayet
sampūjya āsana mantraiḥ ca śaktim śayyā adhipām nyaset
śibikā ādau samāropya bhavānyā anugatam nayet

original: dvāradeśe tu saṃprāpte dadyādarghyaṃ krameṇa tu || 66/98 ||
analyzed: dvāra deśe tu saṃprāpte dadyāt arghyam krameṇa tu
āropya śayane devam prāc mastaka samanvitam
liṅgasya uttaratas devīm kriyā ākhyām pīṭha vigrahām
liṅga mūle nyaset devīm nava garta samanvitām
mūrti mūrti īśvara nyāsam tatva tatva īśvara anvitam
brahma viṣṇu harāḥ eva liṅge tatva traya adhipāḥ
ātma vidyā śiva ākhyam tu tatva trayam iti īritam
kṣmā vahni yajamāna arka jala vāyu niśākarāḥ
vyoma antāḥ mūrtayaḥ ca aṣṭau nyastavyāḥ pratikhaṇḍakam
pṛ
śarvaḥ paśupatiḥ ca ugraḥ rudraḥ ca eva bhavaḥ tathā
īśānaḥ ca mahādevaḥ bhīmaḥ ca iti aṣṭa mūrtipāḥ
pañca mūrti ātmake nyāse kṣmā vāri dahana anilāḥ

original: khañceti mūrtayo liṅge brahmādyā mūrtipā matāḥ || 66/104 ||
analyzed: mūrtayaḥ liṅge brahma ādyāḥ mūrtipāḥ matāḥ

original: liṅgapīṭhe śilānāṃ ca vyāptistu āditaḥ kramāt |
analyzed: liṅga pīṭhe śilānām ca vyāptiḥ tu āditas kramāt
śiva śakti manīṣā antam tri khaṇḍa kalpanam punar
vidyā śakti śiva prāntam māyā sādeśa śakti gam
śabda citta manīṣā antam liṅge pīṭha īśmani kramāt

original: kriyā jñānaṃ tathecchā ca tritatvādhīśvarā matāḥ |
analyzed: kriyā jñānam tathā icchā ca tri tatva adhīśvarāḥ matāḥ
dhātrī mūrtipāḥ
pañca mūrti ātmake nyāse vāma ādyāḥ mūrtipāḥ matāḥ  /

original: vāmā jyeṣṭhā kriyā jñānī cecchā ceti prakīrtitāḥ |
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā kriyā jñānī ca icchā ca iti prakīrtitāḥ
saṃpūjya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ devān adhva patīn kramāt
avyakta mūrtim brahmāṇi vidyā deham śivam tatas
śiva aṅgāni ca sampūjya gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt
ācchādya nava vastreṇa pratibhāgam ca pūjayet
vedi ūrdhve paritas kumbhān nyaset viśveśvara ātmakān
nidrā kumbham śiraḥ deśe vardhanīm uttare nyaset
kumbhān vastraiḥ samāveṣṭya hema padma samanvitān
pidhāna kūrca saṃyuktān pallavaiḥ upaśobhitān
nivedya bhūri naivedyam ca mantravat
guru mūrti dharaiḥ sārdham homa karma samārabhet
mūrtipāḥ śiva śāstra jñāḥ pañca gocara sambhavāḥ
ācārya ārabdha tantra ukta karma krama viśāradāḥ
pratiṣṭhā mantra tantra jñāḥ putra pautra ādayaḥ guroḥ
catur veda adri daḥ viprāḥ catur dikṣu vyavasthitāḥ
paṭhantaḥ devatā liṅga mantrān sannidhi hetave
bhavanti mūrtipāḥ nāma saṃskṛtāḥ śiva śambaraiḥ
vidikṣu ca anna lājān ca tilān madhu lavāḥ tithā
yāga antarāya vidhvaṃsam kurvanti amita tejasaḥ
guruṇā coditāḥ mūrti dhārakāḥ śiva saṃskṛtāḥ
pradhāna agneḥ samānīya svān aṃśān svāyate nyaset
samidh ājya anna lājān ca tilān madhu lavān tathā
pālāśa udumbara aśvattha vaṭāḥ pūrva ādi dikṣu ca
śamī khadira pālāśa śrīvṛkṣāḥ tu agni koṇataḥ
pradhānasya palāśaḥ tu sarvam pālāśam eva vā
samidh ājyam ca kuṇḍānām sva sva dikṣu yathākramam

original: sahasraṃ vā tadarddhaṃ vā tadarddhārdhamathāpi vā || 66/122 ||
analyzed: sahasram vā tad arddham vā tad arddha ardham atha api vā
śatam aṣṭa uttaram vā api mūlena juhṛyāt tatas
mūlāt daśa aṃśa tā ūṅgānām samam vā atha tad ardhakam
mūrtipa āhutiḥ uddiṣṭā brahma aṅgaiḥ aṣṭa dikṣu ca
āgneya aiśāna nairṛya vāyu dikṣu yathākramam

original: īśānaṃ tu pradhāne vā netrāstre madhyakuṇḍake |
analyzed: īśānam tu pradhāne vā netra astre madhya kuṇḍake
santarpya mantrān kumbha ante sādhayeyuḥ atho param
pratibhāgam adhas tena prokṣaṇam vai hi sattamāḥ
saṃśodhya sarve saṃhṛtya japeyuḥ nija śambarān
darbha sparśaḥ tatas bhāgam śuddham saṃjāyate īśvaram
parata tvam upasthāpyam śodhayeyuḥ tatas param
mūla aṇu saṃhitā mantraiḥ ācāryasya japa ādikam
śatam ardham tad ardham vā daśa saṃkhyam atha api vā
mūrti mūrti īśa homam ca tatva tatva īśvaraiḥ saha
kevalena ghṛtena atha sarva dravyaiḥ tilaiḥ atha
sva mūrti rūpa sāmarthyāt vyāpti sandhāna yoginaḥ  /
pṛ
mūrtipāḥ sarva sandhāna yoga kṛt deśika uttamāḥ
evam saṃśodhya brahma aṃśam viṣṇu aṃśa ādi viśuddhaye
vidhāya pūrvavat sarvam homa saṃkhyā japa ādikam
kuśa mūla antara agraiḥ tu brahma bhāga ādikān kramāt
spṛśeyuḥ mūrtipāḥ svīya diś sthitāḥ nija śambaraiḥ

original: evaṃ pīṭhe śilāyāṃ ca homādyaṃ parikalpayet || 66/133 ||
analyzed: evam pīṭhe śilāyām ca homa ādyam parikalpayet
kriyā ādhāra ākhya śaktibhyām mūrtim mūrti adhipa ādibhiḥ
manonmanīm anantam ca krameṇa parikalpayet
prāyaścittam aghoreṇa kṛtvā ca aṣṭa uttaram śatam
bhūti darbha tilaiḥ kṛtvā rakṣām astreṇa mantrataḥ
bahis antar balim kṣiptvā kṣetrapāla balim kṣipet  /
a dīkṣitaḥ tu yaḥ kartā dīkṣayet tam iha antare

original: tataḥ prabhāte vimale deśiko mūrtipaiḥ saha || 66/137 ||
analyzed: tatas prabhāte vimale deśikaḥ mūrtipaiḥ saha
snāna ādi nityam nirvṛtya sāmānyārdhya karaḥ guruḥ
saṃpūjya dvārapāla ādīn samutthāpya maheśvaram
devīm utthāpya mantra jñaḥ yajet gandha ādibhiḥ saha
da tvā pūrṇāhutim paścāt praviśet bhavanam prabhoḥ

original: pañcagavyena saṃprokṣya śilāṃ madhye tu vinyaset |
analyzed: pañcagavyena saṃprokṣya śilām madhye tu vinyaset
ekaviṃśati bhāge tu dvāra tāre tu madhyame  /
bhāge ṣoḍhā kṛte brahmasūtra madhyama sūtrakam
brahma vāma eka bhāga ardham śivasūtram iti smṛtam
śivasya brahmaṇaḥ madhye hareḥ indrasya madhyamam
śivasūtra pramāṇam tu saumya sūtrasya pūrvatas
nyastvā tad sandhi madhye tu vinyaset kaśilām guruḥ

original: praṇavaṃ praṇatiṃ coktvā vyāpinīti sthireti ca || 66/143 ||
analyzed: praṇavam praṇatim ca uktvā vyāpinī iti sthirā iti ca
acalā iti dhruvā iti uccais māyā garbham dharā akṣaram

original: svāhetyantaṃ padaṃ coktvā sthairyaṃ sarvagataṃ smaran || 66/144 ||
analyzed: svāhā iti antam padam ca uktvā sthairyam sarva gatam smaran
padmāsanam tat ārūḍham sa avaṣṭambham nirudhya ca
nyaset ratna oṣadhī loha dhātu bījāni pūrvavat

original: kūrmaṃ vā vṛṣabhaṃ vātha haimaṃ tatra vinikṣipet |
analyzed: kūrmam vā vṛṣabham vā atha haimam tatra vinikṣipet
vilikhya ca āyasena atha śvabhram kṛtvā paṭa āvṛtam
varmaṇā astreṇa saṃrakṣya digīśebhyaḥ balim kṣipet
samācamya kṛta nyāsaḥ juhuyāt asinā śatam

original: devaṃ devīṃ ca sampūjya samāropya rathādike |
analyzed: devam devīm ca sampūjya samāropya ratha ādike
dvāra pradeśe da tvā arghyam spṛṣṭvā ca atha ūrdhva śākhakam
dvāra śvabhra antara avasthe bhadrapīṭhe niveśayet
sthiram bhavet yathā utpādyam śvabhram astreṇa śodhayet
yantreṇa vidhṛtam samyak lambena praguṇīkṛtam
tatas tat avatārayet  /
śakti śaktimatoḥ dhyāyet na bhedaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ
laya antam mantram uccārya sṛṣṭi mārgeṇa vinyaset
nandyāvarta śilāḥ paścāt catasraḥ bahnikoṇataḥ
dharma ādi mantraiḥ saṃyojya devīm utsedhayet kriyām
ādau praṇavam uccārya hrīṅkāraḥ tad anantaram
piṇḍikām ca samāyojya bandhayet aṣṭa bandhanaiḥ
lākṣā agula madhūcchiṣṭa guggulūnām sama aṃśataḥ
eteṣām api sarveṣām saṃgrāhyam sarjaram samam
iṣṭakā cūrṇa bhāge vā pūrva bhāga samanvite
sarveṣām pādataḥ tailam pākaḥ cikkaṇa vat bhavet
sikatābhiḥ samāpūrya ca antaram liṅga pīṭhayoḥ

puṭa vat pāda bhāga ardham adhika unnati saṃyutā
puṭau niṣpau atulyau syāt śrotrasā ardha ardhe eva hi
ṛju tiryak tri pāda ūnam iṣṭa aṃśena viśāla
puṣkaram ca ūrdhva nāsā aṃśa vyāsa uṣṭa aṃśaḥ api ca tridhā

original: nāsāntāṃśaṃ natāgraṃ syātpuṭe tu vipule tathā || 67/83 ||
analyzed: nāsā anta aṃśam nata agram syāt puṭe tu vipule tathā
pāda ardha aṃśa viśāla uccā gojirāt ca nata unnatā
catur aṃśa āyata tayā nīvram aṃśam sa mālikam
tri bhāga uttara vālī syāt pāda aṣṭa aṃśena ca uṣṭhayoḥ
adhara uṣṭhāya tad dvi aṃśam āyāmāt tu viśālakam
viśālāt catur aṃśena tuṅga madhye nata antikam
hanu cakram dvi bhāgam syāt dhanu agram kiñcid unnatam
adhara uṣṭhāt adhas nimnam tat mitha prekṣya yojayet
aṣṭa aṃśam karṇa vistāram pañca pañca aṃśa nāsi yuj
galam hanuḥ ca grīvā aṃśaḥ tathā dvi aṃśaḥ praveśa bhāj
pṛṣṭha keśa avadhiḥ mūrdhnaḥ mukham syāt catur aṅgulam
grīvā dvi bhāgā yatra eva karṇa vṛttiḥ tathā adhikā
aṣṭa aṃśa vistaraḥ pṛṣṭhe karṇa vṛti antare śiraḥ
keśa sīma puroga antāt karṇa cūlī anta mānakam
keśāntam nāha ṣaṣ pañca bhāga uṣṭa aṃśena nāhakam  /
kapola śaṃkha paryantam sa utkṣepam sammatam budhāḥ
skandhaḥ gala sama uccaḥ syāt mūlam yoḥ mūla saṃkṣayam
aṣṭa aṃśaḥ mūla dos tāraḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣa antaram tatas
madhyam tasmāt vibhāga ūnaḥ tasmāt dvi aṃśa adhikā ānatiḥ
śroṇī kaṭī tathā tasmāt ekaikam catur aṃśakam
nābhiḥ ardha aṃśa vistīrṇā gambhīra udara tā unnatā
sampūrṇa gomukha ākāram pāda agra antam mukhe mukhe
catur aṃśaḥ tatas grīvā
hikkāḥ sama khaṇḍanaḥ
dvi bhāgam syāt stana antam syāt cūcukaḥ pāda bhāga bhāj
tiryak karṇa dharaḥ pṛṣṭhe dvādaśa dviguṇa aṃśakaḥ
pṛ
tulyam syāt sūtram tat kṣayitam
viṃśātiḥ kaṭi saṃdhau syāt kakud doṣoḥ tris aṣṭa ca  /
kaṇṭhaḥ dvādaśa bhāgaḥ tu pṛṣṭhaḥ tu catur aṃśataḥ

original: śroṇiḥ kaṭiśca madhyaṃ ca mukhe tiryaṅmukhe'pi ca || 67/98 ||
analyzed: śroṇiḥ kaṭiḥ ca madhyam ca mukhe ca
pañca dvi aṃśa āyata vyāsaḥ meḍhra muṣke viśāla tā
ānatiḥ catur aṃśā tu liṅgam vṛttam ṛju sthiram
sphic piṇḍam ca ūru mūla iṣṭa bhāgaḥ vṛttaḥ tri bhāgakaḥ
uttuṅgam ūru mūlam tu mūla madhya agra vistaraḥ
syāt dvādaśa aṃśaḥ ca aṣṭa aṃśaḥ tāvān jānu agra vistaraḥ
catuḥ ṣaṣ tāra dairghyam tu jānu syāt dairghya vartulam
jaṅghā ṣaṣ aṃśā nalakā catur aṃśa viśāla bhāj
pārṣṇiḥ madhyagra tala gā catuṣpañca ṣaṣ aṃśakaiḥ  /
tithiḥ madhya tala utsedhaḥ pañca aṃśaḥ pārṣṇiḥ uchrayaḥ
catur aṃśa akṣa gulphe ca dvi aṃśa sārdha aṃśa maṇḍale
nalakā pārśva madhyam tu madhyam syāt akṣa gulphayoḥ
pārṣṇi pṛṣṭhe su vṛttāntam pārṣṇi aṃṅguṣṭha agram āyatam
tasya ṣoḍaśaka aṃśam tu dvisapta aṃśam iti smṛtam
pārṣṇi sīmāt kaniṣṭhā antam catur aṃśena vistaraḥ
pārṣṇi rakṣāt adhas tuṅgam catur aṃśa antaram bhavet
catur aṃśa āyata uṅguṣṭhaḥ tat tāre ced dvi bhāgake  /
pāda adhika catur bhāga dīrghaḥ nāhaḥ tu tri aṃśakaḥ
dvitīyasya tṛtīyam syāt dvaya veda ūna nāha yuj   /
pāda ūna catur aṃśa anta āyāmā vā syāt anāmikā
tri aṃśa āyāma aṣṭa bhāgena bhāga ucca vipula anvitā
tri pāda ucca vyāsa upetā kanīyasī
etāsām aṅgulānām tu nakhaḥ sva agra tri pāda bhāj
ārakta snigdha tuṅgāḥ tu aṅgulyaḥ tāḥ su vartulāḥ
aṣṭa bhāga adhika āyāmaḥ tu aṅguṣṭhaḥ tu dvitīyakaḥ
bhujāyāmaḥ dvikdanaḥ mukha ardham mukham iṣyate
madhya aṅgula āyatam tāvat ṣaṣ pañca tri aṃśa vistaraḥ
bhāgaḥ syāt kūrparaḥ tasmāt maṇibandha avasānakam
talamūlasya bāhulyam dvi bhāgam bhāgam agrataḥ
catustriṃśa āyata vyāsaḥ tu antam nimnam samīritam
aṅguṣṭha aṅgula mūlam tu tad nāmnā uktaḥ śukrodaraḥ
pañca aṃśaḥ tala vistāraḥ talam ā nimna madhya gam  /

original: sāntoccaṃ samamevaṃ hi vidhātavyaṃ bahiḥ talam |
analyzed: sa anta uccam samam evam hi vidhātavyam bahis talam
sa pāda aṃśaḥ catur bhāgaḥ tu aṅguṣṭha vipula āyatiḥ
agre daśa aṃśa hīnam tu parvāyāmaḥ dvi bhāga bhāj
tarjanī aṣṭa aṃśa hīna aṃśa vyāsa aṣṭa aṃśa agra hīnakāḥ
pañca aṃśa ardha āyata anyonya hīnāḥ parva traya anvitāḥ
ṣaṣ aṃśa eka aṃśaka āyāma vyāsā madhyā aṅgulī matā  /
tarjanyā anāmikā tulyā tad eka ūnā kaniṣṭhikā
tad daśa aṃśa ūna vistārā parva traya samanvitā
agra vyāsaḥ daśa aṃśa ūnaḥ tu aṅgulī mūla vistarāt
tri tri pāda dvi bhāgaiḥ tu catur bhāga vibhāgikā
aṅgulī nakha vistāraḥ dairghyam ca eva prakīrtitam
agra parva aṅgulīnām tu dviguṇam syāt nakha āyatam
bahis antar sthalam tuṅgam nimnam tu bahis aṅgulī
abhyantara gatā aṅgulyā bhāga ādhikya āyatā matā
rakta pāṇi talam vyakta avicchinna arakta rekhakam
śaṅkha cakra gadā śūla padma vajra samanvitam
su vṛtta asīra roma aṅgau bhujau āja anulambinau
ālambita bhuja chāyam ūru pāṇi tala antaram
syāt dvādaśa daśa aṣṭa aṃśaḥ bāhyaḥ syāt pārśva madhyataḥ
uṣṇīṣa tapanī gojī grīvā ūru nābhi madhya gam
pṛ
liṅga pāda tala anta stham brahmasūtram purogatam
yat uṣṇīṣaka krudh vaṃśa khaṇḍa sphic pārṣṇi madhya gam
ṛju sthiram parāvṛttam brahmasūtram vinirdiśet
mūrdhnaḥ śravaṇa pāli antam gulpa grīvā aṃsa madhya gam  /
pārśva sphikī aja sūtram syāt antar deha gatam dvijāḥ
pārśva aja sūtrāt adhikā catuṣpañca aṃśakā kakud
pañcāśāt syāt bāhuḥ ca bahis bahis
daśa bhāgam kaṭī sūtram mukhe pṛṣṭha ṣaṣ aṅgakam  /
sūtrāt pūrva ūru mūla antāt daśā antāt dvi aṃśakam bahis
jānu tri catur aṃśam tu pārśva sūtram mukhe mukhe
sūtrāt tu nalakā gulpham svam itya ubhayathā samam
sūtrāt pañca aṃśakāt parṣṇiḥ evam pārśvam prakīrtitam
mūla ūru jānu jaṅghā antar eka dvi catur aṃśakam
mukham syāt nalaka abāhyāt antaram catur aṃśakam
evam ṛju āgatam viśva dṛśyam citram iti smṛtam
bhitti āśliṣṭam hi ardhacitram dṛṣṭacitram iti smṛtam
ābhāsam bhittilekhyam syāt etat sāmānyam īritam
strī mānam adhunā vakṣye ṣaṇṇavati aṅgulam tu tat
uṣṇīṣāt keśa paryantam kolakam sa catur yavam
tri mātra aṣṭa yavam vyāsa utsedham uṣṇīṣa mānakam
tasmāt dṛś puṭa hanvantam catur tri dvi ardha mātrakam
grīvā tri mātrā syāt vakṣaḥ sārdha ṣaṣ pañca mātrakam
sārdhaiḥ daśa aṅgulaiḥ madhyam nābheḥ yoniḥ daśa aṅgulā
syāt ūru jānu jaṅghā aṅghri talān uccais anukramāt
dvāviṃśati trayoviṃśa mātrābhiḥ sthitiḥ īritā
mūrdhnaḥ navadaśa aṅgulyam keśa sīmā mukhe mukhe
navaviṃśati mātreṇa na aham keśa avasānakam

original: lalāṭaṃ śaramātraṃ tu madhye khyātaṃ purogatam || 67/138 ||
analyzed: lalāṭam śara mātram tu madhye khyātam purogatam
dṛś sūtrāt śrotra tuṅgam tu bhrū madhye dvi aṅgulam bhavet
bhrū madhyam yava tāra uccam dairghyam syāt tat tri mātrakam
antayoḥ kramaśas hīnam bhruvoḥ ānatiḥ antaram
aṅgulena samam snigdha ślakṣṇa romadhanuḥ samam
yava hīna kalā āyāme madhye ṣoḍaśa vistare
netre pañca yava vyāsam tad madhye kṛṣṇa maṇḍalam
catur ardha yava vyāse tad dvayoḥ śveta maṇḍale
kanīnike dvaya anta sthe yava tārā anvitāyate
yavam ca ardha yavam jyotiḥ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛṣṇa aṃśa madhya gā
ūrdhva adhas pakṣma vistāraḥ dvi yava ardha yava unnataḥ
śrotre netra sama vyāsāt kalā pañca yava adhikā
karṇa bandhāt tu karṇa agram tatas sapta yavam smṛtam
tri yavam śrotraradhram syāt nālau tri ardha aṅgula āyatau

original: kuṇḍalena yutau tau hi bhavetāṃ kolakādhikau || 67/145 ||
analyzed: kuṇḍalena yutau tau hi bhavetām kolaka adhikau
nāsīna āla samau nīvra vyāsa ardha dvi catur yavau
ardha mātra adhikau aṣṭa mātrau vā śravaṇau smṛtau
lakāra āvarta vat jñeyā piñcasī sārdha mātrikā
śrotre kalā antaram nimnam nata vṛtta aṅga vat bahis
śrotra cūliḥ yava vyāsā nirgata avanata kriyā
śrotra pṛṣṭham tathā śrotra samam ūrdhve daśa ardhakam
lalāṭa antāt dṛś antam tu dvi mātram ṣaṣ yava adhikam
tasmāt sapta yava upāṅgaḥ tasmāt tri ardha aṅgulam mukham
ālekhya lekhane tu ardha yava ūnam śrotram aṅgulam
śeṣam tu mukha tāram syāt netra śrotra antaram matam
mūla madhya agram na asyāḥ tu vistāre kīrtitam kramāt
pṛ
puṭau sapta yava vyāsa āyāmau vaṃśasya vistṛtiḥ
mātrā śrotra aṅga pañca ardha aṅgula āyāmā tu mastake
puṣkaraḥ ṣaṣ yava utsedhaḥ tad madhye yava vistaraḥ
puṭau niṣpāva vat proktau na ati unnati samanvitau
puṭa tvac yava nīvrā syāt nāsikā ardha aṅgula unnatiḥ
gojī mūlāt puṭa antam tu tat vyāsasya samucchrayaḥ
nāsā agram tila puṣpa ābham yavena ālambitam puṭāt
netram vā dina padma uttham āraktam śveta maṇḍalam
dvi catur yava tāra uccā gojiḥ āsya ūrdhva madhya gā
ā nimna ardha tri mātre tu ūrdhvoṣṭavipulāyate
syāt trivarga uttarā pāliḥ yavena eva adharā uṣṭa gā
unnata āyata vistāre ṣaṣ yavā ṣaṣ yava adhikā
mātrā mātrā adhara uṣṭasya sa madhya ucca ānata avadhiḥ
tuṇḍīra khaṇḍa saṃkāśam kiṃśuka prasava chavi
hanu cakram atha śliṣṭam grīvāyāḥ tri aṅgula udgatam
grīvā pañca aṅgula vyāsā vyāsa triguṇa nāsikā
aṃsau pañca aṅgula vyāsau adhyardha uccau hanoḥ adhas
hanu cakra dvi mātra ardham āsya rūpam tu pūrvavat
ūrdhve dvi ardha yavāḥ dantāḥ dvi yavāḥ vipula unnatāḥ
tebhyaḥ ūrdhva na āyata vyāsāḥ adhas dantāḥ tu dantataḥ

original: yavārdhenādhikā daṃṣṭrā dantāḥ snigdhāḥ samāḥ sthitāḥ |
analyzed: yava ardhena adhikāḥ daṃṣṭrāḥ dantāḥ snigdhāḥ samāḥ sthitāḥ
su snigdha añjana rocīṃṣi pakṣma romāṇi yojayet
aśītiḥ navatiḥ vā api saṃkhyayā saṃmatāni ca

original: keśāstu ṛjavaḥ śuddhāḥ sūkṣmāḥ snidhyāḥ samāsitāḥ || 67/164 ||
analyzed: keśāḥ tu ṛjavaḥ śuddhāḥ sūkṣmāḥ snidhyāḥ samāsitāḥ
sa alakam ca sa sīmantam sa dhammilla lalāṭa yuj
yoṣitām vadanam kuryāt su prakāram manoharam
bāhumūla viśālaḥ tu grīvā tāra samaḥ mataḥ
pakṣaḥ kakṣāntaram tasya tāraḥ saptadaśa aṅgulam  /
hikkāyāḥ daśa mātra antam vidheyam stana cūcukam
tad antaram dvi bhāgam syāt kukṣeḥ api atha vakṣasi
stanau pañca aṅgula utsedhau vṛttau dvividha cūcukau
mūle sapta aṅgula vyāsau aśvattha dala saṃmukhau  /
su vṛttau antare hi uccam vakṣaḥ ntar vihita avadhi
caturdaśa aṅgula antam tu stana antam hṛdaya avadhi
mūla bāhu dvaya antam syāt ekonatriṃśat aṅgulam
hikkā adhas bāhu dairghyam tu dvāviṃśati aṅgulam bhavet  /
kūrparam syāt catur mātram prakoṣṭhaḥ dvādaśa aṅgulaḥ
maṇibandhasya vistāram tri yavena adhikā kalā
dvi yavena kalā nīvram pāṇi mūla talam matam
āyāmaḥ madhyama aṅgulyāḥ tala āyāma samaḥ mataḥ
mūla aṅguli viśālasya tala agra bahulam samam
catuṣpañca yavaḥ tu agra nakha uṅguṣṭhaḥ dvi parva bhāj
ṣaṣ pañca yava mūla agrā catur ardha aṅgula āyatā  /
anyonya eka ghana upeta mūla madhya agra parva bhāj
tri catur yava vistāra śyāma rakta nakha anvitā
prādeśinī aṅguliḥ tasyāḥ yava mātrā adhika āyatā
ekonaviṃśat tris pañca yava mūla agranāhikā
prāgvat nakha tri parva agrā sā matā madhyamā aṅguliḥ
anāmikā pradeśinyā samānā māna lakṣaṇāt  /
tri mātra dvi yava āyāmā mūle pañca yavā tatas
agre catur yava adhyardha tri yava ardha nakha anvitā
prāgvat tri parva saṃyuktā su vṛttā sā kaniṣṭhikā
mūla ādi agrāḥ su vṛttāḥ syuḥ aṅgulyaḥ su samāhitāḥ
antar hasta tale hi etat nimna tulya talam bahis
bahis talasya mūlam tu maṇibandhāt tatas adhikam
pṛ
rekhām su raktā su snigdhā śrīvatsa ādi aṅka su chaviḥ
gomukha ākāra vat hastaḥ yuvatīnām vidhīyate
hikkā sūtrāt adhas yāvat āyāmaḥ ntar ṣaṣ aṣṭabhiḥ
tri ardha dvi ardha kalā tasya mūla madhya agra vistaraḥ
ā madhya aṅguli yoṣāṇām eṣa hasta vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
adhara uṣṭha avadheḥ grīvā tri mātrā syāt tathā kakud
mātrā mātrā unnatiḥ tasyāḥ tiryak kakṣe yava ardhakam
pṛṣṭhe kakṣa avadhe rekhā daśa kolaka saṃmitā  /
grīvāyāḥ kaṭi sūtra ekaviṃśat aṅgula dairghya bhāj
kaṭyāḥ tu tuṇḍataḥ tālam pṛṣṭam ṣaṣ yava kolakam
pṛṣṭhe kaṭi anta vistāraḥ ca ekaviṃśati mātrakaḥ
pṛṣṭhe nābhi guhā sāmye śroṇiḥ saptadaśa aṅgulā
ūru mūlāt tri mātrā uccam sphic piṇḍam ca aṣṭa mātrakam
sphic tāra aṅga avadheḥ tulya lekhā lekhyā mukhe mukhe
ekādaśa aṅgulam madhya vyāsaḥ triguṇa nāha yuj
vali traya yutam kāryam śāta udara samam śubham
ardha aṅgula su vistīrṇam tāvat gambhīra saṃyutam
pradakṣiṇa krama āvartā nābhiḥ kāryā muni īśvarāḥ
śroṇiḥ saptadaśa vyāsā kaṭiḥ tris sapta mātrikaḥ
īṣat nimna talam kāryam nitamba antam trikolakam
aṣṭa mātra samā yoniḥ kariṇaḥ śirasā samā
aśvattha dala vat bāhya ākṛtiḥ grāhyā manoharā
lekhya udara gatā romarāji rāmadana āspadam
snigdhā eṣā dvandva ṣaṣ gūḍha maṇi roma vivarjitam
varāṅgam aṅganānām tu vidhātavyam vipaścitā
yoni antāt kaṭikā pārśve rekhe dve vidhivat mate
kaṭiḥ kāla aṅgula anta sthā mūla ūroḥ upari sthitā
tālam viśālam mūla ūroḥ madhya ūroḥ pañcakolakam
jānu ante tri kalaḥ ca ūruḥ tri mātram jānu maṇḍalam
tad pañca aṅgula vistāram jaṅghā bhāgaḥ sa ṣaṣ yavaḥ
nalakā tri aṅgula vyāsā triguṇīkṛta nāhakā
hasti hasta nibhau ūrū viromam jānu maṇḍalam
budbuda agra upamā jaṅghā nalaka aṃśa avadheḥ samā
syāt aṅguṣṭha kaniṣṭhā agra pārṣṇiḥ aṅghri tala āyatā  /
aṅguṣṭhaḥ tu aṅgula āyāmaḥ vistāra ūrdhva aṅgula udhikaḥ
vyāsena ṣaṣ yava āyāmā pādāṅguṣṭhāt yava adhikā  /
pradeśinī yava ardha ūnā ca anyayoḥ ca yava kṣayaḥ
yava ardhena viśālaḥ syat aṅguṣṭhe ṣaṣ yavaḥ nakhaḥ  /
anyāsām aṅgulīnām tu nakhaḥ tri dvi aṃśaka ugrataḥ
sāmānya lakṣaṇam proktam pratimānām dvijottamāḥ
yava ādi yava vṛddhyā aṣṭa yava antam bera karmaṇi

original: vṛddhyā hānyā prayoktavyaṃ sarveṣvaṅgeṣu vā dvijāḥ || 67/201 ||
analyzed: vṛddhyā hānyā prayoktavyam sarveṣu aṅgeṣu vā dvijāḥ
tithi mātram samārabhya vyoma mātra vivardhanāt
tri aṅgula antam śiraḥ cakram su vṛttam makara anvitam
nirgamantu tad ardhena makuṭa uccam tri tālakam
ārabhya aṅgula hānyā eka tala antam parikalpayet
pañca aṅgulam samārabhya vyoma mātra vivardhanāt
triṃśat aṅgula paryantam dhanuḥ bāṇa ādi yuktitaḥ
kalpayet āyudham yuktyā prabhā ādyam ca prakalpayet
iti kāmika ākhye mahā tantre sāmānya pratimā lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ
pañcaṣaṣṭitamaḥ paṭalaḥ
triśūla sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ
pṛ
triśūla sthāpanam vakṣye tad lakṣma syāt anekadhā
candanaḥ ca madhūkaḥ ca khadiraḥ saralaḥ tathā
kramukaḥ saptaparṇaḥ ca vakulaḥ kunda candanau
piṇḍikaḥ timiśaḥ raktacandanaḥ panasaḥ tathā
kadambaḥ śiṃśupāhvaḥ ca dhanvinaḥ śūlinaḥ kujāḥ
panasaḥ devādāruḥ ca padma tinduka saṃjñakau
tilakaḥ sapta parṇaḥ ca viṣṇoḥ śūla arthe īritāḥ
vakulaḥ kuṭajāhvaḥ ca piṇḍitaḥ tiniśaḥ punar
dhanvinaḥ ca arjuna aśvatthau brahmaṇaḥ pādapāḥ matāḥ

original: yasya devasya yā devī tasyāḥ tadvṛkṣa eva hi || 68/6 ||
analyzed: yasya devasya yā devī tasyāḥ tad vṛkṣaḥ eva hi
vaikaṃkataḥ ca khādiryaḥ śamī durgā kujāḥ matāḥ
jyeṣṭhāyāḥ pāṭalī proktā śiva ākhyaḥ sapta mātṛṣu
khādiraḥ sarva devānām kṣīriṇī khādiraḥ tathā
sarvāsām devatānām ca śrīvṛkṣaḥ samprakīrtitaḥ
gaṇapa skanda śāstṝṇām mātṝṇām śiva pādapāḥ
sarve sarvatra vā karyāḥ kṛtya nāha anusāriṇaḥ
tāmra ārakūṭa raupyaiḥ vā śātakumbhena vā matāḥ
ekasya ca eka vṛkṣaḥ syāt bahu vṛkṣaḥ tu na iṣyate
dravya saṃgrahaṇam kuryāt tad vidhana prakārataḥ
keśa aṅguli ādi māna artham māna ardham dāru vat nayet
brahmadaṇḍasya vistāraḥ pañca aṅgulam iti smṛtam
meḍhra ādi nābhi paryantam caturaśra ākṛtiḥ bhavet
nābheḥ hikkā antakam ca eva vasvaśraḥ paribhāṣitaḥ
tasya ūrdhvam vakulam kuryāt pakṣa daṇḍasya vistaraḥ

original: saptāṅgula iti jñeyā taddhanetu kalā bhavet || 68/14 ||
analyzed: sapta aṅgulaḥ iti jñeyā tad hanetu kalā bhavet
ubhayoḥ agrayoḥ tasya dvi mātre ca śikhāyatiḥ
vyoma mātra pramāṇena śikhā vistāraḥ iṣyate
eka dvi tri catur saṃkhyāḥ śikhā antāḥ ca prakīrtitāḥ
randhram viṣṇu aṃśa tāreṇa vakṣaḥ daṇḍasya madhyame  /
hikkā sūtrāt adhastāt tu vakṣodaṇḍasya saṃsthitiḥ
kaṭidaṇḍasya vistāraḥ sapta aṅgulaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
kalā jñeyā ghane tasya pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
agni aṅgula pramāṇena śikhā tiryak mukhā bhavet
brahma bhāgasya tāreṇa tad madhye suṣiram nayet
caturaśrasya tāreṇa māna ardham dvi aṅgulam nyaset
dvi mātram nābhi adhastāt tu hitvā atra kaṭi daṇḍakam
yojayet brahmadaṇḍe tu su snigdham su dṛḍham nayet
ūru daṇḍa agra vistāraḥ kolaka iti ca saṃmatam

original: tasya mūle tu suṣiraṃ śikhāmānena kārayet || 68/21 ||
analyzed: tasya mūle tu suṣiram śikhā mānena kārayet
tasya agre tu śikhām kuryāt pakṣa mātra pramāṇataḥ

original: kaṭidaṇḍe śikhāyāṃ ca ūrudaṇḍaṃ ca yojayet || 68/22 ||
analyzed: kaṭi daṇḍe śikhāyām ca ūru daṇḍam ca yojayet  /
jaṅghā āyāmena saṃgrāhyam catur mātra samanvitam
jaṅghā mūlasya vistāraḥ tri aṅgulaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: tasya cāgre tu vistāraḥ sārdhamātra iti smṛtaḥ |
analyzed: tasya ca agre tu vistāraḥ sārdha mātraḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: tasya mūle tu suṣiraṃ śikhāmānena kārayet || 68/24 ||
analyzed: tasya mūle tu suṣiram śikhā mānena kārayet
vakṣaḥ daṇḍa śikhāyām tu bāhu daṇḍam tu yojayet
yojayet tūru daṇḍam tu jānu maṇḍalakam budhaḥ
jānu maṇḍala vistāraḥ yuga aṅgulam udāhṛtaḥ
āyāmaḥ tad samaḥ jñeyaḥ jaṅghā tatra tad ardhataḥ
pṛ
taladaṇḍasya vistāraḥ catur mātram udāhṛtaḥ
bāhumūlasya vistāraḥ guṇa aṅgulam udāhṛtam
tasya agrasya ca vistāraḥ sārdha pakṣa aṅgulaḥ mataḥ
sapta mātra pramāṇena tad mūle suṣiram nayet
vakṣaḥ daṇḍa śikhāyām tu bāhumūlam tu yojayet
prakoṣṭha mūla vistāraḥ tri mātraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
tasya agrasya ca vistāraḥ sārdha aṅgulam udāhṛtaḥ
tad mūlena dvi mātreṇa suṣiram kārayet tatas
bāhu grasta śikhāḥ ca eva prakoṣṭhena eva yojayet
vakṣaḥ daṇḍāt samārabhya kaṭi daṇḍa antara kramāt
pārśva daṇḍa āyatam jñeyam tat tāram kolakam bhavet
tad ghanam tad samam jñeyam pārśva daṇḍasya ca upari
adhas ca suṣiram kārya bheka aṅgula pramāṇataḥ
vakṣaḥ daṇḍa kaṭī daṇḍe yojayet pārśva daṇḍakam
pārśva jam daṇḍayoḥ madhye agre ca ṛṣi mātrakam
strīṇām ca eva viśeṣeṇa varjayet pārśva daṇḍake
eteṣām daṇḍa māne tu māṃsa mānam tyajet budhaḥ
pāda aṅgulam samārabhya pāda aṅgula vivardhanāt
dvi mātrā antaḥ vidheyaḥ syāt hāniḥ vṛddhiḥ ca yuktitaḥ
brahmadaṇḍa intya daṇḍeṣu dvātriṃśat gṛhyatām dvijāḥ
śiraḥ kara talam karṇam ambaram caraṇa ādikam
sva mānāt ardha mātram tu hīnam yuktyā eva kārayet  /
sthānakasya evam ākhyātam viśeṣaḥ kaścid āsane
brahmadaṇḍasya mūle tu yojayet tu yuga aṅgulam
jaṅghā mūla pradeśaḥ tu adhyardha aṅgula hīna yuj
śūla lakṣaṇam ākhyātam tat sthāpanam iha ucyate
kālaḥ api pūrvavat neyaḥ tu aṅkura arpaṇam eva ca
maṇḍapaḥ kuṇḍa kḷptiḥ tu nava pañca eka saṃkhyayā
caturaśrāṇi kuṇḍāni tad diś kuṇḍāni vā tathā
śilpinam ca visṛjya atha puṇyāham vācayet tatas
vāstu homam ca kṛtvā ante sthaṇḍilam kārayet dvijāḥ
saṅklpya śayanam tatra jñātvā brahma ādi daṇḍakān
pañcagavyena saṃprokṣya tatas pañcāmṛta ādibhiḥ
saṃsnāpya śuddha toyena vastreṇa ācchādya pūjayet
āsanam kalpayitvā tu śayyāyām āsana aṇubhiḥ
mūrti bhūtam tu tat śūlam hṛdayena niveśayet
kautukam bandhayitvā tu tat samantāt ghaṭān nyaset
sa kūrcān hema saṃyuktān sa vastrān uda pūritān
tad tad mūrti manum madhye lokeśān paritas yajet
tattva tattva īśvara upetān mūrti mūrti īśvarān nyaset
brahmabhiḥ sakalīkṛtya mūrtim tatra niveśayet
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya mūrtimantram anusmaran
pāyasam sannivedya atha homa karma samārabhet
kṛtvā kuṇḍa ādi saṃskāram mūrtim āvāhya tarpayet  /
samidh anna ājya lājaiḥ ca tila sarṣapa saṃyutam
pālāśa udumbara aśvattha vaṭāḥ pūrva ādi dikṣu ca
śamī apāmārga mādhūka śrīvṛkṣāḥ tu agni koṇataḥ
pradhānasya palāśaḥ syāt śata saṃkhyā pradhānake  /
daśa aṃśe brahmabhiḥ homaḥ tathā netreṇa saṃmataḥ
tattva tattva īśvara ādyaiḥ ca pratyekam tritayam kramāt
tatas pūrṇāhutim kṛtvā prabhāte mūrtipaiḥ guruḥ

original: snātvā devaṃ ghaṭaṃ mantrī saṃpūjyāgniṃ samīpataḥ || 68/52 ||
analyzed: snātvā devam ghaṭam mantrī saṃpūjya agnim samīpatas

original: sthitvā chidraṃ nirasyātha pūrṇāṃ mūrtyā pradāpayet |
analyzed: sthitvā chidram nirasya atha pūrṇām mūrtyā pradāpayet
su muhūrte su lagne tu prāpta pūjaḥ guru tamaḥ
saṃgṛhya mūladhāmnaḥ tu pradakṣiṇam anuvrajan
praviśya garbha geham tu jñātvā brahma ādi bhāgakān
pṛ
sthānaka ādi vibhāgena kṛtvā sthānam ghaṭīkṛtam
iṣṭakā aṃśa ādikaiḥ tatra nyaset ādhāra saṃjñakam
sthānaṃka āsana suptāḥ ca yāna gāḥ gamana unmukhāḥ
nāṭya utsukāḥ ca ṣoḍhā syāt sthānaka ādhāra saṃjñataḥ

original: tathaiva nṛttasaktā ca gamanabhiratā hi ca || 68/57 ||
analyzed: tathā eva nṛtta saktā ca gamana abhiratā hi ca
sthāna ga ukṣa ādi saṃsthā syāt āsana sthāḥ tu pīṭha gāḥ

original: śayyāsaktā tu suptā syātsā ca prāyo'sya neṣyate || 68/58 ||
analyzed: śayyā āsaktā tu suptā syāt sā ca prāyas sya na iṣyate
viṣṇu ādi pratibhā sā syāt ādhāram tu adhunā ucyate
śūla mūla viśālena adhyardham ādhāra mānakam
tad bera aṅgula mānena eka aṅgula vivardhanāt
catur aṅgula mānam syāt samam syāt caturaśrakam
tat ghanam trividham proktam tasmāt eka eka vardhanāt
catur mātrā anta mānam syāt kriyā māna anusārataḥ
suvarṇa tāra tāmra ādyaiḥ pāda pādyaiḥ tu vā bhavet

original: pādāni nava tanmadhye kṛtvā kūṭayutāni vā || 68/62 ||
analyzed: pādāni nava tad madhye kṛtvā kūṭa yutāni vā
ratna ādyam vinyaset tatra prāc ukta vidhinā guruḥ
tatra saṃsthāpayet vāgmī tatra mūrtim anusmaran
brahmadaṇḍa inya daṇḍān ca yojayet ukta vartmanā
athavā pīṭhikā utsedham brahmadaṇḍasya mūlataḥ
śūla dairghya anvitam kṛtvā iṣṭa māna anvitam tu vā
kṛtvā tad avadhi sthāne sthāpyam vā ādhāra saṃjñakam
sthira ādyam pīṭhabandha ādyaiḥ bandhayet suṣiram yathā
mūrti nirgata śūlaiḥ ca su sthiraiḥ sāra dāru jaiḥ
iṣṭa nāha samāyuktaiḥ iṣṭa saṃkhyā samanvitaiḥ
brahmadaṇḍa ādi daṇḍe tu yojayitvā guru tamaḥ
sthairyam sampādayet atra kriyamāṇa anusārataḥ
ṛjubhiḥ loha paṭṭaiḥ ca loha kīlaiḥ anekadhā
bandhayitvā yathākarma ārdram vā vastra veṣṭanam
kalka cikkaṇaka ādyaiḥ tu saṃpūrṇa aṅgam yathā nasat
varṇaiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ citram kārayet pratimokta vat
śilpibhiḥ citra vittamaiḥ
nayana unmīlanam kuryāt citrakarma avasānake
nayana unmīlanāt pūrvam dravya mātram tu tat bhavet

original: tatra chedādikaṃ ceṣṭaṃ tadūrdhvaṃ neṣyate dvijāḥ |
analyzed: tatra cheda ādikam ca iṣṭam tad ūrdhvam na iṣyate dvijāḥ
tatra pratiṣṭhā kartavyā sthāpana ukta vidhānataḥ
sthānāya eva tala vyāsa mānena ādhāra saṃjñikam
jaṅghā ūrū pratimā daṇḍān sthāpayitvā tad ūrdhvatas
kaṭi daṇḍam ca saṃyojya brahmadaṇḍe niyojayet
sarva daṇḍa ādi saṃyuktam kṛtvā ca pratimā ādikam

original: paṭṭādyairbandhayitvā tu tāṃ śayyāyāṃ nidhāya ca |
analyzed: paṭṭa ādyaiḥ bandhayitvā tu tām śayyāyām nidhāya ca
tattva mūrti ādi vinyāsam kṛtvā tām sthāpayet tu vā
śailī ced pratimā śailam kuryāt ādhāra saṃjñakam
anyat sarvam samānam syāt kintu pāda śilā ādayaḥ
kṛtvā kūrcam kramāt kṣīṇam bala anugata mānakam
suṣire pīṭha madhye tu yathāsnigdham niyojayet
kṛtvā āsanam tu tad mantraiḥ bāhubhiḥ sakalīkṛtaḥ
mūrtimantrān nyaset kumbha toya gān pratimā hṛdi

original: tadambhasā tu saṃsnāpya lokapān parito nyaset |
analyzed: tad ambhasā tu saṃsnāpya lokapān paritas nyaset
tat śailam sudhayā ālepya vastreṇa āveṣṭya citrayet  /
śūla sthāpana kāle tu mūrtimantram anunyaset
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre triśūla sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamaḥ
devatā sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ
pṛ
devatā sthāpanam sthānam vakṣyetha muni puṅgavāḥ

original: grāme vā nagare vāpi pattane rājadhānike || 69/1 ||
analyzed: grāme vā nagare vā api pattane rājadhānike  /
ādau nadyāḥ taṭe puṇye devatāyataneṣu ca
samudra tīre setau ca puṣkariṇyāḥ taṭeṣu ca
mahā jala samīpe vā mahājana samīpa ge

analyzed: udyāne puṇya deśe vā niṣkalam sakalam tu vā

analyzed: śailam vā loha jam vārkṣam ratna jam mṛṇmayam tu vā

original: ekaṃ vāpi dvayaṃ vāpi trayaṃ vā brahmamandire || 69/6 ||
analyzed: ekam vā api dvayam vā api trayam vā brahma mandire

original: tadantaraṃ tathā kṛtvā daivikaṃ vārṣakaṃ tathā |
analyzed: tad antaram tathā kṛtvā daivikam vārṣakam tathā

original: idaṃ brahmādikādyaṃ tu grāmādau vā viyojayet |
analyzed: idam brahma ādika ādyam tu grāma ādau vā viyojayet
niṣkalam brahmabhāge tu sakalam daivika aṃśake
grāma ādīnām niveśe tu brahma aṃśe dairghika aṃśake
sthāpayet mānuṣam vā api mātuḥ kecid idam bhavet

original: citrayuktaṃ tu tadberaṃ bāhye paiśācike api |
analyzed: citra yuktam tu tat beram bāhye paiśācike api
rakṣaḥ gandharva yakṣa ādyāḥ piśāca ādyāḥ ca mūrtipāḥ

original: mānuṣe vātha paiśāce dvijānāṃ vāsa iṣyate |
analyzed: mānuṣe vā atha paiśāce dvijānām vāsaḥ iṣyate

vāpīm ca āgneya deśe tu go vāsam kūpa saṃyutam
nairṛte vāpaṇa sthānam devālaya yutam tu vā
vāyau devālayam kuryāt vyatyāse vyasanam bhavet  /
kṣudra vāstau tu tat sarvam na iṣyate brahmabhāgike
dvija vāsaḥ tu tat sarvam śarve vā atha vidhīyate

original: varuṇe viṣṇuvāsaḥ syātkeśavaṃ śarvaṃ eva ca |
analyzed: varuṇe viṣṇu vāsaḥ syāt keśavam śarvam eva ca

cauḥ sahasra paryantam padam paiśācikam kramāt

vāstu paiśācike moṭī madanaḥ sapta mātaraḥ
moṭī śāstṛ vihīnāḥ vā sapta devāḥ tathā matāḥ

analyzed: tad ūrdhvam tu sahasra ante gaurī vā kamalālayā

eteṣu anyatama artham tu śivaḥ gaurī vināyakaḥ
skandaḥ tatra vidheyaḥ vā brahma bhāga ādi bhāgake  /
bāhye raudrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
vāstu vinyāsa tuṣṭāḥ tu prāk atra sthāpitāḥ surāḥ
ukta deśenya deśe vā na te vāstu aṅga bhājinaḥ

analyzed: vinā pratiṣṭhām devānām vāstu nyāsam katham bhavet

santyakta mārṣa sthānāt yathā deva ālayāḥ tu iha
purātanāt tu artha ālocya vāstu nyāsa samācaret

analyzed: sthāna ādīnām yathā pīḍā na syāt sarvam nayet
brahma daivika bhāga ādi sthitā pīḍā na doṣa dā
tasmāt ukteṣu deśeṣu marma ādyam parigṛhya ca
nāgara ādi prabhedena diś bhedena viśeṣataḥ
