iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre devatā sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ saptaṣaṣṭitamaḥ
pratimānām pratiṣṭhām tu pravakṣyāmi samāsatas
dravya saṃgrahaṇam pūrvam bimba nirmāṇam eva ca
paścāt maṇḍapa nirmāṇam ratna nyāsam atas param
nayana unmīlanam paścāt bera śuddhiḥ anantaram
grāma pradakṣiṇam paścāt jalaveśa uṣṭamam bhavet
maṇḍapa alaṅkatiḥ paścāt vāstu homam atas param
śayyā kḷptiḥ tatas proktā pratimā sthāpanam tatas
tatas kautukabandhaḥ syāt śayana ārohaṇam punar
kumbha saṃsthāpanam paścāt arcanam tad anantaram
tatas murti ādi vinyāsaḥ homa kāryam anantaram
dakṣiṇā dānam ante syāt mantra nyāsam atas param

original: ataḥ paraṃ ca snapanamarccanaṃ syādataḥ param |
analyzed: atas param ca snapanam arccanam syāt atas param
dvāviṃśatiḥ kriyāḥ proktāḥ tāsām lakṣaṇam ucyate  /
śilā mṛd loha sat vṛkṣa ratna dhātu sudhā paṭāḥ
dantaḥ ca bera nirmāṇe tasya saṃgraham ucyate
su muhūrte su lagne tu nakṣatra karaṇa anvite
śilā ādi sthānam āsādya sthaṇḍile pūjita īśvaraḥ
huta agniḥ pūjita āśā bhṛt datta bhūta baliḥ śuciḥ
śilā ādyam prokṣya vastreṇa varmaṇā āveṣṭya pūjayet  /
hṛdi vastreṇa saṃveṣṭya ṭaṅka ādyam madhu sarpiṣā
āplāvya tris prahāreṇa sphoṭayet astra mantrataḥ
guroḥ anujñayā śilpī tathā evā sphoṭayet punar
saṃpūjya vastra haima ādyaiḥ ācāryam sthapatim tathā
tasmāt saṃgṛhya tat dravyam nayet karma kuṭīm punar
ādau siktam dravībhūtam astreṇa āstrāvya vāriṇā

original: maṇḍape sthaṇḍilaṃ kṛtvā siktaṃ tatraiva nikṣipet |
analyzed: maṇḍape sthaṇḍilam kṛtvā siktam tatra eva nikṣipet
saṃpūjya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ hṛdā vastreṇa veṣṭayet
tat dravyam śilpine da tvā kārayet lakṣaṇa anvitam
tasya nirmāṇa kāle tu uttara abhimukhaḥ guruḥ  /
pratimā mūlamantram tu japet aṣṭa uttaram śatam
tasyāḥ ca uttara digbhāge śānti homam tu kārayet
deśikam śilpinam ca eva pūjayet kāñcana ādibhiḥ
vṛkṣa saṃgrahaṇe vṛkṣam saṃpūjya evam vadet guruḥ
pṛ
śrīniketa namaḥ tubhyam deva juṣṭa vanaspate
saṅkrāmaḥ syāt iti sthānam guṇavat yat manoramam
visṛjya anena mantreṇa chada ātmānam nirucyate
ghṛta aktena kuṭhāreṇa chindyāt mṛtyuñjayam smaran
tāpa mṛtyu mahāroha gulma uccāṭanam agnitaḥ
dravya saṃgrahaṇam ca evam nirmāṇam pūrvam eva tu
pratimā lakṣaṇam proktam maṇḍapam tu adhunā ucyate
prāsādasya catur dikṣu maṇḍapam ca agra pārśvayoḥ
tri hastam tu samārabhya ca ekaika kara vṛddhitaḥ
pañcādaśa kara antam tu kuryāt lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
atra anuktam tu yat kiñcid tat sarvam pūrvavat nayet
nava pañca eka kuṇḍāni pūrvavat parikalpayet
caturaśrāṇi vṛttāni tad diś aśrāṇi vā nayet
śaktīnām ca eva sarvāsām yoni ākārāṇi kalpayet
maṇḍapam samalaṅkṛtvā pīṭham tatra vinikṣipet
nava paṭṭa samāyuktam pañca paṭṭa yutam tu vā
eka paṭṭa yutam vā api pūjayet candana ādibhiḥ
ādhāra ākhyam anantam ca madhyame vinyaset guruḥ
lokapālān ca caturaḥ ratnāni vividhāni ca
māṇikyam indranīlam ca vaiḍūryam ca pravālakam

original: muktā vajraṃ tathā puṣparāgaṃ gomedakaṃ tathā || 70/27 ||
analyzed: muktā vajram tathā puṣparāgam gomedakam tathā
marakatam ca eva ratnāni navaratna ādi pañcakam
pañcaratnam iti proktam māṇikkam ca ekam eva vā

original: vajraṃ vā madhye proktaṃ mahāveśamiti smṛtam |
analyzed: vajram vā madhye proktam mahāveśam iti smṛtam
sva sva lokapa mantraiḥ ca madhya ādi kramatas nyaset
devam ratna upari nyastvā su snigdham kārayet dṛḍham
śailam ced sthāpane kāle ratna ādyam vidhivat nyaset
śūla sthāpana kāle tu nyaset ratnāni mṛṇmaye
anyeṣām ratna vinyāsam varjayet tu viśeṣataḥ
netra dvaya yuta ṛkṣe tu kārayet netra mokṣaṇam
su gupte maṇḍape ramye gomayena anulepite
pracchanna paṭa saṃyukte sarva alaṅkāra saṃyute
sthaṇḍilam tatra kartavyam aṣṭa droṇa ādi brīhibhiḥ
tila taṇḍula saṃyuktam lāja puṣpa samanvitam
tasya madhye nyaset bimbam prāc mukham deśika uttamaḥ
hema sūcī prahārābhyām netramantram anusmaran
prathamam dakṣiṇam netram dvitīyam vāma netrakam
lalāṭa stham tṛtīyam tu lekhayet pūjayet guruḥ

original: pakṣmarekhāṃ purā kṛtvā tato vai dṛṣṭimaṇḍalam || 70/36 ||
analyzed: pakṣma rekhām purā kṛtvā tatas vai dṛṣṭi maṇḍalam
jyotiḥ maṇḍalam ālikhya netra mocanam ācaret
tathā eva unmīlanam śilpī vajra kāñcana sūcitaḥ
puṣpāyaḥ nirmitena iva ṭaṅkena eva trilocane
nāsikā karṇa vaktrāṇi liṅgam pāyum ca mocayet  /
tad tad deva aṅga bhūtānām nayana unmīlanam nayet
citra ābhāsa ādi devānām tad tad varṇaiḥ samācaret
tadā akṣi mocanam kuryāt hema tūlikayā guruḥ
udvāsya śilpinam paścāt tasya agre sthaṇḍilam nayet  /

original: bimbaṃ tasyopari nyastvā hṛdayena tu mantrataḥ |
analyzed: bimbam tasya upari nyastvā hṛdayena tu mantrataḥ
sa sūtrān sa apidhānān ca kalaśān aṣṭa dikṣu ca
sa vastrān vāri saṃyuktān sa kūrcān pallavaiḥ yutān
sva mantraiḥ abhitas nyastvā lokeśān tatra pūjayet  /
kṣūdra iṣṭa kalaśān hitvā ca anyat sarvam samācaret

original: svarṇayā dūrvayā netraṃ madhvājyābhyāṃ tu tarpayet || 70/43 ||
analyzed: svarṇayā dūrvayā netram madhu ājyābhyām tu tarpayet
hṛdā vā netramantreṇa mantritābhyām guru uttamaḥ
loha je śaila je vārkṣe ratna je pi evam ācaret  /
pṛ
anyeṣām api sarveṣām bhāvayet tarpaṇa kriyām
tarjanī anāmikā madhye sūrya soma agni locane
hiraṇya nakha saṃprotaiḥ nyaset tat bīja saṃyutam

original: sauvarṇe rājate tāmre kāṃsye vātha śarāvake || 70/46 ||
analyzed: sauvarṇe rājate tāmre kāṃsye vā atha śarāvake
ghṛtena madhunā ca eva pratyekam prastha pūritam
tad ardhena ardha pādena pūritam vā pṛthak pṛṭhak
ghṛtam pradarśayet mantrī netramantram anusmaran
darśayet madhu pātram tu mṛtyujit mantram uccaran

original: hṛdayena tu mantrajñaḥ tavatsāṃ gāṃ pradarśayet |
analyzed: hṛdayena tu mantra jñaḥ tavatsām gām pradarśayet
bīja mukhyena mantreṇa dhānya rāśim pradarśayet
śiva ādi daśa bhāra antam teṣām mānam prakīrtitam
brāhmaṇān darśayet paścāt pavamānam anusmaran
tena eva darśayet kanyām bhūṣitām sarva bhūṣaṇaiḥ
pracchanna paṭam āvarjya jana saṃghān pradarśayet
mṛd bhasma kuśa go mūtra gomayaiḥ pañcagavyakaiḥ
tvaksāraiḥ pratimā śuddhim citra ādau darpaṇe nayet  /
vastraiḥ gandhaiḥ ca mālabhiḥ bhūṣayet bhūṣaṇa arhakaiḥ
grāma pradakṣiṇam kuryāt sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
grāma pradakṣiṇam vā api citra ādau parivarjayet

original: mahattare vā tattyājyaṃ prāpayettu jalaṃ tataḥ |
analyzed: mahattare vā tat tyājyam prāpayet tu jalam tatas
jala madhye prapām kṛtvā catur gātra samanvitam
maṇḍitām darbha mālā ādyaḥ tīre sama tale punar
sthaṇḍilam sthāpayitvā tu gandha ādyaiḥ arcayet guruḥ
tasya agre sthaṇḍilam kṛtvā kalaśān aṣṭa vinyaset
lokapāla adhipān tatra hema āḍhyān pūjayet guruḥ
vyapohya bhūṣaṇa arham tu vastreṇa ācchādya varmaṇā
lamba kūrcena saṃyuktam dvātriṃśat sammitena tu
pīṭhe vā phalaka ādau vā śāyayet jala madhyame
gaṅgā ādi tīrtham avāhya paritas kalaśān nyaset  /
eka ādi nava rātra antam veda tri dvi eka yāmakam
jala adhivāsanam kuryāt citra ādau darpaṇe na vā
maṇḍapam bhūṣayet paścāt paṭena mahatā āvṛtam
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra sahasra antān daśa adhikān

original: punyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu vāstuhomaṃ tu kārayet |
analyzed: punyāham vācayitvā tu vāstu homam tu kārayet
paryagnikaraṇam kṛtvā prokṣayet tu śiva ambhasā
puṇyāham vācayet paścāt sthaṇḍile vedikā upari
aṣṭa droṇaiḥ tad ardhaiḥ vā tad ardhaiḥ śālibhiḥ matam
tilaiḥ lājaiḥ ca darbhaiḥ ca puṣpaiḥ samyak prakalpayet
śayanam kalpayet ūrdhve carmaja ādyaiḥ anukramāt
prokṣayet puruṣeṇa eva hṛdā gandha ādibhiḥ yajet  /

original: jalāduttirya beraṃ tu snānaśvabhre tu vinyaset |
analyzed: jalāt uttirya beram tu snāna śvabhre tu vinyaset
vyapohya vastra kūrca accam snapanam pūrvavat nayet
vastreṇa eva tu saṃveṣṭya pūjayet hṛdayena tu
kautukam bandhayet paścāt hṛdā dakṣiṇa hastake

original: śaktīnāṃ caiva sarvāsāṃ vāme vā dakṣiṇe'pi vā || 70/67 ||
analyzed: śaktīnām ca eva sarvāsām vāme vā dakṣiṇe api vā
kumbhān saṃsthāpayet paścāt sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutān
sa sūtrān sa hiraṇyān ca sa kūrcān vastra saṃyutān
gandha udakena sampūrṇān phala pallava śobhitān
vinyasya paritas sarvān gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ yajet  /
mūrti nyāsam tatas kuryāt liṅga sthāpana mārgataḥ
ātma vidyām śiva ākhyam ca jānu karṇa śiraḥ vadhi
homa karma tad ante syāt prāc ukta vidhinā saha
palāśa udumbara aśvattha vaṭāḥ pūrva ādiṣu kramāt
pṛ
śamī apāmārga śrīvṛkṣa pippalaiḥ ca agni koṇataḥ
pradhānasya palāśaḥ syāt samidhaḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
samidh ājya carū lāja sarṣapāḥ ca eva vaiṇavāḥ
yava priyaṅgu śālyaḥ ca mudga māṣa kulatthakāḥ
madhu kṣīra gule saktu phala ādau udakāḥ smṛtāḥ
tri pañca sapta navabhiḥ rudraiḥ viśvaiḥ ca pakṣakaiḥ
dravyaiḥ vā saptadaśabhiḥ samastaiḥ homam ācaret
brahma ādi dikṣu khyātāni vidikṣu hṛdaya ādayaḥ
pradhāne mūlamantraḥ syāt aṅga brahma samāyutaḥ
pañcāgni ātanam ced tu hṛdaya ādīni varjayet
eka agni āyatanam ced tu dravyaiḥ ekatra homayet

original: sahasramardhaṃ tasyārdhaṃ śataṃ vāṣṭaśataṃ tu vā || 70/77 ||
analyzed: sahasram ardham tasya ardham śatam vā aṣṭaśatam tu vā
evam ardham ca daśabhiḥ mūlamantreṇa homayet
mūlāt daśa aṃśatas uṅgaiḥ tu sarvaiḥ brahma ādi homayet
tattva tattva īśvara ādyaiḥ ca homam pūrvavat ācaret
dravya ante vyāhṛtim kuryāt homa ante pūrṇayā yutam
sparśanam pūrvavat kuryāt śāntyambhaḥ prokṣaṇam tatas
atra anuktam tu yat sarvam liṅga sthāpana vat nayet
āgama adhyayanam dikṣu koṇe mantra japam nayet
āgama adhyayanam kuryāt īśāne dīkṣitaḥ tu iha
nṛtta geya samāyuktam stotra maṅgala vācakaiḥ
rātri śeṣam apohya atha prabhāte vimale tatas

original: deśiko mūrtipaiḥ sārdhaṃ kuryātsnānaṃ tu pūrvavat |
analyzed: deśikaḥ mūrtipaiḥ sārdham kuryāt snānam tu pūrvavat
mantra sannaddha kāyaḥ tu praviśya makha maṇḍapam
uddhṛtya pratimām pūrvam mukhe mūrtipa sannibhaḥ
vyapohya vastra kūrca ādīn yajet gandha ādibhiḥ hṛdā
kumbhān saṃpūjayet paścāt vahnikuṇḍeṣu pūjayet
aghora aṣṭaśatam prāyaścitta artham eva vā
vauṣaṭ antam hareṇa eva pūrṇāhutim ātha caret
ācāryam pūjayet tatra vastra hema aṅgulīyakaiḥ
pañca niṣkam samārabhya pañca niṣka vivardhanāt
dakṣiṇā navadhā proktā pratimānām niveśane
athavā ca daridraḥ tu niṣka ādyam pañca niṣkakān

original: dakṣiṇā tu guroḥ proktā tato hīnāṃ vivarjayet |
analyzed: dakṣiṇā tu guroḥ proktā tatas hīnām vivarjayet
anyeṣām ca eva sarveṣām pūrvavat dakṣiṇā bhavet
muhūrta nāḍikā pūrve sthāpanam tu samācaret
śiva kumbham samuddhṛtya vardhanyā saha deśikaḥ
parivāra ghaṭaiḥ yuktam sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
harmya pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā pratimā agre nayet ghaṭān
kumbhāt bījam samādāya pratimā hṛdi vinyaset
tad kumbha stha jalena eva snāpayet parameśvaram
vardhanyāḥ bījam ādāya tad pīṭhe vinyaset guruḥ

original: devena saha ceddevī tasyāstu hṛdi vinyaset ||
analyzed: devena saha ced devī tasyāḥ tu hṛdi vinyaset
vibhinna pīṭhām devī ced pṛthak sthāpanam ārabhet

original: mṛṇmaye tvardhacitre vā ābhāse ca paṭe tathā ||
analyzed: mṛṇmaye tu ardha citre vā ābhāse ca paṭe tathā
saudhe kaścid viśeṣaḥ usti teṣām eva atha sannidhau

original: darpaṇaṃ sthāpayitvā tu snāpanaṃ tatra kārayet ||
analyzed: darpaṇam sthāpayitvā tu snāpanam tatra kārayet

original: karmārcāyāstu pīṭhe vā kūrce vā snāpanaṃ sthale || 70/95 ||
analyzed: karma arcāyāḥ tu pīṭhe vā kūrce vā snāpanam sthale
arcana uktam samabhyarcya vastra ābharaṇa puṣpakaiḥ
prabhūtam tu haviḥ dadyāt tāmbūla ādi samanvitam

original: snapanaṃ kalpayedvā cedutsavena yutaṃ tu vā || 70/97 ||
analyzed: snapanam kalpayet vā ced utsavena yutam tu vā
atrā anuktam tu yat sarvam liṅga sthāpana vat nayet
sva pradhāne para aṅge ca sthāpanam ca evam īritam
parivāra samāyuktam svapradhānam iti smṛtam
itaram tad vihīnam syāt tat ca dvividham ucyate
antaraṅgam ca bāhya aṅgam ādya dhāma antara sthitam
pṛ
calam tat acalam vā api dhāma garbhagṛha ādike
mitti āśliṣṭam citra yuktam śailam vā grāma saṃsthitam
parivāra ālaya stham yat antaraṅgam iti smṛtam
prāsāde maṇḍape sāle gopure bali pīṭhake
toraṇa ādiṣu sustham yat vahiraṅgam iti smṛtam
bahiraṅge viśeṣaḥ usti tat śaṇudhvam śiva dvijāḥ
jala adhivāsanam ratna nyāsam dhāma pradakṣiṇam
śayyā kḷptam vinā vā api sarvam pūrvavat ācaret
etāsām api sarvāsām karṣaṇam prathama iṣṭakam
dhāmnaḥ kḷptim ca nitya iṣṭim utsavam snapanam tathā
māsa pūjā vidhānam ca prāyaścitta vidhi kramam
jīrṇoddhāram bālagṛham tatra saṃsthāpanam tathā
adbhute śāntim anyat ca prakṛti uktam samācaret
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre pratimā pratiṣṭhā vidhiḥ aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
vimāna sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ
vimāna sthāpanam vakṣye vāñchita artha phala pradam
dhiṣṇya avasāne pūrva ukte kāle ca tu aṅkura arpaṇam
prāsādasya agratas kuryāt maṇḍapam vedikā anvitam
nava kuṇḍa samāyuktam pañca kuṇḍa yutam tu vā
maṇḍapam maṇḍayitvā tu kuryāt śilpi visarjanam
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra tad dināt prāk dina traye
tadā prāsāda deha sthaberāṇām dṛṣṭi mocanam
madhu ājya dhānya go vipra kanyānām darśanam dvijāḥ
tad tad hṛdaya mantreṇa kṛtvā saṃprokṣya gavyataḥ
saṃpūjya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ prāsādam prokṣayet tatas
mūrti mūrti īśvarān nyastvā bereṣu api tathā ācaret
vastraiḥ ācchādya sarvam tu puṣpaiḥ darbhaiḥ paristaret
maṇḍapam saṃpraviśya atha puṇyāham vācayet tatas
sthaṇḍile vedikāyām tu vasu droṇaiḥ ca śālibhiḥ
tad ardha taṇḍulaiḥ śuddhaiḥ tilaiḥ lājaiḥ tad ardhakaiḥ
madhyame śiva kumbham tu vardhanī sahitam nyaset
diś mūrti saṃkhyayā kumbhān tad bahis paritas nyaset
sa sūtrān sa apidhānān ca sa vastrān hema saṃyutān
candana udaka saṃpūrṇān sa kūrcān pallava anvitān
gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya naivedya antaiḥ samantataḥ
kṛtvā tathā agni saṃskāram agni kārya ukta mārgataḥ
pradhāna kuṇḍe harmyasya śiva aṅga brahma śambaraiḥ
pūrvasmin pūrva diś deva mantraiḥ dakṣe tu vinyaset
paścime varuṇa sthaiḥ ca some soma diśi sthitaiḥ
vidikṣu hṛdaya ādyaiḥ ca juhuyāt śata saṃkhyayā
pañca homa iṅga hīnaiḥ ca mantraiḥ homam samācaret
samidh ājya carū lāja tila sasya indravaiṇavāḥ
pṛ
udumbara vaṭa aśvattha nyagrodhāḥ dikṣu saṃsthitāḥ
śamī apāmārga khadira bilvāḥ koṇeṣu saṃsthitāḥ
pradhānasya palāśaḥ syāt evam jñātvā samācaret
tattva tattva īśvara ādyaiḥ ca hutvā pūrṇām samācaret

original: prabhāte tu guruḥ snātvā viśuddho mūrtipaiḥ saha |
analyzed: prabhāte tu guruḥ snātvā viśuddhaḥ mūrtipaiḥ saha
nava vastra sraj uṣṇīṣaḥ sa uttarīyaḥ sama alakaḥ
nava vastra ādi saṃyukta mūrtipaiḥ ca samanvitaḥ
prāsāda antar sthitān devān iṣṭvā kumbhān ca pāvakān

original: prāyaścitaṃ ca pūrṇāṃ ca hutvā mūrtidharaiḥ saha || 71/19 ||
analyzed: prāyaścitam ca pūrṇām ca hutvā mūrti dharaiḥ saha
kumbhān saṃgṛhya harmyasya pradakṣiṇam atha ācaret
prāsāda dakṣiṇe deśe sthaṇḍile vinyaset ghatān
prāsādam pūjayitvā tu vastu ādhāre śiva āsanam
mūrti vidyā tanum dehe aṣṭatriṃśat kalā anvitam
vinyasya sa avadhānaḥ san kumbhāt ādāya śambaram
nyaset prāsāda dehe tu vastu ādhāre manonmanīm
tat tat jalena saṃprokṣya tatas diṅmūrtiṣu nyaset
arcayet atha gandha ādyaiḥ naivedya antam pṛthak pṛthak

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute martyo bhuktvā bhogān śivaṃ vrajet ||
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute martyaḥ bhuktvā bhogān śivam vrajet
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre vimāna sthāpana vidhiḥ ekona saptatitamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
maṇḍapa sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ
lakṣaṇam maṇḍapānām tu vakṣyate vipra sattamāḥ
uktānām api sarveṣām dhāmnām agregra maṇḍapam
tad māna sama mānam tu śreṣṭham iti abhidhīyate
maṇḍapam sama mānam ced sa antarālam sa veśakam
yugma stambha samāyuktam yuktyā sarva aṅga śobhitam
sārdha hastam dvi hastam vā prāsāda ardham atha api vā
antarālasya dīrgham syāt anyat sandhi gatam tu yat
tat madhyamam iti proktam triguṇam ca uttamam bhavet

original: ekadaṇḍaṃ dvidaṇḍaṃ vā tridaṇḍaṃ tasya veśanam |
analyzed: eka daṇḍam dvi daṇḍam vā tri daṇḍam tasya veśanam
sa avakāśa antarālam ced tasmāt dvi triguṇam bhavet
pārśva sopāna saṃyuktam mūla sopāna bhittikam
tad ardham bhitti yuktam vā tad aṣṭa aṃśena bhittikam
prāsādam aṣṭaghā kṛtvā hrāsayet aṣṭa bhāgataḥ
yāvat vibhāga mānam tu bhavet dvādaśa mānakam
mūladhāmnaḥ bhavet śuddhiḥ maṇḍapam ced dvi pārśvayoḥ
antarāla pradeśa uktam veśa yuktam prakīrtitam
agra maṇḍapam īdṛś syāt prāsāda sama tuṅgakam

original: svāyaṃbhuvādiliṅge tu nyūnaṃ vāpyadhikaṃ tu vā || 72/9 ||
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuva ādi liṅge tu nyūnam vā api adhikam tu vā

original: tadvattasya talaṃ cātha bhittihīnaṃ tu vā matam |
analyzed: tadvat tasya talam ca atha bhitti hīnam tu vā matam
vivṛta stambha saṃyuktam na ced dvāram tad agrake
dvāra lakṣaṇa mārgeṇa dvārapau matau
vivṛta stambha saṃyuktam ced mūla dhāma praveśa gau

original: hitvā tu maṇḍapaṃ tatra śukāgraṃ vā vidhīyate |
analyzed: hitvā tu maṇḍapam tatra śuka agram vā vidhīyate
śuddha nāgara dhāmnā etad garbha māna ardha niṣkramaḥ
pṛ
śikhara ardha samutsedhaḥ śuka nāsā vibhūṣitaḥ
antarālam tad agre syāt pārśva deśa pramāṇakam
sa niṣkrama antarālam vā maṇḍapam vā vidhīyate
pārśva dvāra samopetam nirdvāram vā atha tat bhavet
tad agre maṇḍapam kuryāt pratimā sthāpana arthakam
snapana artham tad agre syāt tad agre nṛtta maṇḍapam
eteṣām api sarveṣām adhiṣṭhāna ādi mānakam
mūla dhāma samam śreṣṭham sva aṣṭa aṃśa ūna adhikam tu vā
catuḥ ṣoḍaśa bhāga ūnam adhikam vā prakīrtitam
mānave mānavam hi etat sāmānyam samudāhṛtam

original: maṇḍapaṃ vā sabhā vāpi kūṭameṣāṃ samākṛtiḥ |
analyzed: maṇḍapam vā sabhā vā api kūṭam eṣām sama ākṛtiḥ
eteṣām api sarveṣām pramāṇam adhunā ucyate
tri karam tu samārabhya kara pāda vivṛddhitaḥ
śa hasta avasānaḥ tu bhavet maṇḍapa vistaraḥ
prāsāda ukta āya saṃyuktam iṣṭa pārśva ga bhitti yuj
nānā jālaka saṃyuktam nānā dvāra samāyutam
pṛthak ādi iṣṭakā upeta māyā ādi śubha saṃyutam
vistāram aṣṭa vahni ahni vasu ghnam raviṇā bhajet  /
manu aṣṭaghnaiḥ tu yat śiṣṭam bhavet dhanam ṛṇam dvijāḥ
yoniḥ tārā ca paryante triṃśat muni hate sati
tithi vāra krameṇa eva maṇḍapāya ādayaḥ matāḥ
na ca ayam vihitaḥ tu agramaṇḍape ca antarālake
ādya iṣṭakā ādayaḥ api atra na vidheyāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
anyeṣām api sarveṣām mūla uktam sarvam ācaret
sa ardha hastam samārabhya tri tri aṅgula vivardhanāt
pañca hasta anta mānam tu bhitti mānam ca maṇḍape
tathā eva sthambhamānam syāt kim tu paṅkti kara antakam
pañca aṅgulam samārabhya vyoma mātra vivṛddhitaḥ
triṃśat aṅgula paryantam stambhatāram
vyoma paṅkti samārabhya vyoma paṅkti vivṛddhitaḥ
pañcāśat paṅkti paryantam maṇḍape paṅktayaḥ matāḥ
bhadra upabhadra saṃyuktam madhya stambha prabhāsanam
lāṅgala ākāra kuḍya āḍhyam nānā alaṅkāra śobhitam
brahma aṅkaṇa samāyuktam athavā tat vivartitam
dvāra tāla tala upetam kūṭa koṣṭha ādi śobhitam
etat eva sabhā mānam iti proktam dvijeśvarāḥ
āsthāna maṇḍapam kuryāt dhāmnaḥ dikṣu vidikṣu ca
prāc uktena pramāṇena maṇḍapam kūṭam eva vā
sabhā vā tatra kartavyā ca aṣṭa diṅmukha saṃyutam

original: samāśramāyatāśraṃ vā mukhe bhadrayutaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: vā mukhe bhadra yutam tu vā
eka aneka tala upetam pārśva sopāna saṃyutam
saṃpādya evam tad agre tu sabhā ādyam parikīrtitam
pañca hastam samārabhya vyoma hasta vivṛddhitaḥ
ekatriṃśat kara antam tu vistāraḥ tasya saṃmataḥ
vistāra pāda vṛddhyā tu yāvat veda guṇam bhavet
āyāmam kalpayet tasya vistāre bhittiḥ ucyai
vahni bhittim samārabhya vyoma bhitti vivardhanāt
viśva bhitti avasānam tu vistāre bhittayaḥ matāḥ
vistāra bhitti vasudhām kṛtvā ardha ardha vivardhanāt
vistāra adhyardha māna antāḥ samāna dvārabhittayaḥ
yugma bhittiṣu madhyastha pādānām oja vistaraḥ
tad mānam vardhayet madhye pārśva bhittiṣu hrāsayet
oja bhittiṣu madhyastha pada śreṇi dvayam tu vā
tyajet tasya samantāt tu dvāram kuryāt yathāvidhi
mūlabhitti pramāṇena pādam vā ardha tri pādakam
dvāra mānam samākhyātam tad pādān yuktitaḥ nayet

original: mūlapādācca dvārasthāḥ pādā ye saṃsthitāḥ tviha || 72/41 ||
analyzed: mūla pādāt ca dvāra sthāḥ pādāḥ ye saṃsthitāḥ tu iha
pṛ
tad tad pāda viśālena bahis antar niṃveśitāḥ
sva sva sthāna gatā vā api vidhātavyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ
sabhā ādi madhya gam raṅga sthānam deva āsanam tu vā
eteṣām api sarveṣām prokṣaṇam tu adhunā ucyate
kṛtvā aṅkura arpaṇam pūrvam puṇya aha prokṣaṇam tathā
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā ādau tat ucchiṣṭam vivarjayet

original: puṇyāhaṃ ca punaḥ kṛtvā pañcagavyena secayet |
analyzed: puṇyāham ca punar kṛtvā pañcagavyena secayet
vāstu homam tatas kṛtvā paryagnikaraṇam nayet  /
maṇḍapam bhūṣayitvā tu gandha ādyaiḥ arcayet guruḥ
nivṛtti ādi kalāḥ nyastvā madhya stambha catuṣṭaye
kautukam bandhayet agni koṇa bhāga itha bandhayet
vastraiḥ astreṇa ca āveṣṭya mālā ādyaiḥ bhūṣayat tatas
gandha ādyaiḥ punar abhyarcya tattva tattva īśvara anvitān
mūrti mūrti īśvarān nyastvā madhyame maṇḍapasya tu
sthaṇḍilam śālibhiḥ kṛtvā vasu droṇa ādi mānataḥ
taṇḍulaiḥ tila lājaiḥ ca darbhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paristaret
madhyame śiva kumbham tu nivṛtti ādi kalā anvitam
tad vāme vardhanīm tasyām devīm āvāhya bhaktitaḥ
catur kumbham tu saṃsthāpya hema vastra ādi saṃyutam

original: dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ teṣu vahnitaḥ || 72/51 ||
analyzed: dharmam jñānam ca vairāgyam aiśvaryam teṣu vahnitaḥ
pūjayet gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ naivedya antaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak
tatas śiva agnim saṃsthāpya samidh ājya anna lājakaiḥ
śata saṃkhyam tad ardham vā śiva ādyaiḥ homam ācaret
pradhānena śivena aṅgaiḥ pūrva diś sthaṇḍile matāḥ
homaḥ syāt agni koṇataḥ
tattva ādyaiḥ ca tatas hutvā pūrṇāhutim atha ācaret  /
guruḥ snātvā mūrtipaiḥ ca samanvitaḥ
nava vastra dhṛk uṣṇīṣī sa uttarīyaḥ sama alakaḥ
saṃprāpta dakṣiṇaḥ mūrti dhāra daivajña śilpibhiḥ
su muhūrte su lagne tu mantra nyāsam samārabhet

original: maṇḍapaṃ vedagātraṃ ca kumbhānagniṃ ca yojayet |
analyzed: maṇḍapam veda gātram ca kumbhān agnim ca yojayet
prāyaścittam aghoreṇa kṛtvā pūrṇām samācaret
nyastvā tat adbhiḥ saṃprokṣya gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ yajet  /
naivedya ante guruḥ mantrī hṛdayena tu mantrataḥ
evam eva sabhā ādīnām vidheyam prokṣaṇam budhāḥ
evam yaḥ kurute martyaḥ saḥ niṣṭaiḥ viprayujyate

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre maṇḍapasthāpanavidhiḥ saptatitamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre maṇḍapa sthāpana vidhiḥ saptatitamaḥ paṭalaḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa prākārāṇāṃ tu lakṣaṇam |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa prākārāṇām tu lakṣaṇam
prāsādasya viśāla ardham daṇḍam iti abhidhīyate
eka dvi tri catuṣpañca daṇḍaiḥ madhyāt samantataḥ
eka prākāra kḷptiḥ tu pañcadhā parikīrtitā

original: mūlālayaviśāle tu tridhā bhakte padaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: bhavet

original: tena bhāgena tadbāhye dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ tu vā || 73/3 ||
analyzed: tena bhāgena tad bāhye dviguṇam triguṇam tu vā
tri catur guṇakam ca api catuṣpañcaguṇam tu vā
pañca ṣaḍguṇam iṣṭam ca prākāra dvaya kalpanam
pṛ
evam caturvidham proktam tri prākāraḥ tu kathyate
prāsādasya caturbhāge yaḥ tu daṇḍam iha ucyate
tasya dvi tri catur bhāgaiḥ tri catuṣpañcabhiḥ tathā
catuṣpañca ṣaṣ aṃśaiḥ tu pañca ṣaṣ saptabhiḥ tathā
ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭabhiḥ uddiṣṭam tri prākāra pramāṇakam
pañcadhā kathitam veda prākāram śṛṇuta dvijāḥ
tri prākārasya bāhye tu ekaika aṅgula vardhanāt
nava bhāga avasānam tu samantāt parivardhayet
evam pañcavidham proktam catuṣprākāra mānakam
evam prāsādasya viśālakam
samastam ca ardha mānam ca tri catur bhāga mānakam
daṇḍa ardham yojayet dhīmān hasta mānena ca ucyate  /
dvi hastāt eka vṛddhyā tu nava hasta avasānakam
eṣu prākāra mānam tu kṣudrāṇām aṣṭadhā matam

original: dvihastaṃ ca trihastaṃ ca tricaturhastameva ca |
analyzed: dvi hastam ca tri hastam ca tri catur hastam eva ca
catuṣpañca karam ca eva pañca ṣaṣ karam eva ca
ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa karam ca eva aṣṭa nandam tathā eva ca
nanda dīrgha aṣṭakam ca eva dvi prākāra pramāṇakam
asmāt eka kara ṛddhyā tu rudra hasta antam eva ca
tri prakāra pramāṇam tu veda prākārakam tathā
ekaika hasta vṛddhyā tu ravi hasta avasānakam
catuṣprākāra mānam tu kṣudra ādīnām prakīrtitam
jāti chanda vikalpa ābhāsa ādīnām tu samīritam
niyamaḥ vidyate na eva prāsāde sārvadeśike

original: jātau jātikarāṇāṃ tu anyasyāpi ca sadmanaḥ |
analyzed: jātau jāti karāṇām tu anyasya api ca sadmanaḥ
ardha tri aṃśa catur bhāgaiḥ dvi bhāgaiḥ ca krameṇa tu
sama mārga anumārgābhyām nāgara ādau niyujyate
prāsādasya viśālena sa pādena samena ca
pāda ūnena viśālena mahāmārga arhakam tu vā
kalpayet hasta māne api prāc ukta vidhinā saha
ayam vibhāgaḥ na asti eva prāsāde sārvadeśike
ca aṣṭa nanda vṛtau tathā
hastaiḥ pādaiḥ samantāt tu vardhayet pūrva mānataḥ

original: samaṃ tu caturaśraṃ tatpūrvaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ param || 73/21 ||
analyzed: samam tu catur aśram tat pūrvam kṛtvā tatas param
kalpayet tu mukha āyāmam devasya abhimukham yathā
pṛṣṭhe vā kalpayet pārśve purātana vimānake
nūtane vā prakartavyam sthāna saṃkaṭa saṃyute
eka hastam samārabhya hasta eka eka vivṛddhitaḥ
ekādaśa kara antam tu prāk uktāt tu viśālakāt
vardhayet hrāsayet vā api yāvat iṣṭa prapūraṇam

original: pṛṣṭhe vāpi mukhe vāpi pārśvayorubhayostu vā |
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe vā api mukhe vā api pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ tu vā
kuryāt mukha āyāme prakalpayet
pāda adhikam atha adhyardham pāda ūna dviguṇam tu vā

original: dviguṇaṃ dviguṇārdhaṃ vā triguṇaṃ ca caturguṇaṃ || 73/26 ||
analyzed: dviguṇam dviguṇa ardham vā triguṇam ca caturguṇam
dvi hastam tu samārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
yāvat pañcaguṇam tāram mukha āyāmam prakalpayet
bhitti antarāla mānam vā bhitti bāhyam atha api vā
bhitti madhyam tu vā kuryāt prākārāṇām pramāṇakam
āya ādi ṣaṭka siddhi artham vṛddhim hānim ca hastakaiḥ
kalpayet pāda mārgeṇa prākārasya prakalpane
sa chinna hasta prāsāde chinna hastasya lopanam
pūraṇam vā prakartavyam ca
devānābhi etat uktam tu narāṇām syāt khalūrikā
tad ukta mātram saṃgrāhya mātra uktam tatra yojayet  /
āyam vasu guṇam kṛtvā saptaviṃśatibhiḥ haret
śeṣam ṛkṣam tu vistārāt sakalāt vā atha kalpayet
pṛ
uktāt ekam athavā aṣṭa guṇitam bhānubhiḥ bhajet
āyam tri guṇitam digbhiḥ manubhiḥ vibhajet tatas
vyayaḥ tu kathitaḥ śāstraiḥ dviguṇam vasubhiḥ haret
dhvaja ādi yonayaḥ proktāḥ paryanta triṃśataḥ bhavet
tithiḥ ca kathitā vāraḥ munibhiḥ bhājitaḥ bhavet
mūlaprāsāda hastaiḥ vā ca anyaiḥ vā atha nirīkṣayet
eka hastam samārabhya ca eka aṅgula vivardhanāt
dvi hasta antaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ sālānām ca eva vistaraḥ
tad vistāra pramāṇena yāvat triṃśadguṇam bhavet

original: triguṇaṃ tu samārabhya kṣudre mahati mandire || 73/37 ||
analyzed: triguṇam tu samārabhya kṣudre mahati mandire
prākāra utsedhaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ mūlāt ūnam tad agratas
ṣaṣ aṃśam tu samārabhya yāvat ṣoḍaśa bhāgikam
tāvat kṛtvā sa mūlam tu ca eka aṃśena tad agrakam
adhiṣṭhāna ādi varga āḍhyam khaṇḍa harmya ādi maṇḍitam
ṛju bhakti yutam vā api prākāram tu prakalpayet
chatra ādi śikhara upetam ūrdhva stha vṛṣabha anvitam
tasya daṇḍa pramāṇena ca ardhena atha tri pādataḥ
sa pādena atha sārdhena pāda ūna dviguṇena vā

original: dviguṇena ca mūle tu bhitteścaiva vinirgamaḥ |
analyzed: dviguṇena ca mūle tu bhitteḥ ca eva vinirgamaḥ
upānam kathitam tasya upariṣṭāt tena mānataḥ
ardha ādi pāda vṛddhi ādi dviguṇa antam hi pādakam
tasya upariṣṭāt kampam tu tad caturtha aṃśa mānataḥ  /
tasya ardhena tri pādena sa pādena ca sārdhataḥ
pāda ūna dviguṇam vā api dviguṇa antam prakalpayet

original: kampamekaṃ dvayaṃ vāpi ūrdhvopānaṃ tu vā bhavet |
analyzed: kampam ekam dvayam vā api ūrdhva upānam tu vā bhavet
antar sa alāṅkaṇam nimnam bāhya sa alāṅkaṇam bhavet
sālānām antare vyāsam bāhye sāla aṅkaṇam bhavet
aṅgula dvayam ārabhya ca ekaika aṅgula vardhanāt
nava mātra antakam yāvat pratisālam tu nimnakam
ṣaṣ pañca veda rudra akṣa dvi aṅgulaiḥ parikalpayet
jāti chanda vikalpa ābhāsānām kṣudrasya ca eva hi
sārvadeśika harmye tu nā ca ayam vidhiḥ iṣyate
svāyaṃbhuva ādi liṅgānām antar nimna samam tu vā

original: bāhyanimnaṃ tu vā kāryaṃ sālānāmaṅkaṇaṃ budhaiḥ || 73/49 ||
analyzed: bāhya nimnam tu vā kāryam sālānām aṅkaṇam budhaiḥ
sālānām antare pi syāt mālikā maṇḍapa ākṛtiḥ
sabhā ākṛtiḥ vā kartavyā ca eka dvi trika bhittibhiḥ
catur bhintti yutā vā api eka aneka tala anvitā
upānāt tu samārabhya mūla prāsāda tuṅgakam
uttara antam vibhajya atha saptadhā tu masūrakam
dvi pādam pāda dairghyam tu śeṣeṇa parikalpayet
mūladhāmnaḥ tu pādam tu bhajet vā nava saṃkhyayā
adhiṣṭhāna dvi bhāgena pādam śeṣeṇa kalpayet
dvi hastam tu samārabhya ca ekaika aṅgula vardhanāt
sapta hasta antaḥ utsedhaḥ stambhānām parikīrtitaḥ
bhitti mānam tathā eva syāt kṣudre kṣudra vimānake
pakṣa aṅgulam samārabhya ca ardha aṅgula vivardhanāt
caturviṃśati mātra antam stambha vistāraḥ iṣyate
pāda ucca ardham adhiṣṭhāna saptama aṣṭa nava aṃśakam
hīnam vā api adhikam vā api pāda uccepi evam eva hi
pāda ucce tri catur bhāgena athavā api masūrakam
pāda bandham sajātīyam adhiṣṭhānam niyojayet
prastara ādi pramāṇam ca prāsāda ukta vat ācaret

original: āgneye nairṛte koṇe vāyavye cātha vaiśake |
analyzed: āgneye nairṛte koṇe vāyavye ca atha vaiśake
catuṣkoṇe api vā kuryāt garbham ca prathama iṣṭakām
abhyantara mukhāḥ ca eva prākārāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
svasya dakṣiṇaka iṃśe tu dvāra koṇa antare pi vā
pṛ
gṛhakṣate mahendre vā bhallāṭe puṣpadantake
sthānam garbhasya nirdiṣṭam tatrasthā prathamā iṣṭakā
mūrdha iṣṭakā ūrdhva kīla āḍhyam mūlāt tat parikalpayet
bhitti ūrdhva stha catuṣkoṇeṣu ekasmin iṣṭakām nyaset
antar maṇḍalam ādyam syāt antarhārā dvitīyakā
tṛtīyā madhya hārā syāt maryādā ākhyā caturthakā
mahāmaryādikā ākhyā ca pañcamī parikīrtitā
parivāra amarān sarvān tatra saṃsthāpayet guruḥ  /
parivāra vidhānāya tat ca leśāt nigadyate
parivāra vimānānām mānam garbha ardham eva vā
mūlavāstu tri bhāga ekam ardham vā pāda bāhyakam
eka hastam samārabhya rudra hasta antam eva hi

original: prāsādasya tu vistāro hyutsedhaḥ prāgvadeva hi |
analyzed: prāsādasya tu vistāraḥ hi utsedhaḥ prāgvat eva hi
aṅga liṅga ālaya ākārāḥ parivāra ālayāḥ matāḥ

gṛhebhyaḥ ca tathā aiśānyām asurebhyaḥ ogni gocare
pālāśyām palabhakṣebhyaḥ nāgebhyaḥ vāyu diś dale
dala bāhye balim dadyāt dikpālānām sva nāmataḥ

original: || iti kāmikākhye mahātantre parivārārcanavidhiḥ trisaptatitamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre parivāra arcana vidhiḥ trisaptatitamaḥ paṭalaḥ
vṛṣabha sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ
pṛ
vṛṣa sthāpanam vakṣye tad lakṣaṇa puraḥsaram
antar dvārasya pūrvasmin kalpayet prathamam vṛṣam
dvitīyam maṇḍapa agre tu pīṭhāt pūrve tṛtīyakam
pīṭhe pīṭhe viśeṣeṇa paścime vṛṣabha sthitiḥ

original: pīṭhārdhaṃ vā samaṃ tatra dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: pīṭha ardham vā samam tatra dviguṇam triguṇam tu vā
tyaktvā caturguṇam vā api tasya agre sthāpayet vṛṣam
pūjā bhāga samam śreṣṭham tad ardham madhyamam bhavet
tad ardham adhamam jñeyam catur tri dviguṇam tu vā
tad tad antara mānam vā lohaje vṛṣabham matam

original: garbhaṃ kṛtvā navāṃśaṃ tu navadhā śailaje matam || 76/5 ||
analyzed: garbham kṛtvā nava aṃśam tu navadhā śailaje matam
dvāra uccam aṣṭadhā kṛtvā ca ekaika aṃśa vivardhanāt
caturguṇa anta mānam tu mṛṇmaye vṛṣabhe matam
lohajam saṃyajet dvāre parivāre tu śailajam

original: pīṭhāgre mṛṇmayaṃ proktaṃ śailaṃ vā tatra saṃmatam || 76/7 ||
analyzed: pīṭha agre mṛṇmayam proktam śailam vā tatra saṃmatam

original: lohajaṃ tu prakartavyaṃ sthitaṃ vā śayitaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: loha jam tu prakartavyam sthitam vā śayitam tu vā

original: śailaṃ sudhāmayaṃ kāryaṃ śayitaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ || 76/8 ||
analyzed: śailam sudhā mayam kāryam śayitam tu viśeṣataḥ
sthitam vapi prakartavyam ṛṣabham deśika uttamāḥ
atha sāmānya liṅgasya purastāt vṛṣabhaḥ mataḥ
svayaṃbhu bāṇa lauha ākhyam raudra loke prapūjitam
lokapāla aṅkitam siddham śata sāhasra liṅgakam

original: mukhaliṅgaṃ ca beraṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ liṅgamīritam |
analyzed: mukhaliṅgam ca beram ca viśiṣṭam liṅgam īritam
tad anyatra vṛṣaḥ proktaḥ tatra api kathitaḥ tu vā
dhvaja yaṣṭiḥ tathā proktā tad lakṣaṇam iha ucyate
bhaktvā caturaśīti antam tena mānam vidhīyate  /
śṛṅga pradeśa vistāraḥ ṣoḍaśa aṅgulaḥ ucyate
tāvat eva ca dairghyam syāt vaktra tāraḥ tu ṣaṣ kalaḥ
sṛkkiṇī prothayoḥ madhye daśa aṅgula vinirmitā
netram netra samam dairghyāt tad ardham vistareṇa ca
tad tri bhāgena tāram syāt jyotiḥ tad pañcama aṃśataḥ
netra ardha antam bhruvoḥ sthaulyam tat dairghyam syāt dvi mātrakam
nāsā syāt dvi aṃgulā proktaḥ tad madhye veda mātrakaḥ
nāsā pradeśa vistāraḥ vaktram syāt dvādaśa aṅgulam
tad ūrdhve daśa mātram syāt tad ūrdhva iṣṭādaśa aṅgulam
netra antaram catur mātram trikoṇe tu kapolake
catur netrau ubhau pārśvau vaktra saṃdhyoḥ tu karṇakau
karṇa mūlāt ca vaktra antam pañcanetram prakīrtitam
karṇa mūlāt tu karṇa antam proktam manu aṅgulam bhavet
karṇa mūlau dvi mātrau tu tadvat ucca samanvitau
tatra eva vartule kārye daśa aṅgula su nāhake
karṇau pañca aṅgula āyāmau kalā vṛtta samudbhavau
pañca aṅgula pṛthū madhye paritas paratas kṛśau
ṣaṣ aṅgula āvṛtau mūle ṛju rekhā vibhūṣitau
śṛṅga mūlam catur mātram ṣaṣ aṅgula samucchrayam
ardha aṅgula agra vistāraḥ manāk vakra samanvitaḥ
śṛṅga mūla sthitam piṇḍam hitvā bhāga antare matam
piṇḍam aṅgula mānam syāt ucchritam śṛṅga mūlayoḥ  /
śṛṅga agrāt avaṭam yāvat ṣaṣ netram ca antaram matam
aṣṭa netra āyatā grīvā kakud dairghyam trinetrataḥ
trinetram ucchrayāt uktam mānam vaktram ca mūrdhani
kakud odha uṣṭa netraḥ tu jaṅghā pañca dṛś āyatā
pṛ
sandhiḥ eka aṅgulā proktā catur netra upajaṅghikā

original: sārdhanetraṃ tato gulphe dvinetrau khurakau punaḥ || 76/27 ||
analyzed: sārdha netram tatas gulphe dvi netrau khurakau punar

original: gulphādhaḥ khurike kāṃsye netrapāde same yathā |
analyzed: gulpha adhas khurike kāṃsye netra pāde same yathā
jaṅghā mūla āvṛtiḥ saptadaśa mātrā prakīrtitā
jaṅghā agre tithi mātram syāt manu mātra aṅgula kramāt
mūla agre ca upajaṅghāyāḥ veṣṭanam
khurayoḥ aṣṭa mātram syāt hitvā veṣṭana mātrakam
kakudaḥ pṛṣṭha mānam tu ṣaṭtriṃśat mānam īritam  /
tatra trikaṭa mātram tu ṣaṣ aṅgulam iti smṛtam
trikaṭā anatimānam tu dvādaśa aṅgulam īritam  /
tasmāt ca paratas puccha santatiḥ tu prakīrtitā
puccha mūlam catur mātram agra iṅgula vinirmitam
triṃśat aṅgula mānena puccha dairghyam prakīrtitam
ṣaṣ aṅgula pramāṇena tasmāt syāt keśa santatiḥ
pṛṣṭhe trikaṭi deśe ca tāraḥ viṃśati mātrakaḥ
vistāra deha madhye tu ṣoḍaśa aṅgulaḥ ucyate
kakud sandhi pradeśe tu vistāram manu mātrakam
grīvā adhastāt catur mātram sāsnā ālambaḥ prakīrtitam
sā ca aṣṭādaśa mātrā syāt jaṅghā anta āyati saṃyutā
aśīti aṅgula vistārā kukṣiḥ nābheḥ prakīrtitā
tu ṣaṣṭi aṅgulam iti smṛtam
nābhiḥ netra dvayena syāt dvi netrau vṛṣaṇau matau
vistāra āyāma mānena para jaṅghā daśa aṅgulā
sandhiḥ dvi mātraḥ ṣaṇṇetrā ca upajaṅghā prakīrtitā

original: dvinetrau gulphakau jñeyau khurau pañcāṅgulau matau |
analyzed: dvi netrau gulphakau jñeyau khurau pañca aṅgulau matau
khurake dvi aṅgule kārye dvāviśati aṅgulena tu
jaṅghā madhyamanāhaḥ syāt sandhi deśe punar trayaḥ
veṣṭanam ca upajaṅghāyāḥ ṣoḍaśa aṅgulam ucyate  /
dvi aṅgulam pṛṣṭha dairghyam syāt adhas tu aṣṭa aṅgulaḥ mataḥ
eṣā vṛṣa kriyā śakti paryanta vyāpti saṃyutā
athavā anya prakāreṇa vṛṣa lakṣaṇam ucyate
bhaktvā pañca aṃśam utsedham tri mātram khuram ucyate  /
mūla vyāsaḥ catur mātra śṛṅga agram syāt dvi mātrakam
nava mātram lalāṭaḥ syāt mukha vyāsaḥ svara aṅgulaḥ  /
utsedhaḥ ca samastena netra āyāmam dvi mātrakam
sārdha aṅgulam tat uccam syāt netra madhyā mukha ākṛtiḥ
catur netra aṅgulam pṛṣṭham grīvāyāḥ tu ṣaṣ aṅgulaḥ
pakṣa pañca aṃśam utsedham tena mānam prakīrtitam
pañcaṣa aṅgulam āyāme proktam tu muni sattamāḥ

original: ārabhya mūrdhnaḥ kaṇṭhādho daśāṅgula iti smṛtaḥ || 76/46 ||
analyzed: ārabhya mūrdhnaḥ kaṇṭha adhas daśa aṅgulaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
grīvā uccam vamu mātram syāt tayoḥ ddairghyam ṣaṣ aṅgulam
anutsedham tu ṣaṣ mātram jānu mātram dvi mātrakam
jaṅghā dvi tri aṅgulā dairghyāt tri mātram khuram ucyate
śṛṅga antaram dvi mātram syāt tayoḥ dairghyam ṣaṣ aṅgulam
mūlavyāsam catur mātram lalāṭa uccam muni īśvarāḥ
netra karṇa antaram tadvat karṇāyāmaḥ śara aṅgulaḥ  /
tri mātram uttara oṣṭha uccam adhara oṣṭham dvi mātrakam
mūla āyāma ucca vistāraḥ dvi mātra eka tri mātrakaiḥ
pañcāśat grīva vistāraḥ mūla vistāraḥ eva ca
ṣaḍvasvaṅgulaḥ iti uktaḥ krameṇa dvija puṅgavāḥ
kakud ṣaṣ aṅgula vyāsaḥ utsedhaḥ dvi tri mātrakaḥ
karṇasya agra viśālam tu dvi mātram yuktitaḥ nyaset
kakudaḥ tu śarīra uccam proktam ā aṣṭadaśa aṅgulam
dvisapta mātram pṛṣṭhe syāt vistāraḥ dvādaśa aṅgulaḥ
anyonya mūla madhya agra vyāsaḥ veda aṅgulena ca
pṛ
aṣṭa aṅgulena diś mātraiḥ krameṇa eva bhavet dvijāḥ
pañca aṅgulam tathā āyāmaḥ jānu deśam dvi mātrakam
jaṅghā pañca aṅgula utsedhā tri aṅgulā syāt viśālataḥ
khura utsedham dvi mātram syāt tathā asyāt pucchamūlakam

original: sārdhāṅgulaṃ tu pucchāgraṃ jaṅghāntaṃ tasya lambanam |
analyzed: sārdha aṅgulam tu puccha agram jaṅghā antam tasya lambanam
muṣka āyāma viśāle tu dvi mātre ca yathākramam
jaṅghā āyāmam tri mātram syāt udara aṅgulam āyatam
śeṣa āyāmam tri mātram syāt gudam māyā aṅgulam bhavet
ūru mūla agra vistāraḥ veda aṅgulam iti smṛtam
jaṅghā agram tu tri mātram syāt śeṣam yukti balāt nayet
ghanam vā api aghanam vā api lohajam parikalpayet
veṇu vastra ādi vetreṇa sadanam parikalpayet

original: sakalasya tu yanmānaṃ tanmānaṃ vā vṛṣodaye |
analyzed: sakalasya tu yat mānam tat mānam vā vṛṣa udaye
ukta idhi ardha yava ādi aṣṭa ucchāyasya yava aṅgulam  /
hīnam vā api adhikam kāryam kartuḥ icchā vaśena tu
nānā bhūṣaṇa saṃyuktam ghaṇṭā jāla samanvitam
pratimoktāya jāti aṃśam tadvat āyādi śobhanam
evam lakṣaṇam ākhyātam sthāpanam śrūyatām dvijāḥ
kālaḥ api pūrvavat jñeyaḥ tadvat eva aṅkura arpaṇam
maṇṭapam parivāra ukta mārgeṇa eva samācaret
pañca eka kuṇḍe homam syāt tathā eva sthaṇḍile api vā
ratna nyāsam prakartavyam śaila je loha je pi atha
ratna artham hema padmam vā mṛṇmaya ādau vivarjayet
tatas ukṣimocanam śuddhiḥ grāma ādīnām pradakṣiṇam
toya adhivāsanam prāpya tatas maṇṭapa saṃskṛtiḥ
dvija saṃbhojanam puṇya toya secanam eva vā

original: vāstuhomaṃ tathā śayyā snapanaṃ kautukaṃ tathā |
analyzed: vāstu homam tathā śayyā snapanam kautukam tathā
vṛṣasya dakṣiṇe śṛṅge kautukam bandhayet guruḥ  /
śayana ārohaṇam kumbha sthāpanam pūrvavat nayet
saptavargāt caturtha antam sapta svara vibhūṣitam
bindu nāda samāyuktam ādau praṇava saṃyutam
vṛṣabhāyāḥ namaḥ ca ante tasmin brahma aṅga kalpanā
madhya kumbhe vṛṣaḥ proktaḥ lokapāḥ
atha vidyeśvarān vā api vṛṣasya paritas nyaset
ukṣā ca gopatiḥ ca api śaṅkukarṇaḥ tathā eva ca
tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaḥ tathā nandī viṣāṇī paśubhṛt tathā
mahodara uṣṭamaḥ ca etān sva sva bījena vinyaset
saṃpūjya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ mudga annam tu nivedayet
caru kalpe tathā eva syāt tattva mūrti ādikam nyaset
agni kāryam tatas kuryāt prāc ukta vidhinā saha
samidh ājya carūn lājān mudga māṣān kramāt hunet

original: prabhāte deśikaḥ śuddhaḥ pūjāhomaṃ ca kārayet || 76/75 ||
analyzed: prabhāte deśikaḥ śuddhaḥ pūjā homam ca kārayet  /
ācārya pūjā syāt ante hotṛbhyaḥ ca api dakṣiṇāḥ
su mūhūrte su lagne tu mantra nyāsam samācaret
calam ced vṛṣabhasthānam vedi ante ca sva deśake
mūlamantreṇa saṃsthāpya gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ yajet  /

original: tataḥ kumbhān samāhṛtya vṛṣāgre sthaṇḍile nyaset |
analyzed: tatas kumbhān samāhṛtya vṛṣa agre sthaṇḍile nyaset
kumbhāt bījam samādāya vṛṣasya hṛdaye nyaset  /
anyebhyaḥ bījam ādāya tad pīṭhe paritas nyaset
tatas kumbha udakena eva snāpayet vṛṣam ādarāt
dhvajasya āropaṇe pi evam kintu tat daṇḍa mūlake
kumbha abhiṣekaḥ kartavyaḥ tatra prokṣaṇam eva ca
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre vṛṣabha sthāpana vidhiḥ catuḥsaptatitamaḥ
paṭalaḥ
pṛ
sthāpanam gopurāṇām ca vakṣye lakṣaṇa pūrvakam
mūlaprāsāda vistāre sapta aṣṭa nava bhāgike  /
daśa ekādaśa bhāge tu tad tad eka ūna bhāgataḥ
dvāra śobhā ādi mānam syāt gopura antam viśālataḥ
kṣudra ilpe ca tat uddiṣṭam madhya mānam vidhīyate
dhāmni tāre catuṣpañca ṣaṣ bhāgena vibhājite  /
sapta aṣṭadhā kṛte tebhyaḥ vibhāgaḥ gopura antakaḥ
dvāra śobhā ādi vistāraḥ pañcadhā parikīrtitaḥ
tri bhāga ekam atha ardham ca tri bhāge tu dvi bhāgakam
catur bhāge tri bhāgam ca pañca aṃśe catur aṃśakam  /
jyeṣṭhadhāmnām viśālam syāt gopura antam krameṇa tu
dvi hasta ādi dvis aṣṭa antam vyoma aratni vivṛddhitaḥ
pratyekam tri tri mānam syāt gopura antam viśālataḥ
ekaviṃśat kara antam tu tri hastāt dvika vardhanāt
pūrvavat tithi saṃkhyātāḥ māna śobhā ādi vistare
ārabhya nanda hastam tu dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
saptatriṃśat kara antam tu gopura anta viśāla tā
tri pañcadaśa saptāt tu eka hasta vivardhanāt
pañca mānam dvis aṣṭābhyām pañcasu ekasya sammatam
anyathā hasta mānena vistāraḥ pravidhīyate  /
pañca ādi viśva hasta antam ca ekaika kara vṛddhitaḥ
prathama āvaraṇe dvāra śobhā vistāraḥ iṣyate  /
tithi hastāt trayoviṃśati antāḥ syuḥ dvāra śālake
pañcaviṃśati hastāt tu trayastriṃśat kara antakaḥ
dvāra prāsāda vistāraḥ pañcamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
pañcaviṃśat samārabhya tricatvāriṃśat antatas
dvāra harmya viśālaḥ syāt nava pañca kara āditaḥ
tripañcāśat kara antam tu viśālaḥ gopurasya tu
eka dvi tri catur pañca hastaiḥ nyūnam tu vā adhikam
nagara grāma veśa ādau mānam gopura vistare
kalpayet dvāra śobhā ādau sapta aṃśa daśa bhāgikam
catur aṃśa ṣaṣ aṃśam tu sapta aṃśe catur aṃśakam

original: nandāṃśe bhūtabhāgaṃ ca dviguṇam ca prakalpayet || 77/17 ||
analyzed: ca   ca prakalpayet
dvāra āyatana tuṅga artham khalūrī gopura ādikam
mānam api atha saṃgrāhyam nirgamam ca api tad samam
gopurasya viśālam tu kṛtvā viṃśati bhāgikam
eka ādi aṣṭa daśa aṃśa antam gopurāṇām guru uttamāḥ
nirgamam sāla bāhyāt vā tad antar vā samācaret
sārdha hastāt tu pāda ūna dvi hastāt dvi karāt kramāt
ṣaṣ nanda nava mātraiḥ tu vardhayet deśika uttamaḥ
pañca sapta nava antaḥ tu dvāra tāraḥ pṛthak bhavet

original: tithisaṃkhyā ca hīne syānmadhye śreṣṭhaṃ tu sammatam |
analyzed: tithi saṃkhyā ca hīne syāt madhye śreṣṭham tu sammatam
pañcāśe dvāra vistāre sapta aṃśe muni bhājite  /
daśa aṃśaḥ dviguṇaḥ pādāt adhikaḥ pañcadhā ucchrayaḥ
mūla dhāmni masūrī ādi tuṅgāt veda aṃśaka ādikaḥ
ravi bhāga avasānam tu kṛtvā eka aṃśam vihāya ca
kṛtvā masūra pādam ca tad śeṣeṇa eva pīṭhakam
yojayet gopura dvāram tuṅga vṛddhyā ardham eva ca

original: atha prāguktabhāge tu varddhitaṃ samameva vā || 77/25 ||
analyzed: atha prāc ukta bhāge tu varddhitam samam eva vā
chedayet tat adhiṣṭhānam sa upapīṭhe tu kevalam
pṛ
uttara anta samutsedham tad ardham vistṛta anvitam
gopura dvāra tuṅgam vā kārayet vāstuśāstra vid
eka dvi tri talam kuryāt śobhāyām eka vṛddhitaḥ
tala ādikam atho kuryāt pañca ṣaṣ sapta bhūmikam
gopuram tu vidheyam syāt madhyame pi evam ūhyatām
dvāra śobhā dvāra śālā dvāra prāsāda harmyake
gopureṇa eva pañca antam maṇḍala ādiṣu saṃsthitāḥ
masūḥ stambhamānam tu prāk eva pradipāditam
tad ūrdhva prastārāt sthūpi paryante mānam ucyate
ṣoḍhā vibhajya tat tuṅgam prastaraiḥ sa aṅghri bhāgakaiḥ
tadvat kaṇṭha śiraḥ dhi ardha bhāgena sthūpikā aṃśakaḥ
evam eka talam proktam dvi talam ca vidhīyate
tat uccam navadhā kṛtvā sa aṅghri eka prastara udayaḥ
eka aṃśam galam iti uktam sārdha dvi aṃśam śiraḥ bhavet
śeṣaḥ śira uddhṛtaḥ proktaḥ dvi talam tu etat īritam
dvādaśa aṃśam tri bhūmi uccais kapotam sa aṅghri bhāga bhāj

original: sārdhadvyaṃśaṃ ca pādoccaṃ prastaro bhāga eva hi |
analyzed: sārdha dvi aṃśam ca pāda uccam prastaraḥ bhāgaḥ eva hi
dvi bhāgaḥ pāda dairghyam syāt aṣṭa aṃśena aṃśa mānataḥ  /

original: taduccaṃ cāṃśo grīvoccaṃ sārdhadvyaṃśaḥ śiro bhavet |
analyzed: tad uccam ca aṃśaḥ grīvā uccam sārdha dvi aṃśaḥ śiraḥ bhavet
śeṣeṇa sthūpikā utsedhaḥ tri talam ca evam īritam
uttara ādi śikhā antam yat mānam aṣṭādaśa aṃśakam
tri bhāga sahitam bhāgam anta uccam pravidhīyate
sārdha dvi aṃśam tu pāda uccam sa aṅghri eka prastara udayaḥ
bhāgena galamānam syāt tri bhāgaiḥ śikhara udayaḥ
śeṣeṇa sthūpikā proktā pañcabhaumam atas param
uttara ādi śikhā antam ca api ekonatriṃśat aṃśakam  /
bhāga ardham prastaram kuryāt pāda uccam catur aṃśakam
pādona dvi aṃśakam mañcam sārdha dvi aṃśam tu pādapaḥ
tri pāda aṃśa ekakam mañcam tri bhāgāt pādapa āyatiḥ
sa pāda aṃśa kapota uccam ūrdhva bhāgāt dvi bhāgataḥ  /
prastara uccam dvi bhāgena kandhara ucca samaḥ bhavet
sārdha dvi aṃśaḥ śiraḥ tuṅgaḥ śeṣeṇa syāt śira udayaḥ  /
evam tu ṣaṣ talam proktam sapta bhaumam atha ucyate
uttara ādi śikhā antam yat mañcam ṣaṭtriṃśat aṃśakam  /
sa aṅghri dvi aṃśam kapotam syāt sārdha veda aṃśataḥ adhikam
dvi bhāgaḥ prastara utsedhaḥ pāda uccam veda bhāgataḥ
sa tri pāda aṃśakam mañcam sārdha dvi aṃśaḥ tu pādapaḥ
mañcam pāda ūna bhāgābhyām tri pādaḥ pāda vaidhṛtiḥ
sārdha aṃśam prastara uccam syāt dvi aṃśaḥ tu anta tala āyatiḥ
sa pāda bhāgam mañca uccam sārdha bhāga dvi bhāgikam

original: kapotoccaṃ tu bhāgena kandharaṃ tatsamaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: kapota uccam tu bhāgena kandharam tad samam bhavet
sa dvi pāda dvi bhāgena śiraḥ śiṣṭāḥ śikhāḥ matāḥ
sapta bhaumam idam śreṣṭham tad ūrdhve pūrva māna bhāj
stambha prastara bhāgābhyām kalpitābhyām adhas tale
ravi bhauma antam iṣṭam syāt gopurāṇām iha āgame
uktāni gopura aṅgāni vibhajet catur aṃśakam
ārabhya aṣṭa daśa aṃśam teṣu eka aṃśam tu nava aṃśakam
dvi aṅgulam tri aṅgulam vā api catur pañca ṣaṣ aṅgulam
vardhayet hrāsayet vā api yuktyā prāc ukta mānataḥ
pañca bhāge viśāle tu tri bhāge garbha vistaraḥ
śeṣeṇa bhittiḥ atrā uktā vyoma bhūmau muni īśvarāḥ
vyāsaḥ sapta aṃśa vedāṃśaḥ garbhakūṭaḥ tu bhāga bhāj
koṣṭhasya ātma ga vistāra dairghyam pañca aṃśam iṣyate
kūṭa koṣṭha antarāle tu pañjara ādi vibhūṣitam
evam dvi talam ākhyātam tri talam ca adhunā ucyate

original: tāre navāṃśe garbhaḥ syāttribhāgaḥ tadvahiḥ kramāt || 77/54 ||
analyzed: tāre nava aṃśe garbhaḥ syāt tri bhāgaḥ tad vahis kramāt
pṛ
gṛha piṇḍī alindahārān ca krameṇa parikalpayet
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṅgam pūrvavat parikalpayet
viśāle paṅkti bhāge tu garbhagehe tri bhāgataḥ
sārdha aṃśaḥ bhitti viṣkambhaḥ eka bhāgam alindakam
khaṇḍa harmyam tu bhāgena kūṭa koṣṭha ādi pūrvavat

original: mukhe pṛṣṭhe mahāśālā pañcāṃśo vā ṣaḍaṃśakaḥ || 77/57 ||
analyzed: mukhe pṛṣṭhe mahāśālā pañca aṃśaḥ vā ṣaṣ aṃśakaḥ  /
caturbhaumam idam khyātam sarva avayava sundaram
vistāre rudrabhāge tu nālī geham tri bhāgataḥ
eka aṃśam khaṇḍa harmyam syāt anyat sarvam samānakam  /
pañcabhaumam samākhyātam ṣaḍbhaumam adhunā ucyate
vistāre ravi bhāge tu nālī geham yuga aṃśakam
dvi bhāgaḥ bhitti vistāraḥ dvāra aṃśena prakīrtitaḥ
bhāgena khaṇḍa harmyam syāt anyat sarvam samānakam
ṣaṣṭha bhaumam idam proktam saptamam tu adhunā ucyate
trayodaśa aṃśe vistāre garbhaḥ syāt aṃśa bhāga bhāj
sārdha dvi aṃśam tu bhittiḥ syāt ekena alindam iṣyate
khaṇḍa harmyam iha eka aṃśam kūṭa śālā ādi pūrvavat
pṛṣṭhe mukhe mahāśālā ṣaṣ bhāgena prakīrtitā
pañca aṃśe hasti pṛṣṭhe ca pakṣaśālā ādibhiḥ yutaḥ
nānā masūraka stambha vedikā jāla toraṇam
sapta bhaumam idam proktam gopuram sārvadeśikam
catur aṃśa ūnakam vā syāt ūrdhva dvāram tu vistarāt
upari upari dvāram syāt madhya adhama uttama anvitam
sopāna garbha gehe tu talam prati samācaret
upa pīṭhe catuṣkaṇṭhe sopānam pravidhīyate
maṇṭapa ābham bhavet dvāram śobhāyai paṇḍita īśvarāḥ
daṇḍa śālā sama ākārā dvāra śālā prakīrtitā
prāsāda ākṛti vat dvāra prāsādam paripaṭhyate
mālikā ākṛti vat dvāra harmyam syāt muni sattamāḥ
śālākāra samam kuryāt dvāra gopuram antimam
sarvatra gopuram kuryāt yathāśakti viśeṣataḥ
pañca bhāga ādi bhāgam vā ca ekatriṃśat sama avadhi
bhāgān kṛtvā viśālān tu gopurasya dvi bhāgataḥ
vṛddhyā tithi aṃśa antam prakalpayet
garbha geha viśālam syāt śobha ādīnām muni īśvarāḥ
tena vistāra bhāgena vyoma aṃśa dviguṇa avadhi

original: sāyataṃ vā samaṃ vāpi garbhagehaṃ prakalpayet |
analyzed: sa āyatam vā samam vā api garbhageham prakalpayet
tasmāt ūrdhvam tu dairghyam syāt adhikam dvāra tārakam
yathā bhavet tathā kuryāt gopuram muni puṅgavāḥ
garbha gehāt samantāt tu garbha ardhāt pāda vṛddhitaḥ
tri bhāga avadhi kuḍyam ca vyoma ādi bahu saṃkhyakaḥ
tathā alindam ca hāram ca kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ

original: aṃśamānena vā dvāratāraṃ vā gopuraṃ bhavet |
analyzed: aṃśa mānena vā dvāra tāram vā gopuram bhavet
tri bhāgam tu samārabhya ardha aṃśāt tithi saṃkhyayā
yāvat dvāra viśāla artham aṃśān atra prayojayet
prāsāda alaṅkṛtim ca eva śālāya alaṅkṛtim tu vā
sarvam vā gopure kuryāt sañcita ādi vibhedataḥ
nānā masūraka upetam nānā stambha samanvitam
nānā prastara saṃyuktam veda aśra gala saṃyutam
valabhi ādi śiraḥ yuktam bahu sthūpi samanvitam
kūṭaśālā eka tuṇḍaiḥ ca pañjaraiḥ pakṣaśālayā
āyāma aṃśa adhikaiḥ vā api sama aṃśaiḥ parikalpayet
nānā dvāra samāyuktam vṛṣa sthala samanvitam
dhāmnām samasta bhūṣābhiḥ anyābhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
pṛ
mūla dhāma ūna bhaumam vā sama bhaumam tu vā adhikam
khalūrikā vidhāna ukta rītyā ca etat samācaret
diś vidikṣu tat iṣṭam syāt pūrvavat prathama iṣṭakām
mūrdheṣṭakā vidhānam ca dhāma ukta vidhinā ācaret
kiñcid madhye dvayoḥ vā api ca ekam syāt sthūpikāsu vā
kṛtvā ūrdhva śailam pratyekam catur saṃkhyam niveśya ca
tad ūrdhvam sthūpikām sthāpya sthūpikā ukta vidhānataḥ
kiñca etad adhidevān ca jñāna ākhya kriyayā saha
triṣu ced syuḥ tri tattvāni catasṛṣu kalāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vivṛttiṃ ca vinā brahmarahitāḥ kāraṇaṃ tu vā || 77/87 ||
analyzed: vivṛttim ca vinā brahma rahitāḥ kāraṇam tu vā
sadyojāta ādikāḥ vā api nivṛttya ādyāḥ tu pañcasu
aṇḍa antar vartinaḥ ṣaṭsu kalā nyāsāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
kalā ādyāḥ sapta vijñeyāḥ vidyeśāḥ vasu kalpane
vāmā ādyāḥ nava kalpe syuḥ lokapālāḥ daśa ākhyake
rudra saṃkhye tu rudrāḥ syuḥ ādityāḥ ca arka saṃkhyake
proktāḥ catur pañcadaśa anvite
tithayaḥ bhuvanāni uktāḥ dakṣāt ārabhya paścime
tad tad sva nāma mantreṇa nyaset tad dhāmni nirmite
gopura sthāpanam kuryāt tad agre maṇṭape kṛte
pūrva ukta vidhinā ayukta kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile api vā
nava kuṇḍa eka saṃkhye vā puṇya aha prokṣaṇa anvite

original: sthaṇḍile vedikordhve ca aṣṭau ca sthāpayedghaṭān || 77/93 ||
analyzed: sthaṇḍile vedikā ūrdhve ca aṣṭau ca sthāpayet ghaṭān

original: madhyame ca mahādikṣu śāntyādīn tatra pūjayet |
analyzed: madhyame ca mahā dikṣu śānti ādīn tatra pūjayet
śata saṃkhyaiḥ tad ardhaiḥ vā tad mantraiḥ samidh ādibhiḥ
pūrṇā da tvā iṣṭi santuṣṭaḥ guruḥ pañca ghaṭa udake
śānti ādīn āditas nyastvā tad manūn abhiṣecayet
kriyā eṣā pracurā kāryā pradhānāḥ deśika uttamāḥ
anyatra api anukalpam syāt pracurā vā prakīrtitā
gopuram pratiyojyāḥ syuḥ nandi ādyāḥ ca dvi pārśvayoḥ
niṣkale paścima dvāram sakale dakṣiṇam hitam  /
iti kāmika ākhye mahātantre gopura sthāpana vidhiḥ pañcasaptatitamaḥ
